九江 (出生地)

-----title
开封
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a5369799e55a4a4cb0facc28e854f14c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a5369799e55a4a4cb0facc28e854f14c");'><span id='a5369799e55a4a4cb0facc28e854f14c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>，3岁</div><div id='a5369799e55a4a4cb0facc28e854f14c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1000&endYear=1000')">1000年</a>　冬，随父在京，父宋玘调任常州司理参军。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='5d9f58c149ba4890a169948a52e0c575_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5d9f58c149ba4890a169948a52e0c575");'><span id='5d9f58c149ba4890a169948a52e0c575_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1023&endYear=1024')">1023-1024年</a>，26-27岁</div><div id='5d9f58c149ba4890a169948a52e0c575' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1023&endYear=1023')">1023年</a>　冬，在京应举，始与晏殊交。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年2月</a>　二月，在京应礼部试，作《采侯诗》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年3月8日</a>　三月八日，在京，有书上刘筠。作品：座主侍郎书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157557' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157557' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157557?labeling=true' target='_blank'>座主侍郎书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年3月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157557")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157557_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157557'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157557'>三月八日，门生宋祁谨斋沐献书座主侍郎：数日前，入侍郎坐，伏蒙以《汝阴诗笔》一编俾之䌷览，捧戴震汗，罔识所寘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157557_comment'></div>亦既返穷庑，隐危几，振衣三薰，正冠一沐，然后徐绎篇次，寖求指归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157557_comment'></div>炜乎其采也，沨乎其大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157557_comment'></div>若洞庭之奏，始闻而惧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157557_comment'></div>如章台之观，三休乃跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157557_comment'></div>适然得肉以大嚼，杳然御风以忘返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157557_comment'></div>飘飘凌云气，乃游天地间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157557_comment'></div>肃肃入宗庙，但见礼乐器，不足喻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157557_comment'></div>甚幸甚幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157557_comment'></div>窃惟吟咏之作，神明攸系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157557_comment'></div>内导情性，旁概谣俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157557_comment'></div>造端以讽天下之事，变义以戛万物之蕴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157557_comment'></div>音之急缓，随政之上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157557_comment'></div>大抵三百篇，皆有为为之，非徒尔耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157557_comment'></div>后虽体判五种，时经三变，音制弥婉，体裁益致，以浮声切响相镇，以彫章缛采相矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157557_comment'></div>然而大方之家，往往披华于沈宋之林，收实乎曹王之囿，窒其流宕，归之雅正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157557_comment'></div>是以垂虹蜺，骑日月，而不为怪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157557_comment'></div>砺泰山，吞云梦，而不为广；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157557_comment'></div>矜螓首，状佩玉，而不为丽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157557_comment'></div>兴蜩螗，比朴樕，而不为烦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157557_comment'></div>道治世，语幽国，而不为佞且怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157557_comment'></div>灵均以来，未有不睹斯奥而能垂名不朽者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157557_comment'></div>自唐德有荡，人文寖微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157557_comment'></div>巷委其歌，披扇成俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157557_comment'></div>执古者过尧以入貉，徇今者袭鲁而成鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157557_comment'></div>讪怒则咄咄逼人，幽忧则跕跕堕水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157557_comment'></div>摘句则骛离朱𧩶诟之索，限局则均折杨皇荂之谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157557_comment'></div>衰微及国，无闻焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157557_comment'></div>至于幽人苾刍，遁世长往，短章悴句，时时投曲，然皆哇咬鷇音，局趣猿韵，不足论也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157557_comment'></div>伏惟侍郎明公禀道至明，为人先觉，虑含蓍蔡之吉，言埤金玉之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157557_comment'></div>三入秘禁，亲逢圣期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157557_comment'></div>且以席间谈笑经大猷，以笔端肤寸润天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157557_comment'></div>赞累盛之布度，操斯文而主盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157557_comment'></div>而乃念雅颂之沦，轸风流之弊，渡橘成枳，众雌靡雄，下垂百年者杳默遗响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157557_comment'></div>于是倡始多士，作为连章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157557_comment'></div>钩深缔情，上薄于粹古；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157557_comment'></div>促节入律，下偶乎当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157557_comment'></div>震枹鼓以竦介士，运斗杓以准四时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157557_comment'></div>复而不厌，茂而有间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157557_comment'></div>使味之栩然骇其理胜，览之又亹然恐乎卷尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157557_comment'></div>及夫盛气注射，英辞鼓动，思泉流唇，云纸落手，诸儒愿喙长而不克诵，小史惧腕废而不及书，此又精入于神，不可得而闻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157557_comment'></div>与夫订锦襄之品，诧簟袍之夺，赋韵竞病，咀父膏腴，一何区区哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157557_comment'></div>祁被蒙奖怜，擢厕荣伍，不以鞭箠之使，俾与杖履之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157557_comment'></div>手探秘笥，面命成矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157557_comment'></div>导以真人之謦欬，洒其屯膏之钝昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157557_comment'></div>徒一孤生，而再受大赐，其何况如之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157557_comment'></div>且慕有道者，折角以效巾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157557_comment'></div>爱太傅者，掩鼻而成咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157557_comment'></div>况其亲接音旨，密漱灵润？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157557_comment'></div>窃用感发，自忘顽愚，谨亦搜次旧诗，得五十首，具稿执献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157557_comment'></div>昔刘琨遗卢谌以二诗，谌不能晓，乃以常体酬报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157557_comment'></div>斯文之族，无乃类旃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157557_comment'></div>轻渎宗工，伏地俟罪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1157557_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年3月18日</a>　三月十八日，在京，于崇政殿受宋仁宗召对，与兄宋庠同榜进士及第，名列第十。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年3月</a>　三月，在京，及第后有谢座主启。作品：谢及第启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_1157673' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157673' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157673?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢及第启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157673")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157673_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157673'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157673'>雪袂传趋，并集规庭之秘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157673_comment'></div>芝函诞告，茂倾纶采之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157673_comment'></div>获预言扬，举增夕惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157673_comment'></div>窃以周家共贤者之乐，式订思皇之篇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157673_comment'></div>唐室获彀中之雄，大署前乡之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157673_comment'></div>皆以寤求侧陋，尊吁畯良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157673_comment'></div>拔十之取至精，群百之廉竞爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157673_comment'></div>粉泽贤业，于以畅同文之规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157673_comment'></div>笙簧帝谟，于以赞丕天之律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157673_comment'></div>卓为能事，属我泰辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157673_comment'></div>国家援史契以右文，宪奎钩而按牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157673_comment'></div>历选奥训，庸见大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157673_comment'></div>焕乎尧章，蔚垂光于四表；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157673_comment'></div>炳然汉德，森奏御于千篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157673_comment'></div>肃羽嬉翔，珍群簉集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157673_comment'></div>遘宅丕之承烈，咨故训以垂精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157673_comment'></div>象大璧之雍流，典容寖讲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157673_comment'></div>厉砥石而磨钝，爵驭载縻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157673_comment'></div>细文下乎方州，吉士旅于庭物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157673_comment'></div>崇简臣邻之重，慎司秀选之求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157673_comment'></div>睿式震严，庙谟敕尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157673_comment'></div>文每奏而称善，中覆用加；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157673_comment'></div>士三适而有功，新书弥谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157673_comment'></div>厦材萃止，官棫翘然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157673_comment'></div>谅匪学践圣优，职穷言贯，膝倚桑林之舞，神欲沛游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157673_comment'></div>末至睢阳之园，妍辞樀警，则何以仰膺劝驾，祗奉式言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157673_comment'></div>预棘篱之第名，备囊帷之乙览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157673_comment'></div>亶咨国彦，始协人言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157673_comment'></div>如祁者数本只奇，才无肖似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157673_comment'></div>谬参灵最，猥席庆馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157673_comment'></div>失南亩之转缘，滥中陵之乐育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157673_comment'></div>呻佔之毕，罕遘于师严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157673_comment'></div>戕屈之杯，自惊其性失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157673_comment'></div>徒以早䌷晏楹之训，久讳东家之穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157673_comment'></div>英游诮其节疏，连蹇甘乎头责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157673_comment'></div>量愁多万斛之苦，积疹岂一丸之销？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157673_comment'></div>奔走煨尘，支离皮骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157673_comment'></div>间属外侨乡梓，求饯歌苹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157673_comment'></div>州司敦遣以临门，县次偕来而续食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157673_comment'></div>利见中天之阙，独校尚书之闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157673_comment'></div>俨佩纷而并趋，几阁笔而不下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157673_comment'></div>根柢之容素乏，敢冀目成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157673_comment'></div>神明之观坐迷，颇虞气耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157673_comment'></div>勉从叩寂，内怵他先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157673_comment'></div>所宜谨颜氏之舍藏，先子云之触罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157673_comment'></div>并逃九罭，无预于盈虚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157673_comment'></div>亟骋百钩，前忧乎挠竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157673_comment'></div>宁期黔浅，误及甄收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157673_comment'></div>采啧韵于折扬，露膑姿于仁寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157673_comment'></div>越陪下缀，祗造清厢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157673_comment'></div>锦几横霞，亲呈其署议；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157673_comment'></div>枫宸烛日，谛望于颙卬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157673_comment'></div>仰清问之载俞，遽哲科而中选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157673_comment'></div>若若之绶，蕃锡以光躯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157673_comment'></div>灏灏之言，举行而申儆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157673_comment'></div>走墙奚让，涣汗莫收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157673_comment'></div>簸秕在前，顾公非而可畏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157673_comment'></div>履豨愈下，荷至鉴之不遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157673_comment'></div>矧夫埙伯之荣，冠乃王髦之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157673_comment'></div>联跗并秀，怀组相趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157673_comment'></div>佩华宠之沓臻，抚儳躬而内省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157673_comment'></div>愧流浃背，愔感装怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157673_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇阁下协比国猷，若时天縡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157673_comment'></div>赓缦云而启旦，贲倬汉以垂章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157673_comment'></div>并刈众材，居无弃物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157673_comment'></div>续凫断鹄，必尽生之短长；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157673_comment'></div>诚衡捶钩，不为人而轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157673_comment'></div>目眢拯其将坠，采菲俾于兼资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157673_comment'></div>枯木无容，罔吝牺樽之饰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1157673_comment'></div>豕苓为主，备收药箓之珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1157673_comment'></div>荷更品以于兹，抚孤生而奚报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1157673_comment'></div>谨当稽参官式，勤缉政纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1157673_comment'></div>疏瀹乃心，服朝家之成宪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1157673_comment'></div>僶俛从事，讲肉食之远谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1157673_comment'></div>仰酬如卵之私，俯厉析肝之誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1157673_comment'></div>过兹已往，未知所图。</div><div id='poem_sentence_75_1157673_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年3月</a>　三月，在京，作《景灵宫颂》作品：景灵宫颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三四。系年月份据《续资治通鉴长编》卷一〇二。）</span><div id='poem_1158032' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158032' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158032?labeling=true' target='_blank'>景灵宫颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158032")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158032_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158032'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158032'>臣闻，有开必先，大朴为神器之本；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158032_comment'></div>率义而上，九皇为圣人之祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158032_comment'></div>然则往来不穷之谓变，阴阳不测之谓神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158032_comment'></div>其精甚真，强名曰道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158032_comment'></div>故其高出太虚，深际六极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158032_comment'></div>冠三仪而称大，亘上古而难老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158032_comment'></div>帝鸿得之升云天，伯阳得之为教父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158032_comment'></div>遥源宝系，接正统以延鸿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158032_comment'></div>锡羡贻谋，启灵心而孚佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158032_comment'></div>非天下之至赜，其孰能预于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158032_comment'></div>真宗文明武定章圣元孝皇帝之在宥天下也，基命静渊之枢，绎思光明之懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158032_comment'></div>顺考古以遵妙道，聿怀福以祲群元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158032_comment'></div>虽有佳兵，不矜其忿鸷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158032_comment'></div>虽有拱璧，常宝乎慈俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158032_comment'></div>诏爵磨砥石之钝，官惟其人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158032_comment'></div>斋居录贱星之囚，刑几于措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158032_comment'></div>绝金铄，次农书，惠孤终，优老寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158032_comment'></div>弥文郁矣，监二代而可从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158032_comment'></div>大孝熙矣，放四海而皆准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158032_comment'></div>疵疠不作，宠绥有截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158032_comment'></div>于是呼韩就序，并会清明之朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158032_comment'></div>戊己撤候，咸羁荒忽之服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158032_comment'></div>《萧》《勺》四畅，粉泽交绚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158032_comment'></div>既而蕊晨真荫，接乎常明之宝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158032_comment'></div>兰宇秘图，流于主文之辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158032_comment'></div>援绝瑞，按秋游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158032_comment'></div>纵雉郁苍之椒，奠缯堆堀之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158032_comment'></div>曲礼之记三百，翕习而摅容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158032_comment'></div>神灵之封七千，昭明而受记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158032_comment'></div>下之报礼也既重，则上之降康也弥速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158032_comment'></div>当其苍水前戒，紫宙博临，瑜然象载之美，飘如风马之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158032_comment'></div>嘉夜四馥，顺拜晬清之容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158032_comment'></div>流霞载𣂏，躬闻声臭之载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158032_comment'></div>皇基逿悟，飙游上宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158032_comment'></div>天子乃稽灵心，极能事，以为誓诰所不及，则称事裁典，故我金声玉振，制仪号之当；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158032_comment'></div>天人之相交，必知意合德，故我镂版藏鐀，为积累之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158032_comment'></div>尽物之多，不足以称德，于是总鸿铄荐高广之称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158032_comment'></div>自外而至，不止于无主，于是度宝构为密靖之都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158032_comment'></div>则景灵之作，乃国家所以陈本锡支，优裕淳烈者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158032_comment'></div>故其测星庙之秘纬，即珍坤之宝势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158032_comment'></div>鼛鼓不胜其乐，灵台勿亟于成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158032_comment'></div>宛延鸿纷，上轶倒景；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158032_comment'></div>静深神丽，仰法太微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158032_comment'></div>峙大众之会，据神区之隩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158032_comment'></div>焕若飞楼之十二，接层城而在兹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158032_comment'></div>兀如神鳖之三番，负五山而不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158032_comment'></div>秘殿博敞，缭垣盘亘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158032_comment'></div>珊瑚玉树，恍陟阆风之颠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158032_comment'></div>沟水蒲池，差胜渭阳之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158032_comment'></div>采诗供清夜之诵，持节候神人之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158032_comment'></div>惟清静之庭，以观其妙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158032_comment'></div>不携贰之爽，以为之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158032_comment'></div>盖天子穆然思所以蠲烝上神，申固百禄者，又可得而云矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158032_comment'></div>先是，上栋协吉也，倚云筑而流睿唱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158032_comment'></div>银榜将署也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158032_comment'></div>泚壶墨而霏仙翰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158032_comment'></div>考室大备也，洽藻凫，晞萧露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158032_comment'></div>汉钱差赐，下逮乎门阑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158032_comment'></div>周醵啜观，遍露乎歌耋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158032_comment'></div>此乐成之三物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158032_comment'></div>典领置使，咨于台宰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158032_comment'></div>神灵标节，著之休令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158032_comment'></div>六羽基德，五云御历，受民者十四姓，长神者三百年，则见于先天之纪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158032_comment'></div>云日众变，天渊盈塞，郡国所上者数百千所，群臣将顺者千有馀篇，则存乎降圣之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158032_comment'></div>此昭荷之四物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158032_comment'></div>禘所自出，王者之配；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158032_comment'></div>益作原庙，大孝之本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158032_comment'></div>于是并诏方国，建天庆之祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158032_comment'></div>生民厥初，歆然著其盛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158032_comment'></div>有物混成，寂兮为之母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158032_comment'></div>于是嗣荐琼册，推懿后之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158032_comment'></div>典铸尚方，摹瑑黄冶，作为上帝之神宝，分镇列郡之殊庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158032_comment'></div>此隆孝之三物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158032_comment'></div>若夫赤精下教，阴骘乎九宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158032_comment'></div>朱光以渥，遂开乎百世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158032_comment'></div>事隔人理，故宫而不庙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158032_comment'></div>仪参仙品，故荐而不血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158032_comment'></div>礼有因造，事兼节文，则先圣御制赞载之备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158032_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下，奉承审训，祗遹孙谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158032_comment'></div>允执厥中，纯亦不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158032_comment'></div>方谷既富，乐凫鹥之守成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158032_comment'></div>秘过不移，善春秋之顺祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158032_comment'></div>方且载主卒业，见羹永怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158032_comment'></div>故即位之二年，诏迓先帝真像于是宫，建宝殿以奉安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158032_comment'></div>其后再郊委粟之场，大合清庙之主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158032_comment'></div>先甲而告，按斋辂以右回；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158032_comment'></div>肆夏之趋，饬扣金而一献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158032_comment'></div>又以见圣者之作，明者之述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158032_comment'></div>周家之世世修德，复命武王；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158032_comment'></div>虞民之烝烝克孝，重协于帝者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158032_comment'></div>原乎万世不毁，是之谓有功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158032_comment'></div>非人所致，是之谓受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158032_comment'></div>五运迭起，杂霸德者盖斗精之馀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158032_comment'></div>千载胥会，守天聚者必盛德之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158032_comment'></div>我宋之兴也，基乎溟涬，瓞乎遂始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158032_comment'></div>挟宇宙以制物，载降为皇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158032_comment'></div>绝天地而属民，用佐于帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158032_comment'></div>及夫气开于嗜欲之至，兆应乎精神之向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158032_comment'></div>太祖经武攻昧，躬文王之一怒，于变时雍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158032_comment'></div>太宗执竞题期，训神禹之五事，莫匪尔极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158032_comment'></div>故真考之纂大也，百度累盛，群公交告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158032_comment'></div>仁闵之监，临我而无贰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158032_comment'></div>博厚之宝，涌出而不爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158032_comment'></div>有积善为之长发，有列真迪其凝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158032_comment'></div>屹神壝，谨馨粢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158032_comment'></div>度九筵之堂，枚枚而有侐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158032_comment'></div>瞻八景之驭，飘飘而下臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158032_comment'></div>联压神皋之奥区，震显旧邦之新命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158032_comment'></div>万八千岁，俾尔寿而无疆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158032_comment'></div>十有五王，靖我民而斯久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158032_comment'></div>与夫汉纂尧后，立唐山之祀，而文献不足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158032_comment'></div>李出柱下，尊濑乡之宇，而独恭不优，非同年而语矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158032_comment'></div>而臣滥首词禁，躬阅瑞图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158032_comment'></div>猥奉方底之音，谬当成功之告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158032_comment'></div>重念永定宸刻，冠映三辰之章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158032_comment'></div>温雒秘文，稡合五星之老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158032_comment'></div>矧敢轧稽缓之蒙思，赞显承之真躅，剽皇坟之末，扬天律之大哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158032_comment'></div>姑述下武之钦崇，粗标底绩之和会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158032_comment'></div>至于奕奕寝貌，奚状万楹之多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158032_comment'></div>缦缦帝容，但继百工之和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158032_comment'></div>踯躅流汗，敢次颂云：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_120_1158032'>于皇巨宋，得天之统，绝瑞云照，繁祺山拥，福禄总兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158032_comment'></div>粤在三叶，虚晨梦协，青阁笼霄，朱文委牒，人神接兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158032_comment'></div>帝心祗遹，沛容善述，圆封累䃭，奠宗侔栗，东风秩兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158032_comment'></div>道荫孔彰，飙游下翔，歌绵悟瓞，执竞日强，命历长兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158032_comment'></div>真宗曰咨，咨尔群辟，扬庭荐号，剥圭联册，首宗祏兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158032_comment'></div>真宗曰咨，咨尔畴工，仰观星定，大度瑰宫，罄尔邕兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158032_comment'></div>炳丹激射，飞仙图写，邃轩拖虹，回阿舞马，表神舍兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158032_comment'></div>毡罽周张，琼糜迪尝，云旄芬树，罴案凝锵，奠青场兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158032_comment'></div>天锡神宝，飞荣妙道，美镠冶质，福庭分告，尊有昊兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1158032_comment'></div>帝署嘉名，宸藻乐成，娲天镂石，奎画摹星，袭六经兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1158032_comment'></div>两宫纂服，上仪繁缛，不失旧物，聿怀多福，似以续兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1158032_comment'></div>先圣丕律，美假洋溢，肖像颀长，栖神曲密，降之吉兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1158032_comment'></div>干旄之旟，惟皇厥都，有龟而书，有龙而图，沓珍符兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1158032_comment'></div>五城宛延，馆御列仙，渊然其泉，健然而天，亘永年兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_133_1158032_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年4月7日</a>　四月七日，在京预琼林宴。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='be32f20956464a17b0f6aca18864f58d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("be32f20956464a17b0f6aca18864f58d");'><span id='be32f20956464a17b0f6aca18864f58d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>，27岁</div><div id='be32f20956464a17b0f6aca18864f58d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年8月</a>　八月，在京释褐为复州军事推官。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='ca7f7135155e4d808cc3d93155145355_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ca7f7135155e4d808cc3d93155145355");'><span id='ca7f7135155e4d808cc3d93155145355_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1026&endYear=1033')">1026-1033年</a>，29-36岁</div><div id='ca7f7135155e4d808cc3d93155145355' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1026&endYear=1026')">1026年</a>　冬，代还，以孙奭荐，改大理寺丞、国子监直讲。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1026&endYear=1026')">1026年11月</a>　十一月，在京为大理寺丞，受命与杨安国等校勘明法科律疏。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1026&endYear=1026')">1026年11月</a>　冬，在京为大理寺丞，有诗献孙奭。作品：初初直讲献内阁冯学士孙侍郎。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_105624' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105624' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105624?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初除直讲献内阁冯学士孙侍郎</a><span class='authorDate'>（1026年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105624")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105624_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105624'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105624'>圆海崇遗教，中陵育茂材。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105624'>雾从仙市合，风向舞雩来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105624'>宝篆侔东壁，儒篇访曲台。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105624'>泮芹参上俎，燕彗拥轻埃。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105624'>鼓箧华冠聚，丘山缥帙开。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105624'>虫形浮墨沼，鼠耳绽经槐。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105624'>有客缘承乏，无庸愧滥陪。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105624'>难重汉家席，易眩鲁门杯。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105624'>学困青箱广，书愁皓首催。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105624'>空尘博士议，不称洛阳才。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105624'>高阁连云景，层城枕斗魁。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105624'>惟应仲尼冶，未惜铸颜回。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105624_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105624'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_105624_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1026&endYear=1026')">1026年11月</a>　冬，在京为大理寺丞，作《西斋休偃记》作品：西斋休偃记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西斋休偃记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1026年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158019")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158019'>夫坐薮泽，乐閒处，遁世者能之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158019_comment'></div>近湫隘，不易宅，有德者能之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158019_comment'></div>若吾人者，漫漶尘容，婴络世网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158019_comment'></div>进无腹背之用，退有缰锁之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158019_comment'></div>凿繁丧真，注重增拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158019_comment'></div>非得萧散之地，休偃之乐，则何以胖勤体，旺劳神，彷徉日出，专气阗实，入寥天之域哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158019_comment'></div>自予游都城，官太学，官最閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158019_comment'></div>外僦私舍，滨蔡漕，地尤岑寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158019_comment'></div>居有西斋，因得为畸人休景之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158019_comment'></div>先是，轩豁其南，以为堂庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158019_comment'></div>前人多以竹树杂艺左右，复有二夹庑，用贮陈书十许箧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158019_comment'></div>每令辰归沐，黉直番休，脱㡚褫巾，箕坐自纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158019_comment'></div>或冷风暂至，则窾者穴者槁者条者萧然并籁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158019_comment'></div>翔暾既华，则樛者挺者荟者缺者杂然布阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158019_comment'></div>于是内揵暂祛，外喧不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158019_comment'></div>呻黄卷，据藜床，兀乎摽枝，澹乎深渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158019_comment'></div>目睎飞鸿，心溯归云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158019_comment'></div>蘧蘧适适，不知周粟之薄、颜闾之陋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158019_comment'></div>昔人以名教中自有乐地，宁欺我哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158019_comment'></div>况今丛云在辰，群隽如植，巧者进取，拙者低伏，理所宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158019_comment'></div>予故拙矣，安不尔思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158019_comment'></div>就令勉倥侗之姿，希驰骛之辙，而车马官位不能动人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158019_comment'></div>色𧹞舌噏，趋步踽踽，不过肮脏门外，得家丞一谢耳，又何能请间关说，及天下事哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158019_comment'></div>昔仁者攸居，著里端而为美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158019_comment'></div>愚公所处，并谷名而遂移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158019_comment'></div>予上方既惭，下比何愧？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158019_comment'></div>尚恨非吾土者，不尔，当以朴拙名斋。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1158019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1027&endYear=1027')">1027年</a>　本年，在京为大理寺丞，有诗述怀。作品：直讲周岁。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。温谱系此诗于天圣七年，此据宋祁仕历改。）</span><div id='poem_105095' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105095' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105095?labeling=true' target='_blank'>直讲周岁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1027年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105095")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105095_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105095'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105095'>本自悲凉葆发多，何缘末至滥中阿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105095'>马肝不食非论味，狗曲犹轻枉为歌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105095'>旧学空疏缘病废，壮情牢落伴年过。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105095'>终然野鹿江鱼性，长在云林与素波。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105095_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105095'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105095_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1028&endYear=1028')">1028年</a>　春，在京为大理寺丞，有诗挽张知白。作品：哀故文节公。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_105836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>哀故文节公<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1028年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105836")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105836'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105836'>早传黄石系，未伴赤松游。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105836'>暴疹惊床蚁，深恩赐养牛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105836'>溪璜俄碎玉，川楫遂藏舟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105836'>萧相今无嗣，夫人绍酂侯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105836_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105836'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105836_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_105111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105111?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1028年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105111_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105111'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105111'>顺采思忠荩，宣谋叹巧劳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105111'>慭遗无一老，投吊剩三号。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105111'>撤奠哀笳引，追荣敛衮褒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105111'>欲知凭厚庆，弟览得传刀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105111_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105111'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105111_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_105112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105112?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1028年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105112'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105112'>霜露才婴疾，龙蛇已丧贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105112'>神骑尾星次，家托寝丘田。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105112'>长乐申君吊，东堂罢禊筵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105112'>佳城白日掩，从此即千年。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105112_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105112'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1028&endYear=1028')">1028年6月</a>　六月，在京为大理寺丞，作《陈州瑞麦赋》作品：陈州瑞麦赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷一。系年月份据《玉海》卷一九七。）</span><div id='poem_1157076' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157076' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157076?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈州瑞麦赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并表）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1028年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157076")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157076_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157076'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157076'>臣某言：伏以厥田惟上，界王国之右藩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157076_comment'></div>以谷俱来，告我牟之纪瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157076_comment'></div>事昭邦縡，美溢农书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157076_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下茂拥蕃祺，恪经善物，弄汉田而劝啬，揉神耒以训勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157076_comment'></div>扈有九官，务尽耕耘之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157076_comment'></div>地杂五种，深防水旱之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157076_comment'></div>屡敕攸司，劝登宿麦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157076_comment'></div>至诚上达，嘉气下翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157076_comment'></div>发为两岐，告成八政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157076_comment'></div>田祖有神而徯应，守邦作绘以来图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157076_comment'></div>庖穗孔蕃，天心为豫，并诏儒馆，交掞颂章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157076_comment'></div>良史必书，无谢归禾之命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157076_comment'></div>升歌大备，遂高多稌之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157076_comment'></div>臣位属冗閒，辞流涩讷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157076_comment'></div>隔从臣之品，无预奏囊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157076_comment'></div>效游童之谣，亦均嬉壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157076_comment'></div>冒闻黼几，集惧严渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157076_comment'></div>谨夙夜斋戒，撰成《陈州瑞麦赋》一首，随表上进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157076_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1157076'>赋曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1157076'>冠三辅之上者，莫迩于陈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157076_comment'></div>接五谷之乏者，孰先于麦？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157076_comment'></div>当乘离之令序，挺降麰之瑞殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157076_comment'></div>盛气云郁，混鳞隰之初霏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157076_comment'></div>密穗金繁，动星田之霁色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157076_comment'></div>两岐旁秀，六穗互出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157076_comment'></div>厥华芃芃，厥颖栗栗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157076_comment'></div>田畯奔告，守臣骇观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157076_comment'></div>伻来以图，悉上送官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157076_comment'></div>他谷弗书，视麦禾之最重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157076_comment'></div>吾王攸助，知稼穑之惟艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157076_comment'></div>沫北爰采，罔劭乎力农；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157076_comment'></div>关中益种，无闻于锡祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157076_comment'></div>讵若天极归贶，明神效异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157076_comment'></div>偕蕃椒之盈升，配命禾而合穗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157076_comment'></div>迎层宙之休气，冠中田之嘉谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157076_comment'></div>绘我于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1157076", 1157076, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>瑞图</span>，辨我于凡菽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157076_comment'></div>蒙至尊之渥惠，播新声于弦次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157076_comment'></div>上可以荐清庙之馨品，下可以助外飨之食剂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1157076_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1028&endYear=1028')">1028年9月</a>　九月，在京为大理寺丞，作《太一新宫颂》作品：太一新宫颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三五。）</span><div id='poem_1158035' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158035' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158035?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太一新宫颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1028年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158035")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158035_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158035'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158035'>臣闻昔者宅命之骏，索百神以遍祭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158035_comment'></div>降生之嘉，鼓万物而均福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158035_comment'></div>然则祀典载其群族，礼文领其盛节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158035_comment'></div>疏之则气纵而靡震，狎之则精携而不物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158035_comment'></div>上圣于是揖归运之孚佑，倚太虚而参变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158035_comment'></div>慎斋精意，洞洞属属，旁求于幽闇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158035_comment'></div>爇萧煮鬯，芬芬苾苾，烝进于馨香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158035_comment'></div>是以封君错居，守神灵者七千之广；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158035_comment'></div>冢宰制用，备祭祀者什一之仂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158035_comment'></div>诚欲异而不渎，建为有极，鼓舞至妙，祛合无垠，以亿上帝，以庇生民者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158035_comment'></div>粤若体粹亨之元，奋希微之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158035_comment'></div>厥存主宰，以司变化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158035_comment'></div>上验秘纬之次，总按万灵之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158035_comment'></div>何言而善乎应，象先而不为老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158035_comment'></div>肇称太一，尊有十神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158035_comment'></div>亳忌启奉祠之方，天官著常居之记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158035_comment'></div>化截群有，辅盖高之监；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158035_comment'></div>文包幽室，启无穷之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158035_comment'></div>畴祀恤而不昌，罔匮神而能永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158035_comment'></div>若乃瑰宫奕奕，砻砥而孔曼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158035_comment'></div>嘉坛崇崇，藉罽而四合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158035_comment'></div>蕊笈真籍，按循醮戒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158035_comment'></div>草楼上士，奉承薰濯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158035_comment'></div>沃酒茅以示洁，默牲銮而撤腥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158035_comment'></div>蒐三代之文，有所未秩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158035_comment'></div>揽群条之极，制定其当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158035_comment'></div>质不及野，仪不过物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158035_comment'></div>镇神华以作固，举裨海而蒙祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158035_comment'></div>非巨宋之善制，畴克臻于此耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158035_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下高拱密清，共规洪鬯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158035_comment'></div>得天统以播宪，括地象而经野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158035_comment'></div>建大中之治，陈之浃日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158035_comment'></div>订丕承之烈，肆于时夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158035_comment'></div>尺一信牍，重抚树惇之乡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158035_comment'></div>六齐佳兵，更铸大农之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158035_comment'></div>回霜收电，而钦刑之恤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158035_comment'></div>针疽委辔，而慎赦之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158035_comment'></div>合质剂以一度，同土炭以均风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158035_comment'></div>扪箕舌而堲佞谗，攦倕指而黜纤巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158035_comment'></div>于是都人摈踶齧于赘聚，女红后纂组于纴织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158035_comment'></div>薪棫美官人之盛，鲿鱼譬万物之多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158035_comment'></div>光明缉熙，上下充格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158035_comment'></div>儒者之喙三尺，讷于抒颂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158035_comment'></div>从臣之橐千翰，秃于宣美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158035_comment'></div>方复澹然无治，几而不康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158035_comment'></div>可以震珍见怪者罔不祈，可以蒙嘉获丰者罔不序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158035_comment'></div>由是种祠旧畤，悉领县官，嘉币偶马，以为岁事者不可载已，乃诏建太一宫于都城之西南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158035_comment'></div>顺礼文，介熙事，且言时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158035_comment'></div>先是筮龟既同，天星既中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158035_comment'></div>圭以溯景，臬以攻位，镇沉奥之厚载，据神明之积高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158035_comment'></div>审曲有经，伻图中覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158035_comment'></div>陛下以为崇奉真荫，导迎秘祉，不可屈外府之财用，取祝史之辞忱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158035_comment'></div>乃命损乘舆张饬，发少府藏，偿其调度，因过更冗卒，覆将作善匠，给其员程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158035_comment'></div>既而陇材千章，周版百堵，督墨为雨，叩鼛成雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158035_comment'></div>法《大壮》之上栋，宪《斯干》之南户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158035_comment'></div>人不抶勉，工以雄成，未踰二时，大告考室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158035_comment'></div>述夫秘殿，则崔嵬博敞，郁律鸿纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158035_comment'></div>翠虬齐首以负栋，海鸱疐尾而衔瓦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158035_comment'></div>玉磶重荷，文珰四注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158035_comment'></div>阳宗倒光以纳景，阴祇濛雾而扶倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158035_comment'></div>犀尘不游，螟风无隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158035_comment'></div>乃有皇邸五色，黼帷九张，为之真寝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158035_comment'></div>乃有云梢三素，绿舆八景，储乎仙卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158035_comment'></div>甲乙异帐，辛壬殊秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158035_comment'></div>众殿并列，十座如一，焕紫宫之是环，羾赤霄而可挹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158035_comment'></div>其左右则飞宇回带，修廊班属，云楶百层，芝栭万状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158035_comment'></div>因其真画之品，并绘群灵之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158035_comment'></div>恍然觉神仙之可以致，肃然知鬼神之易为巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158035_comment'></div>其前则藻扃连观，抗为重门，树松隐椎，表其驰道，揭示篆银之榜，列坐铸镣之狄，所以震叠焜照千祀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158035_comment'></div>其外则缭垣自盛，灵囿封殖，甘露腾文于茂树，醴泉侧出于阴沟，间以九层之台，五城之楼，荣曝偓佺，袂挹浮丘，所以范围鸿洞九清也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158035_comment'></div>及夫尝烝戒旦，刚柔涓辰，祓惟净之场，裒列真之对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158035_comment'></div>于是乎水土和气之实，玉帛二精之虔，沚毛纷旅，泂潦淳溉，仙浆挹斗，香云薄霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158035_comment'></div>像以鸾辂龙驹，器以扣金华盖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158035_comment'></div>瑞祝发中而临遣，使者持节以侍祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158035_comment'></div>灵璈绛幡，导乎谒款，则盥而不荐，稽大《易》之象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158035_comment'></div>坐工合乐，陪乎夜诵，则昏祠至明，采甘泉之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158035_comment'></div>高真并享，啐福如仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158035_comment'></div>飞龙秋游以格思，肸蚃兴作而归福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158035_comment'></div>数百千所，聊记符瑞之多；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158035_comment'></div>七十五来，更迈神光之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158035_comment'></div>猗欤盛哉，浚哲之能事，神明之钜典也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158035_comment'></div>盖制作之本，我朝旧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158035_comment'></div>始太宗徇史官之请，胥宇于国南，以开拜贶之馆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158035_comment'></div>今陛下按故府之法，度筵于都右，以敞集灵之庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158035_comment'></div>俯仰其前，不失夏家之旧物，陟降于上，越成周邦之新命，有由然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158035_comment'></div>夫神能专福，不加于鲜德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158035_comment'></div>君能专祀，不殖于非礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158035_comment'></div>且如黜其刲血，岂为觳觫之爱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158035_comment'></div>而懿德改荐，遂介无疆之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158035_comment'></div>探乎秘经，不徇拘挛之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158035_comment'></div>而层构昭事，自成一王之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158035_comment'></div>捐金斥币，纾执事之滞，而民不益赋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158035_comment'></div>升坛奠斝，为百姓之请，而过无移下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158035_comment'></div>由是言之，宁不善始善述？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158035_comment'></div>虽丝衣其紑，高子志星尸之绎，梦蛇下属，文公作鄜畤之瑞，待我具五，始标黑帝之祠，向坐而拜，躬接高门之享，一何区区者已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158035_comment'></div>下臣陶乃文之化，觌告成之迹，固非大夫之能赋，实虞薪者之多诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158035_comment'></div>辄次舆颂，升之有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158035_comment'></div>其辞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_97_1158035'>奂焉层构兮，镇我都之夹右兮，我稽神宗之旧兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_98_1158035'>右一章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_99_1158035'>肃然上灵兮，戾我宫之靖冥兮，我据昭德之馨兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_1158035'>右二章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_101_1158035'>帝宥黔黎兮，匪孔祷之私兮，与神裒是对兮，俾物之阜而滋兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_1158035'>右三章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_103_1158035'>天眷圣皇兮，执周道之彊兮，俾君寿而臧兮，配天之久且长兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158035_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_104_1158035'>右四章。</div><div id='poem_sentence_104_1158035_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1028&endYear=1028')">1028年</a>　秋，在京为大理寺丞，作《皇帝后苑燕射赋》作品：皇帝后苑燕射赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1157077' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157077' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157077?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇帝后苑燕射赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并表序天圣六年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1028年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157077")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157077_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157077'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157077'>臣祁言：伏闻今月九日幸后苑，诏宗室赐宴射弓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157077_comment'></div>气肃商旻，神清汉籞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157077_comment'></div>展懿亲而合宴，讲王射以侑欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157077_comment'></div>常武是经，良辰饰喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157077_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下，靖嘉民极，勤训道枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157077_comment'></div>钧众志以惟精，乂永图而无逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157077_comment'></div>夹辅蕃屏，立爱于周亲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157077_comment'></div>夏屋权舆，示慈于镐饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157077_comment'></div>乘九秋之盛集，修六耦之帝容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157077_comment'></div>终日射侯，不出正而命中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157077_comment'></div>嘉宾式燕，实厥篚以奉将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157077_comment'></div>洽公姓之乐胥，竦臣邻之咏叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157077_comment'></div>多仪有焕，在古罕偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157077_comment'></div>臣位属冗閒，业专讲肄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157077_comment'></div>久陶景化，窃耳大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157077_comment'></div>敢萌诵圣之心，仰企强名之作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157077_comment'></div>感缘中发，虽极抃于四支；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157077_comment'></div>音以叩烦，更增羞于五降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157077_comment'></div>谨夙夜斋戒，撰成《皇帝后苑燕射赋》一首，缮写随表上进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157077_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1157077'>臣闻羲图肇画，诸睽取星弧之象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157077_comment'></div>周文弥郁，大乐著天驺之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157077_comment'></div>谅以四方为志，本男子之事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157077_comment'></div>一张作武，震王者之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157077_comment'></div>自秦制专私，汉道云杂，徒存燕射之旧礼，罕闻明辟之亲御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157077_comment'></div>惟魏祖畋南皮之野，一日射雉，获六十三头，史笔诧其妙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157077_comment'></div>文成避灵丘之区，仰山发矢，高四百馀丈，琰刻旌其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157077_comment'></div>是皆殊绝之诡遇，本非揖让之多仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157077_comment'></div>摅其善经，徯我嘉会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157077_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下，膺载周之陈锡，绍放唐之丕律，高拱岩廊之上，丕冒环海之表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157077_comment'></div>百执之骏奔走，无或旷官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157077_comment'></div>四方之大和会，不知何力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157077_comment'></div>于是外朝夙退，杪秋告丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157077_comment'></div>庆重合之阳名，申式遨之夏具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157077_comment'></div>披虎落之囿，会麟定之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157077_comment'></div>始讲射侯之容，将明洁觯之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157077_comment'></div>若其天威粹健，帝表胖正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157077_comment'></div>雕弓栗笴，俨若有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157077_comment'></div>栖鹄画正，砉然命中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157077_comment'></div>欢声回商琯之肃，馀劲助霜旻之高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157077_comment'></div>宗室奉觞，以次称寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157077_comment'></div>佥谓天挺其武，所以辅文之缛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157077_comment'></div>事本于礼，所以缀乐之谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157077_comment'></div>盖陛下财成大猷，冠卓千古，是而弗纪，有司之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157077_comment'></div>夫言以文远，功由赋宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157077_comment'></div>不有作者，将何述焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157077_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_1157077'>执徐统岁，少皞司秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157077_comment'></div>月著授衣之令，日纪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1157077", 1157077, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>吹花</span>之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157077_comment'></div>仙盘露变，神阙云浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157077_comment'></div>田畯告茨粱之获，乡童启豫助之讴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157077_comment'></div>上乃留瞩良辰，载怀茂苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157077_comment'></div>呼跸复道，回舆帐殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157077_comment'></div>望葱郁于麟棷，披阴岑于虎圈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157077_comment'></div>跄凤遥溯，相乌细转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157077_comment'></div>凉翠下长杨之宫，暝紫入棠梨之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157077_comment'></div>千门洞接，九幄霞连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157077_comment'></div>周邦则伯叔之懿，汉家则肺腑之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157077_comment'></div>相趋规地，杂簉琼筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157077_comment'></div>俨飞绥而交弭，森委佩而凝鋗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157077_comment'></div>川醪溢汎，骑炙纷传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157077_comment'></div>湛其露而在草，需有云而上天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157077_comment'></div>先是司射谨官，梓人庀具，饰虎进侯，张狸设步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157077_comment'></div>上干下干之交维，三乏三正之并树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157077_comment'></div>排崇旌以虹拖，画广堋而云布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157077_comment'></div>并夹并储，决拾相旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157077_comment'></div>我物孔扬，我仪用光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157077_comment'></div>剡矢荐于夏箙，彫弓出于扶桑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157077_comment'></div>彩五施而列晕，歌九节而升堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157077_comment'></div>万乘来御，群心乐康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157077_comment'></div>弦随月上，弓与天张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1157077_comment'></div>姬周则多材之主，汤乙乃甚武之王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1157077_comment'></div>有翼有严，不戁不竦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1157077_comment'></div>舍拔则拱，应弦而中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1157077_comment'></div>主皮划其已彻，劲羽饮而犹动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1157077_comment'></div>骇踆乌于日域，震封狼于星冢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1157077_comment'></div>彼艺有六，徒得乎剡注参连；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1157077_comment'></div>我善兼五，不专乎兴舞和颂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1157077_comment'></div>掩前辟以擅名，表上天之锡勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1157077_comment'></div>于是皇襟兑悦，协气云蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1157077_comment'></div>少府之赐钱流地，庖人之割肉如陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1157077_comment'></div>示慈则折节加俎，式宴则鼓瑟吹笙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1157077_comment'></div>轩霞蕃后，磐石宗英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1157077_comment'></div>美发的之希代，咸奉觞而造庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1157077_comment'></div>似雍泽之翔振鹭，若辰居之环列星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1157077_comment'></div>原夫射之为义，是谓观礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1157077_comment'></div>外则审固而正躬，内则雍容而绎志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1157077_comment'></div>支左诎右之能，项发口纵之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1157077_comment'></div>或合宴序宾，或算多与祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1157077_comment'></div>公用隼而射墉，观如墙而扬觯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1157077_comment'></div>中则得为诸侯，争有似乎君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1157077_comment'></div>然特人臣之善容，未识我皇之射意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1157077_comment'></div>若夫修五常为弓，矫百度为矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1157077_comment'></div>总黎献以树的，罄绵区而除位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1157077_comment'></div>参天地之控引，顺阴阳而张弛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1157077_comment'></div>一发则英雄在彀，虚抚则蛮夷断臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1157077_comment'></div>岂徒鹄为小鸟，取难中之名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1157077_comment'></div>驺曰仁兽，乐庶官之备而已哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1157077_comment'></div>是日，太师阕乐，酒正彻觞，辰旋回指，归于未央。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1157077_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1029&endYear=1029')">1029年3月</a>　三月，在京为大理寺丞，作《上苑牡丹赋》作品：上苑牡丹赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1157078' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157078' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157078?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上苑牡丹赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序天圣七年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1029年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157078")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157078_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157078'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157078'>臣闻天以盖高为质，不待言以达意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157078_comment'></div>物以非常为感，不择物而效瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157078_comment'></div>故日月得之为见象，草木得之为鸿英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157078_comment'></div>尧则萱草莳陛陲，汉则玉芝秀池霤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157078_comment'></div>《桃夭》美室家之盛，《蓼萧》著王泽之广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157078_comment'></div>托县虽细，贶施甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157078_comment'></div>圣上即位之七年春三月，内苑出牡丹三种，特异常卉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157078_comment'></div>其一，双头并干；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157078_comment'></div>其二，千叶一房；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157078_comment'></div>其三，二花攒萼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157078_comment'></div>跗足甚大，葩色正红。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157078_comment'></div>盖上帝博临之都，休精回复之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157078_comment'></div>袭百昌以挺出，震殊应而沓臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157078_comment'></div>圣上美兹嘉生，载延睿赏，有诏侍从，咸俾陈篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157078_comment'></div>良以天瑞来，皇襟豫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157078_comment'></div>物宜遂，颂声作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157078_comment'></div>其《崇丘》、《行苇》之比乎，都荔桂华之俦乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157078_comment'></div>下臣无庸，窃耳嘉致，饰是蹈舞，永为文词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157078_comment'></div>不敢预枚皋之伦，庶将备遒人之采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157078_comment'></div>赋曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1157078'>夫何牡丹之挺育，冠群葩以擅奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157078_comment'></div>历上古而隐景，逮中世而扬蕤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157078_comment'></div>桐君之录兮，曾莫余毒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157078_comment'></div>谢客之咏兮，盖殊尔知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157078_comment'></div>有隋种艺之书，疏略而未载；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157078_comment'></div>子华绘素之笔，髣髴而传疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157078_comment'></div>盖神明其德，故隐显从时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157078_comment'></div>昔也始来，由皇唐之缀赏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157078_comment'></div>今而荐瑞，徯我宋之重熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157078_comment'></div>徒观夫强干深根，交柯委质，腻理内滋，夸容横出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157078_comment'></div>材无用兮，不敢美于匠目；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157078_comment'></div>子非甘兮，不见伤于口实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157078_comment'></div>怀香馥郁，结荫葱密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157078_comment'></div>让众卉之先荣，灿灵华而后出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157078_comment'></div>鲜苞星布，丹艳霞蔚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157078_comment'></div>杂双行之重锦，衒已文之两黻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157078_comment'></div>挹仙掌之承露，溯咸池之浴日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157078_comment'></div>莫不玩之者怡神，揽之者蠲疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157078_comment'></div>彼芍药萱草之凡材，秾李摽梅之俗物，杜若骚人，兰香燕姞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157078_comment'></div>曾不得齿其徒隶，况与之论其甲乙哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157078_comment'></div>于是圭苑密清，瑞殖欣荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157078_comment'></div>翠华雷豫，清跸天行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157078_comment'></div>眷大造之吻合，庆神物之财成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157078_comment'></div>粤双跗之特异，与合干而同名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157078_comment'></div>为贵于多，何如千叶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157078_comment'></div>莫斯为盛，谁比三英？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157078_comment'></div>信夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157078_comment'></div>顾神县以隤祉，戛珍坤而炳灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157078_comment'></div>匪一花之取贵，盖万物之厚生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157078_comment'></div>于是宸瞩洒然，群心乐只。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157078_comment'></div>诏从橐以均赏，肆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_49_1157078", 1157078, "Clauses/108/Comments/0")'>诗风</span>而饰喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157078_comment'></div>且其铺观往图，各祛茂祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157078_comment'></div>胡不出于下土，而出乎京师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157078_comment'></div>胡不萃于异品，而钟乎花卉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157078_comment'></div>臣愚不识，请占之天意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157078_comment'></div>若曰：双头者，两宫之应，同德之象，馨香升闻，亿兆攸仰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157078_comment'></div>千叶者，卜年之数，永命所基，宜尔子孙，以大本支；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157078_comment'></div>三花者，品物盛多，黎庶蕃庑，德宇宏被，恩腴周普。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157078_comment'></div>有一于此，尚可咤丕应，奋终古，况凝层昊之协气，萃上林之敏树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157078_comment'></div>重葩叠叶，凝丹绚素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157078_comment'></div>迩颙若之龙颜，间娑然之凤羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157078_comment'></div>亦由芝房之唱，升汉之郊庙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157078_comment'></div>桃花之行，著唐之乐府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157078_comment'></div>上方执冲德，合鸿猷，特以人瑞为应，不以物瑞为尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157078_comment'></div>则是花也，聊可玩于耳目，故虽休而勿休。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_63_1157078'></div><div id='poem_sentence_63_1157078_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157078'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「赋系天圣七年祁为国子监直讲时上。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157078_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1029&endYear=1029')">1029年</a>　本年，在京为大理寺丞，有诗挽鲁宗道。作品：肃简鲁公挽词四首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_105099' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105099' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105099?labeling=true' target='_blank'>肃简鲁公挽词四首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1029年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105099")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105099_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105099'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105099'>拂世谟谋盛，端朝载采熙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105099_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105099'>上前推汲直，天下咏曹随。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105099_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105099'>密启多焚草，加餐餍嗜葵。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105099_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105099'>不图霜露疾，奄忽丧元龟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105099_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105099'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105099_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_105098' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105098' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105098?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1029年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105098_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105098'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105098'>震邸陪翔凤，天坛侍祭牲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105098'>参谋大丞相，别对小延英。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105098'>上栋方隆国，颓山遽奠楹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105098'>武公年不至，辅德是功名。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105098'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105098_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_105097' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105097' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105097?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1029年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105097_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105097'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105097'>忧国神无爱，呼医体寖臞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105097_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105097'>人忧一台坼，帝遣两驺扶。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105097_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105097'>临视回襄御，遗言入舜谟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105097_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105097'>七兵荣赠册，沉础贲龟趺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105097_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105097'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105097_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_104563' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104563?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1029年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104563_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104563'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104563'>密勿千龄旦，生平三命恭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104563'>承家男得凤，择婿女乘龙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104563'>酂邑穷遗产，邢山卜素封。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104563'>空馀吊客泪，倾海望长松。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104563_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104563'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104563_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1030')">1030年</a>　四月，在京为大理寺丞，作序送张保雍出任两浙转运使。作品：送张端公转运两浙序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四五。）</span><div id='poem_1157959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157959?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送张端公转运两浙序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1030年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157959")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157959_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157959'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157959'>国朝析扬州具区之地为二浙，以建行台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157959_comment'></div>北汇三江，东引五湖，而注之海，尽浙分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157959_comment'></div>地殖稻鱼，山采铅铜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157959_comment'></div>熬盐赋荈，错出珍贝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157959_comment'></div>飞舻长帆，以输都藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157959_comment'></div>号令经营，天下之甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157959_comment'></div>故漕局兼按，必难其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157959_comment'></div>岁在庚午夏四月，清河张君冠柱后惠文，以二千石持节领使，东南之利，得尽商之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157959_comment'></div>初，君以粹和文明，夷靖强立，毅然声采，出诸公间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157959_comment'></div>培风览德，遂簉鹓鹭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157959_comment'></div>乘传蜀道也，按谳平允，除缴绕之禁，属城畏之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157959_comment'></div>佐治天邑也，精力靡盬，溯密靖之风，都人宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157959_comment'></div>话言艺极，优为沛力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157959_comment'></div>坚金所柅，而群躁就制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157959_comment'></div>大刀所奏，而众綮洞分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157959_comment'></div>惟二宫亦知其能，故淑旂赤裳倚君为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157959_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157959_comment'></div>君又将推二方之善政，化吴粤之细民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157959_comment'></div>检其放佚，驱之忠厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157959_comment'></div>底慎财求，推明章程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157959_comment'></div>幅利便民，振淹纠慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157959_comment'></div>缓阁更赋，悦息夫家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157959_comment'></div>将使一方之人，和声善气，韵为景风，蒸为甘濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157959_comment'></div>予知夫诛求辜榷权谲一切之政，自君革焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157959_comment'></div>斋刀启行，朱芾在股，行矣强饭，企乎令声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157959_comment'></div>公卿有缺，予又将见君之入也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157959_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1157959_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1030')">1030年</a>　冬，继母朱夫人卒，退居畿邑守丧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1030')">1030年</a>　冬，在京为继母守丧，有诗。作品：答书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一一。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　本年，在京为继母守丧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年12月</a>　十二月，在京服除，迁殿中丞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年12月18日</a>　十二月十八日，在京为殿中丞，试学士院，以本官直史馆。作品：琬圭赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1157107' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157107' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157107?labeling=true' target='_blank'>琬圭赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（王赐之节，修德崇好。　明道元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年12月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157107")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157107_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157107'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157107'>彼玉之贵，待人而彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157107_comment'></div>嘉琬圭之作瑞，旌列辟以勤王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157107_comment'></div>使介奉承，杀锋芒而见美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157107_comment'></div>缫文升荐，挺温润以含章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157107_comment'></div>古者利厥建侯，宠其受赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157107_comment'></div>琢兹缜栗之质，奖彼蕃宣之懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157107_comment'></div>事备著于《周官》，职兼存于《汉纪》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157107_comment'></div>秉为瑞节，爰发采于帝庭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157107_comment'></div>奉作龙光，自凝华于国器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157107_comment'></div>始也效珍美璞，献状攸司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157107_comment'></div>圆首露粹，方形究奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157107_comment'></div>信为宝之尤者，非假人而用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157107_comment'></div>申锡以庸，居有握瑜之美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157107_comment'></div>保持在德，绝无磨玷之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157107_comment'></div>及夫臣告成功，君嘉茂烈，则是圭也，出国之府，旌邦之杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157107_comment'></div>外碌碌以云坚，内温温而表洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157107_comment'></div>其致也，行人达命，迈刻虎以为符；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157107_comment'></div>其聘也，大夫以时，越铸龙而用节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157107_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157107_comment'></div>治德本乎无怠，讲好在乎勤修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157107_comment'></div>尔功之昭，则赠圭之重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157107_comment'></div>彼绩不建，则贻玉之羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157107_comment'></div>是以上无虚授，下靡妄求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157107_comment'></div>初疑前诎之葵，光昭臣范；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157107_comment'></div>终比不趋之玉，茂对王休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157107_comment'></div>是知嘉乃爱民，观其述职，保邦则据以为重，命事则陈而有翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157107_comment'></div>什袭之缇是奉，何患越乡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157107_comment'></div>五等之爵不踰，盖将比德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157107_comment'></div>和难者，安能均美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157107_comment'></div>判规者，未必同功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157107_comment'></div>曷若我徽章所被，礼典是崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157107_comment'></div>蕴虹采以自照，贲天光而有融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157107_comment'></div>受事于朝，式并舜颁之瑞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157107_comment'></div>永孚于下，本非周剪之桐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157107_comment'></div>美哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157107_comment'></div>元后向明，多方匪傲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157107_comment'></div>不爱宝以酬德，惟协邦而结好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157107_comment'></div>尔公尔侯，宜念吾王之厚报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1157107_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年12月</a>　十二月，在京为殿中丞，有谢直史馆启。作品：谢直馆启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157780' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157780' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157780?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢直馆启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157780")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157780_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157780'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157780'>今月十九日，蒙恩充前件职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157780_comment'></div>祗服言纶，入尘藏室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157780_comment'></div>用浮才表，愧溢情涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157780_comment'></div>窃念祁仆遫无能，倥侗有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157780_comment'></div>世微膴仕，天与数奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157780_comment'></div>甫冠而孤，未堪多难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157780_comment'></div>过时乃学，遂不名家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157780_comment'></div>由乡老以宾兴，参仕途而扬历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157780_comment'></div>间关吏事，污蔑尘容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157780_comment'></div>入陪上计之期，行俟有幽之黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157780_comment'></div>至今含垢，善养如春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157780_comment'></div>回备责于最科，俾改升于卿属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157780_comment'></div>上庠乏使，中诏甫留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157780_comment'></div>倚席穷年，离经乏效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157780_comment'></div>如天有斗，非取于挹浆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157780_comment'></div>譬马食肝，敢言于知味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157780_comment'></div>奄衔亲恤，自屏民廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157780_comment'></div>揭白日之昭昭，卧清漳而奄奄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157780_comment'></div>缟祥有讫，食息偶存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157780_comment'></div>不谓执政之臣，请间言上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157780_comment'></div>旁呼俊茂，并及妄庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157780_comment'></div>趣以复官，敦其给札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157780_comment'></div>会斯干之考室，括裨海以蒙禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157780_comment'></div>别寘朝班，入趣会表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157780_comment'></div>逮膺试可，愈恧无文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157780_comment'></div>晨葩并春，枯杨知其难艳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157780_comment'></div>天髦同辔，骀步判其先颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157780_comment'></div>幸得罢归，以惩妄进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157780_comment'></div>而睿明收采，承弼赞襄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157780_comment'></div>帖䌷史之美名，竦群材之觖望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157780_comment'></div>揆能隘薄，闻命震惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157780_comment'></div>且古有载言，代为丕训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157780_comment'></div>闻宣父之叹，犹及阙文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157780_comment'></div>有子长之才，乃称实录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157780_comment'></div>国家建明天载，以贲大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157780_comment'></div>招致乂英，茂充秘馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157780_comment'></div>磨研编削，盛东观之游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157780_comment'></div>供帐餐钱，抗开元之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157780_comment'></div>罔深道训，曷宿官成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157780_comment'></div>顾兹画饼之名，超据采薪之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157780_comment'></div>谅缘外奖，方玷荣阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157780_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇阁下均爱汇茅，助封芃棫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157780_comment'></div>务英才之乐，有味其言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157780_comment'></div>极荐宠之私，豫为之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157780_comment'></div>假冷风之末力，涂断木之繁文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157780_comment'></div>密导茂恩，俾加无状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157780_comment'></div>敢不懋明乃志，慎伏攸箴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157780_comment'></div>遵道以行，惟书尽信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157780_comment'></div>灵龟自守，潜戒于朵颐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157780_comment'></div>鸣鸡有晨，不愆于如晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157780_comment'></div>庶逃司败，罔忝知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157780_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1157780_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　冬，在京为殿中丞，有诗送梅询知并州。作品：送梅学密赴并州。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一五。）</span>送枢直梅学士守并州。<span
