"poem_title_105288")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105288_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105288'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105288'>笳箫后队联幽侠，璧马中军聘楚材。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105288_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_105661' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105661' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105661?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送枢直梅学士守并州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105661")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105661_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105661'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105661'>素领登朝旧，黄枢递直新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105661'>还持汉家节，坐福晋墟民。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105661'>旆羽凌霜晓，袍花犯雪春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105661'>连云祖坛幄，隘道舞骖尘。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105661'>檄楯边书息，羹羊府宴均。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105661'>唐诗存雅俗，亥字访遗人。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105661_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105661'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_105661_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年2月</a>　二月，在京为殿中丞，有诗和宋仁宗。作品：和御制皇太后恭谢太庙。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二三。温谱系此诗于明道元年，此据宋仁宗《来年耕籍皇太后恭谢太庙御札》（《宋大诏令集》卷一三四）改。）</span><div id='poem_104548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和御制皇太后恭谢太庙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104548")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_104548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104548'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104548'>柔极深慈冠古先，谢成宗祏奉斋牷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104548'>欲知太姒嗣音盛，亲见周王作雅年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104548'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_104548_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年2月</a>　二月，在京为殿中丞，作《皇太后躬谒清庙赋》作品：皇太后躬谒清庙赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1157079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇太后躬谒清庙赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并表明道二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157079")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157079'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157079'>臣某言：伏以遹追孝者，雅人歌其匪棘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157079_comment'></div>能事神者，书策美其多材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157079_comment'></div>况祗款庙祧，裒对宗祢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157079_comment'></div>宣治馨而有飶，恍忾叹以如闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157079_comment'></div>从昔所难，乃今具举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157079_comment'></div>恭惟皇太后陛下，至仁兼爱，柔道体元，保育长君，就成圣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157079_comment'></div>出入一纪，巩固万枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157079_comment'></div>黎苗偃化，则泽从云游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157079_comment'></div>殊邻结好，则倚若天等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157079_comment'></div>三光储发歛之度，百物遂零茂之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157079_comment'></div>且念措多方之治平，皆真考之遗法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157079_comment'></div>成功不荐，审训谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157079_comment'></div>亟诏攸司，属图新礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157079_comment'></div>躬按天飞之驭，并会月游之庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157079_comment'></div>万羽蹈扬，袆章参亚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157079_comment'></div>逮晏朝而已事，因列圣以居歆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157079_comment'></div>薰然至和，入金匏而成象；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157079_comment'></div>锡之多福，塞穹壤以无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157079_comment'></div>臣属在陪祠，职当汗简，轻率斐狂之思，少裨舞叹之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157079_comment'></div>敢露欢悰，自忘朴学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157079_comment'></div>谨夙夜斋沐，撰成《皇太后躬谒清庙赋》一首，干渎宸览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157079_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1157079'>闻夫祀以息民，王假有庙，昔人美而称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157079_comment'></div>殊不知粢盛之香，所恃者昭德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157079_comment'></div>祝史之荐，不愧者信辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157079_comment'></div>济济非尽志之貌，翼翼为多福之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157079_comment'></div>然未有祓精，意燀鸿仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157079_comment'></div>仰瞻丹楹，则祫而后献；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157079_comment'></div>俯奠嘉玉，则告而不祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157079_comment'></div>非圣后之有作，畴能出千古而鬯丰规哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157079_comment'></div>于皇齐圣，绍天葆命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157079_comment'></div>佑育我长君，财成我庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157079_comment'></div>十有一年，绵区厎定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157079_comment'></div>且曰予惟膺真庙之托，耿列圣之光，投艰夙夜，罔或怠遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157079_comment'></div>幸三边无谁何之警，万物跻仁寿之场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157079_comment'></div>若使功成不告，则春秋祗事，无以奉承审训而享我先王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157079_comment'></div>丕显明辟，孝爱兼极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157079_comment'></div>将顺德音，爰告方国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157079_comment'></div>列保荫于亲慈，谂勤劳于圣职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157079_comment'></div>粤若朝多吉士，位靡瘝官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157079_comment'></div>乃承乃弼，为屏为翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157079_comment'></div>薪有芃棫，河无伐檀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157079_comment'></div>此则圣后备陶姚则哲之难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157079_comment'></div>清问下民，哀矜庶狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157079_comment'></div>兴列化条，恢疏网目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157079_comment'></div>杜其牙角，保我墉屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157079_comment'></div>此则圣后有成康措刑之速也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157079_comment'></div>每岁命使，继好龙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157079_comment'></div>轒辒相衔，厥角相平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157079_comment'></div>罔投以饵，罔系以缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157079_comment'></div>此则圣后保汉宣抚和之盟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157079_comment'></div>能仁精庐，圣仙福地，有种于祠，有歆于类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157079_comment'></div>莫不发少府之藏，贲万楹之丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157079_comment'></div>此则圣后奉唐家戒禧之至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157079_comment'></div>恭则易优，俭斯少欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157079_comment'></div>金玉不扣于上方之器，纂组不丽于三宫之服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157079_comment'></div>别苑无从禽，离宫无改筑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157079_comment'></div>此则圣后守黄老清静之躅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157079_comment'></div>至于熙百志，乂万枢，粹与天谋，冲与道俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157079_comment'></div>朝未昕而晰燎，夜已乙而观书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157079_comment'></div>尚且勤劳励翼，辑阙衮而按罗图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157079_comment'></div>是以长乐之记，彤管之史，休功懿绩，纷纶填委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157079_comment'></div>虽巧劳与智忧，邈无阶而胜纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157079_comment'></div>是宜格祖谢成，有斋恤祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157079_comment'></div>答在天之丕覆，拥如山之秘祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157079_comment'></div>于是方岳投颂，臣邻肄仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157079_comment'></div>增蔽旒于法冕，加缛采于袆衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157079_comment'></div>皆宸心之参定，掩前圣之未思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157079_comment'></div>仍以仲春吉日，曳九旗，参六螭，云罕前导，王轪下驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157079_comment'></div>羲和扫霞以登照，雨师沈景而藏霏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1157079_comment'></div>攸徂之民，注耳倾目者以万计，惟恐属车之行迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1157079_comment'></div>宝辂徐动，云帘四垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1157079_comment'></div>翟茀騩乘，次于鸡翘之省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1157079_comment'></div>莫不穆穆肃肃，按周道而翳华芝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1157079_comment'></div>有侐閟宫，光昭帝容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1157079_comment'></div>百工如绣，广乐成宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1157079_comment'></div>咀芝英以自洁，秉葵首而有融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1157079_comment'></div>鸾刀騞然，刑丽牲以升几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1157079_comment'></div>玉瓒觓尔，湛明水而函空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1157079_comment'></div>边豆惟旅，铏芼相从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1157079_comment'></div>遍七室以沃灌，罄一德而虔恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1157079_comment'></div>星妃备亚献之列，月后谨三酌之容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1157079_comment'></div>二告交答，万祥来同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1157079_comment'></div>然而归蕃釐于嗣帝，让懿铄乎祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1157079_comment'></div>是以秘祝私请，无一当于圣躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1157079_comment'></div>宁不谓虑危以安，保盈以冲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1157079_comment'></div>虽古之任姒马邓，区区述美，曾不足踵武而齐风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1157079_comment'></div>乐阕礼成，回舆而归，天子乃揽率吁之固请，建丕称而扬徽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1157079_comment'></div>拜奉琼册，内荐椒闱，上公旄节以焜照，群臣冠剑而陆离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1157079_comment'></div>遂鸿名于茂实，俪天极之巍巍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1157079_comment'></div>已事而诏曰，我之此行，务达至诚，不丰于昵，不有其名，惟斋心以交肸蚃，惟合漠以侑神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1157079_comment'></div>然重劳百执之庀事，聊第赐于公卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1157079_comment'></div>若夫策勋舍爵，兹事体大，则候夫皇帝之躬耕。</div><div id='poem_sentence_91_1157079_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年2月</a>　二月，在京为殿中丞，作《耤田颂》作品：耤田颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三五。）</span><div id='poem_1158036' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158036' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>耤田颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158036")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158036_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158036'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158036'>皇帝再纪元之明年春二月，率群臣耕于东郊，恤毖祀，祈丰年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158036_comment'></div>前此，诏书示有司曰：「自我太宗，袭熙厥功，亿神裕人，宥命方国，肖翘跂行，亦莫不宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158036_comment'></div>永惟土著之本，民天之重，乃躬耤田，以倡农先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158036_comment'></div>震地房之满眚，导改政之长懋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158036_comment'></div>柔嘉令芳，于是乎孚肸蚃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158036_comment'></div>卤莽灭裂，于是乎复敦庞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158036_comment'></div>穗滞秉遗，见粮如坻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158036_comment'></div>我真考因其累盛，重以明德，故能步师百万，狩医闾，见武节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158036_comment'></div>高世八九，升突辽，建元封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158036_comment'></div>奉符隤祉，以摅无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158036_comment'></div>肆余承绪，祗率厥典，则爇萧布币，固有常所，监农狎野，厥存旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158036_comment'></div>惟一二执事，率循而懋明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158036_comment'></div>方春作时，百谷革始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158036_comment'></div>姑使斯人悦羽旄之美，重见汉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158036_comment'></div>后嗣谂稼穑之艰，不失夏物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158036_comment'></div>无赘聚储峙，无烦劳供帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158036_comment'></div>趣合于礼，劭吾农焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158036_comment'></div>前期则修饬神壝，按除膏壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158036_comment'></div>夷道如砥，呼跸填街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158036_comment'></div>稍夔獝以护野，杂荆牟以守燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158036_comment'></div>阡陌绣错，原隰龙鳞，蒸膏冒橛，协风回春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158036_comment'></div>于是旄头先驰，属车齐躅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158036_comment'></div>奔星舞于旗斿，行月栖于羽箙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158036_comment'></div>寿犀注铠，肃给乎师营；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158036_comment'></div>苍虬范驭，秋游乎天辔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158036_comment'></div>琼钑流景，金根照涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158036_comment'></div>帟幕周张，纨绡綷䌨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158036_comment'></div>既而揉耒剡耜，载保介之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158036_comment'></div>先穜后稑，庞播植之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158036_comment'></div>官分无诿，事具不教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158036_comment'></div>天子乃以丙午之旦，升华辂，由大庭，颜行山则，衔枚无声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158036_comment'></div>龙虎见象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158036_comment'></div>堪舆奔警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158036_comment'></div>坌阊阖，切囿游，乃彷徉乎层城之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158036_comment'></div>五精来同，七圣景从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158036_comment'></div>銮声佩节，次于帷宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158036_comment'></div>上既淳濯圭洁，储思渊默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158036_comment'></div>昧明，乃顿大次，款嘉坛，索先农以享之，因教稷以配之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158036_comment'></div>血毛幽全，金石铿訇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158036_comment'></div>躬接妥侑，加祠官之一等；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158036_comment'></div>礼重沿袭，具祖宗之遗意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158036_comment'></div>尔乃降灵场，俨朱纮，物睹于圣，天健其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158036_comment'></div>星田弥望，绀辕储驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158036_comment'></div>洪縻序进，玉步有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158036_comment'></div>三推成礼，迩臣告备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158036_comment'></div>上曰：「朕志在敦本，充其强力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158036_comment'></div>既可以劝，何惮于勤」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158036_comment'></div>遂推而进之，有司以义固争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158036_comment'></div>几十垡而后释，乃始弭节容与，御夫观耕之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158036_comment'></div>三公群后，班趋次耨，靡然从风，迈五踰九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158036_comment'></div>大农洒种，庶人终亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158036_comment'></div>官师抃手，行内天旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158036_comment'></div>于时都人熙熙，驻望皇轩，或歌以壤，或击于辕，不图丛云之旦，复见东户之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158036_comment'></div>日华晏温，天心凭豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158036_comment'></div>奉斗极，御应门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158036_comment'></div>翔鸡树竿，坠鹄宣制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158036_comment'></div>大赉四海，与之更始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158036_comment'></div>亏除威辟，存问高年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158036_comment'></div>振淹修坠，平徭阔赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158036_comment'></div>中外百执，告至而策勋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158036_comment'></div>践过三更，以差而赐帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158036_comment'></div>膏以解雨，鼓之巽风，不崇朝而周万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158036_comment'></div>先是，群臣绎丕懿，润鸿名，将琢之玉版，纳于金匮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158036_comment'></div>至是，则回雕舆，坐前殿，震照仪矩，翕受典册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158036_comment'></div>皇哉兹礼，真帝世之希阔，臣工之旦幕者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158036_comment'></div>儒臣学于旧史，窃明《载芟》之诗，甸师之职，在耤之义，有三说焉：一、典籍之常礼，二、籍履以亲事，三、借民而治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158036_comment'></div>所言虽殊，要之驱天下之民，弃末而归本耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158036_comment'></div>且古者，谨察天庙，申赦阳官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158036_comment'></div>田之不辟，辟在司寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158036_comment'></div>作为御廪，钟而藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158036_comment'></div>其故何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158036_comment'></div>以为奉荐粢盛，非无良农，不如亲之愈也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158036_comment'></div>课督耘耔，非无猛制，不若劝之善也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158036_comment'></div>夫祭莫大于备物，物备而百神据之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158036_comment'></div>兵莫大于足食，食足而四夷怀之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158036_comment'></div>人莫急于丰财，财丰而有生聚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158036_comment'></div>是三物之济否，在此举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158036_comment'></div>且周宣缺之，戎轧其衰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158036_comment'></div>汉文用焉，民阜其宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158036_comment'></div>唐后勤止，以丰易饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158036_comment'></div>洪惟太宗光迪于前，陛下述宣于后，皇矣同底于道，烝哉不陨其声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158036_comment'></div>方且九扈勤民，三事就绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158036_comment'></div>儗儗其盛，陈陈相因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158036_comment'></div>粮馀可栖，草殖弗奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158036_comment'></div>民一于耜，家万斯箱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158036_comment'></div>遂驾五帝，轶三王，奋甘实而摅馨香也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158036_comment'></div>敢作颂曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_86_1158036'>倬彼鲜原，旁耤于田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158036_comment'></div>匪耤其勤，我为民先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158036_comment'></div>悠悠春旗，覛土于畿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158036_comment'></div>阳膏泽泽，迈乎三推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158036_comment'></div>有壬有林，亦莫不祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158036_comment'></div>我疆我理，载耘载耔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158036_comment'></div>实苞实皂，茀厥丰草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158036_comment'></div>田畯至喜，祈年伊早。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158036_comment'></div>我谷用成，我仓既盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158036_comment'></div>我仓耽耽，钟于东南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158036_comment'></div>其用伊何，事神荐馨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158036_comment'></div>为酒为醴，为粢为盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158036_comment'></div>蒸之浮浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158036_comment'></div>释之溲溲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158036_comment'></div>上帝居歆，降福孔休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158036_comment'></div>降福伊何，我民既蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158036_comment'></div>室家溱溱，三事不谖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158036_comment'></div>食足武奋，震叠尔功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158036_comment'></div>蛮夷来同，罔不率从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158036_comment'></div>帝猷昭升，式于九围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158036_comment'></div>兢兢业业，以毖万几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158036_comment'></div>在丰念匮，在饫思饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158036_comment'></div>子子孙孙，勿替引之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_108_1158036_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年2月</a>　二月，在京为殿中丞，奉表上《藉田颂》作品：进藉田颂表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三六。）</span><div id='poem_1157352' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进藉田颂表</a><span class='authorDate'>（明道二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157352")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157352'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157352'>臣某言：臣闻王者必藉千亩，庸劝九农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157352_comment'></div>载御耦于介间，脉阳膏于廛左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157352_comment'></div>借民之力，时辟于甫田；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157352_comment'></div>为神之仓，岁储于馨稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157352_comment'></div>睿明在御，容典交修，茂遵文祖之规，遂庀阳官之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157352_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下菲衣训俭，重谷教人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157352_comment'></div>乘春官之载阳，按大田而惟正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157352_comment'></div>追循先烈，祗展上仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157352_comment'></div>缀万骑于中营，抗九旗于先道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157352_comment'></div>农祠讫享，神甸就耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157352_comment'></div>服黛耜以天临，纡朱纮而身劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157352_comment'></div>本宜一拨，遂过九推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157352_comment'></div>揭丕律以自新，冠前王而绝拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157352_comment'></div>自昔车牛马耦，仅出偏方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157352_comment'></div>钩盾弄田，罔稽正典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157352_comment'></div>订兹之盛，曷拟于伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157352_comment'></div>臣陪列祠宫，宿官道室，窃兴盛礼，敢废徒歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157352_comment'></div>愿因风土之馀音，少识樵苏之谈道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157352_comment'></div>谨夙夜斋沐，撰《藉田颂》一首，干渎宸扆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157352_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年3月</a>　三月，在京为殿中丞，有诗送叶参知苏州。作品：送叶苏州。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集拾遗》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_105233' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105233' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105233?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送叶苏州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105233")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105233_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105233'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105233'>卧锦潜郎种种丝，为邦独爱阮咸麾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105233_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105233'>中台给契鱼初剖，外闼升车雉尚随。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105233_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105233'>风汴杂花飘夕棹，雨吴芳树隐春旗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105233_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105233'>为寻刘白高吟地，酒熟螯香左右持。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105233_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105233'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105233_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年5月12日</a>　五月十二日，在京为殿中丞，受命为《籍田记》及《恭谢太庙记》检讨官，上言皇太后谒庙事不可为后世法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年5月</a>　五月，在京为殿中丞，作《右史院蒲桃赋》作品：右史院蒲桃赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1157080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>右史院蒲桃赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（有序　明道二年五月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157080")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157080'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157080'>癸酉之仲夏，予受诏修书，寓于右史院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157080_comment'></div>䌷绎多暇，裴回堂除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157080_comment'></div>有蒲桃一本，延蔓疏瘠，垂实甚寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157080_comment'></div>予且玩且唶，以为省户凝切，禁廷敞閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157080_comment'></div>人不天摧，禽不栖喙，与平原槁壤有间，匪灌丛宿莽所干，而条悴叶芸，不为时珍，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157080_comment'></div>得非地以所宜为安，根以屡徙为危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157080_comment'></div>封殖浸灌，信美非愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157080_comment'></div>因为小赋，代其臆对云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157080_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1157080'>昔炎汉之遣使，道西域而始通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157080_comment'></div>得蒲桃之异种，偕苜蓿以来东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157080_comment'></div>矜所从以至远，遂遍植乎离宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157080_comment'></div>去葱雪之寒乡，托崤函之福地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157080_comment'></div>并万宝以均载，历千古而舒粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157080_comment'></div>玩之可使蠲烦，食之足以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1157080", 1157080, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>平志</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157080_comment'></div>不由甘而取坏，乃因少而获贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157080_comment'></div>鄙柚包之轻侻，贱蔗境之尘滓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157080_comment'></div>粤何人斯，殖我于兹？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157080_comment'></div>托深严之秘署，切轇轕之文榱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157080_comment'></div>培孤茎以膏壤，引柔蔓乎标枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157080_comment'></div>泉石渠以蒙浸，露金茎而泫滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157080_comment'></div>布凉影于月宫，猎重葩于禁飔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157080_comment'></div>蔽周庐之岑寂，隐肃唱而逶迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157080_comment'></div>彼得地而逢辰，宜欣欣以茂遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157080_comment'></div>奚敷华而委质，反惨惨而兹瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157080_comment'></div>乏磊砢于当年，让纷华于此世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157080_comment'></div>是必野荄非层掖之玩，菲实异太官之味，因枳橘之屡迁，叹匏瓜之徒系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157080_comment'></div>亦犹郁柳有性，不愿杯棬之华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157080_comment'></div>海鸟取容，非荣觞酒之馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157080_comment'></div>胡不放之岩际，归之垄阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157080_comment'></div>上敷荣于樛木，外结庇于缁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157080_comment'></div>蒙烟沐雾，跨野弥岑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157080_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1157080", 1157080, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>丰茸</span>大德之谷，栖息无机之禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157080_comment'></div>保深根以庇本，诫繁实之披心，穷天年以善育，奚斤斧之可寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157080_comment'></div>乱曰：阶药衒华，堂萱争丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157080_comment'></div>枝以万年为名，木以五衢称瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157080_comment'></div>是皆托中涓以进艺，荷钩盾之为地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157080_comment'></div>结实心以自如，非孤生之所冀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1157080_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　夏，在京为殿中丞，有《回晏尚书到任启》作品：回晏尚书到任启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五二。）</span><div id='poem_1157641' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157641' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157641?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回晏尚书到任启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157641")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157641_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157641'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157641'>伏自尚书暂辞机轴，近抚藩垣，揭天节以载华，总斋航而右溯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157641_comment'></div>便时叶吉，树政有经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157641_comment'></div>恭惟天一奥区，郁华胜里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157641_comment'></div>文坛藉罽，经顺拜于宸游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157641_comment'></div>封屋连云，有望霓之故老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157641_comment'></div>式倚神明之化，往敦恺悌之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157641_comment'></div>何辱谦仪，特贻音咫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157641_comment'></div>笃尝僚之曩谊，露存阙之深情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157641_comment'></div>况切营求，谅非远复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157641_comment'></div>冀绵绵而存用，副赫赫之攸瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157641_comment'></div>披晤尚遥，编摩非述。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157641_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　夏，在京为殿中丞，代晏殊作亳州到任谢上表。作品：代晏尚书亳州谢上表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157418' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157418' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157418?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代晏尚书亳州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157418")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157418_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157418'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157418'>初违四近，出守一麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157418_comment'></div>祗禀诏条，奉扬民政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157418_comment'></div>拥左鱼于官次，傃疲马于君轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157418_comment'></div>揆宠循躬，竞荣惭刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157418_comment'></div>窃念臣本性孤远，获对盛明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157418_comment'></div>因缘篆刻之微，陶被师儒之诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157418_comment'></div>先皇帝怜其稚齿，奖以片文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157418_comment'></div>长育中陵之阿，每诫素丝之习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157418_comment'></div>遂用<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1157418", 1157418, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>谨敕</span>，进服宠光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157418_comment'></div>涂饰朱丹，湔除埃𡏖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157418_comment'></div>乘人之乏，每食辄浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157418_comment'></div>始自书林，寖阶辞掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157418_comment'></div>属星渚之贰极，参震邸以为僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157418_comment'></div>此际出入两闺，遭逢千载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157418_comment'></div>宁无越思之过，或有奇中之谗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157418_comment'></div>大度兼容，多言<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1157418", 1157418, "Clauses/31/Comments/0")'>讫息</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157418_comment'></div>入跻内署，弥迩清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157418_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下重协睿华，丕承淳烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157418_comment'></div>轸其旧物，谓无他肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157418_comment'></div>断自宸衷，佐经枢筦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157418_comment'></div>室大柱小，罕不挠之期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157418_comment'></div>车重驭烦，有必颠之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157418_comment'></div>果停密务，近守留都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157418_comment'></div>旋沐召还，再加收试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157418_comment'></div>南台风宪之地，秘殿侍从之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157418_comment'></div>咸叨践扬，蔑有论报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157418_comment'></div>擢司邦计，颛领使权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157418_comment'></div>虽笼天下之财，罔纾县官之急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157418_comment'></div>遽蒙中诏，参预宰庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157418_comment'></div>忘申侯之有疵，用王谭于下第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157418_comment'></div>论思在日，僶俛踰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157418_comment'></div>曾不能卓尔建明，毅然处可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157418_comment'></div>引俊良而咸事，放险谒之庸违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157418_comment'></div>开陈治端，总领群职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157418_comment'></div>而廊庙之任，方夏具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157418_comment'></div>政之无良，臣任其咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157418_comment'></div>陛下弗询徐防之免，罔责石庆之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157418_comment'></div>人言则姑务纳污，天灾则不令移过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157418_comment'></div>括囊耽禄，久已自知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157418_comment'></div>伤锦瘝官，居然众验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157418_comment'></div>洪惟浚哲，终赐保全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157418_comment'></div>属当明辟之初，例举均劳之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157418_comment'></div>懋官加等，作翰疏通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157418_comment'></div>道路甚夷，风土差乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157418_comment'></div>恩护其短，谊不忍诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157418_comment'></div>再生之慈，有死无答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157418_comment'></div>重念臣夙陶雅化，粗识大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157418_comment'></div>盖知一心事君，四体率职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157418_comment'></div>惟书尽信，舍道弗营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157418_comment'></div>动保廉隅，进非绍介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157418_comment'></div>受命于地，乃冀于不凋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157418_comment'></div>获罪乎天，奚取于他祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157418_comment'></div>但以孤特少助，依违取容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157418_comment'></div>独木不林，众怨如府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157418_comment'></div>积为拱默之罪，上孤振拔之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157418_comment'></div>往咎深惟，胡颜自处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157418_comment'></div>所赖回霜申宥，涵海蒙禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157418_comment'></div>废格典刑，矜怜愚憃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157418_comment'></div>乾坤施德，厚及于谢生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157418_comment'></div>犬马日长，誓思于补过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157418_comment'></div>收桑榆而可待，摩顶踵以为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157418_comment'></div>宿业云初，乃情增悸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157418_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_62_1157418_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年6月</a>　六月，在京为殿中丞，作文祭孙奭。作品：祭孙仆射文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><div id='poem_1158171' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158171' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭孙仆射文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158171")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158171'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158171'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158171_comment'></div>圆方相函，有奥有清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158171_comment'></div>禀乎粹灵，贤人挺生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158171_comment'></div>荃宰相期，有聧有遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158171_comment'></div>值其嘉会，盛烈斯举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158171_comment'></div>允矣我公，懿德乘时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158171_comment'></div>总是二美，蔚为人师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158171_comment'></div>齐风泱泱，洙俗訚訚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158171_comment'></div>弱龄就傅，典学书绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158171_comment'></div>巾箱襞积，油素纷纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158171_comment'></div>神宗御天，擢首儒先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158171_comment'></div>所立卓尔，其声裒然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158171_comment'></div>一命筮仕，铨衡密启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158171_comment'></div>缓玦缁帷，翻经璧水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158171_comment'></div>礼有爱羊，河无渡豕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158171_comment'></div>我冠两梁，我绂斯皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158171_comment'></div>进陪朝襘，兼侍藩房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158171_comment'></div>诸家去圣，诋诃夺攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158171_comment'></div>空言秕稗，异制械桁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158171_comment'></div>公愤若时，毅然含章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158171_comment'></div>增埤发墨，塞路摧杨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158171_comment'></div>兟兟学徒，终知向方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158171_comment'></div>章圣临驭，神庭搆宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158171_comment'></div>命公待诏，轩然凤举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158171_comment'></div>邦实止贤，人荣稽古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158171_comment'></div>鲠亮摩切，优游博裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158171_comment'></div>匪尺是枉，伊柔弗茹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158171_comment'></div>前膝宸帷，叩头省户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158171_comment'></div>砥刃以须，衮章辄补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158171_comment'></div>谋之具臧，弊庶遄沮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158171_comment'></div>帝念蒸黎，连翩出麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158171_comment'></div>奉行细札，褰去垂帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158171_comment'></div>神明树政，乐职闻诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158171_comment'></div>居则率俾，去而见思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158171_comment'></div>乃践谏霤，乃官琐闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158171_comment'></div>长君继明，进阶贰卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158171_comment'></div>追锋趣召，燕席光亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158171_comment'></div>宣室清问，华光授经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158171_comment'></div>有猷有为，弗猥弗并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158171_comment'></div>典常坟大，武戒汤铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158171_comment'></div>诵言必对，嘉猷是经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158171_comment'></div>白首魁垒，与世作程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158171_comment'></div>银台崇崇，公阅其封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158171_comment'></div>牧驺耳耳，公专厥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158171_comment'></div>或司绵蕞，或教国子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158171_comment'></div>惟公得之，异乎求之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158171_comment'></div>截河弗溷，导款靡亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158171_comment'></div>大车而载，秋阳以辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158171_comment'></div>鸿飞冥冥，不慕矰弋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158171_comment'></div>公居法从，志澹虚极，抗章引年，阖门谢客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158171_comment'></div>上所固留，愿焉弗获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158171_comment'></div>龙筦纳言，得请东藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158171_comment'></div>奎钩洒翰，宴斝申恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158171_comment'></div>亦命四近，赋诗赠言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158171_comment'></div>卧阁踰岁，乞骸去位，春坊傅席，菟裘仙里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158171_comment'></div>疏受挥金，式宴以喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158171_comment'></div>广德挂车，诒孙及子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158171_comment'></div>天且佚老，君能知止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158171_comment'></div>向用五福，与善则常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158171_comment'></div>公明且哲，宜寿而昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158171_comment'></div>天乎弗淑，萎哲歼良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158171_comment'></div>睆箦占命，忠言孔彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158171_comment'></div>玉辉金相，掩此不旸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158171_comment'></div>人彝代矩，今也云亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158171_comment'></div>士类相吊，朝家悯伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158171_comment'></div>恤恩告第，号书密章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158171_comment'></div>高明令终，微公孰当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158171_comment'></div>某等或奉绪言，或庥大庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158171_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1158171", 1158171, "Clauses/139/Comments/0")'>游藩</span>蒙润，挹流疏秽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158171_comment'></div>平日函丈，今兹交臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158171_comment'></div>拘此宿官，永乖薄酹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158171_comment'></div>有李成蹊，有碑堕泪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158171_comment'></div>遐赍令芳，庶展哀忾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158171_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158171_comment'></div>尚飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1158171_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年6月</a>　六月，在京为殿中丞，作孙奭谥议。作品：赠尚书右仆射孙奭谥议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四三。）</span><div id='poem_1157338' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157338' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157338?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠尚书右仆射孙奭谥议</a><span class='authorDate'>（明道二年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157338")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157338_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157338'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157338'>博士宋祁议曰：仆射清明庄重，体柔而用健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157338_comment'></div>扬和吸精，储为英华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157338_comment'></div>在布衣韦带，有深沈不器之韵，缓玦弹冠，宾于王门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157338_comment'></div>是时宋兴四十馀岁，天子上文向学，开太平之原，薪槱髦士，充布台阁，而未有卓然以儒名家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157338_comment'></div>仆射由经生博贯前载，乃以《诗》之多识，《书》之致远，《易》之肆而隐，《春秋》之婉而微，《礼》之肃雍，《乐》之易良，参劝讲授，为荐绅倡始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157338_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1157338", 1157338, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>执据</span>圣道，洮汰群疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157338_comment'></div>斗杓所建，遂成寒暑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157338_comment'></div>珩璜所触，自然宫徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157338_comment'></div>历官上庠，居为时宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157338_comment'></div>既而籍内禁閤，践谏省駮曹之任，入进其说，出诡其辞，批鳞罔惮，职衮无阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157338_comment'></div>在《蹇》，王臣匪躬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157338_comment'></div>在《说命》，朝夕纳诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157338_comment'></div>惟仆射举之，爱莫助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157338_comment'></div>属今上浚明厥初，物色旧老，实膺丹书之问，进对华光之涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157338_comment'></div>用阶告猷，式克跻圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157338_comment'></div>桓荣稽古，宽中𦕈论，惟仆射有之，是以似之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157338_comment'></div>及宸幄归道，安车税驾，天文褒饯，士伦嗟悒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157338_comment'></div>俾耆而艾，以殁元身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157338_comment'></div>大君废朝，行路相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157338_comment'></div>赙布所须，一出长府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157338_comment'></div>密章加等，昭饰下泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157338_comment'></div>信乎令终之高显，《大雅》之明哲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157338_comment'></div>谨按《谥法》，体和居中、善问周达曰宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157338_comment'></div>仆射处躬弥冲，在丑忘竞，不居物累，不为盗憎，其让如范宣，其快如子孺，能体和矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157338_comment'></div>内治家事，外施邦政，接士无貌言，祝神无愧辞，协用通介，时其进退，能居中矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157338_comment'></div>行成束修，节贯华皓，终以硕望，显升师臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157338_comment'></div>其所荐士，皆足经哲秉猷，敷贲皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157338_comment'></div>逊远时誉，常如不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157338_comment'></div>以年得谢，享考终之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157338_comment'></div>生平素守，鲜如晨葩，信善问矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157338_comment'></div>建白䌷次百馀篇，傅经见义，质圣行远，藏于册府，副在家楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157338_comment'></div>推明则董仲舒，博洽则刘向，其周达矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157338_comment'></div>节惠知行，请谥曰宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157338_comment'></div>谨议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1157338_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年7月</a>　七月，在京为殿中丞，代陈尧佐作谢表。作品：代转户侍充职知庐州谢表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157421' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157421' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157421?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代转户侍充职知庐州谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157421")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157421_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157421'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157421'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣户部侍郎、充龙图阁学士、知庐州军州兼管内劝农事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157421_comment'></div>宠加无状，愿出所涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157421_comment'></div>涣汗不收，扪心增㥏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157421_comment'></div>窃念臣憃烦材品，捍格艺文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157421_comment'></div>早污署堂，继持从橐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157421_comment'></div>庆亲逢之在旦，托私盖以如天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157421_comment'></div>既负又乘，宜疏而粺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157421_comment'></div>书思朝簿，绝念夫均劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157421_comment'></div>计过夜分，未知其寡悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157421_comment'></div>且复禀生多病，中年早衰，目苦眊昏，气多辎结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157421_comment'></div>愔愔臂肉，计日减分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157421_comment'></div>种种头毛，从衰得白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157421_comment'></div>或卧庐请告，或伏枕弥旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157421_comment'></div>极昧死以陈章，愿出藩而宽疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157421_comment'></div>洪惟惨爱，终尔依违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157421_comment'></div>如臣至愚，自卜已审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157421_comment'></div>非不知高门之地，迩帝所之凝严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157421_comment'></div>承明之庐，为仕涂之极挚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157421_comment'></div>而命奇智困，福过灾生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157421_comment'></div>跛倚不足以相仪，忘误无容而置对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157421_comment'></div>起讫还卧，自取晋臣之嗤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157421_comment'></div>否终弗倾，谁任羲爻之咎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157421_comment'></div>罔虞三渎，频紊四聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157421_comment'></div>祈天必从，誓恩不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157421_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下深仁念旧，大度匿瑕，收电霁威，回春振槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157421_comment'></div>悯其尸居之气，察无他恶之肠，更进文昌之贰官，尚领河图之秘禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157421_comment'></div>择其善地，许以再麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157421_comment'></div>本缘偃息之私，更遂便蕃之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157421_comment'></div>臣敢不勉修治体，遍谕上仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157421_comment'></div>循致乐和，少宽旰昃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157421_comment'></div>至于遵宣尼之慎疾，访周氏之全医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157421_comment'></div>冀及平彊，再陪访逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157421_comment'></div>出奉会稽之最，非敢告劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157421_comment'></div>归成丽正之书，誓无私恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157421_comment'></div>逢辰论报，没齿为期。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1157421_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='6cffc93071784c8c83c7d4a1ad52d266_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6cffc93071784c8c83c7d4a1ad52d266");'><span id='6cffc93071784c8c83c7d4a1ad52d266_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1041')">1033-1041年</a>，36-44岁</div><div id='6cffc93071784c8c83c7d4a1ad52d266' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年11月</a>　十一月，在京为殿中丞，诏罢修《籍田记》，有诗。作品：癸酉六月奉诏修耤田记十一月诏罢赋诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_105161' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105161' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105161?labeling=true' target='_blank'>癸酉六月奉诏修耤田记十一月诏罢赋诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105161")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105161_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105161'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105161'>三时受诏拥缇油，曲笔无功苦思抽。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105161_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105161'>不得成书同太史，须知非我异春秋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105161_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105161'>空言自合因人废，残藁犹应盖瓿留。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105161_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105161'>归卧私庭深阁笔，饱尝鸡膳太悠悠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105161_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105161'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年3月</a>　三月，在京为殿中丞，与郑戬上奏，乞重定《广韵》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年4月27日</a>　四月二十七日，在京为殿中丞，受命与张观等覆校《南史》、《北史》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年4月28日</a>　四月二十八日，在京为殿中丞，受诏与郑戬等同刊修《广韵韵略》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年4月</a>　四月，在京为殿中丞，应叶清臣之请作《秀州重修鼓角楼记》作品：秀州重修鼓角楼记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158008' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158008' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158008?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秀州重修鼓角楼记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1034年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158008")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158008_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158008'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158008'>景祐元年夏四月，嘉兴郡新作台门，书时，且言功也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158008_comment'></div>越翌日，掾属邦人从二千石南阳叶君道卿，陟降而达观之，酾酒大会以修衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158008_comment'></div>礼成，率吁墙进，愿以更张经始及悦以使成勿亟之能，咨《春秋》之徒，善叙其状，发闻馨香，与石皆泐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158008_comment'></div>君抑不止，乃绘图以谂予，且俾列其崖略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158008_comment'></div>秀，故苏属邑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158008_comment'></div>钱氏王二浙，欲侈地以自张，始建为州，国朝因焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158008_comment'></div>然而饟漕走集，货赀迁引，事丛政厖，地剧官勤，一都会之不若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158008_comment'></div>先是寺署本于霸朝，因时之污，以陋自恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158008_comment'></div>严扉弗闶，液材将压。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158008_comment'></div>后之长人者，姑重改作，茍完仅庇而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158008_comment'></div>岁直癸酉，今上躬揽威柄，用甘露黄龙故事，高选牧守，嘉靖方国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158008_comment'></div>于是太守九江庞君醇之，以治有异等，入视行马内事，而以君代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158008_comment'></div>君因其化条，遂用丕变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158008_comment'></div>居者弗扰，流者自占，巳日乃孚，卒岁大穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158008_comment'></div>如销金揉木，无时月之累，以仁继贤故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158008_comment'></div>初，庞君既以郡仪不称，而怀必葺之虑，且惮伤财而勤民也，因上言郡有樵廥斥贾千缗，愿权奇赢，将助兴作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158008_comment'></div>实被可报，未克僝工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158008_comment'></div>君之至，则检结故符，以成庞志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158008_comment'></div>揆日力，计徒庸，易彼将坏，成我大壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158008_comment'></div>乃广丽谯，以冠牙门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158008_comment'></div>乃挟修宇，以华游观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158008_comment'></div>飞轩旁注，夷道在下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158008_comment'></div>其内则大敞重扃，夹植锜兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158008_comment'></div>层厦纚连，双庑翼张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158008_comment'></div>广豁静深，乃至于黄堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158008_comment'></div>其制大，可以重威；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158008_comment'></div>其度高，可以临下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158008_comment'></div>閒民穷隶于是乎督之，故夫家不烦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158008_comment'></div>羡材积草于是乎用之，故虞衡不劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158008_comment'></div>役兴仲冬，跨三时而毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158008_comment'></div>初，樵贾不足以偿费，又出库钱续之，率用三百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158008_comment'></div>楼成，及左右宇若干楹，内屏联属若干楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158008_comment'></div>有因有创，如君之素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158008_comment'></div>储鼓角于楼，以节晓昏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158008_comment'></div>列棨幡于屏，以雄矩仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158008_comment'></div>管籥常于斯，宪令常于斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158008_comment'></div>开阖有宜，谁何有禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158008_comment'></div>入骑不踶，出车不击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158008_comment'></div>千里奔走，四邻表则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158008_comment'></div>议者谓斯举也，不专于《诗》之考室，《礼》之修键，所以备邦制而虔君命，变则通，通则久焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158008_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158008_comment'></div>以道卿之敏秀而文，洵直而方，由诸生取畯科，入道山，籍治朝，其所履践皆沛如桑林，铿若黄钟，舍章虑善，以光王国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158008_comment'></div>今又兴轮奂于官下，树艺极于吏师，导物忠厚，洗人愁叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158008_comment'></div>陟状此功，为东南第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158008_comment'></div>号君子者，故不器欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158008_comment'></div>昔汉武帝时，惟董仲舒、公孙弘、倪宽居官可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158008_comment'></div>三人皆儒者，以经术缘饰吏事，后孙与倪皆至三公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158008_comment'></div>则醇之居于前，道卿之继于后，今日之政，异时之仕，合儒林、循吏而兼得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158008_comment'></div>为天子所器，可前知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158008_comment'></div>予洎伯氏与道卿联仕牒，并直庐，知之也深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158008_comment'></div>姑因落成之日，遂推雅行之美，且塞秀人之勤请云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158008_comment'></div>谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1158008_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年8月23日</a>　八月二十三日，在京为太常博士，受诏与燕肃等按试律准。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年9月</a>　九月，在京为太常博士，作御书律准赞。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年</a>　秋，在京为太常博士，有诗送刘沆知衡州。作品：送刘学士守衡阳兼还故里。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_105235' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105235' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105235?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送刘学士守衡阳兼还故里</a><span class='authorDate'>（1034年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105235")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105235_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105235'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105235'>名帖唐家十二时，囊封自乞阮咸麾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105235'>三行牛酒过乡墅，九向云山驻使旗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105235'>兰露夕薰欢洁膳，桂风秋遣怨丛枝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105235'>不应晚计还台约，紫掖深沈伫演辞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105235_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105235'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105235_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年</a>　本年，在京为太常博士，因改官太常博士，有启谢张士逊、晏殊。作品：上许州张相公陈州晏尚启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五二。温谱系于景祐二年，此据宋祁仕历改。）</span><div id='poem_1157649' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157649' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157649?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上许州张相公陈州晏尚书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1034年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157649")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157649_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157649'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157649'>近听恩制，序进卿联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157649_comment'></div>列让靡还，冒荣增㥏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157649_comment'></div>伏念某本缘天幸，忝参国均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157649_comment'></div>会聪睿之日跻，乏谋猷而誉处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157649_comment'></div>有轩窃禄，不穑馀囷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157649_comment'></div>未登考岁之期，遽滥赏风之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157649_comment'></div>外哗乡议，仰累朝猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157649_comment'></div>敢谓阁下锡以公言，与其礼进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157649_comment'></div>绚书邮之庆问，分台舍之馀辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157649_comment'></div>愿佩优评，庶亡祇悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157649_comment'></div>丹愚萃感，搦翰匪宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157649_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1157649_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年</a>　本年，在京为太常博士，有诗送蒋堂为江南东路转运使。作品：送蒋御史漕江南。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_105296' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105296' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105296?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送蒋御史漕江南</a><span class='authorDate'>（1034年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105296")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105296'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105296'>柱后峨冠久未还，江南行府使旗鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105296'>陈陈洪庾催输粟，往往吴山即铸钱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105296'>暝月早霞千里国，废楼残社六朝天。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105296'>时清宪笔无弹劾，供助骚人藻思妍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105296_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105296'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105296_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年2月5日</a>　二月五日，在京为太常博士，上《大乐图义》二卷。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年4月25日</a>　四月二十五日，在京为太常博士，受诏与冯元等同修乐书，是时已迁同知太常礼院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年5月17日</a>　五月十七日，在京为太常博士，上礼院议祖宗配侑。作品：礼院议祖宗配侑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1157255' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157255' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157255?labeling=true' target='_blank'>礼院议祖宗配侑奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年5月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157255")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157255_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157255'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157255'>臣等闻王者建庙祏之严，合昭穆之缀，祖一而已，始受命也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157255_comment'></div>宗无预数，待有德也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157255_comment'></div>由宗而下，等胄之疏戚，以为迭毁之制，使后嗣虽有显扬褒大，犹不得与祖宗并列，可以壹统乎尊尊，古之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157255_comment'></div>皇帝陛下躬孝治，发德音，永惟三后之盛烈，际天接地而推尊之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157255_comment'></div>礼有所未称，明发悼惧，图惟厥衷，使攸司得稽旧章，开群议，摅懿铄，阐孙谋，将以吻合灵心，垂荣无极，非臣等孤陋所能及已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157255_comment'></div>窃以太祖皇帝诞受宝命，付畀四海，铺敦变伐，潜黜不端，夷泽潞之畔，兼淮海之昧，东焚吴舆，右困蜀垒，湘楚闽粤，请吏入朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157255_comment'></div>当此之时，天下之人去大残，蒙更生，卜年长世，丕阐洪业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157255_comment'></div>太宗皇帝敦受其玺，席运下武，龚天之讨，厎定太原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157255_comment'></div>由是慎九刑之辟，艺四方之贡，信赏类能，重食劝功，官无烦苛，人无恫怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157255_comment'></div>又引搢绅诸儒，讲道兴学，炳然右文，与三代同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157255_comment'></div>真宗皇帝乾粹日昭，执竞维烈，重威抚和，休宁北方，顺斗布度，先天作圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157255_comment'></div>遂考夏谚，绍虞巡，秘牒岱宗，育谷冀壤，翕受瑞福，普浸黎元，肖翘跂行，罔有不宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157255_comment'></div>百度已备，眷授明辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157255_comment'></div>恭惟一祖二宗之烈，历选坟诰，未有高焉者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157255_comment'></div>昔成汤为商之祖，太甲、太戊、武丁，实号三宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157255_comment'></div>后稷为周之祖，文王、武王庸建二祧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157255_comment'></div>高帝为汉之祖，孝文、孝武特崇两庙，皆子孙世世奉承不辍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157255_comment'></div>我皇伯祖经纶草昧，遂有天下，功宜为帝者之祖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157255_comment'></div>皇祖勤劳制作，皇考裁成治定，德宜为帝者之宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157255_comment'></div>三庙并万世不迁，宣布天下，以示后世，臣等请如圣诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157255_comment'></div>至于升侑上帝，裒对先谟，本之周道，克厌典礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157255_comment'></div>昔太宗亲郊，奉宣祖、太祖配焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157255_comment'></div>真宗肇祀，奉太祖、太宗配焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157255_comment'></div>自尔有司不敢轻议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157255_comment'></div>今二宗同跻不祧之位，则礼无异等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157255_comment'></div>伏请自今以往，太祖为定配，二宗为迭配，称情适事，理实无嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157255_comment'></div>其将来皇帝亲祠，伏请以三圣偕侑，上显对越之盛，次申遹追之感，圣人之能事，群臣之大愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157255_comment'></div>此后迭配，还如前议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157255_comment'></div>昔唐高宗之上封也，以太武皇帝、文皇帝配昊天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157255_comment'></div>明皇之封也，以高祖配天，睿宗配地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157255_comment'></div>开元之著礼也，高祖配方丘，太宗配神州，此二宗迭配之前例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157255_comment'></div>垂拱、开元之间，高祖、太宗、高宗同配昊天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157255_comment'></div>真宗登介丘，降社首，并以太祖、太宗崇配天地，此三圣偕侑之明准。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157255_comment'></div>其岁时常祀，则至日圆丘，仲夏皇地祇，配以太祖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157255_comment'></div>孟春祈谷，夏雩祀，冬祭神州，配以太宗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157255_comment'></div>孟春感帝，配以宣祖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157255_comment'></div>季秋大飨，配以真宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157255_comment'></div>伏请皆如礼便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157255_comment'></div>陛下重宗祧之事，鉴照前载，抑畏虔巩，让而不专，故令臣等得申愚管，谨用敷罄，惟圣心裁鉴。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1157255'></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1157255_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157255'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按《仁宗本纪》，系景祐二年祁迁太常、同知礼院时上。《历代名臣奏议》作皇祐二年，误。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157255_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年6月</a>　六月，在京为太常博士，上疏议李照乞减编钟事。作品：乞减编钟事奏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二六。温谱系此文于景祐三年，此据《宋会要辑稿》乐一之一〇改。）</span><div id='poem_1157256' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157256' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157256?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞减编钟事奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157256")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157256_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157256'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157256'>准中书送下监铸编钟所李照状，为乞减编钟十六为十二事，</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1157256_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年</a>　夏，在京为太常博士，有诗送张奎出任京东转运使。作品：送殿院张奎漕京东。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_105301' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105301' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105301?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送殿院张奎漕京东</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105301")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105301_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105301'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105301'>霜柏轻寒惊曙乌，使台东道亚风旟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105301'>人瞻御史乘骢贵，钱续司农朽贯馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105301'>睢苑千门聊按节，齐官三服罢移书。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105301'>此行须信褒恩美，新诏黄金饰佩馀。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105301_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105301'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105301_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年8月10日</a>　八月十日，在京为太常博士，上疏论郭稹不当为出嫁母行服事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年9月29日</a>　九月二十九日，在京为太常博士，上《乐论》七篇。作品：论以尺定律。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷二六。）</span>论太乐署有舂牍之名而无舂牍之器奏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二六。）</span>论太乐置雷鼓灵鼓路鼓备而不击及无三鼗奏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二六。）</span>论竽及巢笙和笙奏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二六。）</span>论引武舞所执九器各有所用奏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二六。）</span><div id='poem_1157254' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157254' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157254?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论以尺定律奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年9月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157254")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157254_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157254'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157254'>臣闻乐生于音，音生于律，律定于尺，尺成于黍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157254_comment'></div>得黍不真，尺固不定，定尺无准，律亦自差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157254_comment'></div>而望声调，是南舟溯燕，北辕走越，愈亟愈远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157254_comment'></div>故尺短则律从而短，尺长则律从而长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157254_comment'></div>短者声清益上，长者声浊益下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157254_comment'></div>清浊不得其中，而至乐遁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157254_comment'></div>古者神瞽考中声而量之，以为之律，所以立均出度也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157254_comment'></div>黄帝命伶伦断竹长三寸九分，吹之以为黄钟之宫，然后制十二律，以上下求而听凤鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157254_comment'></div>司马迁黄钟之律长八寸七分之一，太蔟七寸七分之二，林钟五寸七分之三，应钟四寸三分之二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157254_comment'></div>班固、司马彪说黄钟长九寸，声最浊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157254_comment'></div>太蔟长八寸，林钟长六寸，应钟长四寸七分四釐强，声最清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157254_comment'></div>蔡邕、郑康成、杜夔、荀勖等所论，尺有增损，而黄钟之宫要以九寸为定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157254_comment'></div>始勖当武帝泰始中，校太乐八音不和，知后汉至魏，尺长于古四分有馀，勖乃部署著作郎刘恭依《周礼》制尺，所谓古尺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157254_comment'></div>以古尺更铸铜律，调叶声韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157254_comment'></div>后汲郡盗发六国时魏襄王冢，得古周时玉律及钟磬，与新律声韵闇同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157254_comment'></div>于时郡国或得汉时故钟，吹勖律以合之，其声皆应，时人称为精密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157254_comment'></div>惟散骑侍郎陈留阮咸讥其声高，声高则悲，非兴国之音，必古今尺有长短故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157254_comment'></div>武帝以勖律与周汉器合，遂施用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157254_comment'></div>后始平掘地，得古铜尺，岁久欲腐，不知所出何代，果长勖尺四分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157254_comment'></div>时人咸服其妙，而莫能措意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157254_comment'></div>勖立千载之下，推百代之法，度数既合，声韵又谐，亦可谓密切而有證也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157254_comment'></div>而时人掘地之一尺，破周汉之二器，亦近夫贵耳贱目也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157254_comment'></div>隋时始用木尺律而定律吕，铸坏前代金石，以息物议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157254_comment'></div>惜其制度文议没于江都，无闻焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157254_comment'></div>是时，尺有十五等：一、周尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157254_comment'></div>二、晋田父玉尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157254_comment'></div>三、梁表尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157254_comment'></div>四、汉官尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157254_comment'></div>五、魏尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157254_comment'></div>六、晋后尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157254_comment'></div>七、后魏前尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157254_comment'></div>八、中尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157254_comment'></div>九、后尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157254_comment'></div>十、东后魏尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157254_comment'></div>十一、蔡邕铜龠尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157254_comment'></div>十二、宋氏尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157254_comment'></div>十三、万宝常水尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157254_comment'></div>十四、杂尺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157254_comment'></div>十五、梁朝俗间尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157254_comment'></div>后周氏达奚震等议，独以铁尺为允，即十二宋氏尺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157254_comment'></div>其说曰：「今以上党羊头山黍，依《汉书·律历志》度之，若以大者稠累，依数满尺，实于黄钟之律，须撼乃容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157254_comment'></div>若以中者累尺，虽复小稀，实于黄钟之律，不动而满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157254_comment'></div>计此二事之殊，良由消息未善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157254_comment'></div>其于铁尺，终有一会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157254_comment'></div>且上党之黍，有异他乡，其色略乌，其形圆重，用之为量，定不徒然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157254_comment'></div>正以时有水旱之殊，地有肥瘠之异，取黍大小，未必得中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157254_comment'></div>按许慎《解字》，黍体大，本异于常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157254_comment'></div>疑今之大者，正是其中，累百满尺，非是会古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157254_comment'></div>实龠之外，裁剩十馀，此恐围径或差，造律未妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157254_comment'></div>就如撼动取满，论理亦通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157254_comment'></div>今勘周汉古钱，大小有合；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157254_comment'></div>宋氏浑仪，尺度无舛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157254_comment'></div>古者黄金方寸重一斤，今铸金校验，铁尺为近」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157254_comment'></div>未及详定，会高祖受命而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157254_comment'></div>唐贞观中，又诏张文收铸铜斛秤尺，咸得其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157254_comment'></div>诏以其副，藏于乐署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157254_comment'></div>至武延秀为太常卿，用为奇玩，以律与玉尺、玉斗舛合献焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157254_comment'></div>开元中，将考宗庙乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157254_comment'></div>有司奏请出之，敕惟以铜管付太常，亡其九管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157254_comment'></div>国朝金石，传自周代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157254_comment'></div>世宗常诏王朴累黍定尺，以为律管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157254_comment'></div>管既不便，作准之尺寸，于今具在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157254_comment'></div>而当时实录，不论秬黍，未知何用，即加酬定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157254_comment'></div>且五代离乱，古器荡然，虽欲制作，靡所缘傍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157254_comment'></div>时无神瞽，孰敢取中？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157254_comment'></div>独非莫知，独是莫晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157254_comment'></div>工乎音者，不能言义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157254_comment'></div>工乎书者，不能察声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157254_comment'></div>信乎音声之难，不可以言晓者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1157254_comment'></div>故曰，知之者欲教而无从，心达者体之而无师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1157254_comment'></div>方今去圣既远，知音又寡，但取朴准，调叶八音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1157254_comment'></div>属者太常臣燕肃，以律准尺之三分，欲为十二律管，而黄钟九寸，遂不得声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1157254_comment'></div>更广空道，乃与律应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1157254_comment'></div>虽管内均厚未悉如法，然深疑今尺比古差短，太常钟石，遂及于清，流至法部，转用高急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1157254_comment'></div>臣以为宜求索上党秬黍，如达奚震之言，选其精圆，累定寸尺，求管得管，求声得声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1157254_comment'></div>以所管之声合周时之准，茍高下符会，清浊无差，即可遂为定法，颁布方国，足以示陛下同律度量衡之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1157254_comment'></div>脱有与准未合，即乞募知音，别用新管，参考中声，检摄群音，制定雅乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1157254_comment'></div>庶乎正历代之谬秕，亦何惮焉<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1157254_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_1157254'>之律：原脱，据《隋书》卷一六《律历志》上补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_78_1157254_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157254'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_77_1157254_0'>⑴ 《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷二六。又见《历代名臣奏议》卷二八○。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1157254_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1157258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论太乐署有舂牍之名而无舂牍之器奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年9月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157258")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157258'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157258'>臣观景德中李宗谔所进《乐纂》，革部中著舂牍，其说曰：「《周礼》笙师掌教舂牍应雅，以作《裓》乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157258_comment'></div>宾醉而出，奏《裓夏》，以三器筑地为之节<span class='inlineComment2'>（三器，谓牍及雅、相也。）</span>，明不失礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157258_comment'></div>大五寸，长七尺，短者或三尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157258_comment'></div>其端有空，漆画之，以两手筑地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157258_comment'></div>今并于宫县舞乐中用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157258_comment'></div>臣比遍问乐工，言初无此器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157258_comment'></div>及责其乐器之籍，则明著舂牍，而说与《乐纂》相符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157258_comment'></div>又景德乐工，于今多在，诘其所以，乃云恐宗谔论著之时，止凭本署簿文，误著于《乐纂》耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157258_comment'></div>臣谨采《三礼图》所画舂牍之状，大略可晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157258_comment'></div>然检覈著令及旧史，其文武二舞，诸工所用，但有鼗、铎、錞、铙、相、雅、干、戚、籥、翟等器，不著舂牍，则知后人设采古名以为空说矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1157258_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157257' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157257' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157257?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论太乐置雷鼓灵鼓路鼓备而不击及无三鼗奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年9月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157257")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157257_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157257'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157257'>臣按，周大司乐之职，雷鼓雷鼗，奏于圆丘，以祀天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157257_comment'></div>灵鼓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1157257", 1157257, "Clauses/5/Comments/0")'>灵鼗</span>，奏于方丘，以祀地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157257_comment'></div>路鼓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1157257", 1157257, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>路鼗</span>，奏于宗庙，以格祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157257_comment'></div>历代用焉，著为乐令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157257_comment'></div>然则小鼓为大鼓先引，得作乐之渐，故两施无嫌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157257_comment'></div>国朝崇荐郊庙，但各设鼓于乐县之内，备而不击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157257_comment'></div>夫有鼓无鼗，于礼已阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157257_comment'></div>设而不用，在阙尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157257_comment'></div>盖上袭五代，抏敝失传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157257_comment'></div>有司持循，罔暇论讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157257_comment'></div>臣以为可诏本署，稽旧典，访遗法，作为三鼗，以备大乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157257_comment'></div>祭祀之际，其鼓若鼗，皆使县工播而击之，用谐音节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157257_comment'></div>如此则器备礼完，神祇来格矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157257_comment'></div>旧说鼗者，如鼓而小，以木贯中作柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157257_comment'></div>雷鼗柄各四枚，为八面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157257_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1157257", 1157257, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>灵鼗</span>柄各三枚，为六面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157257_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1157257", 1157257, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>路鼗</span>柄各二枚，为四面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157257_comment'></div>旁以结皮为耳，摇之，还自击也，以通雷鼓、灵鼓、路鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157257_comment'></div>掌鼓之工，每面一人，左手播鼗，右手击鼓云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157257_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157259' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157259' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157259?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论竽及巢笙和笙奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年9月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157259")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157259_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157259'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157259'>臣奉诏与太常臣燕肃等图画太常乐器，以备程览。<div class='inline'
