id='poem_sentence_0_1157259_comment'></div>至匏部，有竽及巢笙、和笙共三种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157259_comment'></div>按旧说，竽长四尺二寸，三十六篁，宫管在中，形参差，像凤翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157259_comment'></div>巢笙十九篁，和笙十三篁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157259_comment'></div>今据太乐诸工以竽、巢、和三种并为一器，皆取胡部七十管笙为之，但以宫管移徙左右，用为小异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157259_comment'></div>其巢、和二笙，在景德中，李宗谔又奏定二义管，悉贯匏中，今为十九管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157259_comment'></div>臣曾索于乐署，得凤笙一种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157259_comment'></div>乐工言，此古器，今不可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157259_comment'></div>推验形制，乃古竽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157259_comment'></div>其长四尺有馀，三十六管，列管参差，及曲颈，皆为凤饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157259_comment'></div>其空悉在管外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157259_comment'></div>岁久不治，有管无簧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157259_comment'></div>今但秘而存之，为无用之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157259_comment'></div>臣以为可募知音者修复古竽，以合正声，革易当今署工所用浅俗惉懘之器，勿令乱雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157259_comment'></div>并按竽以合正声，悉还旧制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157259_comment'></div>传曰「放郑声」，谓此物也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157259_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157260?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论引武舞所执九器各有所用奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年9月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157260")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157260_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157260'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157260'>臣按，武舞六十四人，左执干，右执戚，离为八列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157260_comment'></div>又别使工人执旌居前，次执鼗，次执铎，次执鼗，次执铙，次执相在左，执雅在右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157260_comment'></div>各分行夹引，至乐作舞入，则自鼗而下，咸振作之，舞工定位而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157260_comment'></div>及舞将退，又振作之，舞工毕出而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157260_comment'></div>臣窃详鼗铎之设，义不虚生，盖旧史礼经，但举其凡，不言其细，故辈出旅进，无有先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157260_comment'></div>且鼗者，所谓导舞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157260_comment'></div>铎者，所谓通鼓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157260_comment'></div>錞者，所谓和鼓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157260_comment'></div>铙者，所谓止鼓也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157260_comment'></div>相者，所谓辅乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157260_comment'></div>雅者，所谓陔步也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157260_comment'></div>夫錞于铙铎，在周鼓人四金之奏，以和军旅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157260_comment'></div>武舞象功，故得以军器参焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157260_comment'></div>是舞之容节导于鼗，通于铎，和于錞，止于铙，辅于相，陔于雅，义可见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157260_comment'></div>宁有导舞方始，止鼓参焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157260_comment'></div>止鼓既摇，通铎乱焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157260_comment'></div>进退不伦，终始无别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157260_comment'></div>臣虽不习故事，窃以私意度之，谓当舞入之时，鼗铎以先之，錞以和之，相以辅之，雅以节之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157260_comment'></div>及舞之将成也，则鸣铙以进行列，筑雅以陔步武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157260_comment'></div>各分左右，与舞俱出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157260_comment'></div>其鼗铎錞相，皆止而不作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157260_comment'></div>故司马职曰「鸣铙且却」，斯之谓矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157260_comment'></div>如此则允协乐意，庶复旧职。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1157260_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年11月</a>　十一月，在京为太常博士，作《阳郊庆成颂》作品：阳郊庆成颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三五。）</span><div id='poem_1158037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158037?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阳郊庆成颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158037")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158037'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158037'>臣某言，臣向者幸得以博士奉侍大祠，清庙圆丘，恭导升降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158037_comment'></div>伏见陛下接神措事，饬躬备物，亹亹夙夜，如不敢康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158037_comment'></div>至诚上通，灵贶如答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158037_comment'></div>辇出殿幄，而瑞霰先涂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158037_comment'></div>斋款宗祏，而祥飙迎辂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158037_comment'></div>景至之夕，步自帷宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158037_comment'></div>改衣云散，登坛月皎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158037_comment'></div>收戢凄凛，煦如阳春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158037_comment'></div>旂无荡斿，燎无摇景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158037_comment'></div>已事还轸，官不告勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158037_comment'></div>三灵洪洞，交相为庆，涤秽荡瑕，纳于昭清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158037_comment'></div>此则上帝所以顾諟，陛下所以钦奉，天人之际，不为远已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158037_comment'></div>臣亲觌盛礼，昧于知量，辄订诗人之义，作《阳郊庆成颂》六篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158037_comment'></div>义大词褊，无以游扬万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158037_comment'></div>庶几侲童谣汉、击辕慕韶之比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158037_comment'></div>窃用缮录，冒昧以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1158037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年</a>　本年，在京为太常博士，与夏竦有书信往来。作品：回夏尚书南京上任启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五二。）</span><div id='poem_1157644' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157644' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157644?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回夏尚书南京上任启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157644")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157644_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157644'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157644'>伏承荣焘显都，肃开上府，道风所被，礼俗载康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157644_comment'></div>恭惟尚书识照圣邻，谋含国采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157644_comment'></div>早同寅于成务，荐凝绩以蕃君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157644_comment'></div>比汉酂侯，谨信而司籥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157644_comment'></div>为周申伯，惠直以揉邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157644_comment'></div>属信处之云初，顾化成而允赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157644_comment'></div>猥纡公翰，申贲礼华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157644_comment'></div>永惟万户之严，聊浃九河之润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157644_comment'></div>冀遒天祉，翘奉帝咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157644_comment'></div>佩戢欣愉，一二非述。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1157644_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年</a>　约于本年，在京为太常博士，作《太常寺进案到钟磬一部表》作品：太常寺进案到钟磬一部表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三六。）</span><div id='poem_1157351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157351?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太常寺进案到钟磬一部表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157351")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157351_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157351'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157351'>臣闻凫氏之为钟也，已厚则石，已薄则播，故以弇侈之量齐焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157351_comment'></div>磬氏之为磬也，上则磨其旁，下则磨其端，故以清浊之法制焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157351_comment'></div>是则器先利而音调，民已和而乐应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157351_comment'></div>《礼》著夏歌者，实先于人奏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157351_comment'></div>《诗》次《商颂》者，本依于磬声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157351_comment'></div>然后奋豫饰情，统同布度，尽《韶》之美，黜《武》之惭，谐下管以九成，绚崇牙而四合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157351_comment'></div>圣期累盛，至范交修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157351_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下，考古立均，披图迎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157351_comment'></div>大猷翕作，《韶》《象》嘉成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157351_comment'></div>推至乐以求音，本乎在治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157351_comment'></div>顾攸司之合奏，容有失传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157351_comment'></div>所属以闻，发中垂可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157351_comment'></div>特颁明命，俾考正声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157351_comment'></div>臣等共率惷冥，仰祗推择，昧阮咸识微之妙，非文收调哑之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157351_comment'></div>淹久日时，咨求典故，方且校堵肆之全缺，参宫羽之重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157351_comment'></div>或铝其铣栾，均疾舒之所在；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157351_comment'></div>或镵其鼓股，取击拊之有宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157351_comment'></div>曩惟周臣，肇营律准，张弦列位，代管还宫，居有雅音，取为定法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157351_comment'></div>今已考齐钟磬一部，与律准之声悉无差异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157351_comment'></div>七均有叙，九变告和，诎然能终，纯如可纵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157351_comment'></div>惟夫金有大定之德，石无可转之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157351_comment'></div>茍二器应以克谐，则八音受而为度，上符丕律，有焕懿纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157351_comment'></div>窃惟真圣之朝，已尝修正雅乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157351_comment'></div>旧章故在，年所聿迁，遗我成规，以启淳烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157351_comment'></div>况今穆清多裕，听览馀閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157351_comment'></div>幸得树羽充庭，瞭人肄业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157351_comment'></div>虑治音之有误，丐善听之所裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157351_comment'></div>庶使靡靡遗声，不容于五降；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157351_comment'></div>愔愔王度，来格于三神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157351_comment'></div>永示方来，以矜能述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157351_comment'></div>臣等无任省循干冒，激切屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157351_comment'></div>其钟磬谨随表上进以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1157351_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年5月</a>　五月，在京为太常博士，有诗送范仲淹出知饶州。作品：送范希文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二〇。）</span><div id='poem_105859' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105859' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105859?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送范希文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105859")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105859_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105859'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105859'>日夕朋簪远，空成咄咄嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105859'>危言犹在口，飞语已磨牙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105859'>室救鸱鸮毁，庭喧獬豸邪。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105859'>青蒲空顿首，白简遂为瑕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105859'>身历千金险，头经一夕华。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105859'>便应过楚泽，何异向长沙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105859'>篑土障河拙，园葵望日赊。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105859'>尽焚温室草，尚得使君车。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105859'>胜壤堪怀古，扁舟复载家。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105859'>此时能痛饮，努力咏馀霞。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105859'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_105859_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年6月19日</a>　六月十九日，在京为太常博士，受诏与冯元等较定乐尺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年7月13日</a>　七月十三日，在京为太常博士，与修之《景祐广乐记》成书，迁工部员外郎。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年7月</a>　七月，在京为太常博士，代冯元作谢表。作品：代谢进五箴奖谕表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四一。）</span><div id='poem_1157432' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157432' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157432?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代谢进五箴奖谕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157432")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157432_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157432'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157432'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈以臣所进《金华五箴》并遂特赐诏书奖谕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157432_comment'></div>瞽言通讽，窃抒夫危衷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157432_comment'></div>善听作谋，猥烦夫褒答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157432_comment'></div>荷择焉于乃圣，赦斐然之所裁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157432_comment'></div>训奖垂颁，荣悸参处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157432_comment'></div>伏念臣禀生輶蔽，典学迂疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157432_comment'></div>亨会相偕，仕涂寖膴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157432_comment'></div>早缘佔毕之伎，久侍拥经之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157432_comment'></div>天纵睿姿，日跻茂德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157432_comment'></div>泰山盘巩，无俟埃𡏖之增；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157432_comment'></div>时雨沛流，安施浸灌之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157432_comment'></div>委蛇就缀，拱默穷年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157432_comment'></div>琄琄者佩璲之长，尸官自审；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157432_comment'></div>坎坎者河檀之伐，浮禄既多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157432_comment'></div>因缀讲以偃休，偶临文而采获，以为千虑而得，罔间至愚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157432_comment'></div>百官攸箴，趣无阙政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157432_comment'></div>尧仁率俾，有谤木之求；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157432_comment'></div>周道其兴，存庭燎之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157432_comment'></div>由是旁缘前谊，䌷绎费辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157432_comment'></div>宣之使言，本由善治之及；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157432_comment'></div>入告于内，终谢斯猷之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157432_comment'></div>乃蒙皇帝陛下综成务之閒，察迩言之陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157432_comment'></div>贷夫浅虑，谅乃朴忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157432_comment'></div>收为瑱之寸长，乃均犀璧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157432_comment'></div>枉出缗之慈谕，迥比日星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157432_comment'></div>刻诵载周，孤危知免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157432_comment'></div>誓虽从于九殒，靡忘补于万分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1157432_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年8月</a>　八月，在京为工部员外郎，为父宋玘作行状。作品：荆南府君行状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六二。温谱系此文于十月，此据宋祁《代与李舍人书》（《景文集》卷五〇）改。）</span><div id='poem_1158137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158137?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荆南府君行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158137")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158137_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158137'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158137'>宋氏本广平望族，代有冠冕，中叶避地，始来浚都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158137_comment'></div>通州府君事唐昭宗，位至御史中丞，坐法贬州司马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158137_comment'></div>子孙蕃衍，为东畿著姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158137_comment'></div>乾封府君事后唐，历晋、汉，多为剧邑，清尚素节，乡品亡二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158137_comment'></div>霍丘府君弱冠秀发，通王霸之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158137_comment'></div>是时诸侯据藩岳，招豪英，因感艰运，濡足当世，由是连应沧、魏、兖、冀之辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158137_comment'></div>周世宗用兵淮上，铺敦深入，府君自田里献书行在，陈灭吴之策，世宗奇其材，拜真令，随王师东下而安辑之，淮人忘亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158137_comment'></div>遭内忧去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158137_comment'></div>宋受禅，铨符追集，调蔡州团练判官，谢病不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158137_comment'></div>俄而易箦，年四十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158137_comment'></div>先府君蚤孤，事母贾夫人至谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158137_comment'></div>诸兄以宦学，远或千里，近或数年乃还，惟府君朝夕瞻省，以孝闻邑中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158137_comment'></div>里人邢敦，盘桓遁世，罕通谢问，独以府君为益者之友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158137_comment'></div>治《春秋》三家，长《左氏》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158137_comment'></div>贾夫人之丧，毁瘠如礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158137_comment'></div>年四十，亲友劝以仕，始游京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158137_comment'></div>太宗端拱二年，明经及第，为宁州襄乐主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158137_comment'></div>时四方饟道数棘，外台郑文宝檄府君行部中，董索输护，如令而办，大见褒识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158137_comment'></div>代还，调江州司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158137_comment'></div>慨然叹曰：「是不足为仁耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158137_comment'></div>位无大小，顾力行何如耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158137_comment'></div>因精思于讯鞫爰书之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158137_comment'></div>属邑尉邢积捕疑盗数十人，锻锢周密，移之郡狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158137_comment'></div>太守李朝以證左明具，即俾论死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158137_comment'></div>府君疑有枉状，因微挺囚械，物色以问之，囚对不雠，乃自白于朝，朝弗察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158137_comment'></div>府君即申牒：「大狱四十日，所以防冤诬，尽情实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158137_comment'></div>今旬甲未浃，不敢如教」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158137_comment'></div>朝大怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158137_comment'></div>居数日，邻州获真盗自首于官，传檄株送，朝执书惭且骇曰：「掾其神乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158137_comment'></div>州界有行商，部辎重，夜径泽中，将宿佛祠，值奸人前杀群僧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158137_comment'></div>廷内狼籍，商人入寺，蹀其血，乃觉，因轻骑逃去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158137_comment'></div>晓逢逻者，见衣履有污，执以为贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158137_comment'></div>传考数狱，商遂自诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158137_comment'></div>府君以为是辈操奇赢，举千百计，胡怨而蹈死耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158137_comment'></div>因屏左右，訹以好语，商恐惧，辞卒不变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158137_comment'></div>府君犹却其狱，夜据案寐，恍惚若有人乘马至厅事，自称郑使者，呼曰：「误矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158137_comment'></div>府君警寤，遽召侍卒，缓其系，尽取成牍焚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158137_comment'></div>左右杂然谓不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158137_comment'></div>迟明，有姓郑者诣官告其谋，尽获支党，商乃免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158137_comment'></div>其慎谛精感如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158137_comment'></div>前后阅郡将数人，其间侍中文懿冯公尤所钦待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158137_comment'></div>殿省丞吕奉天峭刻临州，少所推荐，器府君仁隐材干，凡再加保述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158137_comment'></div>居官八年弗得代，时故贰卿文定赵公以美俗使江表，廉其淹恤，疾置言状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158137_comment'></div>是冬，集吏部，复掾常州，三考皆最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158137_comment'></div>掌狱凡十年，所蔽数千，无一諈诿者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158137_comment'></div>每有重辟，必持案谂囚，尔罪应死，尽召家人，使之相见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158137_comment'></div>饘鬻衽席，时其早晏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158137_comment'></div>未始妄加搒掠，须其情究意讫，然后行决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158137_comment'></div>囚皆叩颡感泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158137_comment'></div>既诛，又为人设一僧，使诵经忏罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158137_comment'></div>自是州人习闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158137_comment'></div>其后囚每伏法，卒呼曰：「若物化有知，当为宋府君作狗马，偿厚德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158137_comment'></div>九江、毗陵二郡父老至今能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158137_comment'></div>俄为光州录事参军、安州应山令、江陵府从事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158137_comment'></div>府君谦谨修洁，廉静乐道，薄于自奉，裕于施物，笥无兼衣，案无累殽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158137_comment'></div>以己不知人为疚，不以人不知己为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158137_comment'></div>冲猷隐量，粹焉莫见其际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158137_comment'></div>恭于接士而不谄也，力于事神而不祈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158137_comment'></div>不援上以茍求，不诡遇以取获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158137_comment'></div>居六官，更三十载，结考十七，讫无玷漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158137_comment'></div>而间关栖迟，终不获迁，力与命其相戾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158137_comment'></div>雅性强记，闇诵诸经及梁《昭明文选》，以教授诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158137_comment'></div>遇家人嗃嗃严厉，虽盛暑必正冠束带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158137_comment'></div>居常讽梵书，日十数过以为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158137_comment'></div>读《庄子·内篇》，至「金跃求为镆邪」，辄以订己曰：「吾终不为不祥之请」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158137_comment'></div>其埋照含厚，盖性之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158137_comment'></div>天禧元年调都下，疾终于僦庑，实六月二十九日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158137_comment'></div>同母昆弟七人：长曰玮，终安州云梦令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158137_comment'></div>次曰琚，曰璩，曰现，咸先殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158137_comment'></div>弟曰昱，举进士，早世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158137_comment'></div>曰位，终国子博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158137_comment'></div>五合姓：曰高氏，曰二王氏，继以钟氏，最后朱氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158137_comment'></div>朱夫人后府君十三年而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158137_comment'></div>三子：长曰邡，早夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158137_comment'></div>仲曰郊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158137_comment'></div>季曰祁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158137_comment'></div>邡，后王氏出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158137_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_77_1158137", 1158137, "Clauses/231/Comments/1")'>郊、祁</span>，钟出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158137_comment'></div>府君之归全也，朱夫人留止南方，独郊侍疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158137_comment'></div>及斩焉在疚，力不克葬，乃权窆京城之偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158137_comment'></div>后八年，郊与祁皆进士及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158137_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158137_comment'></div>小子以治命之重，不敢殒灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158137_comment'></div>天假残息，兴于零丁孤苦之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158137_comment'></div>遭时乐育，进服嘉会，非府君之储德凭厚，义方清白之所庇，畴能及此！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158137_comment'></div>然禄之弗逮，哀亦罔极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158137_comment'></div>幸天子推孝治之化，笃褒亲之典，乃以天圣五年郊祀，诏书一追赠府君为太子中允，封朱夫人为寿光县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158137_comment'></div>明道东耕，再赠屯田员外郎，追封钟夫人为颍川县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158137_comment'></div>景祐二年园丘礼成，进加今赠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158137_comment'></div>今得吉卜于许州阳翟县三封乡之南原，以景祐丙子孟冬之癸酉，举公之柩，以钟氏、朱氏二夫人合祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158137_comment'></div>恭惟先府君庸言成规，庸行成矩，凡有诸训，皆可为士林景法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158137_comment'></div>而光灵寖远，竹素靡传，摧恸追怀，百不获一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158137_comment'></div>谨捃摭崖略，以备志墓之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158137_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_93_1158137_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年8月</a>　八月，在京为工部员外郎，为叔父宋位作行状。作品：叔父府君行状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六二。温谱系此文于十月，此据宋祁《代与李舍人书》（《景文集》卷五〇）改。）</span><div id='poem_1158138' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158138' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158138?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叔父府君行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158138")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158138_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158138'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158138'>府君少孤，逮冠，喜游侠，重然诺，居乡里，以风义自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158138_comment'></div>既而感曾高以降皆用儒术进，始慷慨从学，通戴氏《礼》及《周》、《仪》二书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158138_comment'></div>太宗端拱元年，以经明释褐，补陇州陇安簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158138_comment'></div>再调虔州石城簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158138_comment'></div>代还，以结课尤异，迁耀州观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158138_comment'></div>州与霍丘府君嫌名音协，固乞改拟，不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158138_comment'></div>秩满，又调静安军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158138_comment'></div>时故尚书任中正以时望镇左蜀，幕筹郡政，一以咨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158138_comment'></div>府君敏给而才，感知己之遇，罄露风力，助成绥辑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158138_comment'></div>任公密启其状，冬进改大理丞，出宰大名府朝城县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158138_comment'></div>以建封之庆，就改太子右赞善大夫，仍赐五品服，移宰河南之登封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158138_comment'></div>祀汾礼毕，列进殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158138_comment'></div>俄而通判麟州，又移镇戎军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158138_comment'></div>天禧初，有司稽劳，转国子博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158138_comment'></div>晚节连倅边守，皆西陲劲兵处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158138_comment'></div>边土惨烈，寒中肌骨，髀肉销尽，壮趾成灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158138_comment'></div>及还台，不能拜伏，辄取长床卧里舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158138_comment'></div>痌瘝寖剧，遂臻大病，以天禧二年某年月日启手足于京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158138_comment'></div>前夫人王氏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158138_comment'></div>后夫人孙氏，封长安县君，皆前卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158138_comment'></div>子一人，曰郁，以族父之荫，今为荣州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158138_comment'></div>同祖兄六人：曰玮，终安州云梦令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158138_comment'></div>曰琚，曰璩，曰现，皆文行孝友，不及仕途；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158138_comment'></div>曰珣，终江陵府节度推官，赠工部郎中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158138_comment'></div>曰昱，举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158138_comment'></div>并先去世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158138_comment'></div>府君最幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158138_comment'></div>谨按，府君天资强济，于法令尤邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158138_comment'></div>前后操吏治，详民慝，文牍倥偬，群虑眩而不解，府君一见皆唾掌立决，情得奸露，人人厌伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158138_comment'></div>故所莅之政，旬未浃而声已驰矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158138_comment'></div>使轺郡将，争为荐宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158138_comment'></div>忠悯寇公抚全魏，闻朝城之政，恨知君晚，自本邑檄召权贰府事，欲日见音采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158138_comment'></div>其为名卿所钦挹如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158138_comment'></div>精心劲气，老而弥壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158138_comment'></div>与江陵府君华颠从官，比诸昆最寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158138_comment'></div>而姿宇风韵，纤微克肖，虽近亲昵友，或不之辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158138_comment'></div>逮末疾淹久，闻江陵之讣，因而易箦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158138_comment'></div>孔怀之痛，可谓至焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158138_comment'></div>自称讳以来藁窆都外，由群从而上，悉葬故茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158138_comment'></div>及府君，昭穆益卑，容竁无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158138_comment'></div>其孤郁与兄子郊等，别启新域于许州阳翟县三封乡之南原，即以今岁孟冬之癸酉，奉江陵及府君之柩，偶穴同兆，且以终手足之爱，从象数之吉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158138_comment'></div>幽础辞刻，必咨宗匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158138_comment'></div>是用直叙官伐，概举遗烈，不敢文致，以备论次之实云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158138_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1158138_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年8月</a>　八月，在京为工部员外郎，代兄宋庠作书，乞李淑为其父宋玘作墓志铭。作品：代与李舍人书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157558' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157558' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157558?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代与李舍人书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157558")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157558_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157558'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157558'>八月日，广平宋某谨奉书献臣执事某：夙以羁单，天薄其祜，年甫弱冠，再衔怙恃之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157558_comment'></div>独与季氏祁，间关出处，更相为命，仅荷遗构，以及仕涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157558_comment'></div>永念及我先府君，奄弃盛世，藁窆都外，霜沐露濡，七见闰月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157558_comment'></div>以时之不易，久未厝安，夙夜震惧，心焉如殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157558_comment'></div>乃今卜于许之阳翟，龟墨惟食，将以冬十月克襄先妣先君之葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157558_comment'></div>某深惟古君子有天爵道富，高明令终者，则或传于史官，或铭于鼎彝，或谥于攸司，用能发闻馨香，以昭示来世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157558_comment'></div>后虽有不肖愚蒙之嗣，犹赖先哲，自免于沟隍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157558_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157558_comment'></div>若我先君，官限于选条，名壅于邦闻，儒林循吏之篇，莫得采获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157558_comment'></div>近古大夫不世禄，家无庙食，考父孔悝之器，莫知所施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157558_comment'></div>故事，三品薨，始得上尚书，以节一惠，门生故吏之状，实隔彝制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157558_comment'></div>是三者，皆以位不配道，礼从而污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157558_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157558_comment'></div>昔人有行高瑾瑜而名灭煨烬者，不可称纪，谅有憾于此耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157558_comment'></div>今惟圆石勒铭，尚微品制之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157558_comment'></div>后裔皆得序馀庆，哀前烈，勤咨当世之彦，炳辞腾实，以光宠九京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157558_comment'></div>仆诚惷烦梼昧，无可比数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157558_comment'></div>然世谋忠教，尚能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157558_comment'></div>恭惟执事以正几之才，良直之任，纡褒为衮，敷言成春，荐绅代家，咸资善述，以信陵谷之后，为无穷计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157558_comment'></div>是用忍抽裂之痛，以髣髴茂芬潜德，泣状官代，萃为一通，敢私布于下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157558_comment'></div>重念孝子之奉先也，无美而称之，是诬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157558_comment'></div>有善而弗知，不明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157558_comment'></div>知而弗传，不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157558_comment'></div>如先君之纯之卲也如彼，仆之幸而知之也如此，愿托沈刻，以扬遗懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157558_comment'></div>使小人之责，免于不仁不明之地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157558_comment'></div>赍志之愤，见伸于冥冥之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157558_comment'></div>非仁哲锡类，其畴图之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157558_comment'></div>委素归诚，幸赐哀许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157558_comment'></div>不次。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1157558_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年</a>　本年，在京为工部员外郎，应张夏之请，作《泗州重修水窦窗记》作品：泗州重修水窦窗记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158011' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158011?labeling=true' target='_blank'>泗州重修水窦窗记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158011")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158011'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158011'>景祐二年，泗上守清河张君缮防成城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158011_comment'></div>既弥水患，部刺史交章言状，治在异等，帝庸嘉之，荣劳增秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158011_comment'></div>未几，又以江南漕使之节畀即受焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158011_comment'></div>騑牡焜煌，改辕而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158011_comment'></div>泗人郁陶以叹，佥谓君有大造于我邦，式克还定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158011_comment'></div>钜功细役，咸有方略，粲焉可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158011_comment'></div>虽向之建台门，增治署，集贤南阳叶君道卿前述其概；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158011_comment'></div>联长堤，捍怒流，尚书外郎武功苏君仪甫嗣褒其最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158011_comment'></div>珉刻相望，驿声无穷，而水窦窗惟新底绩，忽而不记，则后之人无以知君精心长利，推行弥密者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158011_comment'></div>乃咨余求文，以信其传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158011_comment'></div>州内旧有支渠，受水流恶，股引回注，放于外隍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158011_comment'></div>穴墉为空，植木如棂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158011_comment'></div>内水方淹，则导焉以恣其出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158011_comment'></div>外水或暴，则筑焉以遏其入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158011_comment'></div>由是无曲藭之困，无重膇之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158011_comment'></div>元年淮汴合涨，齧堤传，乘四窦之久敝，入垫区舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158011_comment'></div>君搴菱执朴，亲督其役，培薄增庳，仅胜厥灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158011_comment'></div>及水复旧道，君曰，吾知防御之要矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158011_comment'></div>明年，遂议改作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158011_comment'></div>撤壤之朽，易瓴之苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158011_comment'></div>规以墨文，臬其高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158011_comment'></div>更镵石千枚，代木作棂，并固窦门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158011_comment'></div>运甓十六万，以护沟泐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158011_comment'></div>课员二十六，以总役要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158011_comment'></div>月再朔而功告成，由是视洫无阻流，涉逵无停潦矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158011_comment'></div>其夏水复汎溢，几高民屋，而新堤蟠如，新窦呀如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158011_comment'></div>三老序长，或持一秉菅焉，或操一篑土焉，据坚窒要，守有馀壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158011_comment'></div>水留十二日而去，民皆按堵，有备故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158011_comment'></div>《礼》：「仲春达沟渠，利堤防，以时儆人」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158011_comment'></div>思召公之风，爱所憩之棠，《春秋》有所褒者，其文繁而不杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158011_comment'></div>若张君补弊图久，克勤小物，合乎《礼》之「时儆」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158011_comment'></div>邦人受君之赐，不忘刊美，订乎《诗》之爱树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158011_comment'></div>是美也，由君以勤民得之，异乎人之求之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158011_comment'></div>予敢不申二君之馀咏，裒僝工之纤悉，用《春秋》不杀之义乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158011_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158011_comment'></div>继而共治者，嘉作窦之劳，勿替而引之可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158011_comment'></div>明年为记，乃刊石云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1158011_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年</a>　本年，在京为工部员外郎，应李迪之请，作《重修彭祖燕子二楼记》作品：重修彭祖燕子二楼记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158014' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158014' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158014?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修彭祖燕子二楼记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158014")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158014_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158014'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158014'>景祐二年，丞相陇西公以大司寇殿徐方，瑞节兵璋，东雄诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158014_comment'></div>公既来戾，而三老耆艾，更相庆告：「昔公初仪，实监我州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158014_comment'></div>阶是而往，遂勤王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158014_comment'></div>寅亮谟明，辰阶以平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158014_comment'></div>距三十年，朅来作屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158014_comment'></div>人一所天，我且二之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158014_comment'></div>喔咻保障，邦人攸宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158014_comment'></div>愿相约敕，无咈公虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158014_comment'></div>俾公阳休，克炽而遒」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158014_comment'></div>于是阖境闻风，薰然交吁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158014_comment'></div>吏肃于局，师和于屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158014_comment'></div>政成事辑，西驿腾报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158014_comment'></div>公曰：「官责舒矣，姑逸无劳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158014_comment'></div>乃达观署居，寖眺城隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158014_comment'></div>岿焉二楼，联冠州雉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158014_comment'></div>直艮陬者曰彭祖，占坎方者曰燕子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158014_comment'></div>间所容度，凡百步而赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158014_comment'></div>厥初僝功，因朴成隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158014_comment'></div>丹雘岁逝，淟而不鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158014_comment'></div>公弭节久之，心陋其制，若曰：「此焉惮改，是春秋无以衎吾属而望吾气焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158014_comment'></div>指定于颐，揆日丕作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158014_comment'></div>崇庳撤敝，化为高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158014_comment'></div>收虞衡之羡材，贾隶徒之群力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158014_comment'></div>增增胥观，弗勤弗亟，迭奂并轮，与新偕来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158014_comment'></div>尔乃阳荣南舒，负为虚楹，则席焉可袤丈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158014_comment'></div>阴轩北敞，环为飞槛，则目焉可眺远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158014_comment'></div>溯空蟠高，快煟异仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158014_comment'></div>由左而右，厥制如一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158014_comment'></div>近之则泗汴二流，素波相受，趋浥激堆，汩潏奫沦之奇，呈露于庑下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158014_comment'></div>远之则黄楚众山，翠岭争长，舒霞逗景，合沓奔腾之状，进列于阶次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158014_comment'></div>台风徐生，栋云自逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158014_comment'></div>万妍纷至，一瞬可悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158014_comment'></div>然而丞相落成于斯，合饮于斯，又有属焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158014_comment'></div>览乎鲜原，则农之窳勤是询；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158014_comment'></div>俯乎嚣闬，则工之苦良是察；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158014_comment'></div>间旅笾豆，则宾之威仪是式；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158014_comment'></div>延玩草树，则土之腴瘠是启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158014_comment'></div>至于良辰赏心，发幽储粹，凭瞩虚泬，坐陶天倪，可以适凉温，宁支体者，公不专焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158014_comment'></div>徐人是以知公之光辅二君，昭明显庸者，推是心而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158014_comment'></div>则又谋曰：「公之忠利仁爱，及物也深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158014_comment'></div>一日趣舍人装办，入毗天子，则所憩所茇，尚将爱而歌之，况丽谯改为，胡可弗纪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158014_comment'></div>明年，幕府裒状，属史官以索文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158014_comment'></div>谨按，楼之赋名尚矣，或以地，或以事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158014_comment'></div>公即而用之，纪方言而著实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158014_comment'></div>面势所审，衡从所底仍初者，略而不书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158014_comment'></div>惟是墙屋之完，栋宇之壮，役靡淹时，令出子来，可以足言贻后者，则《诗》之革而飞者欤，《礼》之发而智者欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1158014_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1036&endYear=1036')">1036年</a>　本年，在京为工部员外郎，应孙瑜之请，为其父孙奭作墓志铭。作品：仆射孙宣公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158152' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158152?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仆射孙宣公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158152")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158152_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158152'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158152'>圣上嗣位之初，丕承淳烈，将以雍言布度，召隽老惇儒入崇政殿中，以兴金华之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158152_comment'></div>时惟乐安孙公奭皤颠魁垒，授道帷幄，辰告日跻，渊静扬休，出入十年，厥猷茂焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158152_comment'></div>乃天圣辛未岁，以惇暮告劳，上还所事，天子雅贪公肃艾之望，倚以访逮需。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158152_comment'></div>奏三上，皆不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158152_comment'></div>公面自陈启，顿颡流泣，帝为改容，第许以兖州之章，申几杖之俟，犹命讲《老子》三章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158152_comment'></div>重以束帛乘马，袭衣镮带，命赐备厚，冲概以光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158152_comment'></div>乘舆燕于太清楼，别诏近臣饯于瑞圣苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158152_comment'></div>敕预会者赋诗必类，且锡天什，宠贲其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158152_comment'></div>师臣礼遇，夐无与二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158152_comment'></div>公居东一年，上书求谢，悃愊愿确。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158152_comment'></div>朝议重违，进拜太子少傅，以安车还汶上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158152_comment'></div>明年夏五月，感疾甚笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158152_comment'></div>己丑，奉裨衣复于东荣，实明道癸酉，于是公之生七十二年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158152_comment'></div>讣闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158152_comment'></div>帝震悼，废朝，制赠文昌左相，赗泉二十万，录孤若孙一官，易名曰宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158152_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158152_comment'></div>哀与荣更相终始，其所以得之者，有猷有为故耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158152_comment'></div>公字宗古，代为本郡著姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158152_comment'></div>由公徙居于郓，今又为郓人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158152_comment'></div>讳霸，曾王父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158152_comment'></div>练，王父也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158152_comment'></div>翌，烈考也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158152_comment'></div>饶夫人，嫡妣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158152_comment'></div>丁夫人，继妣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158152_comment'></div>率祖而上，皆毓德丘里，不经世务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158152_comment'></div>考槃在志，以笃睦肥家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158152_comment'></div>丛郁庆祥，傒公而发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158152_comment'></div>烈考累封光禄少卿致仕，赠兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158152_comment'></div>二夫人以鄱阳、济阳二郡贲汤沐之典，从子贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158152_comment'></div>公强志精力，为诸生时，已通五经之说，百家之艺，游长者间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158152_comment'></div>久之，名闻京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158152_comment'></div>端拱中，擢明经高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158152_comment'></div>自释褐阅十七官，更五职，咸以最显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158152_comment'></div>由莒县主簿授廷尉平，参大成均之属，转本寺丞，迁尚书省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158152_comment'></div>又讲经于诸侯王邸，升奉常，为博士，入尚书台，为屯田、都官、职方三员外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158152_comment'></div>以司平、中兵二郎中待禁阁之制，改谏议大夫、给事，合六官践其四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158152_comment'></div>以小司空累迁至大宗伯，并兼玉堂讲劝之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158152_comment'></div>小司马时又帖秘图侍从之职，裕于德而膴于仕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158152_comment'></div>莅十一局，为审官三，吏铨、三班各一，其启拟无滞材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158152_comment'></div>署银台封駮再，判闻鼓一，其进退无壅情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158152_comment'></div>纠京狱，罚以丽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158152_comment'></div>使牧校，驺斯材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158152_comment'></div>总大农，事以给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158152_comment'></div>太常、太学客官，皆荐领焉，旧章之不忘，抑公是赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158152_comment'></div>三守邦治：高密五年，孟津三年，鲁郡再，并期年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158152_comment'></div>仁厚爱利，除一切之禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158152_comment'></div>风声化条，为二千石表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158152_comment'></div>简任之尤者，则章圣上封之岁，假节境上，谕安辽人，通聘于医无闾之落，又接其使于藁馆，道二国之言无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158152_comment'></div>册号郁苍，介使轺之华；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158152_comment'></div>程较俊选，精官材之辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158152_comment'></div>增修商荈旧任，宠其遗利，归之县官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158152_comment'></div>十累阶，止正奉大夫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158152_comment'></div>七论勋，至上柱国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158152_comment'></div>开国爵为公，食邑称是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158152_comment'></div>其发扬烜赫如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158152_comment'></div>在太宗时，辇过庠舍，公自下陈，捧经升阶，讲《说命》三篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158152_comment'></div>因古顺讽，音旨华畅，帝大褒挹，即赐五品袍鱼，群听始竦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158152_comment'></div>在真宗时，属柴梁岱，横河汾，拥符瑞之富，群臣争欲推天意，兴希阔之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158152_comment'></div>天子方凭翠帽，彷徉濑乡之区，眇然以思圣真之遗风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158152_comment'></div>公独建言危微之本，毖乎所忽，且引唐开元终悼后艰为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158152_comment'></div>帝亮其恳至，多所开纳，然犹著论以剖公之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158152_comment'></div>时郡国多上瑞物，公间得见，具言珍禽异卉为和气所蔓，以昭盛德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158152_comment'></div>然脱有窜伪，非应天之实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158152_comment'></div>又言道家祠醮，所费不赀，以爱啬财用为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158152_comment'></div>书数十上，启心进熟，靡所回隐，皆可以纾国庇民，兴天下长利，卓然有古风烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158152_comment'></div>彼龊龊容容，毋忠固意，且不得与公徒隶齿，真可愧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158152_comment'></div>及在经省，则取《无逸》篇绘图以进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158152_comment'></div>诗书道前王丧乱，进读者临文恤忌，或粗略含糊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158152_comment'></div>公独不然，必为正言之，冀以多识故常，有所裨劝，能纳君子善矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158152_comment'></div>公之典礼也，始请无祈谷而后农，冬至侍祠于郊，以天神醊食，宗庙复二舞雍彻，孔庙三献有官，迄今奉行为故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158152_comment'></div>唐礼，祈谷、大雩、大飨并祀昊天五帝，国朝因之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158152_comment'></div>公上言位号重复，不合正礼，且天无二帝，特以五时生育之功强为六名，冬至园丘宜罢五帝位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158152_comment'></div>孟春禘感帝位，日于东，月于西，以会礼家大报天主日配以月之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158152_comment'></div>雩飨宜祀五帝，不设昊天攒题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158152_comment'></div>事下有司，咸谓祀为大事，举而废之，不以疑定议，卒报罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158152_comment'></div>然服公论据精洽，愿下其书于史馆，则神不渎矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158152_comment'></div>初，公患五经章句浮长，删为《节解》数百篇，取九经之治要，著《微言》五十篇，实被诏奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158152_comment'></div>作《乐记图》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158152_comment'></div>承诏撰《崇祀录》，次五服年月，为一家之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158152_comment'></div>奉和两朝圣制，著《赓载集》，体尚沈雅，不为华藻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158152_comment'></div>自七经之疏，皆与刊正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158152_comment'></div>史志、子篇，律学，未镂官椠，以次建白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158152_comment'></div>自是流布，学者仰之，殆如杓然，终始典于学矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158152_comment'></div>举动温重，外和而内庄，譬干、莫在匣，隐然常若可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158152_comment'></div>何隆名重器，不植党援，而盗言哆箕，无所奇中，由慎密以自将欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158152_comment'></div>性纯孝，笃于温凊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158152_comment'></div>既荷囊珥笔，朝夕禁近，不得休沐过家，而烈考尚书又重去乡里，岁时上寿，公弗及预，数上书辞官从养，帝颇难之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158152_comment'></div>于是有左符之授，再徙地益东，盖公志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158152_comment'></div>尚书年过九十，公亦耆，指使尚就子舍，曳班裳，言不称老，养者以为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158152_comment'></div>及时侍疾也，不尝药不进，不复饭不甘，邹鲁之人多能言其行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158152_comment'></div>练达台阁制度，有咨无不得判，议者以许东京胡广，而持正过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158152_comment'></div>善知人，精于评鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158152_comment'></div>今左户二卿始平冯公，初在黄绶，公亟荐于朝，至于光大发舒，绸缪累圣，与接武露门，俱名儒宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158152_comment'></div>及冯浴堂之召，遂让其班而居公下，清议咨美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158152_comment'></div>其他推毂士甚众，虽未大显，皆休有令声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158152_comment'></div>俊乂用章，繄公为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158152_comment'></div>处约居易，让夷难进，不疚利于回，不愧祝于辞，甘是介节，讫无恫悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158152_comment'></div>及菟裘之还也，召乡人诸父，挥金以为欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158152_comment'></div>海鲲冥鸿，所造而适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158152_comment'></div>撤瑟之外，前处正寝，以谂考终之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158152_comment'></div>物怪气焰，罔形请祷，独召子姓以授治命，屏御不使进，且曰：「以齐吾终，遗礼惓惓止于献纳，传称得正而毙焉，斯已矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158152_comment'></div>又云：「既殁，其言立，此之谓不朽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158152_comment'></div>如公实参有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158152_comment'></div>夫人天水赵氏，服珈钿之华，能循法度，老不逮享，追封本郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158152_comment'></div>三子：长曰瑶，次曰琪，季曰瑜，由公任，各以材力进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158152_comment'></div>瑶历司虞员外郎，琪为屯卫丞，并早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158152_comment'></div>瑜今为殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158152_comment'></div>诸孙逮公之荫，为卿寺属者五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158152_comment'></div>殿中君以公殡之未祔，求为本州宾介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158152_comment'></div>怵惧摧怛，奔问于阳卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158152_comment'></div>得今丙子岁冬十月癸酉吉，奉公及夫人之丧，克窆于某县某乡某原，从先茔之穆位，顺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158152_comment'></div>以祁曩为经生，实被公荐，参掌仪署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158152_comment'></div>又节惠以举周法，知公之绩也熟，见托论撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158152_comment'></div>是用次叙其行，而纳于窀埏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158152_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_114_1158152'>猗欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158152_comment'></div>公之文，虑宪秉彝，式是古训，进为经师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158152_comment'></div>挟策立言，删剟游枝，搴其蕤兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158152_comment'></div>猗欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158152_comment'></div>公之仕，丁辰展美，其弁颀然，其缨华止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158152_comment'></div>不蹈九折，安我六辔，坦斯履兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158152_comment'></div>猗欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158152_comment'></div>公之德，方严直清，镇浮含厚，不伐存诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158152_comment'></div>匪躬蹇蹇，受命青青，时则行兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158152_comment'></div>猗欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158152_comment'></div>公之老，在汶之阳，贵屏国爵，宇发天光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158152_comment'></div>弋者何慕，鹪鹏已翔，寿俾臧兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158152_comment'></div>峨鬣封兮序先域，累密玺兮照窀穸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158152_comment'></div>子克荷兮孙绳绳，奉二尊兮安此宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158152_comment'></div>褒善猷兮刻沈賨，賨可泐兮名无垠。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_128_1158152'></div><div id='poem_sentence_128_1158152_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1037&endYear=1037')">1037年闰4月10日</a>　闰四月十日，在京为刑部员外郎，迁权同修起居注，以父讳玘及体弱辞之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1037&endYear=1037')">1037年</a>　夏，在京为刑部员外郎，有诗挽冯元。作品：章靖冯公哀词。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_105442' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105442' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105442?labeling=true' target='_blank'>章靖冯公哀词<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span
