class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105637_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105637'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105637'>朔气迎秋晏，因成糅雪飘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105637'>园宾惊早赋，郢曲爱新调。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105637'>杂霰鸣寒萚，纷花混晚苕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105637'>光含阙边凤，温借省中貂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105637'>缟顷才供望，盐波已屡销。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105637'>今年属清思，旻宇其寥寥。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105637_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105637'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_105637_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　秋，在京为刑部员外郎，有诗。作品：三司晏尚书西园玩菊。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷八。王谱系此诗于宝元元年，此据晏殊仕历改。）</span><div id='poem_104736' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104736' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104736?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三司晏尚书西园玩菊</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104736")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104736_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104736'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104736'>涉园求胜赏，时菊艳秋光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104736'>散漫仙潭饵，缡褷瑞鹄裳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104736'>酒熏吹晚蕊，蜂冷抱残香。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104736'>公意周盈感，留杯尽夕阳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104736_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104736'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104736_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　秋，在京为刑部员外郎，有诗和晏殊。作品：和三司晏尚书秋咏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二三。王谱系此诗于宝元元年，此据晏殊仕历改。）</span><div id='poem_104519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和三司晏尚书秋咏<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104519")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_104519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104519'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104519'>霜繁天白雁行单，灌莽梢梢矗早寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104519'>正是河山摇落处，莫轻离思欲凭栏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104519'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_104519_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_104518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104518?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_104518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104518'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104518'>溪漘水净莲茎倒，林杪风乾栗罅开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104518_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104518'>迥眺独吟俄夕景，毕逋鸦尾过墙来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104518_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104518'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_104518_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年11月16日</a>　十一月十六日，在京为刑部员外郎，改官天章阁待制、同判礼院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年11月</a>　十一月，在京为天章阁待制，有谢改官表。作品：谢改待制表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢改待制表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157369")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157369'>臣某言：臣伏奉制命，特授臣依旧充天章阁待制者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157369_comment'></div>命发于中，擢非其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157369_comment'></div>惧先褒集，感与愧参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157369_comment'></div>伏念臣早以惷冥，陶于文教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157369_comment'></div>在阿蒙育，易仕代耕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157369_comment'></div>由荐牍以应条，齿经生而挟册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157369_comment'></div>提给尚书之礼，升直道家之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157369_comment'></div>间属成书，亦蒙进秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157369_comment'></div>不挹浆而持斗，举畏叨名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157369_comment'></div>未司牧而逢牂，居惭何力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157369_comment'></div>仰含天造，未委官刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157369_comment'></div>猥濡墨于螭坳，兼倅筹于盐筴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157369_comment'></div>清光在望，更无咫尺之违；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157369_comment'></div>至治丁辰，时纪殊尤之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157369_comment'></div>内修幸会，畴敢越思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157369_comment'></div>乃蒙皇帝陛下录以刍微，记其状貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157369_comment'></div>慎行奖数，超寘迩僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157369_comment'></div>弗缘左右之容，特出颙卬之眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157369_comment'></div>披霄延澍，破蔀回光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157369_comment'></div>惟宝阁之神深，秘珍图之襞积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157369_comment'></div>创为美秩，庸伫惇儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157369_comment'></div>宁兹仆遫之才，可重清閒之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157369_comment'></div>卑微骤列，辞控无从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157369_comment'></div>昔之待诏承明，陪游金马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157369_comment'></div>无闻定著，尚诧荣阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157369_comment'></div>讵比亨嘉之辰，专为顾问之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157369_comment'></div>第惊兹授，偶值无庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157369_comment'></div>谨当佩训自强，饬躬思勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157369_comment'></div>驰无泛驾，虽千里之难期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157369_comment'></div>盆靡望天，冀一心而论报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157369_comment'></div>倘施涓𡏖，敢吝靡捐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1157369_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年11月</a>　十一月，在京为天章阁待制，有谢两府改官启。作品：授待制谢两府启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授待制谢两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157801")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157801'>比者被奖中宸，通班秘禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157801_comment'></div>褒甄匪序，荣灼参怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157801_comment'></div>窃念祁祜薄早孤，学勤晚就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157801_comment'></div>虽谋干禄，止辨易农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157801_comment'></div>寖簪绂于朝闺，间磨铅于史室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157801_comment'></div>自忘其鄙，日慎乃修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157801_comment'></div>升直殿螭之坳，入赞牢盆之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157801_comment'></div>车鼷鼓鴳，能无失性之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157801_comment'></div>燕麦兔葵，正恨取名之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157801_comment'></div>渐图寡悔，少赎空餐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157801_comment'></div>敢冀颙卬，曲垂眷逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157801_comment'></div>因避亲于具尔，不缘进于逌司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157801_comment'></div>直寘迩联，专由睿擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157801_comment'></div>在人畏假，即受惭虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157801_comment'></div>矧兹华阁之严，号为规地之密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157801_comment'></div>字文成叶，罗绚于珍图；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157801_comment'></div>奎势如钩，上仪于宝宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157801_comment'></div>讵应完士，入备王僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157801_comment'></div>迹夫误宠之来，抑有为容之素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157801_comment'></div>此盖阁下助陵敷育，因填埏和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157801_comment'></div>谓凫鹤之异宜，俾镈卢之参使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157801_comment'></div>遂容昭世，蔑叹滞才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157801_comment'></div>方且疏瀹乃心，靖恭尔位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157801_comment'></div>儆攸箴之所服，戒求福之斯回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157801_comment'></div>庶息烦言，归酬至鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157801_comment'></div>祓巾褠而尚远，寓笔舌以奚宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157801_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1157801_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年12月9日</a>　十二月九日，在京为天章阁待制，受赐金紫，有谢表。作品：谢赐金紫表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157370' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157370' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157370?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐金紫表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年12月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157370")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157370_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157370'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157370'>臣某言：今月九日，蒙恩改赐臣金紫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157370_comment'></div>戒涂近对，绶品更华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157370_comment'></div>祗佩宠灵，内深荣㥏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157370_comment'></div>伏念臣行能无算，孤拙自知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157370_comment'></div>振鹭珍群，居惭簉羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157370_comment'></div>太官美食，遂叹浮人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157370_comment'></div>久含藏疾之慈，未获酬恩之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157370_comment'></div>属司容局，面控感怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157370_comment'></div>俄被句传，曲膺蕃锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157370_comment'></div>袍文染䓞，鱼饰垂金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157370_comment'></div>服不值庸，忍惭于安吉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157370_comment'></div>力微稽古，贻望于儒先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157370_comment'></div>还綍无从，光躯何幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157370_comment'></div>斯盖伏遇皇帝陛下，重隳常体，业置迩联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157370_comment'></div>特假身章，俾隆官等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157370_comment'></div>庶奉襜如之赐，益图蕞尔之酬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157370_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年闰12月</a>　闰十二月，在京为天章阁待制，应谢炳宗之请，作《凝碧堂记》作品：凝碧堂记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158013?labeling=true' target='_blank'>凝碧堂记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年闰12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158013")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158013'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158013'>会稽谢炳宗作尉之明年，创子堂于署南，榜曰凝碧，托始焉，且志地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158013_comment'></div>堂之大略，闻炳宗之言，予能纪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158013_comment'></div>阳庑凭高，则群峰横罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158013_comment'></div>晨霏暝霞，从日蔽亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158013_comment'></div>周阿溯远，则畦瀛环泻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158013_comment'></div>云漪雪濑，与天上下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158013_comment'></div>鸧鹄啼呼，鳣鲤噞喁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158013_comment'></div>龿葭沿缘于涯涘，柽杨漫衍于洲步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158013_comment'></div>野翠不归，水烟自留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158013_comment'></div>此其因天以获胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158013_comment'></div>春英既蕃，丹紫相妍，则薄采乎户外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158013_comment'></div>秋条既腓，槁籁相悲，则属听乎坐右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158013_comment'></div>或冷飔昼泛，或阴晖夜流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158013_comment'></div>炳宗于是挈胜衿，簪良朋，壶觞侑前，肴核旅右，旷望唫啸，轩然谢客，中休天倪，外忘世缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158013_comment'></div>一树一草，皆可攀藉，此因人以获胜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158013_comment'></div>天胜者不营而成，人胜者有待而名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158013_comment'></div>使二胜交相济，非智且材，孰兼得之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158013_comment'></div>由堂而观炳宗之为，则智且材果不得让已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158013_comment'></div>炳宗再上书阙下，位不克奋，而刚健自强之蕴，无所发舒，故寓见乎观游奥阼之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158013_comment'></div>予知异时立功，犹今兹之目巧也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158013_comment'></div>其面势纤悉，犹有诸公之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158013_comment'></div>索言之时，宝元二年，后十二月为记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1158013_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　本年，在京为刑部员外郎，有书上宋绶。作品：上宋资政书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1157595' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157595' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157595?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上宋资政书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157595")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157595_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157595'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157595'>自閒台坐，稽奉信函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157595_comment'></div>比领风谣，审安福履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157595_comment'></div>病悰忉怛，差用为慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157595_comment'></div>西都旧多丽籞名园，宝坊胜宇，伏计临抚之暇，驾言造适，足以摅幽蕴，摈世纷，彷徉萧散，助啬和理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157595_comment'></div>然后徐副群望，还总钧陶，诚中外至愿，非独孤生之拳拳也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1157595_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　本年，在京为刑部员外郎，有启上夏竦。作品：上夏太尉启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五四。温谱系此文于康定元年，此据文中“祁庇司计幙，阻迹宾綦”句改。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　本年，在京为刑部员外郎，为王曾作墓志铭。作品：文正王公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158151?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文正王公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158151")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158151'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158151'>景祐二年，丞相右府缺，上方图任耆俊，参付魁极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158151_comment'></div>越二年，制诏太原王公曾，其上枢密使印绶，还来相予，进拜尚书右仆射、门下侍郎，所以命赐之尤渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158151_comment'></div>公拜稽首，让弗遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158151_comment'></div>于是择典训庸，以熙百工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158151_comment'></div>外怀迩协，以种九德，饪味燮和，辰阶比平，翼戴圣猷，溥大光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158151_comment'></div>乃十一月，从钦天柴，胙沂以为公国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158151_comment'></div>他日，请间伏青蒲，上陈瘁薾，婴霜露以踣，愿前此纳政，避贤人路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158151_comment'></div>帝怃然无开可意，公执不夺，卒改左仆射，加资政殿大学士，镇东平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158151_comment'></div>戊寅仲冬，感疥，门子谒急书闻，亟命将高手医跳驱趣视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158151_comment'></div>不半道，丙午，公薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158151_comment'></div>上推甲子，得三百六十六，复所生之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158151_comment'></div>家丞列治，让还鸿胪典葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158151_comment'></div>天子悼遗老之弗憖也，再昕置朝，廞左貂以襚，法赗备厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158151_comment'></div>恩录宗姻僚陪十人，容官合「文正」二言以谨周道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158151_comment'></div>公之丧来京师，其引也，盖殡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158151_comment'></div>邦人官师沱涕相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158151_comment'></div>明年，有司持丁亥诏书到公第，仍举中书令密章以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158151_comment'></div>悯册焜煌，再漏下泉，本公之绸缪感会，宠存贲往，有以致者，其如仁欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158151_comment'></div>其司直欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158151_comment'></div>公字孝先，由逸民霸，飞遁天汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158151_comment'></div>显基素德，支裔屡徙，今为青州益都著姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158151_comment'></div>曾祖讳铎，祖讳继华，皆阴储世烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158151_comment'></div>考讳兼，甘节难进，终著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158151_comment'></div>深根浚源，丛沛来祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158151_comment'></div>公贵推泽，并赠开府仪同三司、尚书令、中书令，爵皆为公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158151_comment'></div>大王父国于越，父国于鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158151_comment'></div>妣曰张，别赠燕夫人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158151_comment'></div>曰何，为鲁夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158151_comment'></div>公即何夫人之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158151_comment'></div>轩渠卓异，鲁公曰：「是大吾门」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158151_comment'></div>八岁终二丧，斩焉致毁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158151_comment'></div>仲父宗元育之过所生，一情以均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158151_comment'></div>公亦以所爱事仲父如父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158151_comment'></div>甫冠，与乡士游，汎博书记，不为章句儒，诸老先生皆折辈行以交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158151_comment'></div>咸平中，偕郡上计，委符入关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158151_comment'></div>策进士，再为天下第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158151_comment'></div>当此时，二篇赋，学者争传都纸，以鹪鹩王佐期之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158151_comment'></div>初，命将作监丞，通治济阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158151_comment'></div>代还，试政事堂，以大著作直太史，服五品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158151_comment'></div>判三司户部案，转右正言、知制诰，服三品，充史馆修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158151_comment'></div>入翰林为学士，自司计外郎再迁至中兵，拜谏议大夫，参议大政，加给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158151_comment'></div>以礼部侍郎守应天、大名两府，复贰鼎席，兼太子宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158151_comment'></div>由左户再迁至春官卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158151_comment'></div>以内书侍郎执宰相笔，陟东台，兼地官、遂跻上衮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158151_comment'></div>阅五岁，琳宫火，一昔焚，册灾异免，以天官为本州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158151_comment'></div>又易天雄军，即拜彰德军节度使、检校太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158151_comment'></div>稍换天平军、检校太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158151_comment'></div>俄同中书门下平章事，徙判河南府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158151_comment'></div>入冠枢极，罢幢棨，还冢宰，他如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158151_comment'></div>公由布衣羾君门，誉处时行，为龙光景式，凡三十七年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158151_comment'></div>别任九：判大理、尚书都省、登闻检，知审刑、审官、礼仪院、通进银台司门下封駮事，涖三班院、纠察在京刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158151_comment'></div>领使五：持金絮遗湟水酋，为生辰使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158151_comment'></div>辇谒谯祠，为考制度使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158151_comment'></div>馆寓神岳，以中台为会灵观使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158151_comment'></div>高真宝符，以元辅为玉清昭应宫使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158151_comment'></div>再见上帝，为南郊大礼使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158151_comment'></div>主工部一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158151_comment'></div>由集贤殿、昭文馆及西清之秘，为大学士三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158151_comment'></div>监修国史一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158151_comment'></div>阶一品，勋十二转，表功十有四字，食虚邑万有二千五百室，实五千一百室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158151_comment'></div>此践扬隆赫，其大较也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158151_comment'></div>初，契丹侵边，济为寰服最近，早符晏檄，悉索赋佐军兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158151_comment'></div>公由倅事，疏一二便宜，数奏蒙可，众器其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158151_comment'></div>天禧夜，妖自三川相靡而东，公守睢阳，不逞欢，恐里闾昼阖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158151_comment'></div>公辟牙门，分吏晓勒，捕先倡者鞭梏之，妖熄不复南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158151_comment'></div>筑雒都城，周万雉，云陴言言，辰居以尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158151_comment'></div>复陕路转粟岁二十万，饟得无乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158151_comment'></div>岁旱蝗，齐、楚、周什八以上民曹逃，贷囷粟，乡县株送，公一切榜遣，流瘠更生以千计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158151_comment'></div>所至立学官，分租俸，助兴作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158151_comment'></div>五州镵金石以颂，魏人画像事之，课治者以公为尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158151_comment'></div>绿图夜降，度宫以仪，典客砻石庀材，规创万楹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158151_comment'></div>公列五害，愿省损制度，奉承大中之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158151_comment'></div>先帝弗豫，太子已决事，或议长秋临政，憸人惎语翕翕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158151_comment'></div>公时调护储邸，谓后姻倖曰：「太子长秋谊不独立，有如两宫相维，社稷安矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158151_comment'></div>后悟，由是内外恭顺无违言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158151_comment'></div>庄献总军国，仪不时立，佞党投罅，廷议放肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158151_comment'></div>公独引东汉故事，朝则帝在左，太后在右，施帘自障，群臣奏事如前，诏如公请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158151_comment'></div>长乐上徽册，供张天安殿中，公执不可，改御文德，差损扆座，志在彊王室，安外家，使无纤芥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158151_comment'></div>纳忠者以公为荩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158151_comment'></div>大理总天下狱，异时为冗，帝欲重之，公自西台被选，平亭讯谳，许自辟丞属，遂踵为故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158151_comment'></div>法家有违制而情不一，公请非亲被以失论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158151_comment'></div>会具狱须报，公据前例，帝曰：「自是无复有违制耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158151_comment'></div>公曰：「如陛下言，亦无复有失者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158151_comment'></div>帝悦，更从轻坐，语材者器公之果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158151_comment'></div>践内外辞禁，赞为名命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158151_comment'></div>浑灏炳纯，溯古同风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158151_comment'></div>或选为昌言，或永为赓歌，则家集合五十六篇详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158151_comment'></div>上始乡学，公采圣君贤臣事，绘解为三十篇，因以劝成德美，语镂于椠，遍赐迩臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158151_comment'></div>其他纂次尤多，尚不录，言文者归公之洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158151_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158151_comment'></div>惟公侃然正，崖然立，周密靖慎，久而无流心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158151_comment'></div>在上前开陈处可，辨博有馀言，为国家用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158151_comment'></div>至日旰出沐燕私，讫不道省中语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158151_comment'></div>天资方重，每广朝大会，盛服玉色，郎谒者视进止，如有尺寸，未尝过缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158151_comment'></div>虽妄庸人历嗤诋，亦不能加半言毁短于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158151_comment'></div>当国七年，万物茂宜，四夷休宁，稼茨于原，兵仆于鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158151_comment'></div>嘉生回薄，无有恫怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158151_comment'></div>务大体若丙吉，清净如曹参，总领众职如魏相，内文明如邓禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158151_comment'></div>于时被公之化，察察者敦，沾沾者愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158151_comment'></div>建启露门秘禁，召惇儒硕老，侍擿劝讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158151_comment'></div>复谏署旧员，使正辞謇议日兴于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158151_comment'></div>进贤不植私，爱士不谋党，退不肖，不奸怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158151_comment'></div>奉群母孝，与诸弟友，亲族可任，言之上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158151_comment'></div>不可任，厚分之财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158151_comment'></div>姻娅进用，皆以嫌自退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158151_comment'></div>上尝大署「忠亮忠厚」四字锡之，天下称为贤公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158151_comment'></div>乾兴、天圣之际，时多故矣，身荷重任，为国休戚，虽参和傅会，权定大事，豮彼怒牙，浣其他肠，庇焉如帡幪，虑焉如蓍蔡，然至閒居独念，犹感慨以之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158151_comment'></div>是必弥纶之才，轧于群媢而未悉获骋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158151_comment'></div>健粹之气，有所难屈而弗慊于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158151_comment'></div>烦虑焚和，且至大病，斯可恸已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158151_comment'></div>先时，大星辰落郡寝上，左右惊白，公曰：「后一月乃自知之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158151_comment'></div>如期而始悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158151_comment'></div>宁傅箕萧昴，有凭以始，亦有以终耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158151_comment'></div>君子谓为知命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158151_comment'></div>公始合姓于蔡，实处士光济之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158151_comment'></div>又合姓于李，故相文靖公之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158151_comment'></div>卒，继室以其妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158151_comment'></div>芳猷淑则，迭映中壸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158151_comment'></div>后夫人独偕公老，故启许国，享脂田焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158151_comment'></div>昼哭未期，又不幸以褕衣而复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158151_comment'></div>母弟曰皞，字子融，为刑部郎中、直集贤院；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158151_comment'></div>曰悯，字孝德，终国子博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158151_comment'></div>子四人，曰絪、缘、绎、演。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158151_comment'></div>絪止光禄寺丞，缘夭阏，演止将作监丞，绎为光禄寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158151_comment'></div>绎之幼，公取皞子绎以嗣，及终，又命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158151_comment'></div>故绎即丧序，今为大理寺丞，秘阁校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158151_comment'></div>公之捐馆，以大墓无穆位，不可以葬，乃改卜于荥阳，惟新郑吉，又筮于临济乡，惟梁原吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158151_comment'></div>先是，蔡夫人之殁已祔于姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158151_comment'></div>岁在单阏冬十月乙酉，子融与绎等竭诚信，举公及二夫人之丧合窆新阡，顺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1158151_comment'></div>且求状于太子中允、直集贤院富弼，又自裒公行事一篇，合前后赞书，见授而为之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1158151_comment'></div>恭惟令君之德在生人，其宪度在台阁，其言在谟命，其履践在国书，其人与不可传者皆亡矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1158151_comment'></div>今所捃次，姑举搢绅所道者，著于篇而纳之圹中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1158151_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_132_1158151'>斤斤令君，朅来山东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1158151_comment'></div>利见国光，参偶时龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1158151_comment'></div>既奋厥庸，遂为宗工，订平津之封兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1158151_comment'></div>上初纂嗣，母闱参治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1158151_comment'></div>揭日当天，实相以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1158151_comment'></div>谗唇不摇，王室无惎，赖陈平之智兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1158151_comment'></div>五藩于宣，既仁且贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1158151_comment'></div>邦民宜之，厥猷茂焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1158151_comment'></div>乃建将牙，乃示台躔，繄吉甫之宪兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1158151_comment'></div>郑圃联圻，泉涂启扉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1158151_comment'></div>刻章美槚，终天此依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1158151_comment'></div>九京千载，景仰馀徽，惟随武之归兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_143_1158151_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　本年，在京为刑部员外郎，为章得象之母张氏作墓志铭。作品：故赠太师章公夫人追封邓国太夫人张氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158168?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故赠太师章公夫人追封邓国太夫人张氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158168")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158168_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158168'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158168'>夫人张氏，自远祖去清河，适南服，历世土断，为建州建安著姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158168_comment'></div>大父讳元吉，遭闽土僭霸，以乡里士望被私署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158168_comment'></div>烈考讳仁肃，事南唐李氏，累迁至检校水部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158168_comment'></div>夫人即水部之长女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158168_comment'></div>生而殊禀，幼而明悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158168_comment'></div>既笄而四德备，未结缡而六姻是式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158168_comment'></div>武宁章府君讳奂，稔誉柔嫕，合姓焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158168_comment'></div>夫人移其孝以安舅姑，移其友以和娣姒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158168_comment'></div>勤身以助宗事，尽爱以绥族属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158168_comment'></div>合幽娴静婉之操，以辅佐君子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158168_comment'></div>席庆灵光厚之烈，以克生良嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158168_comment'></div>故府君繇乡彦请举，扬声俊域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158168_comment'></div>一子，今户部侍郎、同中书门下平章事得象，以民宗硕望，显相王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158168_comment'></div>虽章氏之兴，理非一绪，而刑家由臬之训，实夫人是基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158168_comment'></div>丞相七岁弄翰，闇谐辞律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158168_comment'></div>十二衣逢掖，与家尊联名贡牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158168_comment'></div>俊锋国器，场中震动，当时父子俱冠汝南之品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158168_comment'></div>先君无禄早世，夫人茹未亡之痛，教忠勉学，更繄慈壸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158168_comment'></div>咸平中，丞相由进士高第，褫巾服政，发舒贤业，寖华朝绂，绸缪二纪，代极言访对之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158168_comment'></div>流根渗泽，在亡均宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158168_comment'></div>繇是祢室累追赠至尚书左丞，夫人自南阳县累易封至永嘉郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158168_comment'></div>丞相在禁林，年踰知命，夫人华发康豫，含饴弄孙，累茵高堂，享滑甘颜色之养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158168_comment'></div>深慈笃孝，相为庆祉，汤沐荣衍，朝伦耸慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158168_comment'></div>若其咨训图史，审音徽越，组紃箴繲之细，鲜䐹芼湆之法，莫不造诣精极，垂为家范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158168_comment'></div>雅喜宾集，每子舍盍簪置酒，必躬饬㡚御，尽笾羞豆实之品，调烹牒切，毕景无倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158168_comment'></div>早探释部，居常薰祓，高情了识，绝死生之怖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158168_comment'></div>明道壬申岁春二月辛酉，以寿终于京师里第，春秋八十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158168_comment'></div>顺机趋寂，举无怛化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158168_comment'></div>旋殡于荐严佛寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158168_comment'></div>后五年，丞相由翰林学士承旨同知枢密院；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158168_comment'></div>又一岁，升燮槐路；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158168_comment'></div>俄服华衮，从阳郊之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158168_comment'></div>是三者，天子皆诏有司，以隆名极品宠灵先服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158168_comment'></div>左丞由太保太傅遂至帝师，永嘉自安平郡进疏荣国、邓国，并为太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158168_comment'></div>初，先公归全，即葬本郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158168_comment'></div>夫人实有治命曰：「魂气无不之也，奚必同穴而谓之归耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158168_comment'></div>丞相永怀绪音，昊天罔极，虔询蓍蔡，始得许州阳翟之三封原；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158168_comment'></div>惟吉卜，又得宝元己卯孟冬之乙酉辰，与姓合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158168_comment'></div>乃备廞车灵輤，奉尊柩于新域，从吉道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158168_comment'></div>丞相以任国之重，不得申私恩谒，常告题旌之引，乃服缌绖，哭祖于都门之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158168_comment'></div>遂敕家丞宗老相仲子约之，以克终襄事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158168_comment'></div>大惧圣善之懿，弗永于将来，有命论次，以期陵谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158168_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_1158168'>懿懿邓国，惟嫔之则，配贤生才，燮我皇极，基母德兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158168_comment'></div>帝钦四邻，锡命显亲，重封象服，恤典明缗，成于仁兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158168_comment'></div>合葬非古，先音有绪，颍曲辅邦，钧台故里，安吉所兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1158168_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　约于本年正月，在京为刑部员外郎，有诗和晏殊。作品：和三司尚书宣德门侍观灯。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二三。王谱系此诗于宝元元年，此据晏殊仕历改。）</span><div id='poem_104516' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104516' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104516?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和三司尚书宣德门侍观灯</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104516")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_104516_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104516'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104516'>觚棱南抱䌽山连，楼下沈香百炬然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104516'>此夜有人之帝所，默裁馀韵记钧天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104516_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104516'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_104516_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　春，在京为天章阁待制，有与盛度启。作品：盛右丞问候启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157786' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157786' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157786?labeling=true' target='_blank'>盛右丞问候启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157786")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157786_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157786'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157786'>伏自执事均贤枢筦，改秩台机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157786_comment'></div>茂选奥藩，聿开尊府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157786_comment'></div>方春临境，班宽大之诏恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157786_comment'></div>即日餐和，乂神明之锡祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157786_comment'></div>钦惟著范，夙系人瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157786_comment'></div>虽四国于宣，聊资于邦殿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157786_comment'></div>而六符相比，迟正于乾台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157786_comment'></div>由黄霸之治功，启平津之封册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157786_comment'></div>仰祈晏处，务啬粹真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157786_comment'></div>顾旧物之惓惓，溯馀风而叩叩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157786_comment'></div>乃心攸向，点翰匪宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157786_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1157786_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年6月11日</a>　六月十一日，在京为天章阁待制，受诏与王尧臣等清理在京刑狱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年9月</a>　九月，在京为天章阁待制，有启回晁宗慤。作品：回晁参政启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157783?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回晁参政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157783")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157783_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157783'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157783'>伏审显被制荣，恩联宰政，伏惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157783_comment'></div>恭以参政器函道奥，业总天常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157783_comment'></div>膺旦暮之圣期，践凝严之世职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157783_comment'></div>含光弗照，求福靡回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157783_comment'></div>卓为高风，饪布舆议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157783_comment'></div>向者密衔使指，临讯军谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157783_comment'></div>拥车传以适勤，会台庭之佥锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157783_comment'></div>宸心素定，恩策前颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157783_comment'></div>逮此清明之朝，趣对延登之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157783_comment'></div>尚聆秉德，未即当仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157783_comment'></div>申雅奏以让还，枉公函而敷谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157783_comment'></div>钦惟褒命，久协朝言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157783_comment'></div>望改素怀，即符群望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157783_comment'></div>衔感欣伫，万一罔宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1157783_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年11月14日</a>　十一月十四日，在京为天章阁待制，与吴育同判太常寺，兼礼仪事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年12月13日</a>　十二月十三日，在京为天章阁待制，上疏建言设神御库。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　本年，在京为天章阁待制，应王仪之请，为张景作墓志铭。作品：故大理评事张公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158160' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158160' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158160?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故大理评事张公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158160")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158160_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158160'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158160'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158160_comment'></div>有宋闻人张晦之之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158160_comment'></div>晦之名景，江陵公安人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158160_comment'></div>羁丱能长言，嗜学尤力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158160_comment'></div>未冠涉通艺文，颇班班言当世务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158160_comment'></div>贫不治产，往从崇仪使解人柳开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158160_comment'></div>开以文自名，而荐宠士类，一见欢甚，悉出家书畀之，由是属辞益有法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158160_comment'></div>开每曰：「今日在朝廷挈囊荐笏，谁踰晦之者」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158160_comment'></div>即厚遣，使如京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158160_comment'></div>时富春孙仅、沛国朱严、成纪李庶几号为豪英，晦之敝衣与游，名称籍籍，美不容口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158160_comment'></div>真圣谅闇，未即听政，责有司精覆计偕，预者十一二，晦之名在第四，调主大名馆陶簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158160_comment'></div>年少气锐，未能以智自将，坐公累为吏痛诋，贬全州，会赦还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158160_comment'></div>豪长者得罪，并坐所知，继为房、襄二州文学参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158160_comment'></div>晦之中废不用，则大覃思古今，为《洪范》、《王霸》二书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158160_comment'></div>常病浮图氏怪迂诞荒，塔庙日炽，虽服儒衣冠者，皆共宠神之，憖寘六经反为外典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158160_comment'></div>故因事见文，为纪传数十篇而辨折之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158160_comment'></div>虽与世舛驰，而自信不跲云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158160_comment'></div>康肃陈公尧咨，以西台舍人为本府，雅闻晦之，为言于上，复选楚州宝应主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158160_comment'></div>最状应条，监司以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158160_comment'></div>改大理评事、知泗州昭信县，淮岛伧杂，冯戾禨巫，晦之剪除房祀且百所，输入材瓦，以完吏舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158160_comment'></div>急病职劳，邑人宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158160_comment'></div>转运使任其能，移掌真州搉茶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158160_comment'></div>既又请通理州事，可制已报，会遘疾，终官下，年四十九，实天禧二年三月十日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158160_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158160_comment'></div>世之言材而显，善而艾，皆若可信，如晦之终始报享，独大谬不然者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158160_comment'></div>晦之幼丧二亲，有终身之戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158160_comment'></div>方其间关蓬累，而竭诚尽物，克襄事焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158160_comment'></div>墓不用甓，既窆，则下土实之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158160_comment'></div>曰：「千岁后无为狐兔宅，不亦善乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158160_comment'></div>荆人高之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158160_comment'></div>咸曰：「张氏有子矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158160_comment'></div>事崇仪也，崇仪欲以兄子妻之，未归而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158160_comment'></div>又委禽于唐氏，生子一，早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158160_comment'></div>晦之即世，夫人奉柩以如许昌，将便时来南，以岁之不易，久而去室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158160_comment'></div>康定元年，著作佐郎王仪太初始得护㡛柳，以某月日祔塴其先茔，从昭穆之图，成君志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158160_comment'></div>三代之讳之行，则渤海胡旦及康肃公为先圹之志若表在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158160_comment'></div>平生文章，门人万称集为二十五通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158160_comment'></div>太初与晦之再世中表，重节义然诺，且少相友善，故裒状丐文，而毕此封树焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158160_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1158160'>皭才章兮懿淳孝，至膴仕兮难老，啬弗予兮孰天道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158160_comment'></div>蹇皇皇兮晚获伸，发吾怀兮露珍，甫半道兮摧华轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158160_comment'></div>倚庐空兮无冢嗣，从稿殡兮二纪，魂茕茕兮何所止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158160_comment'></div>彼戚友兮义弗违，奉輤柩兮来归，穴虚祔兮人所悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158160_comment'></div>兄弟鲜兮畴立后，神茫茫兮安究，尚立言兮参不朽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1158160_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　约于本年，在京为天章阁待制，作《伤贤赋》作品：伤贤赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1157087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>伤贤赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157087")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157087'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157087'>为先友公孙子正作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157087_comment'></div>盖子正官于太学八年，与予尝僚者二岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157087_comment'></div>观其为人，事亲孝，与士信，深中夷澹，毅然持正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157087_comment'></div>阳休德辉，见于颜间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157087_comment'></div>难进而易其禄，急病而后于己。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157087_comment'></div>亲之无令色，远之无里言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157087_comment'></div>都中士大夫走高门，趋下陈，无寒暑之避，与槐柳皆列者，荡以成俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157087_comment'></div>而子正为礼侯官长初无造诣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157087_comment'></div>居常著书，尤邃礼学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157087_comment'></div>默而好深沉之思，神期数千载间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157087_comment'></div>属文而辞迩雅，临帖而书臻妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157087_comment'></div>予尝谓子正加于人一等矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157087_comment'></div>无鬼责，无人非，《大易》之懿文德，《洪范》之考终命，宜其享之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157087_comment'></div>而禄不过上农，位不登宁定，禀焉早世，命也奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157087_comment'></div>矧无儿应门，有女未傅，斯亦生民之大穷者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157087_comment'></div>予辱于缔交，托在奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157087_comment'></div>出均辔组，宴衔杯酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157087_comment'></div>信誓旦旦，要之白首，今又弱一个焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157087_comment'></div>死生交情，俯仰陈迹，向之欢绪，今成悲端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157087_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157087_comment'></div>天非裨灶之知，辅仁罔验；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157087_comment'></div>命为鬼伯之促，赍恨何穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157087_comment'></div>追为助绋之词，以代焚芝之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157087_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1157087'>天生若人，好是懿德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157087_comment'></div>左佩规而右矩，前陈绳而后墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157087_comment'></div>鉴玉水以论方，殚翠毛而取饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157087_comment'></div>席至珍之百汰，咀永味乎千蹠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157087_comment'></div>莳固蒂于文林，犍洪枢于圣域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157087_comment'></div>澡重氛之耳目，栖灏气乎胸臆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157087_comment'></div>遘帝华之显时，与多士而来思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157087_comment'></div>掩辉山以待价，顿宏罗而见羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157087_comment'></div>士惟君养，爵乃吾縻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157087_comment'></div>敛以越砥，御以新羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157087_comment'></div>入胄筵而鸣鼓，退私室而垂帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157087_comment'></div>或东观以雠籍，或平台而见师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157087_comment'></div>或连蜷第赋，或竞病论诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157087_comment'></div>包左氏之富艳，无枚皋之诋欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157087_comment'></div>有冽匪泉，有直伊矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157087_comment'></div>蹇不挠于亮节，遂无言于膴仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157087_comment'></div>不谄笑以在畦，不处嫌而纳履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157087_comment'></div>年四十而介然，食九人而近止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157087_comment'></div>彼君子之知命，方无愠而无喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157087_comment'></div>误叶县之好龙，叹山梁之拱雉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157087_comment'></div>天难谌斯，皇肯照微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157087_comment'></div>如何不淑，邦哲其萎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157087_comment'></div>竭灵涛于鹭壑，倾怒翼于鹏池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157087_comment'></div>况复颜徒非寿，伯道无儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157087_comment'></div>未嫁兮左思之女，独拜兮任咸之妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157087_comment'></div>使积善之无报，信至神之我欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157087_comment'></div>悽悽草长，寥寥露晞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157087_comment'></div>熏蒿掩乎野土，神明济乎天陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157087_comment'></div>对秣陵之旧简，乏南楚之招辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157087_comment'></div>恸寝门而投赋，彼厚穸兮何知。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1157087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年2月16日</a>　二月十六日，在京为天章阁待制，与欧阳修等宴集东园，分韵赋诗。作品：春集东园诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_105841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105841?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春集东园诗赋得笋字并序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年2月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105841")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105841_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_105841'>春集东园诗者，端明学士献臣李君、翰林伯中王君、天章侍讲原叔王君、馆阁校勘景纯刁君、永叔欧阳君、子庄杨君暨予，仲月既望之宴所赋。是集有三胜焉，地之胜，则如左睨都雉，前眺畿隧，林薄灌丛，铺棻自环；时之胜，如载阳之辰，戢惨傃舒，惠气韶华，怡豫天区；宾之胜，则如朝髦国俊，清交石友，驾言相从，簪盍就閒。三者先具，吾人所以挤天下细故，彷徉萧散而自适其适也。若夫頫撷仰援，有蘤有枚；参行迭馈，有胾有醪。时哢嘤然，可以悦耳；野芳芚然，可以藉席。轻风舞于快馀，鲜云曳于晒表。乐斯咏，咏斯陶，佥谓会之难常，诗之可以群也。俾永叔列韵，坐者陈章，予与题辞焉，以诧其美。昔郑区区一寰内侯，使七子从赵武赋诗，以观郑志，《阳秋》尚之。今多士乐事，萃此王国，选言足叹，一出治音。使如武者，观诸君之篇，则知贤郑人远矣。章别十二句，句五言，杂附左方云。康定纪元之次年序。</div><div id='poem_preface_105841_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105841'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105841'>茂气遍春逵，结客并游轸。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105841'>胜践属园墟，欢言驻驺引。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105841'>跼情适野豁，远目向天尽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105841'>林馥树才花，町疏篁未笋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105841'>饮来无留釂，嘲往有馀冁。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105841'>耳热谢时人，戚戚良可悯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105841'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_105841_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　春，在京为天章阁待制，有诗挽宋绶。作品：司徒侍中宣献公挽词二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一一。王谱系此诗于康定元年，此据金传道《宋庠年谱》（未刊稿）改。）</span><div id='poem_104818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司徒侍中宣献公挽词二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104818")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104818'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104818'>斯文推旧德，忧国变华颠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104818'>夙夜劳三事，东西止百年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104818'>温辞联册秘，良史大都传。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104818'>他日贤臣垄，心知望圃田。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104818_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104818'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104818_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_104819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104819?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104819'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104819'>美疢交明晦，浮龄讵控抟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104819'>宗盟一个弱，人赎百身难。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104819'>赐敛荣絺衮，临哀驻玉銮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104819'>欲知桃李爱，朝绂共汍澜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104819_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104819'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104819_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年6月11日</a>　六月十一日，在京为天章阁待制，出知寿州。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='637e8cd086f04f84ab338c4c598b6e7f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("637e8cd086f04f84ab338c4c598b6e7f");'><span id='637e8cd086f04f84ab338c4c598b6e7f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>，44岁</div><div id='637e8cd086f04f84ab338c4c598b6e7f' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，在京为天章阁待制，为宋贯之《剑池编》作序。作品：宋同年剑池编序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四五。王谱系此文于康定元年，此据余靖《宋太博尤川杂撰序》（《武溪集》卷三）改。）</span><div id='poem_1157972' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157972' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157972?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宋同年剑池编序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157972")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157972_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157972'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157972'>《剑池编》者，宗兄贯之之作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157972_comment'></div>初贯之自七闽西入关，才业锐甚，鼓行英俊中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157972_comment'></div>京师诸儒，少敢支吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157972_comment'></div>时上新即位，至于亲程材品，谦让未遑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157972_comment'></div>第覆有司所校，临轩句唱，署定其籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157972_comment'></div>君以文中乙科，为吏限牵制，调歙之休宁尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157972_comment'></div>未几，州将或以亲致嫌，改洪之丰城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157972_comment'></div>而君自褫巾仕涂，间关勤远，昼治夜计，推行靡密，然未尝一日不在书研间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157972_comment'></div>故其点翰患多，操觚应卒，思风泱然，言泉沛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157972_comment'></div>如良庖鼓刀，羿子彀弓，导窾不顿，舍矢如破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157972_comment'></div>用是四周岁籥，所得诗颂赞纪序启书论若干篇，题曰《剑池》，识方游也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157972_comment'></div>还都之日，裒而见过，且以冠篇为托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157972_comment'></div>仆辱君之知旧矣，不命其承，况勤诲乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157972_comment'></div>原其天分人之能也，甚靳而难悉，虽有力者不能多取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157972_comment'></div>故史家以儒林、循吏各自为传，犹函矢工其一巧，盆天废乎两施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157972_comment'></div>岂若贯之进职其忧，则治目居最；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157972_comment'></div>退立以讨，则懿文益办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157972_comment'></div>若使力命相会，其至寖淫本原，张旺枝叶，未可量也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157972_comment'></div>昔年长好学不勌，惟闻袁伯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157972_comment'></div>每官各为一集，独有王筠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157972_comment'></div>由是而观之，其有意乎作者之事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157972_comment'></div>若夫文之研丽令精，自当观发而知，此不遽数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157972_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1157972_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，在京为天章阁待制，作《衡山福严禅院二泉记》作品：衡山福严禅院二泉记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158017' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158017' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158017?labeling=true' target='_blank'>衡山福严禅院二泉记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158017")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158017_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158017'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158017'>陈有大士曰慧思，得佛法要，始倡而南，乃舍岣嵝之墟，图揆厥居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158017_comment'></div>黑白其徒，褰裳景从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158017_comment'></div>山阿土厚，汲以勤苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158017_comment'></div>师曰：「吾当食此，神必我相」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158017_comment'></div>引仗刺地，灵液仰流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158017_comment'></div>浡潏渗漉，更𣂏竞注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158017_comment'></div>憔焉热恼，荡为清凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158017_comment'></div>久之，大比丘众阴计曰：「有生濯浣，庸可以已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158017_comment'></div>俄有猛兽，导师踰岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158017_comment'></div>攫崖哮阚，槛泉随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158017_comment'></div>由是华清交蟠，内周外给，禅和便安，道风流行，乃宇为大兰若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158017_comment'></div>师已寂灭，其徒神之，因名二泉，曰卓锡，曰虎跑，所以震显冥符、收摄信源者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158017_comment'></div>惟卓锡距堂下，深之十扶，其广八之五，淳而不流，凡瀹者烹者饪者茗者取焉，香以甘故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158017_comment'></div>虎跑直寺西，广之五咫，其深四之三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158017_comment'></div>浚而为沱，刳木函溜，行二千尺，股分脉散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158017_comment'></div>环像馆，历斋房，经厨轩，并中园，缭浴庑，逗厮舍，然后淙而出之，注乎下田，凡湔者漱者浸者取焉，寒以洁故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158017_comment'></div>若乃溯阳弗泮，值阴弗涸，旱焉益深，潦焉益澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158017_comment'></div>十缶繘之不加馀，千罍挹之不加耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158017_comment'></div>奫沦澹淡，盖源而不委者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158017_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158017_comment'></div>斯人斯泉，宁蠲烦流恶而止矣，亦将昭含天解，觉寤斯人欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158017_comment'></div>若闻法有譬喻，请借泉为喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158017_comment'></div>夫不凿而浪似顿，澄焉自如似定，受垢弗辞似广，兼利不言似慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158017_comment'></div>接物以广，畜众以定，息照以顿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158017_comment'></div>即心推而衍之，使自求之，彼挈然而来者，洒然而反，则师之志庶乎几矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158017_comment'></div>今大长老省贤，后师四百载，又嗣其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158017_comment'></div>荷担惠命，光照前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158017_comment'></div>周案显迹，钦如神对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158017_comment'></div>丐文纪实，与此泉偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158017_comment'></div>余不敏，姑捃前载，以窜今事，款之兹山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158017_comment'></div>时庆历纪元之初年月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1158017_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='9eaa5ed841404839b0f18bbc1c9a4059_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9eaa5ed841404839b0f18bbc1c9a4059");'><span id='9eaa5ed841404839b0f18bbc1c9a4059_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1048')">1043-1048年</a>，46-51岁</div><div id='9eaa5ed841404839b0f18bbc1c9a4059' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年3月25日</a>　三月二十五日，在京为天章阁待制，改知制诰，有谢表。作品：谢知制诰表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157376' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157376' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157376?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢知制诰表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年3月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157376")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157376'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157376'>臣某言：伏奉三月壬辰诏书，授臣依前官知制诰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157376_comment'></div>有命自中，无阶申让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157376_comment'></div>怔忪即忝，感懵交颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157376_comment'></div>窃以星署严华，是司书赞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157376_comment'></div>帝猷粉泽，专寄彦髦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157376_comment'></div>故言之简烦，视人之贤否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157376_comment'></div>比纶而演，如汗弗收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157376_comment'></div>绚日星而森垂，薄天渊而充塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157376_comment'></div>号为盛选，宜值难才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157376_comment'></div>伏念臣天畀以愚，学陶所习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157376_comment'></div>本缘薄技，伦比诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157376_comment'></div>待罪文林，荐绅朝笏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157376_comment'></div>预成六典，见谓少勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157376_comment'></div>因得点笔夹阶，注言于左史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157376_comment'></div>前筹倅府，商利于县官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157376_comment'></div>会臣兄某越自禁扃，擢贰公府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157376_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下怜臣淹久，记臣朴忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157376_comment'></div>方以避亲，尤难试可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157376_comment'></div>天语宣示，台宰具闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157376_comment'></div>遽内交戟之深，实兼待诏之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157376_comment'></div>此为异等，绝骇常均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157376_comment'></div>遂使群议坐欢，夸者阴媢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157376_comment'></div>得无忌克，时浼聪谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157376_comment'></div>蔀屋夜脂，触太阳而销散；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157376_comment'></div>幽萌朽蘖，托厚地以兼容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157376_comment'></div>迭为二藩，不远千里，而赐环垂洎，趋节生归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157376_comment'></div>不图误恩，复齿中禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157376_comment'></div>荷宠惟谷，扪襟若酲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157376_comment'></div>且臣踰强仕者六年，废辞业者三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157376_comment'></div>虑穷刀笔，气耗风波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157376_comment'></div>壮为病侵，衰先老至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157376_comment'></div>任焉不称，谤又将兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157376_comment'></div>矧今鸾鸿簉庭，兰蕙交畹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157376_comment'></div>检之禹律，繂以唐文，庆霄光明，万物丹采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157376_comment'></div>安可细事菅蒯，厕之色丝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157376_comment'></div>簸扬秕糠，先乃嘉谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157376_comment'></div>抚孤生之匪次，宁乐育之当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157376_comment'></div>此盖陛下先置不能，以来多士，罔遗笃物，庸示至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157376_comment'></div>策十驾之庸驽，班四户之凝近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157376_comment'></div>上循感会，俯视官箴，敢不勉惰为虔，拂昏于瞭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157376_comment'></div>浚明惟恪，絜矩以须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157376_comment'></div>稍裨慎令之行，冀免知臣之诿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157376_comment'></div>臣无任循荣抃遇感惕屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1157376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年4月</a>　四月，在京为知制诰，有谢启。作品：上两府谢改知制诰启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五三。）</span>上外任两制谢改知制诰启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_1157689' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157689' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157689?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上两府谢改知制诰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157689")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157689_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157689'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157689'>伏奉去年三月壬辰诏书，蒙恩授依前官知制诰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157689_comment'></div>禁掖清华，王言密勿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157689_comment'></div>谬尘高选，擢具常员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157689_comment'></div>志表叨荣，㥏馀集惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157689_comment'></div>伏念祁禀生尪薾，植性狷疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157689_comment'></div>因仕易农，缘辰取宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157689_comment'></div>时惟国教，专育人材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157689_comment'></div>遂籍翁仲之门，入直史家之观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157689_comment'></div>并游群畯，寖揽芳蕤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157689_comment'></div>或抱蕝容台，或䌷书仙室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157689_comment'></div>观殊尤于盛旦，窜章句于诸儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157689_comment'></div>官录其勤，上或称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157689_comment'></div>进筹九府之局，参注二螭之坳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157689_comment'></div>泰与日偕，忝随事积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157689_comment'></div>旋属昆亲贰政，慈圣见怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157689_comment'></div>谓进拟于异时，必妨嫌而烦请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157689_comment'></div>弗由佥论，直寘禁联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157689_comment'></div>成命自中，闻者皆竦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157689_comment'></div>奈何屯蹇之运，疴瘵夙缠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157689_comment'></div>全剧无常，倚徙多阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157689_comment'></div>比请间而得见，辄顿首以自陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157689_comment'></div>愿守僻藩，少纾羸疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157689_comment'></div>俄蒙下蔡之组，间换宛丘之章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157689_comment'></div>课不时升，法当有殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157689_comment'></div>朝恩一解，召节临颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157689_comment'></div>还合关门之符，重瞻户牖之坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157689_comment'></div>危心歆艳，悸魄妥安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157689_comment'></div>然早夜以惟，材分知止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157689_comment'></div>未即衰而老至，不称服而灾生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157689_comment'></div>目糅眩花，鬓垂纷葆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157689_comment'></div>方将奉还迩职，仍丐州麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157689_comment'></div>收桑榆之末阴，答天地之全施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157689_comment'></div>不图甄齿，更逮刍微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157689_comment'></div>蠲试可之成规，即代言之亲补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157689_comment'></div>拜贶三陌，循襟九回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157689_comment'></div>伏况书命之司，风烈攸系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157689_comment'></div>本之浑灏，济以纯深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157689_comment'></div>追周监之多文，讨汉兴之尔雅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157689_comment'></div>布昭于外，润色须工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157689_comment'></div>权舆毫端，鼓舞天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157689_comment'></div>讵宜颓晚，可玷详求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157689_comment'></div>上隳郁穆之风，自取稽留之悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157689_comment'></div>宠灵云误，褒进有基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157689_comment'></div>斯盖阁下敷叙彝伦，迈种昭德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157689_comment'></div>审无他恶，惜委寸长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157689_comment'></div>启佑清衷，财成庆泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157689_comment'></div>使陨跗复蒂，覂驾还驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157689_comment'></div>脱重险于风波，曝至情于日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157689_comment'></div>谨当益探前载，徐绎大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157689_comment'></div>服勤蚤入之常，慎对省中之语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157689_comment'></div>一篑而进，稍勉于有成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157689_comment'></div>万折必东，不乖于攸趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157689_comment'></div>有如自昧，可质明神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157689_comment'></div>卑情无任铭恩佩德激切知归之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1157689_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157692' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157692' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157692?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上外任两制谢改知制诰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157692")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157692_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157692'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157692'>比者叨恩宸扆，授秩词垣，内揆孱疏，举丛荣㥏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157692_comment'></div>窃念祁器非周用，仕偶丁辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157692_comment'></div>著籍皂衣之联，待罪绿图之秘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157692_comment'></div>禀生多疾，昧死请藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157692_comment'></div>间守两州，甫更三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157692_comment'></div>绩幽宜黜，上赦弗诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157692_comment'></div>亟蒙趋节之颁，归服持荷之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157692_comment'></div>未淹浃日，俄掌命书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157692_comment'></div>特免试言，趣令就职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157692_comment'></div>长年废学，绝无润色之工；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157692_comment'></div>天分思迟，必抵稽留之禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157692_comment'></div>茫然即宠，惕若包羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157692_comment'></div>此盖执事早谅羁平，显为褒饬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157692_comment'></div>兼收短技，弗使平除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157692_comment'></div>误推毂于仕阶，得演缗于琐闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157692_comment'></div>敢不澡疏烦涊，研讨旧常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157692_comment'></div>寖窥云汉之华，参裨金玉之度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157692_comment'></div>冀申尺寸，仰谢题评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157692_comment'></div>感素多倪，勌谈安叙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157692_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年4月</a>　四月，在京为知制诰，有回启。作品：回外任诸官贺改知制诰启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五三。）</span><div id='poem_1157694' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157694' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157694?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回外任诸官贺改知制诰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157694")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157694_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157694'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157694'>向解郡符，入朝天墄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157694_comment'></div>蒙台家之过听，俾纶省以司言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157694_comment'></div>制授已行，诉还无逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157694_comment'></div>内循衰晚，久废讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157694_comment'></div>思苦长卿之迟，谋罕裨谌之获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157694_comment'></div>宠光浮量，惭悸装怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157694_comment'></div>敢谓执事推毂交情，提衡仕辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157694_comment'></div>乐闻成命，驰述庆辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157694_comment'></div>恣加丹雘之华，阴示帡幪之庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157694_comment'></div>冀藏嘉惠，庸代良箴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157694_comment'></div>儤直云初，费词难属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157694_comment'></div>感悰多绪，万一匪宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157694_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1157694_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　夏，在京为知制诰，为高若讷祖父高审钊作墓志铭。作品：故崇仪使高府君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故崇仪使高府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158158")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158158'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158158'>府君讳审钊，字伯通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158158_comment'></div>其先为渤海著姓，唐代宗世，河朔再骚，徙贯并州，今为并州榆次人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158158_comment'></div>君烈考赠左千牛卫率府副率，讳谕，性开果，有文武方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158158_comment'></div>幅巾见武宁军节度使王公全斌，异其人，与厚相结，以女妹妻之，既皆不永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158158_comment'></div>于是君生三岁矣，王公怜其孤，鞠为己子，因姓王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158158_comment'></div>既壮，涉猎书史，性慷慨，上武力，然出入舅家，以谨孝闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158158_comment'></div>数计事军中，又痛折节下士，所交皆贤豪，故王公爱重绝诸子，奏任右班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158158_comment'></div>王公被诏率九将军伐蜀，君侍行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158158_comment'></div>王公破贼，遂虏之还，为有司簿诘，王公坐贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158158_comment'></div>君赏不行，稍迁东头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158158_comment'></div>王公即世，心丧无已，表复高氏云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158158_comment'></div>伪汉据并汾，数侵盗边，诏君领彀骑戍晋、潞，又领邢州潞罗八砦，滨带贼境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158158_comment'></div>阅数岁，甲寿士精，敌人畏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158158_comment'></div>俄而太宗且将伐河东，君时督先锋，至则引钩輣，冒矢石，直薄外谯，流镞中面，督攻益急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158158_comment'></div>上召还，慰曰：「无遽，恐亡吾壮士」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158158_comment'></div>由是始知君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158158_comment'></div>贼平，迁洛苑副使、领飞龙院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158158_comment'></div>旋疾暴作，上犹爱其材，特迁崇仪使，赐钱七十万，使掌卫州三牧龙坊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158158_comment'></div>以子怀諲为右班殿直，侍医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158158_comment'></div>端拱二年秋九月卒于官，享年五十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158158_comment'></div>君大王父讳伟，王父讳奫，皆以儒名家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158158_comment'></div>夫人扶风县君马氏，濮州团练使万之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158158_comment'></div>生三子：长怀谅，季未名，皆早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158158_comment'></div>惟仲子怀諲，终右侍禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158158_comment'></div>君之丧也，家不堪多难，是以殡于卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158158_comment'></div>后五十四年，孙天章阁待制若纳谋新兆于开封府开封县吹台乡建邑村之原，克祔二尊焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158158_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158158_comment'></div>府君才为时用，且大有立而遽病卒，似若命然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158158_comment'></div>然孔子罕言命，亦难言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158158_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1158158'>猗崇仪，材而力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158158_comment'></div>捍边镇，百夫特。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158158_comment'></div>被金痍，声震敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158158_comment'></div>病中夺，殡久客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158158_comment'></div>维三年，实庆历，夏六月，壬寅直，京巽隅，龟墨食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158158_comment'></div>祔双灵，安兆域。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1158158_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　夏，在京为知制诰，为高若讷之父高怀諲作墓志铭。作品：故右侍禁赠左屯卫将军高府君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故右侍禁赠左屯卫将军高府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158159")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158159'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158159'>府君讳怀諲，姓高氏，爱之，其字也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158159_comment'></div>以荫补殿前承旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158159_comment'></div>性方正孝爱，肃给好谋，长于治官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158159_comment'></div>工执射，参剡有法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158159_comment'></div>显考病痱甚，太宗惜焉，宠以崇仪使，领卫州三牧龙坊，且授君右班殿直，居家侍疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158159_comment'></div>崇仪之丧，泣血尽哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158159_comment'></div>帝识其才臣子，俾代父任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158159_comment'></div>坊畜战马，茭谷费不赀，君建言覃、怀、邢、赵间多旷野美草，西并太行，莱牧所宜，愿时其出入，如著令，许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158159_comment'></div>岁减用十八，龁饮甘凉，闲佶倍孳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158159_comment'></div>改右侍禁，入主骐骥院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158159_comment'></div>以亲疾辞剧事，愿督永济仓，便晨昏焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158159_comment'></div>年三十九，以病卒，实景德四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158159_comment'></div>君娶阎夫人，生一男子若讷，字敏之，今为尚书礼部郎中、天章阁待制兼侍读。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158159_comment'></div>初，君与母夫人继终，阎夫人比遭大忧，护㡛柳，客窆卫下，抚幼授遗，间关穷年，操洁谊严，族姻称仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158159_comment'></div>女归男立，慈训双济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158159_comment'></div>故敏之能兴孤生，入京师，以文策进士，以材选御史，以鲠谔官谏署，以淹该直书林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158159_comment'></div>云阿华光，以侍以游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158159_comment'></div>迹其致者，夫人力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158159_comment'></div>于是白上，累赠祢室至左屯卫将军，以长安县为太夫人汤沐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158159_comment'></div>夫人之殁，后府君凡三纪，实庆历三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158159_comment'></div>敏之憔然苫中，悼厝安之缓，泣血奔问，则新是卜，得吉繇于开封府开封县吹台乡建邑村之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158159_comment'></div>以夏六月七日壬寅，奉祖妣考妣四丧，叙二竁于茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158159_comment'></div>遣门人状先德，诿予为志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158159_comment'></div>予与敏之偕第同班，得以敦复世烈而叙之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158159_comment'></div>曾祖奫，生祖，赠左千牛卫率府副率谕，谕生崇仪使审钊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158159_comment'></div>高氏自副率以来，根德柢忠，盎然欲有为，咸屈于促算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158159_comment'></div>屯卫将兴之，又不克。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158159_comment'></div>故代祉家祥，蟠蜿扶舆，敏之受而炽之，为朝龙光，天之向劝不诬哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158159_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1158159'>神理祐仁，弗丁厥身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158159_comment'></div>子克奋兴，谱阀大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158159_comment'></div>追贲即安，还昭前人。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1158159_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年7月4日</a>　七月四日，在京为知制诰，自请外郡，以龙图阁直学士知杭州，有谢表。作品：谢龙图阁直学士表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢龙图阁直学士表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年7月4日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157378")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157378'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157378'>臣某言：今月四日，閤门拜受官告敕牒各一道，除臣龙图阁直学士、知杭州者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157378_comment'></div>层禁叨荣，大邦蒙委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157378_comment'></div>恩丛非愿，愧溢乃情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157378_comment'></div>恭以圣考上文，宝楹胥构。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157378_comment'></div>大开天策之蕴，分置金匮之藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157378_comment'></div>间召名儒，入当清问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157378_comment'></div>因璇题之华构，冠学士之美衔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157378_comment'></div>咢为峻资，罔非崇柬。<div class='inline'
