id='poem_sentence_7_1157378_comment'></div>如臣者器资梼昧，学术迂孱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157378_comment'></div>幸有亲逢，记无报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157378_comment'></div>四年待诏，姑奉凝严之游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157378_comment'></div>两郡佩符，不絓循良之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157378_comment'></div>赐还迩著，俾演大言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157378_comment'></div>捍格衰龄，尪绵宿疚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157378_comment'></div>胡广不愆之旧，动辄有忘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157378_comment'></div>左史能读之书，举皆未学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157378_comment'></div>兹焉弗职，况也自知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157378_comment'></div>适会要藩，慎求缺守，宰司误启，制诏闻俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157378_comment'></div>既籍内于神深，又节假其蕃翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157378_comment'></div>谊非轻外，治实责成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157378_comment'></div>目见河图，遂过宣尼之愿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157378_comment'></div>名留禁闼，更无汲黯之嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157378_comment'></div>斯盖皇帝陛下续短于长，劝能以否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157378_comment'></div>谓虽一介，自有鸣吠之专；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157378_comment'></div>借曰万分，亦收涓埃之补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157378_comment'></div>庸加抆拭，垂逮末愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157378_comment'></div>敢忘夙夜之恩，以忝身修之永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157378_comment'></div>神而可质，心不难铭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1157378_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年7月13日</a>　七月十三日，在京除翰林学士，上状辞让。作品：让翰林学士状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157302' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157302' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157302?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让翰林学士状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年7月13日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157302")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157302_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157302'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157302'>右，臣今月十三日，准閤门承受韩文昭报告，为已除授臣翰林学士，今授告敕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157302_comment'></div>闻命侧躬，既荣且骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157302_comment'></div>窃念臣昨知制诰日，以经夏抱疾，愿守便藩，本冀宁居，得养羸喘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157302_comment'></div>俄叨改职，寻以叙辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157302_comment'></div>比令儿息，搬取家属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157302_comment'></div>伺其归室，偶未赴官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157302_comment'></div>僚友具知，宰府同亮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157302_comment'></div>今者忽蒙误选，升备禁局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157302_comment'></div>文翰近班，臣子至愿，当不俟驾，即日造朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157302_comment'></div>但念臣因病自言，蒙恩辄止，不惟欺冒朝听，必恐滋致人言，便谓臣巧作迁延，阴规次补，有妨贤路，专取身荣，启偷竞之风，渎承平之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157302_comment'></div>一惟斯谤，容得自安！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157302_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下察臣外补有因，亮臣知分有素，且依前诏，早遣出麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157302_comment'></div>况馀杭阙官，已逾三月；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157302_comment'></div>学士供职，自有数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157302_comment'></div>若得申沛俞音，收还新命，悯孤踪之羁悸，息浮议之纷嚣，上穆朝佥，下纾忧悃，虽停褒泽，自荷大恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157302_comment'></div>无任祈天俟命战惧之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157302_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年7月15日</a>　七月十五日，在京为翰林学士，再上状辞让。作品：再让翰林学士状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157303' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157303' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157303?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再让翰林学士状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年7月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157303")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157303_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157303'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157303'>右，臣今月十五日，准中书劄子，以臣陈让新除翰林学士告敕，乞且赴杭州，奉圣旨，不得辞让者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157303_comment'></div>恭闻敦敕，参抃诚悰，贷其辄辞，勖以严旨，便当奔走朝路，冒即宠章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157303_comment'></div>谊有未安，不容无诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157303_comment'></div>伏念臣今年三月内，以天章阁待制归朝，寻蒙改知制诰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157303_comment'></div>又于七月中，因陈乞外郡，蒙转龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157303_comment'></div>无劳被奖，自臣为始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157303_comment'></div>尚录馀杭旧例，未速人言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157303_comment'></div>臣是以上殿叙辞曰，乞在任满二年，成三十月，依常参为例，冀图考绩，少答睿私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157303_comment'></div>不意今者再被制书，擢臣为翰林学士，此则一岁之内，三次迁除，缛典蕃数，未有臣比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157303_comment'></div>一介之操，知分甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157303_comment'></div>若便惧命忍惭，腼然祗受，悠悠仕子，偷竞同兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157303_comment'></div>虽微臣茍一日之荣，而广朝被多士之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157303_comment'></div>损大益寡，顾不重哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157303_comment'></div>今拒诏当诛，昧进亦罪，罪无足悯，诛有可矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157303_comment'></div>敢率愚诚，罄叙兹窘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157303_comment'></div>伏望圣慈特许收罢新命，且令赴任杭州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157303_comment'></div>控仁援天，更无别理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157303_comment'></div>如朝廷必以学士院乏人，不令辞免，则臣愿只以内阁职名作直学士院供职，俟满年岁，方冀叙迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157303_comment'></div>二事之中，乞赐矜允，臣无任虔祈恳祷之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157303_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年7月25日</a>　七月二十五日，在京奉召入院为翰林学士，有谢表。作品：谢宣召入院表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157379?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣召入院表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年7月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157379")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157379_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157379'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157379'>右，臣今月二十五日，翰林书艺董皓至臣所居，奉宣圣旨，召臣入院充学士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157379_comment'></div>驿使猥临，天辞垂谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157379_comment'></div>齿收单迹，引内禁林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157379_comment'></div>列让靡从，寘颜无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157379_comment'></div>窃惟凝密之署，诰命所司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157379_comment'></div>朝选慎其咨俞，士类托乎清切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157379_comment'></div>非有羽、产之懿，严、徐之才，曷以对扬迩言，传为成训？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157379_comment'></div>衍膏润于方夏，鼓笙簧于典谟，是惟能贤，足暴公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157379_comment'></div>伏念臣懦冥素禀，蹇拙众知，偶缘雕篆之微，久被菁莪之育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157379_comment'></div>亲逢圣诱，自力攸箴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157379_comment'></div>有事素风，遂安所习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157379_comment'></div>向从青简之列，越缀阜衣之联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157379_comment'></div>緤组为邦，赐环上计，入陪星掖，祗演缗词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157379_comment'></div>而捍格长年，尪劬槁质，故疴新疹，痊剧相寻，浅学空文，废忘几半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157379_comment'></div>间伏蒲而自乞，愿剖竹以再麾，遽沐俞恩，仍迁近职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157379_comment'></div>天诱其愿，人及尔私，方具扁舟，径趋守屏，不谓玉堂任缺，宝诏中留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157379_comment'></div>还骇栗之飘危，补持荷之空乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157379_comment'></div>却其诉避，敦以恪居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157379_comment'></div>旬岁内而三迁，贯情涯而载惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157379_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下过循虚誉，降饬孱姿，枉颁召节之华，俾蹈高门之复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157379_comment'></div>歛躬图勉，揆奖思酬，誓以澡祓蒙心，绎求丕律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157379_comment'></div>体齐人之编栈，谨迪身修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157379_comment'></div>探羲《易》之随风，慎裁宪令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157379_comment'></div>万分可采，九殒为期。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1157379'></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1157379_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　秋，在京为翰林学士，为叶参作墓志铭。作品：故光禄卿叶府君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158156' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158156?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故光禄卿叶府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158156")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158156_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158156'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158156'>庆历三年，岁舍鹑首，秋七月丁丑，光禄卿致仕南阳叶君齐终于京师，享年八十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158156_comment'></div>其孤翰林学士清臣奉柩自京师归湖州，卜之，得九月庚寅吉，乃克襄竁于乌程县澄静乡吴里之先茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158156_comment'></div>前此，翰林谓仆，与我游而知我者，莫善于君，君宜为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158156_comment'></div>仆于卿既丈人行，于翰林又第同年，仕同班，虽均鲠共哀，而谊不得辞，遂摭系铺阀，而铭诸圹幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158156_comment'></div>君年三十，始有仕进意，负策西向，试礼部，辞尤工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158156_comment'></div>及进士高第，调和州历阳主簿，就改州司寇掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158156_comment'></div>历泽州、清海军军事、节度二推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158156_comment'></div>时州将忮贪，以便文自喜，君临事持可不可，中毅外和，以规谂之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158156_comment'></div>岁终，将得无尤，亦不能以事谪君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158156_comment'></div>盗伍持仗劫民牢猪，吏结重辟，君独谓从二人当上谳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158156_comment'></div>既报不死，州将始憾，终谢曰：「微从事，吾坐入矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158156_comment'></div>监司最其课，交任于朝，改秘书省著作佐郎，留为大理寺详断官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158156_comment'></div>未几，监建安军搉茶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158156_comment'></div>移知遂州小溪县，授永康军青城令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158156_comment'></div>时大皂江瀿澍湓涌，邑守百丈堰没不盈版，皆抟手相视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158156_comment'></div>君谒李冰祠，盛服立雨中，邀神为助，有顷少霁，水波为却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158156_comment'></div>岁饥，君毁家囷，赈流人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158156_comment'></div>豪大姓闻之，相率助贷，蒙袂数十万，咸得更生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158156_comment'></div>以检书丞知光州固始，有孤女拥高赀，病甚困，叔规取其家，阳为授婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158156_comment'></div>二夕，女死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158156_comment'></div>君廉得其情，坐叔罪，簿入女财，直钜百万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158156_comment'></div>以太常博士通判宣州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158156_comment'></div>越人讼分财，七劾不承，君被制往按，不旬日而决，果若吏受赇而导其欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158156_comment'></div>以屯田员外郎通判扬州，民冒盐搉，乾没不悛，君建弛禁与民，可以省罪均利者，切切数千言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158156_comment'></div>书奏，不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158156_comment'></div>还朝，以都官员外郎通判濠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158156_comment'></div>岁中，即授广南路提点刑狱、劝农使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158156_comment'></div>使废，以司封员外郎判三司开拆司，出知宣州，入为户部判官，改工部、刑部二郎中，又为苏州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158156_comment'></div>会水灾，农乏食，相与持耰矜强乞丐，吏欲以盗论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158156_comment'></div>君原其穷𩛞，一皆末遣，人人感愧，汔岁定，不复为盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158156_comment'></div>就改越州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158156_comment'></div>以兵部郎中还判度支勾院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158156_comment'></div>时翰林为盐铁判官，故君移判尚书刑部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158156_comment'></div>银艾相交，世荣其迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158156_comment'></div>寻乞为湖州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158156_comment'></div>州本君再再世所贯，坟墓亲戚在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158156_comment'></div>到部，酾酒上冢，与乡人父老相对为乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158156_comment'></div>乡人父老惮君清，亦终不敢谒以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158156_comment'></div>年耆，益厌吏事，上章愿从散秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158156_comment'></div>有诏以本官分司南京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158156_comment'></div>君即日还姑苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158156_comment'></div>田数十丘，宅百亩，莳竹林，治果园菜畦，烹鸡炮羔，与比邻岁时相问遗，往来南阡北陌中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158156_comment'></div>幅巾氅裘，彷佯造适，里人不谓君经为二千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158156_comment'></div>盖老聃所谓知止不殆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158156_comment'></div>明年，迁太常少卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158156_comment'></div>又六年，遂老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158156_comment'></div>事真宗及上，始终四十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158156_comment'></div>凡阶爵皆五品，服三品，勋二品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158156_comment'></div>君名参，字次公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158156_comment'></div>曾王考彪，王考蠙，皆隐居自放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158156_comment'></div>考逵，尝为钱氏霸府从事，不得志，因投檄去，洎终不显，以君故，累赠刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158156_comment'></div>君少孤，事母羊夫人至孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158156_comment'></div>异时疾革，君惶遽刲股肉为羹，奉夫人食之而愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158156_comment'></div>夫人亡虽数十年，言必流涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158156_comment'></div>为学苫，从人借书，皆手写，终即诵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158156_comment'></div>为吏廉，与人无苞苴之馈，所去民辄思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158156_comment'></div>为狱仁，鞠听纤微无所隐然，卒多平反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158156_comment'></div>生平居官无毛发咎谴，专务为阴德，浚蕃涵渟，以大其源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158156_comment'></div>故翰林乘流席庆，汪洋大肆，惟其有而似之故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158156_comment'></div>翰林工文章，古今多所贯综。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158156_comment'></div>方正持重，能以材自结于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158156_comment'></div>知制诰不踰岁，擢龙图阁直学士、权三司使，以善职闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158156_comment'></div>罢知江宁府，复召为学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158156_comment'></div>其嘉谋鲠言在台阁者，士大夫争称道之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158156_comment'></div>使志充计行，其光明于世，乌可量已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158156_comment'></div>初，翰林自江宁奉先卿北上，日调甘旨，烝烝承颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158156_comment'></div>既而养不待而生有涯，末如痛何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158156_comment'></div>虽然，以鲐背敛牖下，既阖棺，君子咸曰：「善人丧矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158156_comment'></div>呜呼盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158156_comment'></div>娶夫人杨氏，关西之裔孙，柔芳静淑，为内外姻表式，先君十三年而终，终而葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158156_comment'></div>君生平自志一穴，曰：「我终必居此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158156_comment'></div>故翰林遵治命，杨夫人同兆异封，竭信诚奉窆，总总尔，皇皇尔，无一物有悔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158156_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_72_1158156'>胄出诸梁邈千祀，后昆推迁籍吴里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158156_comment'></div>三代旷僚君膴仕，槃根茂叶丛庆祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158156_comment'></div>忠爱廉靖府循吏，华颠辞位延寿纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158156_comment'></div>茂生翰林复济美，尽养而收孝忠始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158156_comment'></div>相冢山原古桑梓，呜呼体魄安于此。</div><div id='poem_sentence_76_1158156_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　秋，在京为翰林学士，有诗挽叶参。作品：光禄叶大卿哀词二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_104841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104841?labeling=true' target='_blank'>光禄叶大卿哀词<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104841")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104841_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104841'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104841'>八十浮龄尽，三千去日长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104841'>丛兰秋寂寞，卿月夜苍茫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104841'>里友歌迎绋，州民酹续浆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104841'>英魂知所托，桥梓蔼成行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104841_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104841'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104841_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_104842' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104842' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104842?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104842_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104842'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104842'>偃息朋三寿，生平定四知。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104842'>乡人荣衣绣，光禄号能诗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104842'>未赴安车召，遽成埋玉悲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104842'>方珉纪遗爱，无诳冢中辞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104842_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104842'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104842_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年10月</a>　十月，在京为翰林学士，有诗。作品：去年十月赴淮阳今实周一岁岁中三迁遂直内禁作诗记其出处。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二一。）</span><div id='poem_105607' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105607' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105607?labeling=true' target='_blank'>去年十月赴淮阳今实周一岁岁中三迁遂直内禁作诗记其出处</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105607")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105607_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105607'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105607'>去年诏赴淮阳郡，手合鱼符拥使辀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105607'>今岁恩叨玉堂署，头簪凤笔从宸游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105607'>孤蓬逐吹无时定，倦鸟逢林只自休。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105607'>暗隙遂容私照日，奔湍信有不沈舟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105607'>身归讵敢夸三组，目眩何能读九丘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105607'>白发纷垂文思轧，此生荣遇若为酬。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105607_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105607'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_105607_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年11月</a>　十一月，在京为翰林学士，作《时雪赞》作品：时雪赞。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四七。）</span><div id='poem_1158046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>时雪赞<span class='inlineComment2'>（并状）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158046")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158046'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158046'>右，臣伏以自秋迄冬，天久不雨，亩首憔悴，农或叹愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158046_comment'></div>皇帝陛下储精垦祷，弗遑中旰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158046_comment'></div>盛德震动，霏雪应祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158046_comment'></div>流霙洒素，煖疠销解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158046_comment'></div>伏想宸心，即时欢豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158046_comment'></div>民猷君体，凯慰同深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158046_comment'></div>臣叨尘从列，窃忭嘉应，不胜踊跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158046_comment'></div>谨作《时雪赞》一首，凡十韵，韵十六言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158046_comment'></div>推本天意，遂及圣功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158046_comment'></div>语局文褊，无以铺张光大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158046_comment'></div>辄用缮写，随状上进以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158046_comment'></div>内讼荒斐，伏用战汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158046_comment'></div>谨奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158046_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1158046'>岁次协洽，惟仲之冬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158046_comment'></div>不雨十旬，有害无农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158046_comment'></div>地房泄蒸，蛰户弗坯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158046_comment'></div>日赭风熯，穷天涨埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158046_comment'></div>皇帝曰咨，灾或儆予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158046_comment'></div>精祷通神，神与圣符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158046_comment'></div>日在庚辰，先集惟寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158046_comment'></div>长风北驱，重阴冤延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158046_comment'></div>自霰而霙，霏霏飞飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158046_comment'></div>凭云委华，即壤流辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158046_comment'></div>其雨其浮，膏凝液流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158046_comment'></div>缟尔南山，肪我西畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158046_comment'></div>惟雪其时，上天降康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158046_comment'></div>逢僭成沴，值德为祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158046_comment'></div>为祥伊何，来岁之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158046_comment'></div>根深粒繁，乃京乃坻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158046_comment'></div>拂疠荡温，纳于太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158046_comment'></div>剪剪劳氓，易叹而歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158046_comment'></div>旱未及伤，雪也载霶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158046_comment'></div>皇帝德功，万年不忘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1158046_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年12月3日</a>　十二月三日，在京为翰林学士，请增置提举司勾当公事，时提举在京诸司库务。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年12月</a>　十二月，在京为翰林学士，荐王畴为提举司勾当公事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　本年，在京为知制诰，上疏言三路边防事。作品：言三路边防七事奏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1157271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>言三路边防七事奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157271")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157271'>臣闻病者疗之未危，火者防之未燃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157271_comment'></div>若已危已燃，虽有嘉医力士，犹不能振殂烂之苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157271_comment'></div>是以思患预防，所趋一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157271_comment'></div>臣伏见河北、河东、陕西比年骚困，契丹规掠塞下，求索赂遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157271_comment'></div>陛下以天下为心，屈己忍忿，与之通好，心纾仓卒之急，是以河朔生灵，晏然暂宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157271_comment'></div>此陛下权时之宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157271_comment'></div>夏贼逆命，袭金明，残麟府，破任福，败坏多杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157271_comment'></div>吏卒数十万转食屯兵，于今五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157271_comment'></div>士气丧沮，每闻金鼓之音，皆股战胆销，有百走逃生之心，无一前斗死之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157271_comment'></div>部署钤辖，位均势侔，不相统一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157271_comment'></div>赏滥而不实，罚弛而不行，上下相蒙，徼一切之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157271_comment'></div>臣计二陲之忧，比病与火，可谓将危而且燃也，中外有识，无不寒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157271_comment'></div>臣愚以为不速兴而救之，事一差跌，悔无及已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157271_comment'></div>伏见中书门下、枢密院日入奏事，遵奉常体，但以官吏差遣，使臣迁转，比例高下，计较锱铢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157271_comment'></div>下至百司冗屑申请，无不关白圣聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157271_comment'></div>及宣敕行下，一署曰圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157271_comment'></div>至于边境措置，安危大计，反不暇及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157271_comment'></div>臣愚无知，窃以为过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157271_comment'></div>夫不当行而行，是为徒行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157271_comment'></div>当忧而不忧，是为必忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157271_comment'></div>今耶律君臣包祸就毒，故马放阴山之下，待隙而动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157271_comment'></div>彼其旋玩河朔如股掌之上，责货不已，又将责地，祸根衅萌，章章如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157271_comment'></div>朝廷忽而不防，未知何谓耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157271_comment'></div>方今河北、河东，不澄滥官，不阅冗兵，帅之才不才未尝择，械之可用不可用未尝选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157271_comment'></div>自敌使继至，便谓信誓可凭，谋臣高枕，了无为备，可谓发箧启笥，以待寇攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157271_comment'></div>今陛下盛德清明，大臣方正协力，献可弼违，朝无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157271_comment'></div>不于此时，侧席尝胆，思所以御之之术，急除弊政，图刷大耻，乃欲优游自暇，日安一日，待病之危，待火之燃，救不晚乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157271_comment'></div>夫碎目杂务，非宰司职事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157271_comment'></div>假令此等一皆不问，委之有司，尚无系于治乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157271_comment'></div>若二敌挻变，更相影啸，一出于北，一扰于西，国疲于转输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157271_comment'></div>一夫饿竖，兴为盗贼，凭高呼叫，环数百里，则天下安危决一日之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157271_comment'></div>推是而言，臣所谓不当行而行，当忧而不忧，果可信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157271_comment'></div>刘平、石元孙轻脱寡谋，径与敌斗，师败身死，损辱国威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157271_comment'></div>今之为帅，不鉴前失，尚守旧体，终无改更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157271_comment'></div>其出师也无鼓旗，则号令不行矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157271_comment'></div>其战也无行阵，则败走不救矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157271_comment'></div>其止无营堑自守，其行无辎重自随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157271_comment'></div>烽候不明，间谍不设。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157271_comment'></div>不量人事，不察地形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157271_comment'></div>将不抚士，士不识将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157271_comment'></div>迁代纷纷，未始暂宁，而有司据例换移，习不为怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157271_comment'></div>是以敌小入则小胜，大入则大胜，亦未尝闻朝廷求所以败、所以胜之由，彼所长、我所短之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157271_comment'></div>何者有勇，何者有谋，而可以相辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157271_comment'></div>若何则守，若何则战，而授之成算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157271_comment'></div>兵若久而不解，何策以支？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157271_comment'></div>食若有时而乏，何术以济？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157271_comment'></div>今陛下未以为念，大臣未以为言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157271_comment'></div>天下安危，谁任其责？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157271_comment'></div>臣闻识见隘陋，不足与权大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157271_comment'></div>窃谓当今之急者有七：一曰讲军阵，二曰广牧马，三曰精器械，四曰力耕桑，五曰择官人，六曰重贼法，七曰籍游冗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157271_comment'></div>臣既梼昧，知其大而不得其详，又不敢掩众谋，申独见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157271_comment'></div>伏愿陛下试以閒日，诏一二近臣，出此七事，令共力探讨，使引古验今，执处其要，陛下与大臣择而行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157271_comment'></div>既行，又执而不迁，浮议撼揠，且皆勿听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157271_comment'></div>然须近者三年有成，远者五七年、十数年而成，陛下安心缓虑，总其衔勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157271_comment'></div>夫治国若种树，非谓朝种而暮可庇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157271_comment'></div>假以日月，则根柢深固，坐获茂阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157271_comment'></div>昔孟明再败秦师，归修国政，晋避其德，遂霸西戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157271_comment'></div>今若力农缮兵，日夜申儆，张吾百度，振吾六师，其居有备，其行有法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157271_comment'></div>彼二敌闻之，必且狡谋溃于其胸，阴计烂于其胁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157271_comment'></div>臣又愿陛下诏中书、枢密院，自今以往，取有司申请不干大事者，许依唐时堂帖之比，直令堂判院付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157271_comment'></div>有司杂务，已有定例，便行不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157271_comment'></div>其可以蠲除归有司者，定为永制，俾之奉行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157271_comment'></div>若其大事非臣下可得专者，然后奏请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157271_comment'></div>自然纲提领摄，事亦希简，使大臣得专边境，尽虑金革矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157271_comment'></div>诸路部署以下，出兵之日，臣愿依军法，以一阶一级交相统制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157271_comment'></div>令一则易行，官专则有威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157271_comment'></div>无令贵臣监军，牵制其内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157271_comment'></div>将之与士，既相习熟，则不可数为替改，使得恩结其心，威统其违，缓急与之生死，乃可为用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157271_comment'></div>此其略也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1157271_comment'></div>昔楚庄王区区之诸侯，踞卑湿之地，无日不讨军实而数之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1157271_comment'></div>其戒于国中曰：「人生之不易，祸至之无日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1157271_comment'></div>用能服郑、宋，抗强晋，威震中原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1157271_comment'></div>况陛下拥四海之富，揽天下俊乂，与之图事耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1157271_comment'></div>然时哉时哉，不可缓已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1157271_comment'></div>臣愚戆不识禁忌，惟陛下哀怜省纳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1157271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　本年，在京为翰林学士，由礼部郎中转吏部郎中，有谢表。作品：谢转吏部郎中表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢转吏部郎中表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157377")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157377'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157377'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣尚书吏部郎中，依前充职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157377_comment'></div>课容岁比，官得例迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157377_comment'></div>华秩误跻，愧襟罔措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157377_comment'></div>伏念臣本缘羁远，误直禁严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157377_comment'></div>病与生俱，衰先年至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157377_comment'></div>间抱风波之悸，实依山薮之藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157377_comment'></div>牵勉拙艰，婆娑岁月，攸箴未验，不职应诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157377_comment'></div>敢图公府之署年，直徇郎台之进秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157377_comment'></div>报闻既允，付外遂行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157377_comment'></div>拜奖綍以惊魂，躐华涂而抃股。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157377_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下天无择覆，春不检和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157377_comment'></div>谓陟明之格普颁，且宿业之勤必录，遂容孤迹，亦被优除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157377_comment'></div>谨当澡雪而烦，彰施厥采，和羊肠而叱度，触鸡雨以长鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157377_comment'></div>茍昧是言，有如兹日。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1157377_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　本年，在京为翰林学士，上疏议边兵军粮事。作品：乞边兵三月后减半就粮内郡疏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《宋朝诸臣奏议》卷一二〇。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　约于本年，在京为翰林学士，上疏议减边兵事。作品：减边兵议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1157272' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157272' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157272?labeling=true' target='_blank'>减边兵议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157272")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157272_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157272'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157272'>臣本书生，不当妄言兵革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157272_comment'></div>但以事势料之，参验今古，有灼然易了者，敢为奏请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157272_comment'></div>臣伏见自古以来，防边守塞，未有屯结兵马，经年亘岁，常在城砦，无有休息者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157272_comment'></div>传曰：「久暴师则国不足，虽有智者不能善其后」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157272_comment'></div>只如秦汉时，与匈奴更相酬报，出入钞掠，亦是兵罢即归，不令屯结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157272_comment'></div>亦不如圣朝长令兵马守备边上，既不出攻，坐费粮运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157272_comment'></div>是故用兵未及六年，天下之财已告匮竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157272_comment'></div>良由边将不知休兵，朝廷不授成算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157272_comment'></div>亿万之费，耗散而不计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157272_comment'></div>若更十年，未知多少财用可济其艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157272_comment'></div>臣请言其验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157272_comment'></div>敌界自三月后，马瘦，放在草野，不能负重，关陕人皆知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157272_comment'></div>则背春向夏，敌不能大举，其验一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157272_comment'></div>敌无馈运，每入汉界，常因粮于中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157272_comment'></div>中国自三月以后，才有麦熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157272_comment'></div>其馀禾稼未成，无粮可因，敌不能大举，其验二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157272_comment'></div>又有高山大川，溪谷相衔，春夏之后，雨水时行，霖潦为阻，敌不能大举，其验三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157272_comment'></div>是敌兵锐于冬令而屈于春夏，其势可见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157272_comment'></div>臣欲乞朝廷详度，许令于沿边州军城砦，每年自三月后，抽减一半兵马入内地州府就粮，直至九月却往元驻劄处，号为防秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157272_comment'></div>况所抽兵士，虽在内郡，其校习<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1157272", 1157272, "Clauses/66/Comments/0")'>训练</span>，一如边上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157272_comment'></div>此乃事之至便，不足多疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157272_comment'></div>一则边上州军爱惜，得年支粮草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157272_comment'></div>二则兵马有休息之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157272_comment'></div>三则兵士到内地州府，易为裹费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157272_comment'></div>四则关陕之民，免得转般粮草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157272_comment'></div>是边上一年支准，可展为二年也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157272_comment'></div>识者必难臣曰：敌知朝廷自三月后抽退兵马，必选择壮骑精兵，出人不意，入来汉界作过，恐大段深入，钞掠人民，破荡城砦，何以为备？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157272_comment'></div>臣对曰：假如敌人有壮马精兵，能于盛夏入汉界作过三五日，只是钞掠得界上些小熟户人民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157272_comment'></div>且无粮草可食，彼又不会攻打城壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157272_comment'></div>朝廷但只令所在城砦坚守不出，兵及州军，只增城立栅相对，不与之战，则见在一半人马，已是足用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157272_comment'></div>万一敌人竟敢谋深入，即令内郡就粮兵马，旬日内可以勾集，令大将将数万之兵，结阵徐驱，往彼救应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157272_comment'></div>亦只令硬砦相持，勿与彼争锋，使之进则不敢，退又粘逐，常择便地自逗留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157272_comment'></div>至二十日以上，彼必有粮尽或雨水之阻，又何能破荡城砦，大段深入也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157272_comment'></div>但自来朝廷不肯明下成算与边将，令抽退兵马，是以边将畏避责罚，长要占留在边上，图常有准拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157272_comment'></div>其添到军马，以死固执，无因肯减一人一骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157272_comment'></div>今若朝廷明降成算，使之遵守，如敌非时入界，万一有少败衄，朝廷自任其责，自然边将必无固执斯议者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157272_comment'></div>伏望降付中书、枢密院子细商量，取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1157272_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　约于本年，在京为翰林学士，上疏乞皇帝专刑赏。作品：乞专刑赏状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1157273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞专刑赏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157273")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157273'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157273'>臣闻天子之所以能制四海，役万民而臣之者，其柄有二，曰刑曰赏而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157273_comment'></div>《洪范》曰：「惟辟作福，惟辟作威，惟辟玉食」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157273_comment'></div>臣有作福作威玉食，则害于而家，凶于而国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157273_comment'></div>昔宋子罕谓其君曰：「庆赏赐与者，民之所喜也，君自行之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157273_comment'></div>杀戮刑罚者，民之所恶也，臣请当之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157273_comment'></div>于是宋君失刑，后为子罕所劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157273_comment'></div>且子罕才得一柄，已为主患，况两得之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157273_comment'></div>伏见陛下恭俭仁厚，忧劳听断，细务小物，一更圣心，近世守文之主，未见其比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157273_comment'></div>然而任用臣下，主柄外移，委弃刑赏，不自总摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157273_comment'></div>凡有所进，必待臣下之誉而用之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157273_comment'></div>凡有所退，亦待臣下之毁而黜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157273_comment'></div>夫毁誉行于上，则朋党成于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157273_comment'></div>且党人所恶，能得陛下之法而罪之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157273_comment'></div>党人所爱，能得陛下之赏而官之，则举朝之人，重私赏而轻公法，舍其君而归其臣，虽欲无危，不可得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157273_comment'></div>龙之所以能飞霄汉，入渊泉，变化不测，以风云为之卫也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157273_comment'></div>虎之所以能搏百兽，神空山，以爪牙为之使也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157273_comment'></div>使龙失风云，则鳣鲔等其灵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157273_comment'></div>虎废爪牙，则麋鹿角其能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157273_comment'></div>君失刑赏，则见轻于天下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157273_comment'></div>况今四夷交侵，师不用命，财匮民怨，吏以苛刻相挻，官以党与相营，陛下何不收取二柄而自用之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157273_comment'></div>假如罚不当辜，人犹知畏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157273_comment'></div>赏不值善，人尚知恩，又况陛下之德之明，其赏必善，其罚必罪耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157273_comment'></div>鲁国政在陪臣，《春秋》为讳之，称之曰盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157273_comment'></div>况拥九五之丕构，总天下之机矩，倒持利剑，以资断割，忽《洪范》之至戒，袭子罕之覆辙，轻龙虎之神威，抵《春秋》之所讳，召衰促乱，何所利哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157273_comment'></div>比年以来，日无盛光，月行黄道，氛雾无时，河决地动，皆下侵上，上失权之应也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157273_comment'></div>伏望陛下上揆天形，俯观人事，收威福以在手，破群党于私门，奋乾刚，振雷声，行之一日，天下廓然矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157273_comment'></div>臣蒙恩深厚，不致爱死，轻进瞽言，惟垂裁赦。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_1157273'></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1157273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157273'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「《历代名臣奏议》：系庆历中祁为侍读学士时上。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157273_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年1月1日</a>　正月一日，在京为翰林学士，有诗。作品：甲申岁首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二三。）</span><div id='poem_104444' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104444' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104444?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲申岁首</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104444")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_104444_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104444'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104444'>故岁时光漏中去，新正甲子卷头开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104444'>迎新送故祗如此，且尽灯前蓝尾杯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104444_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104444'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_104444_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年1月12日</a>　正月十二日，在京为翰林学士，以范仲淹之荐，参与议荆王赵元俨葬事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年1月</a>　正月，在京为翰林学士，受诏为荆王赵元俨撰写墓志铭。作品：荆王墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158146?labeling=true' target='_blank'>荆王墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158146")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158146'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158146'>庆历三年冬十二月，皇叔荆王疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158146_comment'></div>辛丑，皇帝辇如其宫，见王卧内，礼如家人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158146_comment'></div>上手为调药，王泣且谢，即陈：「被恩三朝，无以报厚德，今保首领仆牖下，倘使有知，从二先帝游，死骨不朽，惟以儿女长累陛下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158146_comment'></div>上恻然，谓王素康强，虽今小恙，行且瘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158146_comment'></div>敕近医药以自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158146_comment'></div>因赉白金五千两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158146_comment'></div>王固辞曰：「幸一见天子，奚赐之敢叨」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158146_comment'></div>上高王之让，特诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158146_comment'></div>明年春正月乙亥，遂薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158146_comment'></div>上即时临吊，哭之恸，废五日朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158146_comment'></div>壬午，御素服，宰相率百官诣崇政门奉慰，遣中大夫相其室，以蒇内事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158146_comment'></div>诏翰林学士臣某、内侍省都知臣守忠护其葬，以庀外事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158146_comment'></div>制诏中书门下，其赠以天策上将军、兖徐二州牧、燕王印绶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158146_comment'></div>太常上谥为恭肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158146_comment'></div>又诏臣祁：「尔应叙王治行，缕碧款隧，俾永其传」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158146_comment'></div>臣再拜稽首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158146_comment'></div>伏自念懵学扃闻，不能周知王德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158146_comment'></div>今天子展亲饰终，震动显幽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158146_comment'></div>自王弗宁，遣太医高手，踵相及于路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158146_comment'></div>逮终，归赗不赀计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158146_comment'></div>比葬，三酹其丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158146_comment'></div>则上之所以眷王，王之所以承上，其仁其贤，方付史氏，以昭无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158146_comment'></div>臣虽缺然牵缀，尚惧称道失当，为斯文羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158146_comment'></div>而日迫事严，不及误避，是用询玉牒，摭行状，次第其辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158146_comment'></div>谨按，王讳元俨，太宗皇帝第八子，母曰德妃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158146_comment'></div>王于诸子最幼，太宗特爱之，终日侍左右在宫中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158146_comment'></div>真宗嗣统，王年十三，始以检校太保、左卫上将军兼御史大夫，爵为公，国于曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158146_comment'></div>进拜平海军节度使，俄同中书门下平章事，加检校太傅，为广陵郡王，授昭武、安德二军节度，真拜王，以荣为国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158146_comment'></div>稍兼侍中，易安静、武信军，检校太尉兼中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158146_comment'></div>大中祥符八年，宫屋火，延燬内庐，坐火禁不谨，削武信一军节度，降端王，始筑宫于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158146_comment'></div>他日谢上，痛自咎责，真宗嘉慰之，复以镇海、安化二帅节，改王于彭，册拜太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158146_comment'></div>以天平易安化，拜太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158146_comment'></div>以永清、横海帅节，更王通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158146_comment'></div>继授陕州大都督，合保平、定国两军，又王泾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158146_comment'></div>今上即位，以地尊属近，进拜太尉、尚书令，仍前兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158146_comment'></div>以镇安、忠武二镇徙王定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158146_comment'></div>赐赞拜不名，又加诏书不名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158146_comment'></div>顷之，更王镇，赐剑履上殿，拜太师，以河阳三城二节度即王孟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158146_comment'></div>翌日，行京兆尹兼凤翔尹，即军府为节度，乃王荆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158146_comment'></div>又进雍州牧，兼凤翔牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158146_comment'></div>久之，以国在荆，授荆、扬二州牧，即荆南、淮南节度为大使，仍赐入朝不趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158146_comment'></div>大抵赐功臣号者九，其文至二十有四，勋上柱国，阶开府仪同三司，邑户二万七千，实食一万二千四百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158146_comment'></div>人臣之极挚止矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158146_comment'></div>王美姿质，眉目如画，广额丰颐，举止矜重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158146_comment'></div>在平居无少懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158146_comment'></div>祀容恭，朝容庄，宾容肃，宴容侃侃而和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158146_comment'></div>虽霞之轩然，麟之仪然，瑜润而葩鲜，不足侔已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158146_comment'></div>事德妃尤谨，每有疾，焚薰请命，而王进饭，视妃一再以增减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158146_comment'></div>居丧以孝称，躬绘太宗圣容，纤微克肖，天光日润，若可就而望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158146_comment'></div>性开敏，博览文史，好飞白书，拂洒遒妍，结字甚工，作辞赋数百篇，务求理致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158146_comment'></div>寡嗜欲，左右姬侍，裁令奉巾栉箕帚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158146_comment'></div>不受佞谗，剪剪者或伺隙肤诉，必正色折愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158146_comment'></div>由是内外无违言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158146_comment'></div>天圣以来，王自以春秋高，蒙殊礼，不敢数朝请，常阖门申申以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158146_comment'></div>会朝廷调军兴，议省费，王即表上公使钱岁五千万佐用度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158146_comment'></div>上不获已，权许半入，以申王恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158146_comment'></div>晚节颇好丝竹亭观，日夜自娱，盖健粹所赋，必有寄于物而后能适云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158146_comment'></div>始天下之言贵而亲莫若王，而王乃小心恭慎，在骨肉间始终无纤芥，使宗室本支，日爱以敦，语德与功，其何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158146_comment'></div>孙宣公奭尝授经，必语人曰：「王，贤王也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158146_comment'></div>世以为知言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158146_comment'></div>娶夫人张氏，彰德军节度使永德之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158146_comment'></div>循法度，膺象服，承宁王家，以岐、许、晋三为夫人国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158146_comment'></div>不幸前七年薨，追命魏国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158146_comment'></div>子四人：男曰允熙，右监门卫大将军、滁州刺史，赠博州防御使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158146_comment'></div>曰允良，镇国军节度观察留后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158146_comment'></div>曰允迪，静难军节度观察留后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158146_comment'></div>曰允初，汝州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158146_comment'></div>诸孙嫔然，或冠或笄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158146_comment'></div>问安也，蝉玺袭乎庭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158146_comment'></div>来宁也，钿帨交乎闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158146_comment'></div>此所谓朱芾皇皇，室家君王者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158146_comment'></div>初，魏国之葬也，当王墓之次，故即用其穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158146_comment'></div>以三月庚寅，具卤簿鼓吹，奉樟宫，自京师如河南之永安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158146_comment'></div>以夏四月癸卯，启魏国之埏，从礼而合诸墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158146_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158146_comment'></div>王之为子孝，为弟悌，为叔父宠而虔，为父义而有慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158146_comment'></div>甲子一终，启手足焉，未为颐而艾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158146_comment'></div>虽然，寿皇烈，凭天祉，驼钮盭华馀四十年，忠孝之范光矣，荣哀之事终矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158146_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_78_1158146'>太宗九支，潞笃于病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158146_comment'></div>昭成弗永，真宗受命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158146_comment'></div>润邢苏华，并王而藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158146_comment'></div>代天之工，咸罔登年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158146_comment'></div>穆穆燕王，太宗所爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158146_comment'></div>真宗则之，宠锡光大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158146_comment'></div>上曰叔父，属尊以亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158146_comment'></div>不名不趋，剑履振振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158146_comment'></div>王最寿耆，夹辅显承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158146_comment'></div>道具美完，纤訾不兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158146_comment'></div>癸亥之冬，冰介木披。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158146_comment'></div>楚陈尤甚，祲氛前知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158146_comment'></div>困而遗忠，神不夺守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158146_comment'></div>勉训诸子，表贷医咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158146_comment'></div>上命中人，悉取其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158146_comment'></div>或笔或书，分藏石渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158146_comment'></div>厥仗央央，刻章炜炜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158146_comment'></div>诏从俭葬，俾显王美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158146_comment'></div>永熙西原，桥梓后先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158146_comment'></div>既利既安，以佑来昆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_97_1158146_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年3月12日</a>　三月十二日，在京为翰林学士，与王拱辰等共同上言贡举条制事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　春，在京为翰林学士，受诏为赵从郁作墓志铭。作品：皇从侄全州观察使追封新兴侯墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158147' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158147' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇从侄全州观察使追封新兴侯墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158147")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158147_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158147'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158147'>侯讳从郁，字仲文，昭信军节度使、英国公惟宪之子，母曰莒国和夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158147_comment'></div>英公之祢曰潭王德芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158147_comment'></div>自潭而上，昭穆严尊，玉牒史官书之，故不著，独著侯事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158147_comment'></div>侯幼悟警，有志行，群居而自修，佚安而不流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158147_comment'></div>既就傅，务学尤力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158147_comment'></div>临虞世南隶楷绝工，射能命中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158147_comment'></div>景祐中，悉召宗室观书太清楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158147_comment'></div>诏侯赋诗，应旨辄上，帝称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158147_comment'></div>他日，有诏褒美，辇下荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158147_comment'></div>于庆历元年夏六月遘疾，薨于第，享年四十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158147_comment'></div>上为废朝，敕中贵人护葬，所以赗含追恤之良厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158147_comment'></div>留窆普济禅坊，卜兆之未从，且言怀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158147_comment'></div>侯仕始右班殿直，十迁至左屯卫大将军，文州刺史，爵阶勋邑称是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158147_comment'></div>配曰夫人河东薛氏，封丹阳郡君，甚宜其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158147_comment'></div>六男子：世奕，太子右卫率府率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158147_comment'></div>世褒，故太子右司御率府率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158147_comment'></div>世将，太子右监门率府副率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158147_comment'></div>世秩，故太子右内率府副率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158147_comment'></div>世觐，太子右内率府副率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158147_comment'></div>幼未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158147_comment'></div>诸子皆孝谨以肥家，则侯之垂裕当有以致之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158147_comment'></div>岁直涒滩，始诏鸿胪启殡，即河南永安之先茔，月舍己巳，日舍癸卯，克葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158147_comment'></div>赠全州观察使、新兴侯，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158147_comment'></div>昔诗人之称文王，其辞曰：「文王孙子，本支百世」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158147_comment'></div>我祖宗受命而帝，德溥流长，过文王远甚，而其支胄蕃衍，虽千万世尚无有底止，则文字之传，可以已乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158147_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1158147'>帝孙之子，焘我丕祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158147_comment'></div>嗣而承者，何千万祀！</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1158147_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　春，在京为翰林学士，受诏为赵世昌夫人钱氏作墓志铭。作品：皇侄孙右卫率府率夫人钱氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158166' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158166' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158166?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇侄孙右卫率府率夫人钱氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158166")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158166'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158166'>夫人姓钱氏，系出彭城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158166_comment'></div>曾祖讳延正，以武力奋为左金吾卫将军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158166_comment'></div>祖讳守荣，以谨敏进，终内园使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158166_comment'></div>考讳允德，材裕世济，止内殿崇班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158166_comment'></div>庆祥下钟，为令男，为贤女，果不诬已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158166_comment'></div>惟夫人生而恂淑，幼而纯静，德容充裕，内亲党间推之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158166_comment'></div>善女工剪制之事，颇留心毫翰，洞晓音律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158166_comment'></div>繇门阀之懿，预藩房之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158166_comment'></div>景祐丙子仲秋，归于率府世昌，即吴懿王之曾孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158166_comment'></div>入对中禁，锡以冠帔，以藩戚信厚而永其辅佐，以族系高显而承其祭祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158166_comment'></div>家道甚肥，闺范甚修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158166_comment'></div>使率府有令誉绰绰公族间，抑夫人之助欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158166_comment'></div>庆历元年十二月十三日感疾而终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158166_comment'></div>一男曰令襄，太子右率府副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158166_comment'></div>在涒滩孟夏癸卯，葬于河南府永安茔，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158166_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158166_comment'></div>夫人始于髫稚，忘慢戏之容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158166_comment'></div>逮于笄总，致雍和之美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158166_comment'></div>归于邸第，杜骄盈之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158166_comment'></div>以夫人之淑范，不可以不识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158166_comment'></div>是以追琢介石，纳诸圹云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158166_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1158166'>于穆夫人，令仪温温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158166_comment'></div>嫔于密戚，生此德门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158166_comment'></div>履道以谦，处贵以约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158166_comment'></div>远叹藏丹，靡闻勿乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158166_comment'></div>楚挽酸咽，虞歌涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158166_comment'></div>脩短奄忽，逝者如斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158166_comment'></div>崇冈美槚，厚窆幽泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158166_comment'></div>淑柔之誉，垂厥永年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1158166_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　春，在京为翰林学士，受诏为赵克己作墓志铭。作品：防御使进封饶阳侯墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158148' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158148' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158148?labeling=true' target='_blank'>防御使进封饶阳侯墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158148")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158148_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158148'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158148'>今上景祐初，念雅乐犹缺，诏太常考钟石之县，质同律之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158148_comment'></div>时群臣多不能晓，或妄以纵黍累尺，改定均度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158148_comment'></div>上依违未决，乃自谱正声，付授乐家，益召知音者以备顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158148_comment'></div>于是左千牛卫大将军克己字安仁，以宗室子名知音，上遣使即其家，俾制黄钟大曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158148_comment'></div>将军疏牍论次，成不淹晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158148_comment'></div>使者还奏，大蒙赏叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158148_comment'></div>又进别曲十馀解，往往流布乐府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158148_comment'></div>将军自为儿时，已能言五音十二管、夫妇上下相生之法、君臣清浊之差，汪洋闳衍，支脉连著，皆有所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158148_comment'></div>绘为《律吕图》奏御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158148_comment'></div>其心解神悟，殆天性然者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158148_comment'></div>习羲之草、世南隶楷，尤工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158148_comment'></div>会天子族宴，酒中被诏，试虞楷并有所赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158148_comment'></div>将军既感千载之逢，矜稽古之习，援笔足言，烂然盈幅，上益嘉之，厚以金帛为赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158148_comment'></div>尝第所自为诗三百篇，行于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158148_comment'></div>他日寝疾，内夫人传旨抚存，将军以宠待异等，顿首泣谢曰：「臣死不恨」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158148_comment'></div>遂殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158148_comment'></div>天子辍朝嗟悼，赠深州防御使，进封饶阳侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158148_comment'></div>自歛讫殡，无虑所须，一从官给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158148_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158148_comment'></div>终之令而哀之荣，谓将军也欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158148_comment'></div>显考讳承寿，均州防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158148_comment'></div>祖考讳德恭，高密郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158148_comment'></div>郡王之祢，则秦悼王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158148_comment'></div>焘后隤祉，源长而根殖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158148_comment'></div>夫人长宁县君武氏，生三子：叔诏、叔旷，并太子右监门率府副率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158148_comment'></div>叔褒，太子右内率府副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158148_comment'></div>庆历四年，既克葬燕王，凡诸下之未兆者，皆举从之，别遣内常侍将柳而南，如汝州之梁县，叙安于茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158148_comment'></div>史臣被诏刻石著将军之行，宜无愧辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158148_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1158148'>性也重厚，不声以色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158148_comment'></div>服也儒术，惟敏而力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158148_comment'></div>仕由廷臣，七迁厥官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158148_comment'></div>阶崇爵显，勋峻户蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158148_comment'></div>谓仁必寿，胡不我信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158148_comment'></div>侯年四十，嗒然委顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158148_comment'></div>孟夏癸卯，克葬我侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158148_comment'></div>息焉于此，运往名留。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1158148_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　春，在京为翰林学士，受诏为赵承睦作墓志铭。作品：皇从兄赠虔州观察使墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158149' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158149' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158149?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇从兄赠虔州观察使墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158149")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158149_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158149'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158149'>秦悼王之穆曰广陵郡王，王之合曰南阳郡君张夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158149_comment'></div>有子八房，嫡房曰赠虔州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158149_comment'></div>曾祢不书，尊帝也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158149_comment'></div>王讳不书，著也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158149_comment'></div>公名承睦，以皇根之茂，天跗之华，芳酣烈饪，遂用蕃衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158149_comment'></div>直质而不跲，逊志而自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158149_comment'></div>斤斤奉法，日以饬厉，守贵而无骄色，处乐而无流心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158149_comment'></div>自右侍禁践八官而至左领军、彭州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158149_comment'></div>朝家厚宗室，悉留京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158149_comment'></div>虽疏爵而王，列藩而侯，揭节而使，佩印而相，未有就国而操事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158149_comment'></div>不就国，则亲亲之谊戚而弗疏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158149_comment'></div>不操事，则优优之禄肆而弗畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158149_comment'></div>有如公高冠大带，朝殿戺之下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158149_comment'></div>量币黄流，祀家寝之庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158149_comment'></div>资忠移孝，靡有罪悔，奚其为政而后为之功业哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158149_comment'></div>命之弗谌，享年四十有八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158149_comment'></div>天子辍朝，行临吊之礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158149_comment'></div>中人奉诏，护丧窆之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158149_comment'></div>出中帑以襚之，廞廉车以饰之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158149_comment'></div>棺于寝阶，殡于兰若，须时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158149_comment'></div>后三年，岁直甲申，分遣使者启菆柩，卜夏四月癸卯，还葬汝州之梁县，以夫人陇西郡君董氏祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158149_comment'></div>男六人：克顺、克戒，太子右卫率府率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158149_comment'></div>克协、克凝、克伸，右监门卫率府副率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158149_comment'></div>克橐，右内率府副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158149_comment'></div>有诏史臣铭其圹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158149_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1158149'>郁郁芊芊，惟汝阳兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158149_comment'></div>若斧若堂，从家王兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158149_comment'></div>子也承祀，其代昌兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1158149_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　春，在京为翰林学士，受诏为赵宗立夫人李氏作墓志铭。作品：南阳郡君李氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南阳郡君李氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158169")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158169'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158169'>夫人姓李氏，系出陇西太子右赞善大夫惟良之女，武胜军节度使英国公至之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158169_comment'></div>丛光累祥，克诞令淑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158169_comment'></div>家人𣉞厉之法，女功织纴之事，耳濡目染，有如天成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158169_comment'></div>既笄，今左千牛卫大将军宗立委禽焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158169_comment'></div>二姓缀欢，三商有行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158169_comment'></div>于是奉烝尝焉以恭，接姆姒焉以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158169_comment'></div>《鸤鸠》一其仁，《采蘩》谨其职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158169_comment'></div>以将军之贵，诏拜南阳郡君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158169_comment'></div>方赋脂田，膺象服，饰鱼轩之华佶，照玉珈之煌煌，降疾无瘳，享年三十有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158169_comment'></div>以庆历三年七月，殡奉先僧舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158169_comment'></div>明年夏四月，鸿胪奉诏，将柩而西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158169_comment'></div>癸卯，克葬河南永安之西原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158169_comment'></div>子四人：仲舒、仲琳、仲畹、仲偲，并太子右内率府副率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158169_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158169_comment'></div>老宜偕而将军悼之，慈可恃而率府丧之，天之弗庸，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158169_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1158169'>永熙西园图厥域，史臣作铭镂幽石，魂兮有知此惟宅。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1158169_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年7月7日</a>　七月七日，在京为翰林学士，受命为南郊大礼卤簿使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年8月6日</a>　八月六日，在京为翰林学士，与丁度等共同上言答契丹来书事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年9月12日</a>　九月十二日，在京为翰林学士，作晏殊罢相诏，使其免深谴。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年9月</a>　九月，在京为翰林学士，作《议西人劄子》作品：议西人劄子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二九。温谱系此文于庆历三年，此据文中史实改。）</span><div id='poem_1157290' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157290' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157290?labeling=true' target='_blank'>议西人劄子<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历四年九月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157290")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157290_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157290'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157290'>臣伏见赵元昊遣使进纳誓书，西人在馆，以待答报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157290_comment'></div>伏知朝廷议欲降诏，遂相开纳，止留册命，未便举行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157290_comment'></div>又闻俞青使回，北庭谓本朝若必行元昊封册，勿令使命深入，恐契丹兵马一例杀伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157290_comment'></div>又其答书有俟平定西鄙，遣人来报之意，此皆含糊未决之辞，包奸蓄怨之语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157290_comment'></div>臣愚不敏，不知大计，窃谓机危之会，理须审思，事脱一失，悔将难救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157290_comment'></div>且西、北二敌，连兵搆难，中国之利也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157290_comment'></div>方当整勒兵马，阴拱高视，候其大伤小亡，乃可以逞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157290_comment'></div>今若便许元昊同其誓文，则二国要约固已先定，不待封册方正君臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157290_comment'></div>如此，则元昊之贡献必且续至，朝廷之金币亦便颁分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157290_comment'></div>假使北敌能胜西，则契丹必归曲朝廷，以为抚彼叛臣，逆其来信，负力悖慢，势必称兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157290_comment'></div>而元昊得朝廷誓诏，必且取重外鄙，市怨耶律，肆其狡狯，因为间谍，得我金币，以救败亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157290_comment'></div>是乃纾敌祸于一时，嫁外怨于中国矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157290_comment'></div>使西能胜北，则二敌之怨必深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157290_comment'></div>契丹士力更当雠赛，则朝廷却与元昊欢盟厚赂，安得不动敌情哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157290_comment'></div>契丹之怨朝廷益深，则元昊之结朝廷益固者，非谓与我为金石交也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157290_comment'></div>彼藉我之贿，假我之援，全境激敌，以誓劫我，使吾边戍束手瞪目，熟视流散，不得侵略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157290_comment'></div>然后首鼠窟穴，养成豺虎，斯其谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157290_comment'></div>臣又料契丹未能得志于元昊，先且取偿于河北，避强击弱，有何不可？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157290_comment'></div>是朝廷免西鄙之小衄，结北方之巨衅，轻重之择，安得不怀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157290_comment'></div>且契丹言恐一例杀伤，又云俟平定西鄙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157290_comment'></div>此何等语，朝廷忽而不计耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157290_comment'></div>臣伏见元昊誓书中，要结天地，誓及子孙，言虽夸险，势亦窘急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157290_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157290_comment'></div>彼盖迫契丹之用兵，畏我境之乘便，略其边寨，取其老小，重以诅誓，务在速成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157290_comment'></div>必知朝廷已赐开许，不肯先违信誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157290_comment'></div>则彼一心捍北，永无东顾之虞，此贼昊之计，事在目前，确然可辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157290_comment'></div>臣以为当今计者，不如且遣彼使，赐以存问诏书，诘难誓文，更令修正，迁延来往，以赊后期，兼令雄州腾报北帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157290_comment'></div>俟其雄雌之决，更议拒纳之宜，抚西怀北，两得其便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157290_comment'></div>伏望略回圣虑，一赐裁择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157290_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1157290_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　秋，在京为翰林学士，为胡铣作墓志铭。作品：胡府君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158165?labeling=true' target='_blank'>胡府君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158165")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158165'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158165'>予友安定胡昕，以诚信克葬其考妣，及状行与世，使来请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158165_comment'></div>噫，孝乎哉，加于人一等矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158165_comment'></div>且予视府君，丈人行也，故不得辞而铭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158165_comment'></div>予为儿时，从先公牛马走，及见，与府君游甚勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158165_comment'></div>居常衔杯酒，语仁义，訾品贤不肖，道诗书前言，生民病利，衮衮纚纚然，皆可覆记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158165_comment'></div>府君魁岸人也，进退安重，颇乐易，善谈笑，视襮如表，和气溢焉，发于眉宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158165_comment'></div>临政敏锐，如庖操刀，虽髋髀大軱，迎击则断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158165_comment'></div>少通《阳秋》三家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158165_comment'></div>及既第，七调吏部铨，自县尉止节度府判官，所至常用风绩闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158165_comment'></div>佐真定时，群囚结大辟，府君适从外还，擿其冤，寻与府中执争，已而果不死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158165_comment'></div>寇丞相莱公、张丞相邓公数称其材，按部使者见之必加礼，退必任其能，言于朝，然卒不得践丹涂，泽鱼班，近天子之光，老为诸侯上介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158165_comment'></div>传曰：「乐只君子，福禄申之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158165_comment'></div>如府君可谓君子者，非其福禄不申耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158165_comment'></div>昕为光禄寺丞、开府兵曹参军，余之女弟实归之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158165_comment'></div>抱瑜袭瑾，有待而发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158165_comment'></div>子三人：仲弓、叔伦、季康，皆粹秀韶警，鸾雏骥子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158165_comment'></div>盖府君之德，其收报者在子若孙欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158165_comment'></div>初，瀛洲府君既倦游，居无定贯，故三代未葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158165_comment'></div>昕也奔问诸卜，得汝州郏城县钧台乡之原最吉，又卜甲申岁秋九月庚申亦最吉，则自曾门而下，穴位有差，终前人之志，举三夫人合于府君之墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158165_comment'></div>予辱于府君游旧矣，其才且劭，得周知之，故铭于埏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158165_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1158165'>可必者我，不必者天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158165_comment'></div>志与运违，固有以然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158165_comment'></div>没于己巳，葬于甲申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158165_comment'></div>有穆有昭，相望于原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158165_comment'></div>吁嗟若人，裕后以仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158165_comment'></div>孝子令孙，祀以永存。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1158165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　秋，在京为翰林学士，为王拱辰之母李氏作墓志铭。作品：陇西郡君李氏墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158167?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陇西郡君李氏墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158167")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158167_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158167'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158167'>庆历元年，翰林学士太原王拱辰以著令白于朝，得陇西郡追君其母李氏夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158167_comment'></div>明年，以丙寅制书，改陈留郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158167_comment'></div>又明年，翰林授右谏议大夫、权御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158167_comment'></div>岁次甲申，卜兆于开封府尉氏县蒋成乡之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158167_comment'></div>秋九月庚申，奉夫人柩，合诸王考赠尚书兵部员外郎府君之葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158167_comment'></div>李氏自成纪来山东，世牒湮放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158167_comment'></div>夫人之先，更为开封府陈留人，数世隐居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158167_comment'></div>母曰时夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158167_comment'></div>夫人性静淑不媢刻，德肖行严，举有仪矱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158167_comment'></div>事时夫人也，以孝称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158167_comment'></div>归兵部也，以顺称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158167_comment'></div>兵部故大家，尊章姻娅数十姓，庆恤馈饷，岁时无虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158167_comment'></div>夫人以恩意接之，亲疏咸有节适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158167_comment'></div>皆喜曰：「妇当得此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158167_comment'></div>春秋烝荐，必自执其劳，肴洁于筵，酒香于罍，礼以顺迪，无神恫戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158167_comment'></div>兵部晚节官不进，赀产益空，夫人谨视用度，均一甘苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158167_comment'></div>兵部以清白闻，由是待夫人始终如宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158167_comment'></div>授诸子《孝经》、古诗、方田之数，逮其就学，皆未劳而习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158167_comment'></div>教诸妇以箴帨盥总觿甲之事，俾之居室皆弗违而婉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158167_comment'></div>少悟佛谛，多薰祓诵经，率一月常十斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158167_comment'></div>前夫人赵氏，有一女，夫人咻爱等己生，至女不自意为前夫人子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158167_comment'></div>生十男二女，中丞即第八子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158167_comment'></div>天圣八年，与多士试于廷，天子擢为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158167_comment'></div>于是搢绅之言荣且庆者，举归夫人，或祭酒祝延为夫人寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158167_comment'></div>方将裂脂田，贲褕章，盛茵鼎之养，偕山河之老，子堂侍寿母，妇阃庇贤姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158167_comment'></div>九年，遘疾不瘳，寿止五十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158167_comment'></div>后二年，兵部又即世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158167_comment'></div>中丞既毕丧，则自书殿入词垣，跻玉堂，数进见言天下事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158167_comment'></div>幅臆感慨，朝咨其忠，议可计行，其道光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158167_comment'></div>诸昆踵仕，緌缨交照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158167_comment'></div>然而其心怵焉悼报之弗逮，终天之亟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158167_comment'></div>惟斯文叙实，可图不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158167_comment'></div>中丞乃泣状先懿，授予为铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158167_comment'></div>前此欧阳永叔识兵部之埏，其言世德备矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158167_comment'></div>故予叙夫人内也略，而行也详，所以申足其辞，以慰棘心霜露之欷云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158167_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1158167'>谁如夫人，有子皆才兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158167_comment'></div>谁如中丞，方显而养兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158167_comment'></div>吾亲不待，钟于永怀兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158167_comment'></div>大郡疏封，上施窀壤兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158167_comment'></div>蓬池之西，隧而及泉兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158167_comment'></div>双灵同穴，安斯万年兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1158167_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年11月</a>　十一月，在京为翰林学士，与王拱辰等劾奏王益柔。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年11月</a>　十一月，在京为翰林学士，参加圜丘大典，有诗上宋仁宗。作品：享庙禋郊诗二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_105633' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105633' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105633?labeling=true' target='_blank'>享庙禋郊诗享庙八韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105633")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105633_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105633'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105633'>左庙崇清烈，前郊赴享期。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105633'>瞻言七世室，并荐一元祠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105633'>乐变摐金备，天行步玉迟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105633'>香茅均奠鬯，锦册不惭辞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105633'>有诏回宸辇，他宫奉母仪。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105633'>衣冠对游月，脂泽感平时。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105633'>俟献庭虚次，登歌拜受禧。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105633'>大哉王者孝，万叶焕烝彝。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105633'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_105633_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_105633'><span class='label'>注：</span>右臣昨以摄职奉常，对相大赉，自斋帏之出宿，属纷雪之糅空。盖百神来臻，将受其职，故九旻凝晦，用显厥灵。洎大辂启行，阴云解駮，辙无纤𡏖，道有微津，天日交华，室家胥庆。而又皇帝陛下虚次清庙，尽孝思之恪，彻褥上坛，极尊奉之意。六成备奏，三献有仪。寒飙戢吹，朔气停凛。美光充于四极，喜气洽于万情。此盖圣德升闻，灵鉴垂答。黍稷之馨非至，天人之际遂交。臣亲觌善祥，敢忘咏叹。谨斋祓撰成《享庙》、《禋郊》五言诗各一章，一章八韵，一章十韵。干冒宸严，无任省循荒斐战慄屏营之至。谨随状通进以闻。谨奏。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_105633_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_105634' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105634' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105634?labeling=true' target='_blank'>享庙禋郊诗禋郊十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105634")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105634_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105634'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105634'>大驾峨千乘，长涂过百廛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105634'>尘清属车地，雪尽幔城天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105634'>步辇黎明降，华灯艾夜燃。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105634'>升琮奠黄粹，荐璧捧苍圆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105634'>牲俎群灵匝，霞觞二祖联。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105634'>上垓皆彻藉，小次但虚褰。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
