id='poem_sentence_6_105634'>不见纤萝动，惟闻杂佩旋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105634'>回云终乐奏，熏月上柴烟。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105634'>日至方流庆，崧呼节献年。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105634'>欲知釐事毕，鸡赦出楼前。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105634_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105634'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_105634_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　本年，在京为翰林学士，由知审刑院兼翰林侍读学士，有谢表。作品：谢兼侍读学士表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157380' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157380' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157380?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢兼侍读学士表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157380")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157380_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157380'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157380'>臣某言：伏奉今月十一日制命，授臣兼侍读学士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157380_comment'></div>命由中发，职匪次加，揆宠自循，无颜容愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157380_comment'></div>窃念臣天赋愚朴，地托羁单。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157380_comment'></div>去岁中收还郡符，引内自禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157380_comment'></div>以多病之后，乘早衰之馀，昏眸眩于临文，倦舌呿于论事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157380_comment'></div>而尧章焕日，汉律丕天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157380_comment'></div>形过照而自穷，驭已驹而必蹶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157380_comment'></div>方将免冠顿首，自劾旷僚，托迹尘缨，复从冗职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157380_comment'></div>何言大度，并赦弗闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157380_comment'></div>遂令散木之流，获预复门之秘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157380_comment'></div>恭惟上德稽古，至圣多能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157380_comment'></div>当决事之少閒，托不明而访逮，尤须练达，上副咨询，讵容孤生，遽谬高选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157380_comment'></div>何以披文玉版，擿句清厢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157380_comment'></div>觇师尚父之书，尊其为道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157380_comment'></div>观太史氏之策，知所以王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157380_comment'></div>匪曰值才，居然过听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157380_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下爱同刍狗，冒若阳膏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157380_comment'></div>方诡效于寸长，不殚能于再割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157380_comment'></div>遂令鲰质，进尔清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157380_comment'></div>誓且窥管于天，自涔而海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157380_comment'></div>渐识三坟之大，稍知二首之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157380_comment'></div>俾免多言，是酬洪造。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1157380'></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1157380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157380'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按本传：祁徙审官院兼侍读学士。表内云『自去岁收还郡符』，是时当为庆历四年。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157380_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　本年，在京为翰林学士、知审刑院，有奏状。作品：审刑院断绝公案奏状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157304?labeling=true' target='_blank'>审刑院断绝公案奏状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157304")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157304'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157304'>右，臣据大理寺状申日奏司，今月日以前送下公案，并已断奏讫，无见在者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157304_comment'></div>舜刑惟恤，汉谳号平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157304_comment'></div>属九夏之清和，讫四方之论报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157304_comment'></div>至仁丕洽，中典著闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157304_comment'></div>允非甚盛之期，畴臻几措之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157304_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下，烛知治总，懋建民彝，受支日之奏封，谨斋居之阅实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157304_comment'></div>轸人命之重，容有不经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157304_comment'></div>诏天下之平，许从中覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157304_comment'></div>至于法防素具，吏禁易遵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157304_comment'></div>示以简孚之严，窒其旁缘之隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157304_comment'></div>懿条交举，庶狱寖希。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157304_comment'></div>甫当时燠之初，靡馀决事之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157304_comment'></div>画冠斯格，本上德之好生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157304_comment'></div>丹笔屡停，顾攸司之何力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157304_comment'></div>臣误膺审克，祗觌熙隆，愿咨系月之文，备著约章之简，聿光在宥，永照方来。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1157304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　约于本年，在京为翰林学士，上《乞知州转运使三年理一任劄子》作品：乞知州转运使三年理一任劄子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1157274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞知州转运使三年理一任劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157274")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157274'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157274'>臣伏见比来知州、转运使，未曾在任得满三年，民间利害，及簿书文移未知次第，却已迁换。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157274_comment'></div>迎新送故，上下告劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157274_comment'></div>臣不知朝廷设官欲为理耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157274_comment'></div>如不为理，臣故无可言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157274_comment'></div>若欲为理，安得用此敝法，守而不改？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157274_comment'></div>今审官院差遣不行，便奏请京朝官，情愿二年一替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157274_comment'></div>且差遣得行，一司之暂利也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157274_comment'></div>迁换不定，天下之大害也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157274_comment'></div>故败国家大计，使吏奸得行，生民无告，无出于长吏数易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157274_comment'></div>臣愚以为方用兵时，财用调度多出于民，知州、转运使不得人，不能集事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157274_comment'></div>伏望普令台省近臣举知州、转运使五人，转运使知州三人有材干者<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上或已在任，亦许就举充数。）</span>，理三周年为一任<span class='inlineComment2'>（不得只理三十个月。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157274_comment'></div>每岁转运使索取知州功过，并自具功过，申尚书考功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157274_comment'></div>考功逐旋闻奏，请别近臣为考课，使精加考较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157274_comment'></div>若三考俱优，改一官，知州升大州，转运使升上路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157274_comment'></div>三考俱劣，黜一官，知州降小州，转运使降下路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157274_comment'></div>二优一劣，改一官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157274_comment'></div>二劣一优，夺半年俸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157274_comment'></div>大约以此为率<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157274_comment'></div>其提点刑狱使者、通判，并比类此年考，只令中书门下及审官院拣选充职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157274_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1157274_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157274'><span class='label'>按：</span>如何施行，其优劣格，臣乞差官颁下。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_17_1157274_0'>⑴ 以上赏罚，并举主同坐，减一等。举主得以数人赏罚相除。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1157274_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　约于本年，在京为翰林学士，上《乞修复陂塘古迹劄子》作品：乞修复陂塘古迹劄子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1157276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞修复陂塘古迹劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157276")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157276'>臣伏见边鄙用兵以来，所急者莫急于食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157276_comment'></div>食者出于力农，而国家未尝留心于农事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157276_comment'></div>天下郡县虽有陂湖塘堰，例不修营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157276_comment'></div>转运使、知州、通判，但带劝农之名，略无其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157276_comment'></div>及知州、通判、令佐结衔兼堤堰沟洫，习以为常，亦不复知是何等语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157276_comment'></div>是以农困食艰，通天下计之，常无一年之蓄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157276_comment'></div>且天下无一年之蓄，古语以为国非其国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157276_comment'></div>况今大兵在外，水旱难调，脱若灾俭相仍，臣知国用尽于军兴，则力耕之人饿死不救，羸老委沟壑，少壮为盗贼，贻患国家，非细事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157276_comment'></div>臣欲望朝旨专下转运使、知州、通判、令佐等，严行晓告，使于部内各按求陂塘古迹，可以利民救患者，并令修复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157276_comment'></div>量率夫力，限日计功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157276_comment'></div>如能不扰村乡，久远利济，并与理为劳绩，优加酬赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157276_comment'></div>若因此取受，骚扰农人，所犯一疋以上，乞追官勒停；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157276_comment'></div>十疋以上，仍除名，终身禁锢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157276_comment'></div>以上如可施行，乞详定条禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157276_comment'></div>又条制旧有五户各一保，宜申明此条，令力农之家，五家相保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157276_comment'></div>其中如有惰丁游手，不事桑柘，不勤五谷，田畴荒閒者，并许本保申举，官司明行科罚，迁配远州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157276_comment'></div>其勤劝农业者，国家每一二年略行优恤，或少放正税分数，或免户下差科月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157276_comment'></div>自然人务农业，国计必充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157276_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157276_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月</a>　二月十一日，在京为翰林学士，上言开封府沟洫事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月11日</a>　二月十一日，在京罢翰林学士，为翰林侍读学士，兼龙图阁学士，有谢表。作品：授龙图阁谢恩表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授龙图阁谢恩表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月11日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157381")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157381'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157381'>臣某言：伏奉制命，蒙恩特授臣兼龙图阁学士者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157381_comment'></div>停直复门，徙恩层阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157381_comment'></div>本缘亲而自乞，蒙引籍以对除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157381_comment'></div>揆宠兼常，无颜容愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157381_comment'></div>窃惟先圣有作，丛构实兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157381_comment'></div>郁律辰居之严，襞积雾图之广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157381_comment'></div>踵华创职，称是取材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157381_comment'></div>肇允荣涂，何尝轻授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157381_comment'></div>伏念臣识局庸浅，术学<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1157381", 1157381, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>肤孱</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157381_comment'></div>入忝玉堂，间陪讲殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157381_comment'></div>徒以朴忠无饰，孤耿自将，附湜湜于泾清，守嘐嘐于雨晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157381_comment'></div>赖天焘煦，旷日保全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157381_comment'></div>适以臣兄庠召自外藩，复参大政，理所宜避，地不处嫌，稽首请间，素言叙恳，丐上还于禁籍，得专侍于经帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157381_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下见谓由衷，特从换秩，罢兹要近，处以清閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157381_comment'></div>拂佁儗之尘容，荫蟺蜎之宝宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157381_comment'></div>伏况臣出入三岁，便蕃五迁，四叨学士之名，罕见从官之比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157381_comment'></div>虽素领焦秃，病干尪癯，器极斗筲之容，利止铅刀之割，尚当勉懦为立，续短俾长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157381_comment'></div>倘有补于涓铢，矢不忘于陨踣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1157381_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年5月</a>　五月，在京为翰林侍读学士，充《唐书》刊修官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年9月9日</a>　九月九日，在京为翰林侍读学士，侍宴太清楼，受诏作诗。作品：九日侍宴太清楼。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_105585' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105585' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105585?labeling=true' target='_blank'>九日侍宴太清楼</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105585")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105585_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105585'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105585'>荐九标佳节，中天驻翠舆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105585'>晨光清复道，秋色遍储胥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105585'>畦稻霜成后，宫橙露饱初。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105585'>省收行步玉，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_105585", 105585, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>拜赐</span>俨华裾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105585'>曼衍来长乐，鸱夷下属车。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105585'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_105585", 105585, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>帝韶</span>仪瑞鶠，王藻跃恩鱼。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105585'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_105585", 105585, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>霁雾</span>供披拂，凉风助扫除。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105585'>高杨穿叶外，仙菊泛花馀。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105585'>寒入弓声厉，欢留<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_105585", 105585, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>酒算</span>徐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105585'>神池原不浪，温树未曾疏。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105585'>帝眷凭秋稼，臣心仰夏渠。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105585'>承平将乐事，并入史臣书。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105585_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105585'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_105585_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年10月</a>　十月，在京为翰林侍读学士，为契丹馆伴使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年10月</a>　十月，在京为翰林侍读学士，从宋仁宗驾狩近郊，有诗。作品：孟冬驾狩近郊。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_105828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孟冬驾狩近郊</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105828")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105828_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_105828'>臣伏睹今月十七日幸杨村打围，皇帝亲射獐兔甚多，至未刻还宫者。岁始孟冬，驾云行狩，除地近县，先置迥场。诏七萃以景从，按六龙而行健。皇帝陛下躬御武节，俯从前禽，两骖亟驰，一发如破。兽人给鲜之不暇，君庖课获以既盈。幔省中休，衢尊遍锡。取不殚物，姑荐宗庙之新；民傒其来，喜见羽旄之美。入而振旅，日未靡旃。臣猥挈荷囊，预从豹乘，亲逢盛事，难默悴音。谨撰成皇帝狩近郊诗一章五言二十韵，缮写随状上进。轻浼呈览，伏用震惶。</div><div id='poem_preface_105828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105828'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105828'>讲事当农隙，于畋法健行。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105828'>百神奔汉跸，万骑扈轩营。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105828'>彍弩先驱肃，彫戈后队明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105828'>云罗垂列岳，虎落压裨瀛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105828'>掠野毛群萃，搜林羽族并。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105828'>熊罴兆中见，鹅鹳阵前程。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105828'>叠中星弧妙，连飞月箭轻。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105828'>雁穷书并坠，兔尽窟兼平。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105828'>俊鹘交拳击，寒鹰厉吻鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105828'>舞骖均耳耳，鋂犬斗令令。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105828'>示祝仍开网，招虞不用旌。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105828'>才闻大緌下，已见护车盈。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105828'>行在移銮仗，中涂集幔城。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105828'>寿觞称帝酒，恩膳遍君羹。<div id='poem_sentence_13_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_105828'>雾日曈昽暖，霜原澶漫清。<div id='poem_sentence_14_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_105828'>长杨卷衰叶，敦苇拉枯茎。<div id='poem_sentence_15_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_105828'>羽猎何烦讽，车攻遂合赓。<div id='poem_sentence_16_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_105828'>宁专乾豆荐，要阅建章兵。<div id='poem_sentence_17_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_105828'>风入旂常影，天含鼓吹声。<div id='poem_sentence_18_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_105828'>九街犹未晚，尧屋已还衡。<div id='poem_sentence_19_105828_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_105828'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_105828_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年10月</a>　十月，在京为翰林侍读学士，作《缴进升祔庆成诗状》作品：缴进升祔庆成诗状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>缴进升祔庆成诗状<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157295")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157295'>右，臣等伏见今月九日，章献明肃皇后、章懿皇后升祔真宗庙室礼毕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157295_comment'></div>懿烈顺跻，庆仪交展，恩流即日，欢怿县区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157295_comment'></div>忝惟皇帝陛下凝命宅中，协华稽古，虽诞敷于一德，常有怀于二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157295_comment'></div>向者閟寝别祠，翠华躬谒，依违累岁，博徇群臣之谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157295_comment'></div>稽合灵心，用举先朝之旧，制书前降，典册嗣宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157295_comment'></div>遂自仪坤之廷，并升清庙之祏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157295_comment'></div>缘情得礼，因孝示人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157295_comment'></div>回旷荡之洪私，显劬劳之永报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157295_comment'></div>鉴奁易具，交深顾复之思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157295_comment'></div>牲俎荐芬，足慰蒸尝之感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157295_comment'></div>臣等共尘法从，参摄事经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157295_comment'></div>仰钦陟侑之仪，难默揄扬之素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157295_comment'></div>谨各撰成升祔庆成诗一章，缮写别封上进，干冒宸览，无任省循愧汗之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1157295_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年11月20日</a>　十一月，在京为翰林侍读学士，受命与张方平再修《景祐广乐记》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年12月30日</a>　十二月三十日，在京为翰林侍读学士，有诗。作品：除夕作。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_104642' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104642' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104642?labeling=true' target='_blank'>除夕作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年12月30日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104642")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_104642_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104642'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104642'>四十九年今日到，来欢往戚是欤非。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104642'>床头周易有深意，自此恐须三绝韦。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104642_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104642'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_104642_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　本年，在京为翰林侍读学士，作《杨太尉行状》作品：杨太尉行状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六一。）</span><div id='poem_1158133' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158133' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158133?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨太尉行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158133")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158133_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158133'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158133'>杨崇勋，字宝臣，年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158133_comment'></div>公之曾高，燕蓟人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158133_comment'></div>家习武经，世封勇爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158133_comment'></div>暨先正令公，事太宗皇帝，亲信甚笃，谨干见称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158133_comment'></div>济美流芳，至公而盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158133_comment'></div>公气貌温伟，志怀沈毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158133_comment'></div>由弱龄而遇主，逮晚节而还政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158133_comment'></div>休有令闻，谱牒存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158133_comment'></div>公年十一，以父故，补东班承旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158133_comment'></div>时真宗皇帝方居潜邸，须忠实聪悟者以充左右，公与李永力同日中选，特赐今讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158133_comment'></div>至道三年三月，太宗上仙，真皇缵极，公授右侍禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158133_comment'></div>咸平元年二月，改西头供奉官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158133_comment'></div>七月，充寄班祗候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158133_comment'></div>三年春，均寇乘间，益部罹患，命公驰传被受公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158133_comment'></div>四年正月，贼平，授内殿崇班、银青光禄大夫、检校国子祭酒、兼御史大夫、骑都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158133_comment'></div>五年，加检校右散骑常侍，封王城县开国男，食邑三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158133_comment'></div>景德元年八月，授供备库副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158133_comment'></div>二年冬，加检校左散骑常侍，进封开国子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158133_comment'></div>十二月，授香药库使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158133_comment'></div>四年春，驾幸西洛，恭款诸陵，命公为行宫四面同巡检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158133_comment'></div>大中祥符元年正月，进封宏农郡开国侯，食邑五百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158133_comment'></div>十二月，升功日观，熙事既成，授东八作使，加食邑三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158133_comment'></div>三年，顺祀蒲中，精禋脽上，回銮卫阙，推恩绵宇，授尚衣库使，差勾当翰林司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158133_comment'></div>六年，天子按跸涡曲，恭款道宗，又命公为行宫四面巡检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158133_comment'></div>七年六月，充群牧都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158133_comment'></div>十二月，授西上閤门使、群牧副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158133_comment'></div>天禧元年二月，旅款群真，对越世庙，严祀云毕，恩章载举，加检校工部尚书、上轻车都尉，食邑三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158133_comment'></div>十月，授依前检校工部尚书、左武卫大将军，使持节恩州诸军事、恩州刺史，充枢密都承旨兼群牧副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158133_comment'></div>寻差提举点检枢密院通进银台司公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158133_comment'></div>且国家设鸿枢银台之司，素称繁鞅，自公之兼干也，日无留事，时称得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158133_comment'></div>三年十二月，授检校刑部尚书、左骁卫大将军、上柱国，食邑三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158133_comment'></div>四年二月，授英州防御使，充侍卫亲军马军都虞候、并代州管内马步军副都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158133_comment'></div>即日改授客省使，依前英州防御使兼群牧副使，勾当三班院、皇城司、兼管勾閤门四方馆公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158133_comment'></div>真宗皇帝初以兵寄之重，无甚并代，公既受帝命，以潜邸心膂之臣，公实一二焉，故左右侍对，必藉其良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158133_comment'></div>即日故有典客之拜，庶令日侍轩陛，用为腹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158133_comment'></div>时今上方正重明之位，实居继照之盛，有皇城司联事者周怀政，窃搆邪党，将危大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158133_comment'></div>阴谋已成，凶言遽露，公尽忠是务，密疏其由，逆竖就擒，禁闱不扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158133_comment'></div>非先帝知公之忠厚，置公于左右，则何以得凶悖彰败，宗社延永！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158133_comment'></div>故奖诏温密，增秩优隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158133_comment'></div>八月，以功授邓州管内观察使、金紫光禄大夫、检校司空、使持节邓州诸军事、邓州刺史，兼御史大夫、上柱国、宏农郡开国公，食邑二千八百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158133_comment'></div>公屡陈让奏，冀寝恩章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158133_comment'></div>寻改桂州观察使，充内客省使，兼群牧使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158133_comment'></div>乾兴元年，加食邑七百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158133_comment'></div>会上出震居尊，庆泽流布，加检校司徒、彰德军节度观察留后，食邑五百户，食实封二百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158133_comment'></div>三月，差知陈州军州兼管内堤堰桥道劝农使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158133_comment'></div>十二月，除殿前都虞候，充真定府、真州等路马步军都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158133_comment'></div>天圣二年二月，敕差权定州军州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158133_comment'></div>二月，召还，授侍卫亲军马军副都指挥使，加食邑五百户，食实封二百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158133_comment'></div>三年十月，授殿前都指挥使、振武军节度、胜州观察处置等使，加食邑七百户，食实封二百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158133_comment'></div>十一月，加食邑五百户，食实封二百户，赐忠果雄勇功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158133_comment'></div>五年十二月，侍祠园丘，回舆广内，加食邑七百户，食实封三百户，加忠果雄勇宣力功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158133_comment'></div>七年九月，加检校太保，充镇南军节度、洪州管内观察处置等使，依旧殿前副都指挥使，加食邑七百户，食实封二百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158133_comment'></div>八年十二月，加食邑七百户，食实封三百户，加忠果雄勇推诚宣力功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158133_comment'></div>十年八月，授宣徽南院使，兼枢密副使、定武军节度、定州管内观察处置等使，加食邑七百户，食实封三百户，改赐推忠协谋同德佐理功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158133_comment'></div>盖公之总禁旅也，前后十稔，军政日新，宸眷弥渥，朝议惟允，乃有是拜，以旌其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158133_comment'></div>是月，命公充修葺大内副使，公督兹大役，曾不愆素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158133_comment'></div>落成之日，赏典遂举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158133_comment'></div>明道元年十一月，授检校太尉、山南东道节度、襄阳管内观察处置等使，依前宣徽南院使兼枢密副使，加食邑七百户，食实封三百户，赐推忠协谋同德守正佐理功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158133_comment'></div>公帘前曲谢，庄献皇太后谕以先帝言：「杨崇勋忠直，堪于大用」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158133_comment'></div>十二月，授枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158133_comment'></div>二年正月，加光禄大夫，食邑一千户，食实封四百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158133_comment'></div>十月，授同中书门下平章事，充河阳三城节度、孟州管内观察处置等使、判陈州军州兼管内堤堰桥道劝农使，加食邑五百户，食实封二百户，赐推诚保德崇仁忠亮翊戴功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158133_comment'></div>景祐元年八月，罢中书门下平章事，依前河阳三城节度使知寿州，以怀政仲弟累陈雪奏故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158133_comment'></div>二年十一月，加特进，食邑七百户，食实封三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158133_comment'></div>十二月，移知亳州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158133_comment'></div>蕃锡之目，倍越常钧，仍给帑金，以增公费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158133_comment'></div>五年四月，移知陈州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158133_comment'></div>时元昊大为边梗，公屡贡囊封，罄陈方略，上以公先朝心膂，多所采纳，以手诏嘉奖，练将之盛，实有力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158133_comment'></div>宝元元年十二月，加开府仪同三司，食邑七百户，食实封三百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158133_comment'></div>庆历元年十二月，加食邑七百户，食实封三百户，赐推诚保德崇仁忠亮守正翊戴功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158133_comment'></div>二年三月，上以夏寇未息，朔人颇骇，敌众恃强，寖违誓约，驿诏归阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158133_comment'></div>召对之日，上曰：「以卿谙练师律，素推威望，付以兵寄，属于老成」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158133_comment'></div>乃授公同中书门下平章事，依前河阳三城节度使，判定州兼真定府定州等路驻泊马步军都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158133_comment'></div>下车之日，朔人聿宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158133_comment'></div>讲练周严，器甲精设，北鄙传闻，族众惊慑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158133_comment'></div>十二月，以诸羌纳款，二边彻警，移判郑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158133_comment'></div>公夙有末疾，艰于起居，因抗疏引年，乞骸归第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158133_comment'></div>上优诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158133_comment'></div>三年五月，授依前检校太尉、左卫上将军致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158133_comment'></div>四年十二月，加食邑七百户，食实封三百户，改太子太保致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158133_comment'></div>以五年闰五月二十四日，疾终于清平坊之私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158133_comment'></div>上闻讣恻悼，亟选中贵人监护葬事，诸孤以公当属纩之辰，有厚葬之戒，由是泣愬，获寝其命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158133_comment'></div>翌日，遣内司宾至第恤问，厚加赙赐，特辍视朝二日，仍赠太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158133_comment'></div>某月某日葬于祥符县邓公乡公家原，祔于先茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158133_comment'></div>公凡三娶，始嫡夫人王氏，次娶夫人姚氏，次娶夫人田氏，皆先公而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158133_comment'></div>男十二人：长宗让，崇仪使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158133_comment'></div>次宗诩，右班殿直，早亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158133_comment'></div>次宗说，閤门通事舍人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158133_comment'></div>次宗诲，内殿承制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158133_comment'></div>次宗识，内殿崇班，早亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158133_comment'></div>次宗谨，内殿崇班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158133_comment'></div>次宗谔，东头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158133_comment'></div>次宗诱，内殿崇班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158133_comment'></div>次宗谊，东头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158133_comment'></div>次宗谏，东头供奉官，早亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158133_comment'></div>次宗诂，东头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158133_comment'></div>次未名而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158133_comment'></div>公凡五加功臣，至推诚保德崇仁忠亮守正翊戴，系阶至开府仪同三司，勋至上柱国，爵至开国公，食邑一万四千二百户，食实封四千五百户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158133_comment'></div>公才谋周远，器识宏敏，生而羁孤，幼而惠悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158133_comment'></div>尝私叹曰：「若目不识字，手不解书，至于成立，何颜自处」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158133_comment'></div>由此励志向学，勤求师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158133_comment'></div>一日，公与张侍中耆辈侍立次，真宗皇帝谓曰：「知汝等好学文字，若能如此，吾当亲为教授」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158133_comment'></div>公等对曰：「实有志矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158133_comment'></div>乃谢于庭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158133_comment'></div>自兹命张侍中为学长，张景宗观察为副学长，公与夏太尉守赟为学察，安团练守中而下为学生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158133_comment'></div>帝授以《孝经》、《论语》、诗赋，又教以虞世南字法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158133_comment'></div>公自此旁通经史，周知韬略，附云龙之会，亲日月之光，备四方之驱策，受四圣之简注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158133_comment'></div>戎夷之纳款也，则七命为馆伴副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158133_comment'></div>郊祀之展寀也，则屡擢为行宫巡检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158133_comment'></div>其或风闻利病，时政阙失，莫不便殿请对，论列移晷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158133_comment'></div>故相国王沂公、吕许公深相器重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158133_comment'></div>公六艺之学，射御尤精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158133_comment'></div>每信使通欢，射圃锡宴，上必命公陪，其引满中的，边庭叹伏，至今称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158133_comment'></div>公秉马政之年，会有上言者，愿以厩驷市取其直，以资国困，宰弼将从其说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158133_comment'></div>公耳闻矣，心画素周，独于当宁之前，语以忘战之理，帝深称赏，其言遂寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158133_comment'></div>其不畏彊御，面折廷诤，率多如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158133_comment'></div>咸平、景德中，敌骑南牧，宸舆北征，常委公传令边帅，协谋御寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158133_comment'></div>公乃戴星将命，间道徒步，达于诸垒，谕以机事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158133_comment'></div>涉兹危阻，人推其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158133_comment'></div>又命公固守澶渊钜梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158133_comment'></div>时朔方之民携老扶幼，昼夜南渡，恐在其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158133_comment'></div>公繇是求善涉者数十辈，预防其溺，乃有坠河流而得拯者，不可胜纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158133_comment'></div>公七岁时，已失岵屺，伯氏抚鞠，而得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158133_comment'></div>无何，腰足中寒，以至不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158133_comment'></div>虽勤询医剂，且久而罔验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158133_comment'></div>一旦，有高僧自至其家，乃目公曰：「斯奇童也，而有斯疾也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158133_comment'></div>于怀中出圭角之药，傅之苦所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158133_comment'></div>涉数日间，公蹶然下榻，趋走如昨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158133_comment'></div>后访其僧，了不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1158133_comment'></div>故公喜蓄方书，用施汤剂，垂死之疾，获生者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1158133_comment'></div>部下官属有亡殁者，公悉以俸金备其襄事，孤遗还乡，道涂获济，其行阴惠也又如斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1158133_comment'></div>公家有藏书积万馀卷，修职之外，研味忘倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1158133_comment'></div>尤嗜《白翰林集》，公因诠次乐天自未三十岁至七十五所著歌诗凡八十一篇，目之曰《白氏编年集》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1158133_comment'></div>公自制序，手写其集，传诸好事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1158133_comment'></div>公凡历四镇，所至之邦，祗率教条，勤访民隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1158133_comment'></div>寿春富庶，号为难理，有积年狡讼，前后不断，公躬加裁决，共称平允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1158133_comment'></div>曹事清简，吏民宜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1158133_comment'></div>公宽中而多恕，在贵而能降，言不妄发，谈必谙理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1158133_comment'></div>奉身以约，抚族以睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1158133_comment'></div>亲属孤露，必加周恤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1158133_comment'></div>朋执故旧，不忘平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1158133_comment'></div>历事三朝，践扬二府，名遂身退，善始令终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1158133_comment'></div>若匪负不世之才，遇非常之主，明诚事国，纯仁保位，其孰能至于此乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1158133_comment'></div>方就远而从吉，宜考行而易名，敢述令猷，用资清议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1158133_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_144_1158133_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　本年，在京为翰林侍读学士，作《杨太尉墓志铭》作品：杨太尉墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨太尉墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158164")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158164'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158164'>庆历二年，契丹阃差人来请，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1158164", 1158164, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>设言</span>造端，谋寒先盟，南并卢龙塞，阴狙边隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158164_comment'></div>上方视图按锁，曰：「中山博陵，襟束空道，天下劲兵处，须贵重宿将，以张吾军」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158164_comment'></div>于时河阳三城节度使杨公崇勋守淮阳，其三月，召还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158164_comment'></div>既见上，数请间陈方略，愿先颜行，乘北方盛秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158164_comment'></div>有诏仍旧节，复拜同中书门下平章事，部署真定、定州两路马步军，即判定州公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158164_comment'></div>至则饬部队，习驰射，彀甲休士，坚垒养威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158164_comment'></div>本法设张，伍符叶修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158164_comment'></div>由是干皮鞅靽备于行，渠荅罗闉给于守，技击跳荡奋于屯，长城巨防，隐若万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158164_comment'></div>其五月，移判成德军，兼高阳关都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158164_comment'></div>于是河北兵皆属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158164_comment'></div>会朝廷以不战屈敌，其秋，麾下兵罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158164_comment'></div>十二月，改判郑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158164_comment'></div>前此，公告足盭，颇害良行，当缓急，不敢为解，至是以疾自上乞致所事，还私门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158164_comment'></div>诏授左卫上将军，听谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158164_comment'></div>明年，拜太子太保，全食其俸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158164_comment'></div>五年后五月己酉，薨于清平坊第之正寝，享年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158164_comment'></div>上闻讣悼痛，再不视朝，以太尉册书告于柩，内司宾临问其家，录孤归赙，治命不敢当鸿胪葬，有司谥曰恭毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158164_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158164_comment'></div>逢圣于始，显庸于中，奉身于终，缀荣于哀，其所以载侯表世家者，几何公之比！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158164_comment'></div>公字宝臣，本宏农著姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158164_comment'></div>后子孙有入燕蓟者，因土断为蓟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158164_comment'></div>曾王父方道，终后唐涿州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158164_comment'></div>王父守斌，同太祖时为龙捷指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158164_comment'></div>父全美，为太宗倚信，终殿前指挥使、左班都知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158164_comment'></div>比三世皆材当大有为，而不克显，盖莳祥播庆，逮公而获欤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158164_comment'></div>公贵，并赠太师、中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158164_comment'></div>祖室鄂国公，祢室齐国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158164_comment'></div>曾王妣窦氏、王妣孙氏、妣王氏，启楚、韩、秦三国，为夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158164_comment'></div>公年十一，父任东班承旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158164_comment'></div>真宗在东宫，以夙敏得侍，赐令名，且敦勖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158164_comment'></div>他日谓左右曰：「闻若等嗜学，吾授若书」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158164_comment'></div>众皆顿首谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158164_comment'></div>于是令太子太保致仕张耆为学长，公与故宣徽南院使夏守赟为学察，馀比诸生，以授《孝经》、《论语》、诗赋杂家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158164_comment'></div>自是通古兵法书术，知前世兴亡事甚悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158164_comment'></div>真宗践阼，累迁内殿崇班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158164_comment'></div>由供备库副使，三迁至东八作使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158164_comment'></div>国朝翰林司掌汤液果酝之奉，乘舆宴群臣者，在殿中，尤亲近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158164_comment'></div>群牧司领内外国马，时出入而蕃息之，是最要剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158164_comment'></div>枢密承旨所以总郡曹署贰令，地逼势牵，人惮居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158164_comment'></div>银台通四方章奏，襞积不时上，吏易并缘为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158164_comment'></div>公始以尚衣库使领翰林司，供事以办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158164_comment'></div>又为群牧都监，以西上閤门使为群牧副司，驺训以详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158164_comment'></div>以左武卫大将军、恩州刺史充枢密都承旨，参穆基命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158164_comment'></div>改左骁卫大将军，又提举枢密院通进银台司公事，程无留书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158164_comment'></div>搢绅由是知公材无不可施，毅然有大臣望，拭目观矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158164_comment'></div>俄迁英州防御使、侍卫亲军马军都虞候、并代州马步军副都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158164_comment'></div>未行，留为客省使，仍防御使，授领三班院、皇城司，兼閤门、四方馆事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158164_comment'></div>章圣倦勤，皇太子参视朝政，会用事贵人怙权惎间，畏大臣不附，欲专树所私，密计谂公，公亟道不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158164_comment'></div>彼业已露，愈欲胁持，公因羸服夜过枢密使第，白发其谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158164_comment'></div>明日，枢密院以急变闻，帝命曹玮与公收按首谋，穷治支党，斩翼豮牙，宫邻以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158164_comment'></div>旋授邓州观察使，牢让不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158164_comment'></div>诏但易桂州，复转内客省使，兼群牧使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158164_comment'></div>上既纂承，以彰德军节度观察留后知陈州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158164_comment'></div>岁中即除殿前都虞候、副真定路马步军部署，召为侍卫亲军马军副都指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158164_comment'></div>以振武军节度为殿前副都指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158164_comment'></div>久之，换节镇南军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158164_comment'></div>凡天下拳勇趫悍材官，步则拔距蹶张，骑则趹后揬前，悉集京师，日阅而岁择之，得隶侍卫军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158164_comment'></div>武力之右卓异者，升为殿前军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158164_comment'></div>内参屯庐，则岩廊期门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158164_comment'></div>出陪营卫，则彍骑羽林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158164_comment'></div>所以权中制外，厌乱萌，扼斗亢，自侯奄而上，皆慎将彻侯为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158164_comment'></div>公之扈寝弋，总离卫，前后十年，为国爪牙，其见信于上如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158164_comment'></div>以职劳改宣徽南院使兼枢密副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158164_comment'></div>明道初，寝宫考室，以丞相为修大内使，公为之副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158164_comment'></div>揆景僝功，指期落成，天扶神尊，万楹有焕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158164_comment'></div>又改节山南东道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158164_comment'></div>上与明肃皇太后尝曰：「先帝称杨某忠孝亮直，可任大事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158164_comment'></div>即以枢密使印命之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158164_comment'></div>公自以得君逢时，底里无所隐，昼日万几，处可于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158164_comment'></div>天子器之，号为称职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158164_comment'></div>岁馀，以三城帅节兼丞相秩，复治于陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158164_comment'></div>仇家上书追冤前坐，释憾于公，乃罢丞相印绶，徙知寿、亳两州，还为宛丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158164_comment'></div>公为人方重有威，城府开爽，论议常倾座中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158164_comment'></div>事先帝有雅旧，故敢面触廷诤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158164_comment'></div>候人利病，及政可否，必为上言之，多所开顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158164_comment'></div>近臣见时不用兵，建言可鬻厩马取赢以济国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158164_comment'></div>公执奏曰：「当承平时，无所事骑，然自昔忘战者危，不备者不可以师」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158164_comment'></div>帝然之，由是议格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158164_comment'></div>王均乱益州，公乘驿受诸将所奏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158164_comment'></div>真宗再自将，幸河北，诏公走儳道入屯壁，以密旨谕帅臣，论功为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158164_comment'></div>又率兵守澶渊浮桥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158164_comment'></div>时边民之南，项背系道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158164_comment'></div>公选善游数十工，护济全渡，多不可胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158164_comment'></div>其仁爱根于心，宁勉为哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158164_comment'></div>寿春多高赀大豪，囊橐老奸，持吏二千石长短。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158164_comment'></div>公下车，擿其无状，逮系论报，隶身徙家，窟穴破平，治为东方最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158164_comment'></div>善待士，不倨贵，与游皆长者钜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158164_comment'></div>属吏或材，言之朝，不进不已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158164_comment'></div>其不材，亦务全安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158164_comment'></div>乏者周，穷者振，专务饮德不伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158164_comment'></div>嗜唐白居易诗，比次后先，号《白氏编年》，自为题辞，传于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158164_comment'></div>七岁时，两足痹不仁，有异僧过门，叹曰：「奇童也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158164_comment'></div>为出肘后药傅其处，数日趋戏如常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158164_comment'></div>家人具百金为僧谢，访之卒不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158164_comment'></div>福胙凭厚，盖若神所相云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158164_comment'></div>凡累食户万四千二百，实四千五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158164_comment'></div>阶勋极品，检校八迁至太尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158164_comment'></div>爵本郡开国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158164_comment'></div>功臣，在禁卫时，「忠果雄勇推诚宣力」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158164_comment'></div>在机近时，「推忠协谋同德守正佐理」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158164_comment'></div>守藩则「推诚保德崇仁忠亮守正翊戴」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158164_comment'></div>数之繁缛，称是任用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158164_comment'></div>初，公罢常山，亲吏得罪监司，深文诿公，故菟裘之还，褒宠未极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158164_comment'></div>久之，直公无罪，遂有储保之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158164_comment'></div>方公护诸将，连兵数十万，压赵睨燕，干不庭方，敌人恫疑虚喝，不敢进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158164_comment'></div>其倚任何如！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158164_comment'></div>乃今以刀笔曲折，诋欺取胜，吏之文致，诚可畏已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158164_comment'></div>赖上廓度宽仁，恤往厚亡，进退之交，无毛发可间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158164_comment'></div>圣主之保功臣自有体哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158164_comment'></div>公娶三夫人，曰王氏，未及封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158164_comment'></div>姚氏，芮城郡君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158164_comment'></div>田氏，京兆郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158164_comment'></div>子十二人：宗让，内藏库使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158164_comment'></div>宗诩，故右班殿直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158164_comment'></div>宗说，西京作坊副使兼閤门通事舍人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158164_comment'></div>宗诲，内殿承制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158164_comment'></div>宗识，故内殿崇班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158164_comment'></div>宗谨、宗诱，内殿崇班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158164_comment'></div>宗谔、宗谊，东头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158164_comment'></div>宗谏，故东头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158164_comment'></div>宗诂，东头供奉官，最幼，早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158164_comment'></div>家老洎诸孤以为《春秋》诸侯葬不过五月，用奔走蒇事，以仲秋壬申得吉卜，克葬公于开封府祥符县邓公乡公家原，从齐公茔穆位，举三夫人祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158164_comment'></div>弗慢而坏，故礼周；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158164_comment'></div>必信而诚，故情称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158164_comment'></div>既又丐文撰美，孝子之事终焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158164_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_125_1158164'>太尉之贵，发自孤童。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158164_comment'></div>给事储邸，允显有庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158164_comment'></div>天飞云从，化为元功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158164_comment'></div>累光叠华，遂都贵官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1158164_comment'></div>迩臣逞憾，相轧以权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1158164_comment'></div>先事发机，败踵不旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1158164_comment'></div>乃总营卫，乃建节牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1158164_comment'></div>克冠天枢，肆勤王家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1158164_comment'></div>将印相印，于藩有华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1158164_comment'></div>辽人抢攘，阴撼侯疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1158164_comment'></div>公在河朔，尽护戎防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1158164_comment'></div>上言北诮，溃其肺肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1158164_comment'></div>事宁兵解，公则引年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1158164_comment'></div>帝惟念功，式遏憸言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1158164_comment'></div>东宫一品，宠灵益宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1158164_comment'></div>彼仁与贤，天畀耆寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1158164_comment'></div>胡不留屏，偃然西首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1158164_comment'></div>废胡追悼，饰终则厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1158164_comment'></div>邓乡鲜原，昭穆同阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1158164_comment'></div>降魄于此，可作无年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1158164_comment'></div>万有陵岸，不朽斯传。</div><div id='poem_sentence_145_1158164_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　本年，在京为翰林侍读学士，作《杨太尉神道碑》作品：杨太尉神道碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五七。）</span><div id='poem_1158142' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158142' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158142?labeling=true' target='_blank'>杨太尉神道碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158142")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158142_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158142'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158142'>庆历二年春二月甲子诏书：故太子太保致仕、赠太尉崇勋，刚纯义勇，任重效显，有不懈之亮、能断之彊，其追谥曰恭毅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158142_comment'></div>申命史臣祁撰文刻石，且俾螭首龟趺如命，揭著墓阡，馨香无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158142_comment'></div>臣祁伏念天子所以褒礼大臣，隐悼幽显，霜迁树拱，犹无已时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158142_comment'></div>沈恩念忘，漏入九泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158142_comment'></div>受名节惠，不使有司得预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158142_comment'></div>虽砺山于庙，固功臣之誓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158142_comment'></div>欢鼙在廷，深将帅之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158142_comment'></div>始终感会，未有二兹者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158142_comment'></div>敢拜手奉诏，䌷绎功状，掇其功瑑于碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158142_comment'></div>太尉姓杨氏，字宝臣，系出宏农，支裔炽昌，载质四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158142_comment'></div>既贯燕蓟，世禅武力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158142_comment'></div>曾祖方道，任侠豪迈，仕后唐，高选涿州刺史，合姓窦氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158142_comment'></div>祖守斌，善射御，以彍骑从太祖，为龙捷指挥使，授室孙氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158142_comment'></div>父全美，志勇决，器安重，扈执卫戈，山立云从，终殿前指挥使、左班都知，委禽王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158142_comment'></div>并涵渟阴德，益久弥大，发越絪缊，归成后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158142_comment'></div>公既显，率祢而上，赠太师、中书、尚书令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158142_comment'></div>由祖而下，封鄂国公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158142_comment'></div>推妣及曾，分胙楚、韩、秦，为夫人国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158142_comment'></div>太尉事两朝，历二十八官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158142_comment'></div>其最著显者，由彰德军节度、相州观察留后领振武、镇南、定武、山南东道、河阳三城五节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158142_comment'></div>以留务历殿前都虞候、侍卫马军副都指挥使，以节度为殿前副指挥使、宣徽南院使、枢密副使、枢密使，再同中书门下平章事，守陈、寿、亳、镇、定五州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158142_comment'></div>两为河北兵马都部署，皆国家腹心柱石，天下所以安危者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158142_comment'></div>故上欲左右有民，惟公之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158142_comment'></div>若鼎彝然，所处而重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158142_comment'></div>若金汤然，所恃而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158142_comment'></div>有牙童童，有印累累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158142_comment'></div>以勤以庸，元首是毗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158142_comment'></div>举当世贤臣魁垒骨鲠之辅，待公而足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158142_comment'></div>公幼时，以门荫事皇太子宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158142_comment'></div>太子训之学，因通书记刀笔，绝不憙狗马弋猎事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158142_comment'></div>痛折节，比诸生，在左右谨力自将，未尝以孰何见谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158142_comment'></div>皇太子即位，是为真宗皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158142_comment'></div>自东班承旨，十一迁为内客省使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158142_comment'></div>由恩州刺史，三进兼桂州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158142_comment'></div>公既藩邸雅旧，故敢言无所回隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158142_comment'></div>每使四方，督盗贼，采风俗，还奏有条，帝以为才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158142_comment'></div>其后数访群臣臧否，切问迩言，世秘莫闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158142_comment'></div>时时有所建明，帝未尝不称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158142_comment'></div>更莅内司，风绩流闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158142_comment'></div>当此时，益亲近，出入光宠，同时等辈皆不敢抗茵凭几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158142_comment'></div>天禧晚年，贵臣投隙，亲置党人，揠祸端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158142_comment'></div>于时公联掌皇城，密以情告，厚利盗言，或啖或讦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158142_comment'></div>公即计策其诈，念帝久未豫，今上居东宫，若放命窃发，欢动禁省，虽食其肉，奚足偿耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158142_comment'></div>即日白发其谋，魁慝禽伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158142_comment'></div>扑燎未然，折虿始摇，保安宗稷，繄公是力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158142_comment'></div>上自先帝时既闻耳矣，及纂嗣，遂以爪牙任之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158142_comment'></div>居中军上将，风力锐甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158142_comment'></div>视岩廊整整而虔，足和门暨暨而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158142_comment'></div>星藩幔省，居卫行护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158142_comment'></div>朝廷雄尊，得公愈明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158142_comment'></div>久之，进贰枢务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158142_comment'></div>章献明肃皇后尝目公谓上曰：「是先帝所谓忠孝者，用未及显，庸有待耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158142_comment'></div>于是由第四署超正使席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158142_comment'></div>会权纲有归，政体清明，万枢丛远，皆从临决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158142_comment'></div>公心经大猷，膝造昌言，厎行将顺，甚称上意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158142_comment'></div>明年，使罢，得视丞相秩，即淮阳开府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158142_comment'></div>仇家便文诬列曩冤，执事间之，因以释憾，有诏罢宰职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158142_comment'></div>公一不自辩，将命之藩，责言靡雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158142_comment'></div>事久益直，示箧食騠，终蒙简照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158142_comment'></div>岁馀，还治宛丘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158142_comment'></div>北敌丐盟，使者结纳，未能得其要领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158142_comment'></div>于时以传车召公入议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158142_comment'></div>至则赞书已具，若曰：「尔复以相印守博陵，如汉灌婴故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158142_comment'></div>凡兵在镇定者，尔皆统之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158142_comment'></div>公顿首陈谢，退条御戎择帅，边锁所宜急者数十牍以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158142_comment'></div>谋谟卓诡，乙夜被赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158142_comment'></div>乘辕北驱，威先令行，化劬为忭，甲寿马良，士奋于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158142_comment'></div>未几，徙常山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158142_comment'></div>今宿帅王相国得用代镇博陵，与公相犄角，当一面，诸将皆以兵属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158142_comment'></div>师和帅贤，敌谋益伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158142_comment'></div>会戎译<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1158142", 1158142, "Clauses/210/Comments/0")'>讲解</span>，兵悉罢屯，诏公入镇圃田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158142_comment'></div>前此以壮趾之苦，方事未宁，不啬有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158142_comment'></div>至是，固辞不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158142_comment'></div>上言疆埸少间，幸得归节阙下，丐骸骨，还丘园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158142_comment'></div>朝议重违，故制授左卫上将军，听老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158142_comment'></div>明年，册拜储保，俸如居官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158142_comment'></div>乃薨，享寿七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158142_comment'></div>于是岁在大梁闰五月己酉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158142_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158142_comment'></div>公以《大有》之健，《中庸》之不倚，《书》之攸好德，出屏入辅，文武是宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158142_comment'></div>遁居成功，休不待年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158142_comment'></div>其所以经纶黾俛者，卷纳灵府，完为和气，宜艾且祺，屹如冈陵，而遽溘逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158142_comment'></div>盖曩之瘁尽，与今恬泊，不相补欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158142_comment'></div>或化者自有数，得正而殁，贤所乐欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158142_comment'></div>此上所以闻问鲠伤，临莅废朝，锡赗系路，廞衮照室者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158142_comment'></div>公为人有崖岸，识诣精明，居常观图史，博古今，辩论感槩，森如矛戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158142_comment'></div>善为政，摧勒豪彊，苗薅发栉，不使败类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158142_comment'></div>初，群牧制置使悉杂择臣领之，所以佐县官经马政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158142_comment'></div>独公由监司至使任，无虑九年，厩校数充，踶牸不乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158142_comment'></div>及在殿卫二府，亦八岁不他迁，勤官善职，见倚于上乃如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158142_comment'></div>质所树立，固宜有大者焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158142_comment'></div>厌难未萌，先事电发，勇之果也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158142_comment'></div>华首诣屯，初不办严，忠之壮也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158142_comment'></div>蹈道引年，牖下归全，仁之固也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158142_comment'></div>假令《阳秋》可作，尚珍且贵，奚止载太常之縿，镂景钟之乐哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158142_comment'></div>娶夫人王氏、姚氏、田氏，不偕公老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158142_comment'></div>生子十二人：宗让、宗诩、宗说、宗诲、宗识、宗谨、宗谔、宗诱、宗谊、宗谏、宗诂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158142_comment'></div>让为内藏库使，说内园副使、閤门通事舍人，诲内殿承制，识、谨、诱并内殿崇班，谔、谊、谏、诂并东头供奉官，诩、识、谏早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158142_comment'></div>诸子虽食旧德，皆能以才自显，于官诜诜也，知公义方，世济厥问，乌可量已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158142_comment'></div>薨之年，诸孤既辞诏葬，则自发私税与龟筮谋，得秋八月壬申，克葬于开封府祥符县邓公乡齐公茔之子位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158142_comment'></div>夫难泐者有如石，不朽者有如名，行远者有如文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158142_comment'></div>且王命焉，显扬懿烈，由行远，旌不朽，托难泐以示方来，则公之系之才之伐之官，何千万年而有泯焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158142_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_1158142'>古人之勇，挠于为利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158142_comment'></div>公闻悚言，据正弥厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158142_comment'></div>为君督奸，羁踣狂猘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158142_comment'></div>为臣之忠，衰于官成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158142_comment'></div>避剧就安，以保其盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158142_comment'></div>方事之难，公乃奋行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158142_comment'></div>功名之际，贤者罕处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158142_comment'></div>节整位隆，公则引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158142_comment'></div>是是非非，定于阖棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158142_comment'></div>卒葬恩褒，邦靡间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158142_comment'></div>青史有传，公列功臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158142_comment'></div>朱门有闶，庆垂后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158142_comment'></div>梁甸畇畇，汳流浑浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158142_comment'></div>不迁不腐，茂烈偕存<span class='inlineComment2'>（《宋景文集》卷五七。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158142_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_116_1158142'>此句有误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158142_comment'></div>按杨崇勋卒于庆历五年闰五月己酉，以当年八月壬申葬，见此碑下文及宋祁《扬太尉行状<span class='inlineComment2'>（本书卷五二四）</span>《、》杨太尉墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（本书卷五二九）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158142_comment'></div>又据《宋会要辑稿》礼五八之九三：杨崇勋，「初，有司谥恭密，及将葬，诏改之，谥恭毅」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158142_comment'></div>则诏谥恭毅亦庆历五年八月事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158142_comment'></div>此处之「二年」疑当作「五年」，「春二月甲子」疑当作「秋八月甲子」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_120_1158142_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年8月27日</a>　八月二十七日，在京为翰林侍读学士，上言库务司事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　本年，在京为翰林侍读学士，作《顺祀诗》作品：顺祀诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_105866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>顺祀诗并序<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105866")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105866_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_105866_0'>① 案仁宗本纪庆历五年十月辛酉祔章献章懿于太庙与此相符</div></div></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_105866'>臣某言：伏见去年七月壬寅诏书，章献明肃皇太后、章懿皇太后，并祔真宗庙室，有司择日具仪以闻。其十月辛酉，皇帝步自文德殿，奉玉册玉宝至大庆庭中，再拜，以命丞相臣昌朝、臣执中曰：假尔节，其遂告于庙。臣昌朝等再拜受命。容卫焜煌，不哗不敖。款于奉慈，昭告如礼。然后奉章献明肃皇太后、章懿皇太后木主，纳诸太庙。有司至孟月之飨，飨焉。已事。丞相率百官诣阁称贺。有诏大赦天下，释罪已责；赐群臣军校各有差。恭念盛德形容，所以告于神明者，宜有声诗颂叹，以播乐府。臣某被学已旧，受恩寖深，前日预闻朝廷末议，今兹摄事省闼，不当以斐然捍格，自弃诸儒之后，辄夙夜斋祓，撰诗一章。前侔《猗那》，后订《清庙》。刺取经谊，以辑其辞。又惟三代以来，娶止一姓，侄娣有序，势不相踰，故配食纳寝，止一后而已。由汉而下，尽革周制，继室诞圣，均极尊名。而诸儒拘挚，仍执故典。竞无实之偏论，破适世之至权。遂使汉祠别园，梁建小庙。碍礼不厌，抑感弗通。罔极之报，则笃于一情；以时之祭，则判为两祀。列辟未悟，庸可叹哉！且善教者不拘古以妨今，善礼者不后情以先物。唐明皇帝主于合祔，失于叙升，故一王之典，闇而不昭。先帝独启圣虑，顺跻二德，侑太宗之尊；陛下述遵前宪，寅奉二章，参文考之祏。然后天下之议，披聋发蔀，知前古之谬阙，当今之适宜，亲亲尊尊，粲然无惑。故诗之所陈，扬搉熟复，繁而不简，亦咏歌不足，不知舞之蹈之之义焉。臣某顿首以闻。</div><div id='poem_preface_105866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105866'>孰顺其祀，明明天子。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105866'>天子谦让，诏群臣其议。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105866'>惟章献、章懿，遂祔先帝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105866'>宜索而典，而古而今。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105866'>顺考攸宜，慰我孝心。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105866'>群臣稽首，不远厥成。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105866'>伊先猷是程，伊大孝是经。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105866'>匪祥符孰从，则莫我京。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105866'>三代庙寝，止一帝后。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105866'>汉制已迁，儒臣罔究。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105866'>礼缺不称，因朴趋陋。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105866'>亲靡祔尊，神挈斯祐。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105866'>帝曰俞哉，予奉二慈。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105866'>匪曰无典，实成训是依。<div id='poem_sentence_13_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_105866'>促灼尔龟，爰蕝尔仪。<div id='poem_sentence_14_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_105866'>琢金追玉，昭款信辞。<div id='poem_sentence_15_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_105866'>不敢先后，惟以顺跻。<div id='poem_sentence_16_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_105866'>孟冬十月，大飨其时。<div id='poem_sentence_17_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_105866'>朕不惮勤，于庭遣之。<div id='poem_sentence_18_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_105866'>吉日辛酉，帝自文德。<div id='poem_sentence_19_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_105866'>至于大庆，奉宝授册。<div id='poem_sentence_20_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_105866'>永怀劬劳，孝贯天极。<div id='poem_sentence_21_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_105866'>虞宾在位，百官承式。<div id='poem_sentence_22_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_105866'>显显太岁，惟册宝是将。<div id='poem_sentence_23_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_105866'>和鸾有容，龙旗孔扬。<div id='poem_sentence_24_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_105866'>既至于庙，是承是告。<div id='poem_sentence_25_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_105866'>奉迁后主，合侑文考。<div id='poem_sentence_26_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_105866'>有主则止，有匹得行。<div id='poem_sentence_27_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_105866'>遂旅豆笾，以及芼牲。<div id='poem_sentence_28_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_105866'>明水太羹，有飶有澄。<div id='poem_sentence_29_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_105866'>鼓钟钦钦，鼓瑟鼓琴。<div id='poem_sentence_30_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_105866'>考悦妣安，蠲我德音。<div id='poem_sentence_31_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_105866'>德音惟何，帝受纯嘏。<div id='poem_sentence_32_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_105866'>不专斯飨，用赦天下。<div id='poem_sentence_33_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_105866'>开释罪辜，赐逮九军。<div id='poem_sentence_34_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_105866'>一人作孝，庶邦蒙仁。<div id='poem_sentence_35_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_105866'>礼非天作，托始于圣。<div id='poem_sentence_36_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_105866'>圣克正始，万世攸定。<div id='poem_sentence_37_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_105866'>作述交善，神人胥庆。<div id='poem_sentence_38_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_105866'>天谓皇帝，既付所覆。<div id='poem_sentence_39_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_105866'>帝克孝治，奉亲以侑。<div id='poem_sentence_40_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_105866'>其收丕祺，蕃衍后昆。<div id='poem_sentence_41_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_105866'>万有亿年，继继存存。<div id='poem_sentence_42_105866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_105866'></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_105866_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年1月24日</a>　正月二十四日，在京为翰林侍读学士，因参修之《庆历编敕》成书，加勋，并受赐器币。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年3月19日</a>　三月十九日，在京为翰林侍读学士，代宋仁宗作罪己诏。作品：大旱责躬避殿减膳许中外言事诏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《宋大诏令集》卷一五三。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年4月25日</a>　四月二十五日，在京为翰林侍读学士，讲筵为宋仁宗读《贾谊传》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　本年，在京为翰林侍读学士，受吴知几之托为其父作墓志铭。作品：故吴兴居士吴君墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158163' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158163' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158163?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故吴兴居士吴君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158163")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158163_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158163'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158163'>昔太伯延州之兴，本诸礼让，流风馀教，染其深迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158163_comment'></div>后之苗裔，虽在畎亩，咸能整饬，表率雅俗，岂前人之遗烈耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158163_comment'></div>居士某，讳字子玉，吴兴故鄣人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158163_comment'></div>曾大父当钱氏之霸，相与隐晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158163_comment'></div>然齿于里，皆丈人行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158163_comment'></div>居士生国初建隆间，长则天下甫定，人去汤火，俗识簋豆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158163_comment'></div>常喟然有志于学，振起门业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158163_comment'></div>会闵凶所遘，族大为诿，急于营恤，已而不果。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158163_comment'></div>方事之隙，犹佔简毕，故于经史泛通章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158163_comment'></div>处州党，持门户，伏腊支计，内外仰给，鸤鸠之施，莫不均壹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158163_comment'></div>乡人之善者服其行，悍者偃其风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158163_comment'></div>饮人专以和，存物先诸惠，故门内外无间言，里中号为有恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158163_comment'></div>子曰：「施于有政，是亦为政」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158163_comment'></div>斯近之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158163_comment'></div>所居美田宅，佳山水，持老子知足之计，常守雌静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158163_comment'></div>他日，子妷十数，当就外傅，自恨官学不究，无所成名，出其家书，付之肄业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158163_comment'></div>立学舍，延儒衣，督劝其勤，常自喔叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158163_comment'></div>景祐初，若子若妷，遂登厥科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158163_comment'></div>今位诸朝，如其本心，惠训使然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158163_comment'></div>居士以庆历丁亥正月二日卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158163_comment'></div>初不甚疾，了无怛化，治命归骨附于先陇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158163_comment'></div>诸子奉遗意，卜其年九月甲子葬于某乡某里，秩于其祖之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158163_comment'></div>娶沈氏，先居士二十岁而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158163_comment'></div>悼及贤和，卒不复娶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158163_comment'></div>子五人：长曰邻几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158163_comment'></div>次慎几，早卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158163_comment'></div>次曰惟几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158163_comment'></div>次知几，任大理寺丞，尝领安仁长，迁秩殿中丞，闻讣，不拜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158163_comment'></div>次曰虑几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158163_comment'></div>邻几而降，卒端良友悌，保家之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158163_comment'></div>予曾识寺丞君，端粹开敏，可谓佳器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158163_comment'></div>及衔恤在疚，滨于焦毁，匍匐流涕，来诉穷罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158163_comment'></div>且言日月之定，托铭诸竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158163_comment'></div>惟纯孝之志，难以辞拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158163_comment'></div>因约其先行，以表诸后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158163_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1158163'>履道之吉，《易》称幽人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158163_comment'></div>国风之乐，乃在衡门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158163_comment'></div>十室至细，忠信所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158163_comment'></div>彼善居士，结发修身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158163_comment'></div>志便休閒，行成州里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158163_comment'></div>能睦诸姻，善教厥子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158163_comment'></div>起家班朝，光明之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158163_comment'></div>惠训则然，积庆宜尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158163_comment'></div>七十黄发，启手归全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158163_comment'></div>治命有付，葬祔其先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158163_comment'></div>故鄣遗里，美哉山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158163_comment'></div>吴氏有后，存子孙焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1158163_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年1月14日</a>　正月十四日，在京为翰林侍读学士，受命与鱼周询定夺陕西、河东铜铁钱利害。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年5月</a>　五月，在京为翰林侍读学士，有启回王拱辰。作品：回王太博谢高阳官部署启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。温谱系此文于皇祐元年，此据文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回王太博谢高阳关部署启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157755")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157755'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157755'>伏承光奉制恩，出护屯垒，佥择惟允，欣颂兼常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157755_comment'></div>执事授器过人，移忠许国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157755_comment'></div>肃提千骑之警，参守四方之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157755_comment'></div>恭惟河间，最重戎阃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157755_comment'></div>副贰之剧，武力是资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157755_comment'></div>果契公言，训定师则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157755_comment'></div>何冲怀之徇好，眷他帅以移文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157755_comment'></div>切仰干城，已孚于先甲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157755_comment'></div>自然邻国，可假于馀光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157755_comment'></div>感著欢愉，并萃情府。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1157755_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年5月</a>　五月，在京为翰林侍读学士，有启上夏竦。作品：上西京留府太师相公启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五三。温谱系此文于皇祐元年，此据文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157665' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157665' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157665?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上西京留府太师相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157665")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157665_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157665'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157665'>伏审改持命节，移总留都，伏惟欢庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157665_comment'></div>恭以阁下道冠民彝，业熙帝縡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157665_comment'></div>武以摧元恶之渐，文以佐大化之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157665_comment'></div>暂均夙劳，益储钜望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157665_comment'></div>上心攸眷，褒册俄颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157665_comment'></div>辍西洛之保釐，委北门之镇抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157665_comment'></div>介圭卓马，方修觐于帝闱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157665_comment'></div>九鼎长城，已憺威于敌国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157665_comment'></div>不待期月，谅促召装。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157665_comment'></div>且还冠于霄阶，用永安于庙社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157665_comment'></div>衰残无状，埏播焉依。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157665_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年6月</a>　六月，在京复拜翰林学士，作《谢宣召入院状》作品：谢宣召入院状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157313' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157313' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157313?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宣召入院状<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157313")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157313_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157313'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157313'>命节及门，褒纶在耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157313_comment'></div>跽闻振擢，交腆荣惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157313_comment'></div>伏念臣素禀朽疏，亲逢昭泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157313_comment'></div>由累勤于旧史，获通籍于从官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157313_comment'></div>深入玉堂，慎司雅告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157313_comment'></div>无能云补，第恧于空餐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157313_comment'></div>有诿攸箴，已当于襆被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157313_comment'></div>会臣兄庠，猥叼贰政，例合避亲，亟用请閒，恳祈去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157313_comment'></div>寻蒙可报，对易美名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157313_comment'></div>跂华阁以通班，仍露门之擿句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157313_comment'></div>宿官少责，用拙正宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157313_comment'></div>安于之笔遂乾，绝闻名命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157313_comment'></div>裨谌之草虽在，无复讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157313_comment'></div>适以枢务缺员，昆亲补乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157313_comment'></div>垂矜旧物，靡涉他嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157313_comment'></div>复收液樠之材，入齿禁林之缀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157313_comment'></div>矧违近密，回贸寒温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157313_comment'></div>其间缘疢召衰，乘忧失壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157313_comment'></div>学殖逾落，辞绪若抽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157313_comment'></div>心忘五皓之醇，目眩十行之细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157313_comment'></div>曷以再承大对，参润远猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157313_comment'></div>深惟荐至之华，抑本千龄之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157313_comment'></div>斯盖皇帝陛下仁无颇覆，惠等曲成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157313_comment'></div>眷去马以还騑，激倦禽而重翥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157313_comment'></div>宠光完士，歆艳群伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157313_comment'></div>尚当景式前修，绎寻故业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157313_comment'></div>汉风弥郁，冀循尔雅之规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157313_comment'></div>邃齿已高，况属知非之素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157313_comment'></div>抚躬揆遇，滨殒为酬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1157313_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年6月</a>　六月，在京复拜翰林学士，立班在张方平之上，有谢状。作品：谢班次状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢班次状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157311")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157311_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157311'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157311'>右，臣准中书劄子，奉圣旨，令立班在张方平之上者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157311_comment'></div>因旧蒙荣，沿恩进等，恳辞弗听，愧切参怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157311_comment'></div>伏念臣术学空单，年姿衰槁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157311_comment'></div>自还禁署，四易岁阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157311_comment'></div>绝窥铃索之华，寖忘赫蹄之式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157311_comment'></div>属无嫌避，再沐召归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157311_comment'></div>合寘下陈，以从甲令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157311_comment'></div>而方平等，更因近例，追叙前功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157311_comment'></div>屈朝次之明规，崇仕途之美让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157311_comment'></div>荐烦谕诏，俾进上联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157311_comment'></div>畏再渎以取诃，辄忍惭而就著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157311_comment'></div>以新订故，诚非素杼之长；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157311_comment'></div>虽去即还，遂窃塞人之福。<div class='inline'
