id='poem_sentence_12_1157311_comment'></div>仰衔垂睿，曷用仰酬。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1157311_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年6月</a>　六月，在京复拜翰林学士，有诗。作品：再入翰林。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_104843' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104843' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104843?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再入翰林</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104843")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104843_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104843'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104843'>银台路入复门赊，四载重来鬓愈华。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104843'>况自秋毫皆帝力，何言旧物是吾家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104843'>宫盘浩气浮襟爽，省树珍阴叠殿斜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104843'>书枕梦残闻吏报，日痕还复度砖花。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104843_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104843'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104843_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年6月29日</a>　六月二十九日，在京为翰林学士，与张方平等上陕西钱议。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年7月28日</a>　七月二十八日，在京为翰林学士，受命与张永和往视商胡埽决河及覆计工料。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年8月18日</a>　八月十八日，在京为翰林学士，与张永和覆命往视商胡埽决河及覆计工料事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年9月6日</a>　九月六日，在京为翰林学士，受命磨勘提点刑狱、朝廷使臣课绩。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年9月</a>　九月，在京为翰林学士，受诏与李淑同修日历。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　秋，在京为翰林学士，为章得象作墓志铭。作品：文宪章公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五九。）</span><div id='poem_1158153' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158153' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文宪章公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158153")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158153_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158153'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158153'>宋有清忠肃艾之相曰章公，讳得象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158153_comment'></div>其先齐太公裔，封于鄣，去「邑」为章氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158153_comment'></div>侨徙不常，后为武宁望姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158153_comment'></div>曾祖仁嵩，仕李昪为驾部郎中，以公故，赠太师、中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158153_comment'></div>曾妣杜，楚国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158153_comment'></div>祖士廉，汀州宁化令，赠太师、中书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158153_comment'></div>祖妣周，齐国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158153_comment'></div>考奂，志耿介，以儒术发闻，不乐进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158153_comment'></div>试礼部，一不中，即谢去，盘桓家食，以天爵自终，赠太师、尚书令兼中书令、密国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158153_comment'></div>妣张，秦国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158153_comment'></div>世烈前光，幽而后融，委报于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158153_comment'></div>公孩提已自秀挺，丱能属文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158153_comment'></div>年十二，侈袂挟策，与密公及从兄得一俱称茂才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158153_comment'></div>当时夙儒愿与周旋，不以丈人行自谓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158153_comment'></div>咸平五年，举进士，授大理评事、知邵武军归化县，以丧未赴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158153_comment'></div>服除，用大理丞为信州玉山县，会东封泰山，大臣引公签署兖州观察判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158153_comment'></div>以办治劳，迁太常博士、通判明州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158153_comment'></div>以屯田、都官二员外，历知台、南雄、洪三州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158153_comment'></div>会诏近臣举学优行茂者，以名闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158153_comment'></div>时文靖吕丞相、谏大夫张师德联牍上言，试学士院，以职方员外直史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158153_comment'></div>入三司度支部为判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158153_comment'></div>历祠部郎中，赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158153_comment'></div>改刑部曹纠察在京刑狱，赐三品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158153_comment'></div>公自释褐即外迁，间关远方几二十年，搢绅未甚知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158153_comment'></div>及还，游诸公间，器就德完，一口交誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158153_comment'></div>姿表颀茂，所至辄倾坐客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158153_comment'></div>视上訚如，接下侃如，中陶然粹，外颓然简，照通量含，不见崖畛，天下遂推为钜人长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158153_comment'></div>以兵部郎中试中书，进知制诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158153_comment'></div>明年，入翰林为学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158153_comment'></div>公于名命得轻重体要，进无盈褒，退无溢尤，至他诏令，皆便时制宜，使听受施行者遍晓，多至数百千篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158153_comment'></div>即本职改谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158153_comment'></div>以丧去官，有诏夺服，号诉不见听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158153_comment'></div>累迁为礼部侍郎，又兼龙图阁学士，俄拜承旨兼侍读学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158153_comment'></div>摘经验古，劝成风德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158153_comment'></div>在内外辞禁，凡一终星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158153_comment'></div>异时与公尝僚，或出公下者，武相踵为柄臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158153_comment'></div>然愈谦晦，无纤介觖望，不为赫赫名自结，其澹于进取乃如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158153_comment'></div>视积薪倒行，不得辈公厮皂，尚敢望其藩哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158153_comment'></div>惟天子以为国器可大任，景祐三年，乃擢同知枢密院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158153_comment'></div>寻改户部侍郎，毗燮内机，底里输尽，参和协恭，道益光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158153_comment'></div>帝曰：「尔遂相」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158153_comment'></div>宝元元年，以本官拜中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158153_comment'></div>边障驿骚，老师留屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158153_comment'></div>上所与阅赤白囊，按边吏才不肖，调兵食，止一二枢近裁可奉行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158153_comment'></div>议者谓三公无不统兵，独大事有不预知，方多故时，不容偏任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158153_comment'></div>天子向其言，始命宰相兼枢密使，仍进公中书侍郎兼工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158153_comment'></div>公授使，让还其官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158153_comment'></div>在上前论事或日旰，别白精审，无所回忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158153_comment'></div>时天下承平久，器蛊未牢，兵耗不登，公与吕丞相共议，阅良家子数十万，补完虚籍，益市马充车骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158153_comment'></div>为蒐教之法讨于军，谨修缮之令督于官，减用度之冗谨其财，所以憺威常武，纾国庇民者，咸见纳用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158153_comment'></div>会吕丞相病免，复以冬官命公，遂为上宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158153_comment'></div>公既久当国，且畏盛满，昼谂夕咨，虑烦必伤，乃顿首乞还丞相印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158153_comment'></div>诏不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158153_comment'></div>表至十上，未得报，则还第待罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158153_comment'></div>天子手诏曰：「须郊祠毕，更一年乃听」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158153_comment'></div>公以敦谕谆切，不敢违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158153_comment'></div>然志远名宠，每奏事或独留，且陈年侵疾癯，言诚哀到。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158153_comment'></div>庆历五年，始得以检校太傅、镇安军节度，视相秩，即判其州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158153_comment'></div>七年，进封郇国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158153_comment'></div>明年，徙留西洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158153_comment'></div>朝京师，遂请老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158153_comment'></div>时议以图任耆畯，不应以年为解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158153_comment'></div>公执益固，上度不可留，特拜司空致仕，赐实俸，著令燕见礼如丞相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158153_comment'></div>于是公年七十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158153_comment'></div>去位之六月乙未，暴感疾，一日薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158153_comment'></div>诏遣太医驰视，已不可为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158153_comment'></div>讣闻，天子即日幸其第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158153_comment'></div>既酹，哀甚，赐银三千两，他赗襚称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158153_comment'></div>旧制，大臣罢退，有物故，乘舆不临丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158153_comment'></div>又是日常休，法从或出沐，而诏跸遽行，且使走谕二府以殊礼待公意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158153_comment'></div>再不视朝，追赠太尉兼侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158153_comment'></div>进二子一孙官，推叙宗娅者六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158153_comment'></div>公无主馈，嗣且幼，上遣中人省实家赀，簿付宗老，举不满万金，裁俸赐所赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158153_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158153_comment'></div>隐卒褒终，宠孤恤私之恩极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158153_comment'></div>盖公之纳忠也至，故报礼也称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158153_comment'></div>朝野涕咨，谓之荣哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158153_comment'></div>前夫人张氏，未及公显，故君清河县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158153_comment'></div>后夫人杨氏，偕公贵，故国于郇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158153_comment'></div>男五：释之，终大理评事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158153_comment'></div>约之，终光禄寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158153_comment'></div>介之，终太常寺太祝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158153_comment'></div>延之，大理寺丞，公得谢，特赐绯袍银鱼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158153_comment'></div>修之，大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158153_comment'></div>皆俨然在次，号瘠如礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158153_comment'></div>于是发龟策，合内外姻与谋，以秋九月某日，克葬公于许州阳翟县三封之原，以二夫人祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158153_comment'></div>初，母夫人捐养京师，命不还葬，于是作新茔，乃令异位同域，庶公之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158153_comment'></div>公兴诸生，进官于朝，其践历大概著矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158153_comment'></div>至总局如审官、审刑、太常礼三院，尚书都省，通进银台，群牧使，昭文馆，会灵观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158153_comment'></div>奉使则再，充契丹国信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158153_comment'></div>特选则知礼部贡举；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158153_comment'></div>权置则南郊礼仪、大礼使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158153_comment'></div>常兼则集贤、昭文二大学士，监修国史，译经润文使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158153_comment'></div>皆馀功他阀，便蕃烜赫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158153_comment'></div>至善状尚多，不得详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158153_comment'></div>勋、阶、爵并极本品，功臣文四十，邑食万户，实食三之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158153_comment'></div>公不喜为皦厉行，要以天下中庸自居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158153_comment'></div>荐宠士大夫，惟力所视，无有爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158153_comment'></div>茍显于时，弗啻己自出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158153_comment'></div>与人交，久而益亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158153_comment'></div>仕十六官，未始有毫发谴咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158153_comment'></div>虽长喙缓颊，不敢加非于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158153_comment'></div>不植私，不援党，家无言利之老，室无徼福之祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158153_comment'></div>在宰相府，务总纲纪，去烦苛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158153_comment'></div>临大事从容镇静，无遽色亟言见于几微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158153_comment'></div>士之辨锐自喜者，或上谒，有所开说，公为陈大体，皆语塞自引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158153_comment'></div>至上书过訾宰政，天子下其章，他辅臣欲雠实所言，公第置之，无所辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158153_comment'></div>监司绳切州县，更约束，劾发微密，所至纷然，公白其非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158153_comment'></div>是时急于吏课，一切听之，未几，议不以为便，举皆复故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158153_comment'></div>辅政八年，章程修明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158153_comment'></div>其嘉猷纳之上，庶绩付之有司，功名势地，皆一不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158153_comment'></div>故论者但美公德，不能言其所以德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158153_comment'></div>彼挈挈可名者，果其细耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158153_comment'></div>公善行草书，笔法遒婉，时人弆牍秘爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158153_comment'></div>论著文章数百篇，雅懿沈郁，薄天人之极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158153_comment'></div>其为《章惠太后册》，上最称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158153_comment'></div>奉诏撰《御书梵字后记》，铺衍宏丽，文林韪服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158153_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158153_comment'></div>天与善人旧矣，又曰「仁者寿」，挟二必然之理，与公之啬和，不能抗有定之数，使登期颐，固所谓不尽信而难谌者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158153_comment'></div>古之遭时君，必终始自托，然始未尝不隆，而后稍薄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158153_comment'></div>如公叠宠蕃数，存无比而殁有加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158153_comment'></div>易名之日，太常谥曰文宪，至内外无间言，全德哉若人！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158153_comment'></div>仆辱公知，且其嗣有请，遂为之铭：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_122_1158153'>在宋四世，帝功极炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158153_comment'></div>显显有郇，实相而济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158153_comment'></div>二陲休宁，时公之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158153_comment'></div>薰以太和，物夥岁丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158153_comment'></div>遂安元元，以揉万邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158153_comment'></div>乘车啴啴，高牙言言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158153_comment'></div>公有文武，之翰之蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1158153_comment'></div>既老而传，顿首乞身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1158153_comment'></div>天子有命，尔作司空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1158153_comment'></div>弗职以劳，安啬而冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1158153_comment'></div>公有阴德，大济于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1158153_comment'></div>宜永斯年，乃不期颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1158153_comment'></div>六飞骎骎，厥第是临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1158153_comment'></div>裨衣丰貂，既襚乃廞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1158153_comment'></div>贲柩荣终，谁克之如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1158153_comment'></div>本公忠劳，感会有初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1158153_comment'></div>降体颍滨，大宵无晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1158153_comment'></div>孰襄厥事，若子而孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1158153_comment'></div>下有千载，追慕如仁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_140_1158153_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年10月25日</a>　十月二十五日，在京为翰林学士，因误进张贵妃官告，落职知许州。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='69a19b6ef1374e369e29efe4933e7eab_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("69a19b6ef1374e369e29efe4933e7eab");'><span id='69a19b6ef1374e369e29efe4933e7eab_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1051')">1049-1051年</a>，52-54岁</div><div id='69a19b6ef1374e369e29efe4933e7eab' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　春，在京为翰林侍读学士，受命作张士逊神道碑。作品：张文懿公士逊旧德之碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五七。）</span><div id='poem_1158144' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158144' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158144?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张文懿公士逊旧德之碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158144")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158144_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158144'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158144'>惟宋四叶，天以端命付皇帝，既社南邦，乃建元储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158144_comment'></div>始御资善堂，参听天下事，真庙委成，群臣遵审训，奉上国宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158144_comment'></div>皇帝即位，重光合华，道益大兴，天焘地持，罔有不承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158144_comment'></div>惟其佐曰清河张公，由户部、吏部二郎中直昭文馆，为寿春及升府咨议参军，以右谏议大夫历太子左右庶子，进枢密直学士，为宾客，以枢密副使、给事中领詹事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158144_comment'></div>出入两宫，实辅实维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158144_comment'></div>逮潜而飞，神摅景发，首羾天极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158144_comment'></div>上之六年，制诏有司：「先帝遗朕宝臣曰士逊，毗亮厥初，勤劳我家，外经内干，声烈嘉饪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158144_comment'></div>罔德不酬，朕庶几焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158144_comment'></div>尔惟相，且类台德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158144_comment'></div>前此，公已三迁为尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158144_comment'></div>乃以礼部尚书、中书门下平章事，分执政事笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158144_comment'></div>于是纲纪文章，张设修明，公与二三臣协恭济虔，风力锐甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158144_comment'></div>因其故而奉行之，本其宜而财相之，所以镇浮扼动，便安元元之道甚备，翕然号称职相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158144_comment'></div>故枢密使曹利用素贵强，宗子留乡里使酒不轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158144_comment'></div>既具狱，或谓利用并坐，上疑以问执政，众噤嘿相顾望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158144_comment'></div>公徐曰：「利用大臣，宜不知状，独不肖子为之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158144_comment'></div>时间语先入，利用得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158144_comment'></div>公以议不合，罢为刑部尚书、知江宁府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158144_comment'></div>宰相文正王曾亦为上别白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158144_comment'></div>曹事终，曹氏复爵土，还所籍产，官其子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158144_comment'></div>居二岁，朝京师，以检校太傅领定国军节度、知许州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158144_comment'></div>踰年，用旧官复入相，进中书侍郎兼兵部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158144_comment'></div>明年，上专揽万务，除门下侍郎，仍前官，遂总魁柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158144_comment'></div>未几，以左仆射保留西洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158144_comment'></div>时杨崇勋亦罢枢密使，以帅节兼台司，同谢殿中班，在公右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158144_comment'></div>帝怃然悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158144_comment'></div>明日，授公检校太师、山南东道节度，以宰相秩复守许昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158144_comment'></div>公不以汉相尊废事事，为政有体，不曲折烦苛，时时方略纵舍，有足观者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158144_comment'></div>赋更在民，类先与期，故所到皆有惠利仁爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158144_comment'></div>筑大堤环城，以障瀿潦，癐积燥完，户免垫愁，许人蒙休，镵碧颂功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158144_comment'></div>移判河南府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158144_comment'></div>久之，上推雅故，复进公为上宰，尽还前在丞相府之领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158144_comment'></div>俄封郢国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158144_comment'></div>公既以年高位隆，万或一悔，有不胜任之责，乃七表让还印绶，面陈又十数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158144_comment'></div>虽上之所以拒而留者，亦不胜记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158144_comment'></div>公执不回，遂册拜太傅，进封邓国公，听谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158144_comment'></div>特诏朝朔望，大朝会并缀中书门下班，出入施伞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158144_comment'></div>与一子五品绯，赐近城园一区，月给实俸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158144_comment'></div>国朝自中书得老者，以公为初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158144_comment'></div>辞朔望，惟朝会一再至，至必上眷瞩加等，或遣中侍者劳问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158144_comment'></div>尝御书飞白「千岁」二字，赐公难老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158144_comment'></div>公因铺叙前后所锡书九百函，为歌一篇，赞成盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158144_comment'></div>皇祐元年正月己未薨于第，享年八十有六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158144_comment'></div>翌日问闻，上骇叹，趣外办车驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158144_comment'></div>或言日直陛下元命，不可往，上曰：「股肱实亏，日于何避」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158144_comment'></div>遂行，哭之恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158144_comment'></div>赐银三千两，布帛醪米副之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158144_comment'></div>以太师、中书令贲其柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158144_comment'></div>进升宗党官若职者十有六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158144_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158144_comment'></div>公字顺之，淳化中与乡进士试禁中，占对鸿彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158144_comment'></div>太宗异之，擢乙科，调郧乡主簿、射洪令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158144_comment'></div>以异政闻，改襄阳令，外忧自免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158144_comment'></div>还，除秘书著作佐郎、知邵武县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158144_comment'></div>转本省丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158144_comment'></div>虢略杨亿在翰林，高持风鉴，少所器可，荐公才堪御史，因授监察御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158144_comment'></div>顷江南转运使阙，中书进拟辄却，真宗不次用公，执政贺上得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158144_comment'></div>换广南东路，三迁至兵部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158144_comment'></div>代还，授河北转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158144_comment'></div>改工部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158144_comment'></div>河齧棣州，有诏徙阳信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158144_comment'></div>官见粮多，不可以迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158144_comment'></div>公视濒河数州方歉食，即计馀以贷民，年如约输入新郡，振乏权赢，众赖以纾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158144_comment'></div>真宗最公治状，欲遂寘左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158144_comment'></div>会王府开，面命公曰：「枚选于众，无易而才」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158144_comment'></div>公拜稽首，遂用调护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158144_comment'></div>公身七尺，进退安重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158144_comment'></div>中隐正，外文明，笃于孝友，根于仁爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158144_comment'></div>一时士大夫歆艳，成就出门下者，皆名流钜人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158144_comment'></div>施予姻旧，禀稍略足，不问在否几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158144_comment'></div>任枢省凡八年，后三至台辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158144_comment'></div>去位又十年，所遇不同，而事皆可纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158144_comment'></div>方上谅闇，冢司持衡，排抵时望，阴席权宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158144_comment'></div>公居其间，防检百为，身侔长城，虑先元龟，妖脂谗具，无所投污，然而卒定大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158144_comment'></div>盖乾兴时，善公之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158144_comment'></div>章献佐治，轩陛重严，公事二圣，外谋必闻，里言不宣，孝承慈佑，鸿名双济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158144_comment'></div>及乾刚独奋，有弗厌者，一切罢免，而公见留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158144_comment'></div>宰相文惠陈尧佐门下生窃出上书，妄言变事，又有讥谏官立党者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158144_comment'></div>公还奏上前，质其诬蔑，于是告者结三岁刑，谏官事寝不下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158144_comment'></div>故明道间，见公之忠，耆德复用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158144_comment'></div>上方厉精听断，公朝夕进见，一力匪懈，登畯吁良，缉兴化条，太和嘉生，蒸薄渗漉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158144_comment'></div>举天下全盛，视公所以致君至不至耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158144_comment'></div>大抵相创业者先功，相守成者先德，经纶之业易言，而镇靖之绩难知，公可谓治世之杰辅，皇极之全懿者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158144_comment'></div>故宝元以来，著公之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158144_comment'></div>公之引年，人间事一不概意，阅黄老旁行书，粗以应外，精以治内，乘和日化，与相颓靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158144_comment'></div>再过乡上冢，召故人长者，散金为寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158144_comment'></div>野服巾车，不自贵其贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158144_comment'></div>百祉蕃并，化为康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158144_comment'></div>偃然牖下，如蜕一委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158144_comment'></div>当此时，搢绅大夫之辈，又善公终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158144_comment'></div>圣上所以恻恒悼痛，举哀外次，三不视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158144_comment'></div>有司谥为文懿，匪公孰宜！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158144_comment'></div>凡附官见职者：审官、审刑二院，史馆、会灵观判官，以近臣兼之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158144_comment'></div>契丹国信使，在藩房时，帝所特选；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158144_comment'></div>祥源观使，以宥密领之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158144_comment'></div>集贤殿、昭文馆二学士，监国子、南郊大礼使、献懿二太后园陵使，以执政莅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158144_comment'></div>邑户万五千七百，勋阶极品，功臣出处更二十六号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158144_comment'></div>公于书史，多所汎览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158144_comment'></div>为辞章，深纯典正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158144_comment'></div>尤嗜诗，所得皆自然经奇，无所彫劂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158144_comment'></div>故礼部尚书清河张咏许为第一流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158144_comment'></div>生平编次成十集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158144_comment'></div>既诏索遗藁，家丞录五集以献，遂秘禁中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158144_comment'></div>信乎，有德而又有言者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158144_comment'></div>公之先，盖汉阳王柬之苗裔，系牒湮落，世数失传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158144_comment'></div>至曾大父讳育，从唐本道帅赵凝府钩校用度，奏为大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158144_comment'></div>凝破，避兵溯汉，止均州郧乡，道葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158144_comment'></div>配曰郭氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158144_comment'></div>大父讳裕，试金吾卫长史，主阴城盐铁院，配曰胡氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158144_comment'></div>父廷朗，隐约违世，配曰赵氏、二庞氏、李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158144_comment'></div>公能推恩，以开府仪同三司、太师、中书令、尚书令、郕、楚、韩三国公上追先烈，以燕、晋、魏、韩、鲁、越国，封自妣而上五族太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158144_comment'></div>公即魏国所生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158144_comment'></div>七日而母夫人丧，属公于姑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158144_comment'></div>顾复劳苦，至于成立，公请于朝，封姑为南阳县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158144_comment'></div>其丧也，如母而不缞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158144_comment'></div>姑子全氏，赠太子左赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158144_comment'></div>公娶姓三：蒋、黄氏，追封晋陵、英国二夫人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158144_comment'></div>冯氏，封舒国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158144_comment'></div>四男子：曰友直，刑部员外郎、直史馆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158144_comment'></div>曰友称，殿中丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158144_comment'></div>曰友正，将作监丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158144_comment'></div>曰友谊，奉礼郎，独早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158144_comment'></div>上恤其孤，故友直为史馆修撰，友称任亲民官，友正选大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158144_comment'></div>薨之年夏四月癸酉，克葬公于河南府登封县天中乡之原，英、舒二夫人祔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158144_comment'></div>诸子以叙公之业有故吏状，饰公之惠有容官议，册悯于朝，志埋于幽，奏终藏事，无不如志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158144_comment'></div>惟纤石巍存，可刻以磨，若又著庸其上，显摅无穷，谁不谓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158144_comment'></div>乃请而命史臣祁系以词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158144_comment'></div>曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_127_1158144'>惟天兴雨，有云歊蒸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158144_comment'></div>惟辟抚期，有贤挺生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1158144_comment'></div>贤者谓谁，英英令君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1158144_comment'></div>朅来于朝，对我圣真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1158144_comment'></div>帝启南社，实护且毗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1158144_comment'></div>既在东宫，陟降不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1158144_comment'></div>帝受昌珍，瑞福纷纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1158144_comment'></div>负日当天，四海复晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1158144_comment'></div>内经鸿枢，帝心以嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1158144_comment'></div>三陟宰司，并秉将牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1158144_comment'></div>公之在朝，施设有方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1158144_comment'></div>百工仪仪，莫匪畯良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1158144_comment'></div>公之出藩，人以阜安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1158144_comment'></div>黍稷炽丰，靡厉靡患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1158144_comment'></div>圄牢岁空，吏不傅爰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1158144_comment'></div>老还第家，为国傅臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1158144_comment'></div>班视台铉，宠光益振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1158144_comment'></div>陶天之和，用克永年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1158144_comment'></div>未始疾忧，委化而蟺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1158144_comment'></div>帝叹憖遗，行不便时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1158144_comment'></div>殓以衮章，殁轸馀思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1158144_comment'></div>凡公猷为，一代宗臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1158144_comment'></div>有勋在史，有德在民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1158144_comment'></div>昔周之奭，佐成以功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1158144_comment'></div>叶振权纲，王道郅隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1158144_comment'></div>在唐之说，辅明以嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1158144_comment'></div>拥全威灵，大猷讫济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1158144_comment'></div>公视二臣，孰为后先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1158144_comment'></div>著辞表阡，风烈永传。</div><div id='poem_sentence_155_1158144_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年6月21日</a>　六月二十一日，在京为翰林侍读学士，自同刊修《唐书》官改为刊修《唐书》官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　本年，在京为翰林侍读学士，应王子融之请作《故丞相文正王公碑阴记》作品：故丞相文正王公碑阴记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158021?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故丞相文正王公碑阴记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158021")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158021'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158021'>故丞相沂国公既葬十二年，仲弟天章阁待制子融请间见，上追叹公据正有守，得宰相体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158021_comment'></div>子融顿首谢，且言：「臣兄曾事章圣皇帝，兴诸生，不十年参总大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158021_comment'></div>其后拜玉几下，闻顾命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158021_comment'></div>大行诏章献皇后权军国大事，于时宰相谓阴开邪谋，规刊权文，营罔中外，众莫敢抗，独臣兄毅然不肯移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158021_comment'></div>又欲建白天子朝朔望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158021_comment'></div>太后听政，附中人通裁可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158021_comment'></div>即又引东汉故事，请帝、太后同视事，伪计不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158021_comment'></div>方谓谮逐大臣如寇准、李迪等，钩索株连，以动众心，臣兄中立其间，为国督视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158021_comment'></div>隐慝廋情，卒不得施，遂用诈败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158021_comment'></div>太后再受徽号，欲御天安殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158021_comment'></div>复奏言，止御文德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158021_comment'></div>既忤旨，因灾异策免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158021_comment'></div>然太后以数救谏，不能无念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158021_comment'></div>抑畏谦慈，勤翊王家，大业以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158021_comment'></div>此其事陛下尤彰明较著者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158021_comment'></div>上曰：「乃昆之勋，予一人不忘」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158021_comment'></div>子融再拜曰：「陛下幸诏臣寮，勒词隧石，诚得天笔篆额，敷赉前人，死骨不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158021_comment'></div>劝宠忠门，由臣为初」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158021_comment'></div>制曰可，乃置「旌贤碑」三字赐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158021_comment'></div>于是，天章君即金石刻，又欲侈上之褒，丐辞叙其末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158021_comment'></div>仆念已尝志丞相墓，且翰林铭功，其事大略著矣，独原夫天子念丞相贤而旌之者，宁不以临大事不可夺欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158021_comment'></div>损抑过举，以绝未萌，而为之所欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158021_comment'></div>功格于天，默不自名欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158021_comment'></div>仆尝论治乱之机不容发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158021_comment'></div>如令丞相当是时一有假借，则纪律纷更，权迫势陵，憸人乘之，抵巘投隙，意有所肆，沦胥淫夷，遂蹈后艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158021_comment'></div>凡列爵几何，底罚几何，而后能定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158021_comment'></div>由是观之，丞相之勋，可以言者其大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158021_comment'></div>夫阴施之所及广，则阳德之蒙报显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158021_comment'></div>故丞相虽贤，待圣人乃明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158021_comment'></div>初，公于天章敦爱甚，而天章奉公也无不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158021_comment'></div>始丞相未贵时，娶蔡、李二夫人，早亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158021_comment'></div>及贵，谦不封国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158021_comment'></div>天章岁比当迁，辄上书还一官为二夫人追封，成公志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158021_comment'></div>至是，又引甲令，建螭首龟趺，丞相之名，由天章益传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158021_comment'></div>《春秋》之法，于善善也，长至刻祭，彝铭乐栾，皆所以行远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158021_comment'></div>况珉表之隐然，天文之粲然，披九函之潜光，奋无穷之休烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158021_comment'></div>后虽百千岁，拜馀风、泣遗直者曰，此贤丞相之陇欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158021_comment'></div>呜呼，盛哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1158021_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　本年，在京为翰林侍读学士，有启上夏竦。作品：河阳夏侍中启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1157751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河阳夏侍中启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157751")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157751'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157751'>向解州符，入陪禁籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157751_comment'></div>铩羽重奋，势固未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157751_comment'></div>重创始平，理当滋慎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157751_comment'></div>不时通于奏记，恐仰累于所天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157751_comment'></div>久而省循，乃敢参讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157751_comment'></div>伏自侍中避剧右洛，改镇盟津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157751_comment'></div>委远功名，镇息流竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157751_comment'></div>内保元吉，自存介石之诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157751_comment'></div>彼有褊心，弗碍虚舟之触。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157751_comment'></div>卓焉高躅，冠我群伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157751_comment'></div>但缘一德之隆，终伫三能之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157751_comment'></div>愿崇贤老，永对贞期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157751_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1157751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年3月29日</a>　三月二十九日，在京为翰林侍读学士，上《明堂通议》二篇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年3月</a>　三月，在京为翰林侍读学士，荐王洙为礼官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年3月</a>　三月，在京为翰林侍读学士，上《上帝五帝议》，时判太常寺。作品：上帝五帝议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四二。）</span><div id='poem_1157330' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157330' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157330?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上帝五帝议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157330")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157330_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157330'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157330'>郑康成以上天之神凡六：昊天者，天皇大帝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157330_comment'></div>五帝者，太微五帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157330_comment'></div>王肃曰：昊天惟一神，以五帝为次神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157330_comment'></div>而诸儒附郑者多，故据而为说云，凡合祭五帝，一岁有二祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157330_comment'></div>龙见之月，祭于南郊，谓之大雩，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157330_comment'></div>九月，大飨于明堂，宗祀文王以配，二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157330_comment'></div>祭明堂者，诸儒之言不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157330_comment'></div>或说周家祭五天帝皆明堂中，以五人帝及文王配，五官神坐廷中，以武王配，号曰祖宗，礼所谓祖文王而宗武王者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157330_comment'></div>施设神位，准五行相向以为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157330_comment'></div>威仰在卯，西面；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157330_comment'></div>熛怒在午，北面；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157330_comment'></div>枢纽在未，北面；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157330_comment'></div>招拒在酉，东面；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157330_comment'></div>汁光纪在子，南面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157330_comment'></div>太皞、炎帝、黄帝、少皞、高辛各在其位少退，句芒、祝融、后土、蓐收、玄冥皆在人帝下少后，文王坐太皞之南，位如主人，武王少退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157330_comment'></div>或曰，合祭之日，五精之帝皆西面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157330_comment'></div>其牲则天帝各一犊，合用十牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157330_comment'></div>文王之牲用太牢，以《诗·我将》篇曰：「我将我享，维羊维牛」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157330_comment'></div>文王、武王而用太牢者，以五人帝各配一天，为之主，足为外神依止，则文王汎配五帝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157330_comment'></div>以不专配，则所用牲得从尽物之享云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157330_comment'></div>汉武帝祠太一五帝于明堂上坐，牲以太牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157330_comment'></div>礼毕，燎堂下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157330_comment'></div>晋武帝初议明堂，群臣曰：「五帝即天也，王气时异，故殊其号，虽名有五，其实一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157330_comment'></div>明堂、南郊宜除五帝坐，五郊改五精之号，皆同称昊天上帝，各设一位而已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157330_comment'></div>诏可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157330_comment'></div>时韩阳建言：「古建明堂，咸秩五帝，无祭一天者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157330_comment'></div>帝下诏曰：「往者众议除明堂五帝位，考之礼文，不正，其复之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157330_comment'></div>挚虞议以为：「汉魏故事，明堂祀五帝之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157330_comment'></div>新礼，五帝即上帝，上帝即天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157330_comment'></div>明堂除五帝之位，惟祭上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157330_comment'></div>按仲尼称『郊祀后稷以配天，宗祀文王于明堂以配上帝』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157330_comment'></div>《周礼》，祀天旅上帝，祀地旅四望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157330_comment'></div>四望非地，则上帝非天，断可识矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157330_comment'></div>郊丘之祀，扫地而祭，牲用茧栗，器用陶匏，事反其始，故配以远祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157330_comment'></div>明堂之祭，备物以荐，三牲并陈，笾豆成列，礼同人理，故配以近考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157330_comment'></div>郊堂兆位，居然异体，牲牢品物，质文殊趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157330_comment'></div>且祖考同配，非谓尊严之美；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157330_comment'></div>三日再祀，非谓不黩之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157330_comment'></div>其非一神，亦足明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157330_comment'></div>昔在上古，生为明王，没配五行，故太昊配木，神农配火，少昊配金，高辛配水，黄帝配土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157330_comment'></div>此五帝者，配天之神，同兆之于四郊，报之于明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157330_comment'></div>祀天，大裘而冕，祀五帝亦如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157330_comment'></div>或以为五精之帝，佐天育物者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157330_comment'></div>前代相因，莫之或废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157330_comment'></div>前韩阳上书，宜如旧祀五帝，诏已施用，请改定新礼」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157330_comment'></div>从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157330_comment'></div>唐礼部尚书许敬宗议：「祠令新礼，并用郑氏六天之说，圆丘祀昊天上帝，大郊祀太微感帝，明堂祠太微五帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157330_comment'></div>按郑氏惟据谶纬，以说六天，皆谓星象，而昊天上帝，不属穹苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157330_comment'></div>其注《月令》、《周官》，以昊天上帝为北辰星曜魄宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157330_comment'></div>注《孝经》，明堂，为太微五帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157330_comment'></div>按《易》：『日月丽于天，百谷草木丽于地』，『在天成象，在地成形』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157330_comment'></div>足明辰象非天，草木非地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157330_comment'></div>毛苌传曰：『元气浩大，则称昊天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157330_comment'></div>远视苍苍，则称苍天』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157330_comment'></div>此则苍昊为体，不入星例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157330_comment'></div>且天地各一，是曰两仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157330_comment'></div>天尚无二，帝焉有六？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157330_comment'></div>是以王肃群儒咸非其义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157330_comment'></div>起居舍人王仲丘又以：「贞观礼，季秋祀五帝明堂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157330_comment'></div>显庆礼，祀昊天上帝于明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157330_comment'></div>准《孝经》说，先以为天是感精之帝，上帝即太微五帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157330_comment'></div>且上帝之号，本属昊天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157330_comment'></div>《周礼》，『王将旅上帝，张毡案，设皇邸，祀五帝，张大次小次』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157330_comment'></div>由此言之，上帝之于五帝，自有差等，不可混而为一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157330_comment'></div>郑注《孝经》：『上帝者，天之别名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157330_comment'></div>神无二主，故异其处，以避后稷』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157330_comment'></div>孔安国曰：『帝亦天也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157330_comment'></div>然则禋享上帝，有合经义，而五方皆祀，行之已久，请二礼并行，以成《月令》大享帝之义」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157330_comment'></div>诏可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1157330_comment'></div>自是不改，国朝因之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1157330_comment'></div>臣按诸儒之说上帝及五帝，纷然不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1157330_comment'></div>王肃以为上帝即昊天，郑康成谓昊天为皇大帝，五帝为太微五帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1157330_comment'></div>王郑二说既显，学者争为执辨，虽天子亦不能果定其文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1157330_comment'></div>然臣以为就经言之，仲尼之意傥可见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1157330_comment'></div>《孝经》曰：「孝莫大于严父，严父莫大于配天」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1157330_comment'></div>又曰：「郊祀后稷以配天，宗祀文王于明堂以配上帝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1157330_comment'></div>《周颂·我将》篇曰：「祀文王也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1157330_comment'></div>「我将我享，维羊维牛，惟天其右之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1157330_comment'></div>伊嘏文王，既右享之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1157330_comment'></div>《孝经》言配天而后言上帝，《诗》当言帝右而云天右，是天为上帝，上帝为天，互文以见义也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1157330_comment'></div>天之所以为五帝者，先儒之议多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1157330_comment'></div>近大儒孙奭建言：「天虽一神，以其至尊，故有多名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1157330_comment'></div>亦犹人君称皇、王、后、辟、天王、天子、皇帝、县官，臣民曰陛下，史臣曰上，服用曰乘舆，出入曰车驾，各随德义而称，亦以至尊故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1157330_comment'></div>以天帝之神，迭王五时，故圣人制礼，谓之五帝，非五帝各一神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1157330_comment'></div>窃谓先儒不怪《诗》传天有五名，而独怪帝有五号」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1157330_comment'></div>奭又以：「岁九祭皆主于天，至日圆丘，正月祈谷，五时迎气，孟夏雩，季秋享，凡九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1157330_comment'></div>惟至日其礼最大，故称曰昊天上帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1157330_comment'></div>昊天者，以礼称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1157330_comment'></div>上帝者，以德兼举，礼大故也，其馀则否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1157330_comment'></div>至于大雩，祈百谷之雨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1157330_comment'></div>大享，报百谷之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1157330_comment'></div>以五帝者有生成之功，祈报之礼，阙一不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1157330_comment'></div>虽止一神，并陈五位，不知神之于彼乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1157330_comment'></div>于此乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1157330_comment'></div>奭言如是，其得也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1157330_comment'></div>然而欲去昊天上帝一位，止设五帝，臣以为礼有未然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1157330_comment'></div>号昊天者，以其元气魁然，乘五行王气，普临万物，因时显功，人强以名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1157330_comment'></div>故春曰青帝，夏曰赤帝，犹春为苍天，冬为上天耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1157330_comment'></div>唐以来，二家之说兼行，故今享礼有六帝位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1157330_comment'></div>虽然，奭许于彼于此而求之矣，何独有五而非六乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1157330_comment'></div>故兼存之，则示圣人尊天奉神，不敢有所裁臆云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_100_1157330_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年9月</a>　九月，在京为翰林侍读学士，作《明堂颂》作品：明堂颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三五。）</span><div id='poem_1158044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明堂颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158044")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158044_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158044'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158044'>臣某言：三月戊子制诏，季秋有事于明堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158044_comment'></div>臣以太常，与礼官、博士诣垂拱殿议配飨事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158044_comment'></div>即建言：「周有臣曰旦，始严父配天，仲尼是之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158044_comment'></div>唐并诸儒说，并祀六天，帝不敢损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158044_comment'></div>陛下幸访有司，请如古便」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158044_comment'></div>四月乙丑，诏若曰：「夫礼，称情适文，今议者言周、唐则善，至牵制所闻，褊而不优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158044_comment'></div>宋亦一家，让不制作，如来嗣何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158044_comment'></div>且事天不及地，配父而遗祖，朕甚陋之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158044_comment'></div>水旱不时，群神预焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158044_comment'></div>今赖天之力，方内以治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158044_comment'></div>朕能合飨天地，以三圣侑，啜报百神，咸秩并修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158044_comment'></div>况祖宗郊雩，不为无比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158044_comment'></div>有司无讳以劳，务称朕意」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158044_comment'></div>臣伏诵圣训，久乃开晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158044_comment'></div>以为前古所缺，群臣不逮，陛下独得于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158044_comment'></div>其所以事神训人，使万世子孙无以加者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158044_comment'></div>至于作声歌，琢圭邸，帐帟无文，夜鼜弗严，以竭恭致敬者尚数十物，臣愚且不能遍知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158044_comment'></div>若今诗颂不传，是陛下盛德神功不尽注天下耳目，耸动四夷，声隐乎无疆也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158044_comment'></div>谨撰成《明堂颂》一篇，辞浅义直，可使户晓，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_18_1158044", 1158044, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>壤翁</span>辕童，皆得歌讴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158044_comment'></div>臣昧死再拜以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158044_comment'></div>颂曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1158044'>天有明命，以圣付圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158044_comment'></div>太祖太宗，燮代大定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158044_comment'></div>谁僭而王，孰坛而土？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158044_comment'></div>左披右攘，罔不就绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158044_comment'></div>厥角在廷，四夷无侮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158044_comment'></div>真考显承，受报收成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158044_comment'></div>休休厥宁，震震厥声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158044_comment'></div>七十而五，号以大荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158044_comment'></div>皇帝纂武，有庇于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158044_comment'></div>兵櫜不铦，箙委而羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158044_comment'></div>一农之饥，吾饲以哺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158044_comment'></div>一夫之寒，吾暖以褚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158044_comment'></div>日宽租徭，岁贷囚瘐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158044_comment'></div>协气四薄，顺旸若雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158044_comment'></div>原高隰下，百谷膴膴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158044_comment'></div>二十九载，惟秋九月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158044_comment'></div>乃即大庆，度筵度室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158044_comment'></div>宝字署颜，震照多物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158044_comment'></div>置使有五，悉诏辅弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158044_comment'></div>既款灵宫，亦享庙祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158044_comment'></div>天兵桓桓，罗列卫营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158044_comment'></div>有闟有斿，龙轭螭衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158044_comment'></div>耳耳其驱，雅雅于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158044_comment'></div>旖旎连蜷，风舞云萦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158044_comment'></div>士若衔枚，骖牡不鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158044_comment'></div>吉日辛亥，进祀于堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158044_comment'></div>衣画衮然，环瑀玱玱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158044_comment'></div>六帝二祇，三后侑旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158044_comment'></div>醴淳牲肥，嘉樽钜房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158044_comment'></div>芼醢果粢，净洁芬香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158044_comment'></div>膋炽胖升，以迪厥尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158044_comment'></div>我钟钦钦，我舞俣俣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158044_comment'></div>天妥于坐，百灵来序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158044_comment'></div>奔精哆光，曶霍层宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158044_comment'></div>山灵渎怪，显幽驰骛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158044_comment'></div>或旅诸墀，或席诸庑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158044_comment'></div>有膻斯饫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158044_comment'></div>相维辟公，既敏而度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158044_comment'></div>帝拜稽首，柴烟上举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158044_comment'></div>祝有嘏言，皇帝受之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158044_comment'></div>产百斯祥，裒万斯禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158044_comment'></div>其矗如山，其积如茨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158044_comment'></div>皇帝曰咨，朕不专有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158044_comment'></div>旦御端门，百执奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158044_comment'></div>其赦天下，新邦之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158044_comment'></div>赒乏录劳，刮濯痕垢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158044_comment'></div>官赏兵赉，金爵是富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158044_comment'></div>驿欢四海，间弗容昼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158044_comment'></div>天谓皇帝，感实火德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158044_comment'></div>火德在孝，宗祀惟极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158044_comment'></div>其还而功，恤嗣千亿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158044_comment'></div>而子而孙，长有万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158044_comment'></div>天谓皇帝，安我群元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158044_comment'></div>投蛑斥螟，稼溢于廛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158044_comment'></div>厉讫疾攘，人乐跹跹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158044_comment'></div>皇帝眉寿，永锡万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158044_comment'></div>前祀三日，区霿如闭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158044_comment'></div>皇帝既斋，一夕而霁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158044_comment'></div>六幕扫除，若𡏖逢彗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158044_comment'></div>天清地晏，夜星腾晰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158044_comment'></div>皇帝小心，恭与虔并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158044_comment'></div>遍见神祇，拜跪送迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158044_comment'></div>久立于次，须乐之成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158044_comment'></div>器必全玉，牢不爱牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158044_comment'></div>制为诸安，以正和清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158044_comment'></div>夜鼓彻严，敷致厥诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158044_comment'></div>明明皇帝，惟先训是式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158044_comment'></div>惇睦懿亲，其磬如石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158044_comment'></div>存问<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_88_1158044", 1158044, "Clauses/198/Comments/0")'>龆耋</span>，容受谠直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158044_comment'></div>振淹登畯，毋或失职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158044_comment'></div>惟慈惟仁，不厉声以色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158044_comment'></div>皇帝有言，克己则兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158044_comment'></div>丰守吾俭，尊舍吾矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158044_comment'></div>惟日之升，瞿瞿兢兢，无不此或承。</div><div id='poem_sentence_93_1158044_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　秋，在京为翰林侍读学士，受命为李用和作行状。作品：李郡王行状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六一。）</span><div id='poem_1158131' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158131' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158131?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李郡王行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158131")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158131'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158131'>李用和，字审礼，年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158131_comment'></div>郡王本陇西冠姓，世系数徙，邢公自馀杭北还，遂籍祥符为土著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158131_comment'></div>王即章懿皇后母弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158131_comment'></div>性审谨，慥慥自将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158131_comment'></div>少为魏王彭城刘美所识，且与王有里表，故任为三班奉识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158131_comment'></div>试剧有能，三迁右侍禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158131_comment'></div>俄兼閤门祗候，为开封府考城县兵马都监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158131_comment'></div>明道元年，章懿皇后崩，诏王会丧京师，已葬，转礼宾副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158131_comment'></div>俄持节劳赐西平王德明，奉使有指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158131_comment'></div>是岁，大营宫室，王分护涂填宫城，迁正使，兼领皇城司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158131_comment'></div>明年，改葬懿后，诏王佐经总，哀恪诚尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158131_comment'></div>故陵地卑，不能无沮洳，上怒有司谋始不谨，俗簿责其由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158131_comment'></div>命王按视，王畏得罪者众，委曲申理，由是稍解，主者皆释不诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158131_comment'></div>九月，改崇仪使兼贺州刺史，领介兵千骑，护梓宫而西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158131_comment'></div>上嘉王之勤，锡慰系道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158131_comment'></div>十月，复土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158131_comment'></div>明年二月，诏王乘传行后陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158131_comment'></div>还，拜宁州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158131_comment'></div>是冬，改泽州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158131_comment'></div>四年，进庆州防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158131_comment'></div>岁中，为鄜州观察使，并仍皇城司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158131_comment'></div>王有风力，部分严整，其条约典旧无一日不讨于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158131_comment'></div>帝益亲任之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158131_comment'></div>宝元二年，以观察印充殿前都虞候，又兼鄜延路驻泊马步军副都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158131_comment'></div>未行，加拜永清军节度观察留后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158131_comment'></div>其秋，换真定府定州路副部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158131_comment'></div>八月，赴屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158131_comment'></div>王下车，晓敕军伍，习战阵，抶惰勉勤，营和畏威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158131_comment'></div>又悉所赐具醪饩，日月享宴，讫无留赀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158131_comment'></div>明年，擢侍卫亲军副都指挥使，更为兵马都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158131_comment'></div>十二月，召还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158131_comment'></div>庆历元年，徙帅马军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158131_comment'></div>明年，拜建武军节度，进领殿前副都指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158131_comment'></div>此三帅府，分提天下兵，以卫天子镇方夏者，居则持扣杖侍楯下，出则导乘舆夹驰离卫，其所以亲近倚爱莫二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158131_comment'></div>王遍历之，出入六年，不懈而虔，未尝有过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158131_comment'></div>后因请见，自陈多病，愿解近职，还私门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158131_comment'></div>上亦以王戚最尊，且春秋高，宜见优礼，不当犹以职事婴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158131_comment'></div>乃以建武节、检校太傅进为宣徽北院使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158131_comment'></div>逾月，改彰德军节度、同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158131_comment'></div>不欲王远去，故留为景灵宫使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158131_comment'></div>王既位显务閒，常阖门移告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158131_comment'></div>八年十月，上亲临问，赐银五千两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158131_comment'></div>王顿首让，不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158131_comment'></div>月馀，有瘳，勉入谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158131_comment'></div>十一月，进检校太尉兼侍中，仍彰德节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158131_comment'></div>王小心简素，虽以元舅之重，在百官诸侯上，未尝招宾客为赫赫声势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158131_comment'></div>有所荐引，皆长厚知名士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158131_comment'></div>不殖赀产，不侈居庑，膳不重肴，室无焞龟，厩无粟驹，四方饷遗一不纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158131_comment'></div>在朝廷兢兢，入私门申申，虽子弟皆奉承修饬，耻为纨裤近习事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158131_comment'></div>初，王未有第，上以芳林园假之，王固辞不敢处，乃假今第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158131_comment'></div>景祐中，天子再郊，皆为大内居守，其见信于上如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158131_comment'></div>皇祐二年秋七月，疾革，乘舆即见卧内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158131_comment'></div>王治家，素不为后计，上哀之，赐银三千两，以所居长为王第，斥官邸无虑数千万直，俾之得永收其入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158131_comment'></div>二子一孙未仕者，悉给廪钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158131_comment'></div>中子西上閤门副使珣，上尝许为閤门使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158131_comment'></div>至是，拜床下，欲王及见之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158131_comment'></div>甲辰，乃薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158131_comment'></div>上即日临吊为恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158131_comment'></div>赙赗加等，以太师、中书令、陇西郡王制书告于柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158131_comment'></div>特诏罢五日朝，发哀苑次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158131_comment'></div>王诸子中，璋、珣、玮先显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158131_comment'></div>璋为神龙卫四厢都指挥使、眉州防御使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158131_comment'></div>玮选尚福康公主，主待年前，拜为滨州刺史、驸马都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158131_comment'></div>皆忠力静畏，虽微荫籍，犹能以才自奋于时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158131_comment'></div>自古外家负贵近，出入禁省，非纵磬险谒，即贪墨不终，故婴、鼢以通轻侠亡，阴、窦以奢状败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158131_comment'></div>若郡王据肺腑之地，可以市权，可以干恩，否则狗马射猎，钟鼓女伎，以穷玩好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158131_comment'></div>今乃畏渐防微，反若韦布儒者，无秋毫之咎挠朝廷法，可谓外戚之贤家，三事之哲老欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158131_comment'></div>《诗》称令终者善其终也，若王非耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158131_comment'></div>今葬有日，史臣被诏，次王行实，敢告有司，请循谥法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158131_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_69_1158131_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　秋，在京为翰林侍读学士，受命为李用和作墓志铭。作品：李郡王墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李郡王墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158150")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158150'>皇祐二年秋七月，有宋元舅彰德军节度使、检校太尉兼侍中李公用和以羸疾闻，太医更往治，弗损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158150_comment'></div>丙申，乘舆临问，公病不能束绅，卧箦泣谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158150_comment'></div>上念公居告久，又素不殖产，赐银三千两，为医祝费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158150_comment'></div>斥官舍百馀区，岁僦二百万与之，使长食其赀，即赐所居为公第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158150_comment'></div>又以次子西上閤门副使珣为正使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158150_comment'></div>二子一孙未仕者，赋其禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158150_comment'></div>皆拜床下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158150_comment'></div>甲辰，公薨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158150_comment'></div>上震恻，是日临吊，哭且恸，赗𧚇络绎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158150_comment'></div>遗命辞诏葬，故遣近侍及中大夫职丧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158150_comment'></div>册赠太师、中书令、陇西郡王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158150_comment'></div>五日不视朝，赐谥曰恭禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158150_comment'></div>壬子，帝举哀苑次，将卜葬，以八月甲申吉，诸子号踊荒痛，乃庀具，有诏葬日以本品卤簿宠之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158150_comment'></div>又命史臣次王之行，镂石藏于襚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158150_comment'></div>谨按，王字审礼，系出陇西，远祖徙馀杭，既又来京师，故今土著，始为开封人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158150_comment'></div>曾祖讳应己，隐不自名，曾妣曰沈夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158150_comment'></div>祖讳延嗣，举进士乙科，终金华主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158150_comment'></div>祖妣曰汪夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158150_comment'></div>考讳仁德，以进士试有司，数诎，晚乃选为三班奉职，终左班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158150_comment'></div>妣曰章夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158150_comment'></div>惟夫人克生元女，嫔帝诞圣，柔风顺教，佐治六宫，终享大号，祔主庙祏，是为章懿皇后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158150_comment'></div>前后延贲三世，并以太师、中书令兼尚书令告第，以舒、邢、魏为三公国，吴、陈、楚为三太夫人国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158150_comment'></div>廞钿刻章，罗照窀涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158150_comment'></div>王即后母弟，少孤，内行修谨，释褐衣，召为廷臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158150_comment'></div>试事连最，益知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158150_comment'></div>以右侍禁、閤门祗候出监考城兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158150_comment'></div>明道元年，会章懿丧，除礼宾副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158150_comment'></div>其年大考宫室，以分护劳正为礼宾使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158150_comment'></div>明年，改治后陵，王参相奉安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158150_comment'></div>帝念后昆弟惟王，思有褒宠，故擢崇仪使兼贺州刺史，将彍骑轻兵护梓宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158150_comment'></div>明年，诏王亲展寝园，还为宁州刺史，改刺泽州，并本州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158150_comment'></div>又迁庆州，加防御使，拜鄜州观察使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158150_comment'></div>自贺及鄜，不即州，领皇城兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158150_comment'></div>宝元二年，仍使号充殿前都虞候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158150_comment'></div>俄加永清军节度观察留后，以帅职出为真定府定州路兵马副都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158150_comment'></div>踰年，迁侍卫亲军步军副都指挥使，更为兵马都部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158150_comment'></div>召还，视本司事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158150_comment'></div>未几，改帅马军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158150_comment'></div>庆历二年，拜建武军节度使，充殿前副指挥使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158150_comment'></div>久之，以建武节进检校太傅，充宣徽北院使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158150_comment'></div>不踰月，授彰德节、同中书门下平章事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158150_comment'></div>王既尊戚慎将，当日进见省户下，故不之镇，留为景灵宫使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158150_comment'></div>居再岁，升门下二品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158150_comment'></div>王临事强敏，然性静畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158150_comment'></div>见可以佐县官者，避戚属，未尝显争得失，率一二密对，故外莫得闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158150_comment'></div>不为狗马玩好驱驰弋猎，不立居宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158150_comment'></div>检御姻族，使循法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158150_comment'></div>此则马廖之慎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158150_comment'></div>先后之启故陵，瀸洳方中，诏王按视，中外为惧，王不一辞措枉于人，物色申右，帝意解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158150_comment'></div>故薄主者罪，往往得原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158150_comment'></div>此则樊宏之畏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158150_comment'></div>前后居爪牙任，为国御侮，岩廊尊荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158150_comment'></div>不竦不哗，退视徼道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158150_comment'></div>按周庐，省幕府，文书惟谨，建白时当，有司率为故常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158150_comment'></div>在河北，尤善抚士，修完器械，勉怯为勇，易单为牢，悉公钱享部校僚属，无留私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158150_comment'></div>景祐中，再郊，王两为大内善守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158150_comment'></div>此则申伯之武也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158150_comment'></div>初，王无第，诏权舍芳林园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158150_comment'></div>王以禁御非人臣所居，固辞，更假今第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158150_comment'></div>此则窦长君之能让也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158150_comment'></div>领殿前兵历四期，后数请间避剧任，帝曰：「叔舅诚年高，尚烦以职事，非所以优之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158150_comment'></div>由是开府视宰相，每朝会大宴，与执政联坐，鸣玉珥貂，进退恂然，亲宠第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158150_comment'></div>尝属疾，辇过候安否，勉医药，赐予千万，又以王经过郊墅，别赐银饰安舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158150_comment'></div>此则邓骘之贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158150_comment'></div>大抵外戚在朝廷，预进退士，干议论，则近权，权且有党；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158150_comment'></div>滋货买田，通四方饷谢，则近侈，侈则多求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158150_comment'></div>王居常谢宾客，罕所荐进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158150_comment'></div>朝或大议论，不敢知，故无党，无党则权不往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158150_comment'></div>用度一出俸，稍抑绝苞苴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158150_comment'></div>其为子孙谋，尽仰所赐产，故求寡，求寡则侈不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158150_comment'></div>且王肺腑要重，茍有开说于上，势宜听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158150_comment'></div>糜金钱，嗜所欲，厚自奉养，人亦无所诋疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158150_comment'></div>而天资俭约，终不舍此为彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158150_comment'></div>使属任之恩始终荫密，不曰贤哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158150_comment'></div>凡功臣号再加，阶光禄大夫，勋上柱国，爵开国公，虚食邑四千户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158150_comment'></div>夫人王氏，以淑懿之行，助宗事，干内法，偕王之贵，封荣国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158150_comment'></div>生男子九：曰璋、珣、琚、琦、瑊、玮、球、瑛、某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158150_comment'></div>璋为眉州刺史兼防御使，领龙神卫四厢都指挥使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158150_comment'></div>珣即前拜閤门使者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158150_comment'></div>琚、琦、瑊、球，皆任内殿承制、崇班；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158150_comment'></div>玮为滨州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158150_comment'></div>初，上欲与王世为甥舅，故诏玮尚福康公主，主待年，玮前拜驸马都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158150_comment'></div>瑛为东都供奉官，早夭，赠如京使、某州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158150_comment'></div>或以沈果进，或以敏干闻，或以谨厚选，其能济王之美而不陨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158150_comment'></div>惟邢公而上，坟墓在馀杭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158150_comment'></div>自魏公始茔开封府祥符县邓公乡原，窆于昭位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158150_comment'></div>今克葬王于魏公之左，为穆位，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158150_comment'></div>昔秦康公以路车乘马赠送晋侯，作《渭阳》之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158150_comment'></div>人微事陋，仲尼以为可传，追什其风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158150_comment'></div>况乎宠外家，褒哲辅，恤终表贤，仪物典册，光明肆大，极天子亲亲之恩，慰先后在天之慈，庸得不识！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158150_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_90_1158150'>王之先，赤舄绵绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158150_comment'></div>乃自馀杭，引而北迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158150_comment'></div>允显魏公，赐始家田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158150_comment'></div>度汴之阳，大表厥阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158150_comment'></div>王之贵，照发于他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158150_comment'></div>帝所自出，亲则舅家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158150_comment'></div>忠力谨庸，福禄是荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158150_comment'></div>台臣之印，上将之牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158150_comment'></div>王之亡，帝恸且伤，五不视朝，哀袭缌裳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158150_comment'></div>师令王爵，追密厥章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158150_comment'></div>归赗易名，恩缛于常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158150_comment'></div>王之葬，图于茔穆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158150_comment'></div>既有秘器，饭珠赠玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158150_comment'></div>鼓吹轰铮，旂旒熠煜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158150_comment'></div>我且不朽，彼则陵谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158150_comment'></div>王之后，诜诜而荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158150_comment'></div>或筑外馆，有提卫兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158150_comment'></div>佩锵其珩，冠翠其缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158150_comment'></div>尔公尔侯，永嗣家声。</div><div id='poem_sentence_108_1158150_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　秋，在京为翰林侍读学士，为贾昌朝之父贾注作墓志铭。作品：贾令公墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五九。）</span><div id='poem_1158155' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158155' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158155?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贾令公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158155")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158155_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158155'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158155'>公讳注，字宗海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158155_comment'></div>贾氏自汉梁王傅谊居雒阳，以王术说文帝，不合，而为儒先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158155_comment'></div>捐之谏元帝罢朱崖，以安关东，人蒙其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158155_comment'></div>在魏晋，常为荐绅闻家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158155_comment'></div>至唐司空、魏国公耽，世贯沧洲南皮，佐德宗有功，任宰相十三年，为长德钜公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158155_comment'></div>子孙稍稍徙真定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158155_comment'></div>五世祖谅仕为本府掾，弃官去依鹿泉抱犊山，肆然不以外物胶于心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158155_comment'></div>生高祖瑾，仍世隐处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158155_comment'></div>曾祖处士讳初，有至行，守乡里不肯事四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158155_comment'></div>祖讳纬，博学善辞章，论议明锐，一时诸儒皆屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158155_comment'></div>唐自武宗后，史录亡散，君掇拾残馀，为《唐季补录》数十万言，叙成败事甚悉，书显于时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158155_comment'></div>汉、周间为中书舍人，时主以君贵，即家拜处士为司封员外郎，不事事，累赠右丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158155_comment'></div>考讳琏，周显德中擢进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158155_comment'></div>太祖平蜀，召为太子左赞善大夫、知陵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158155_comment'></div>州有盐井，异时置熬盆，民利其赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158155_comment'></div>蜀灭，吏塞井亡去，绐言开者不利太守，公私贫虚，食絮无滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158155_comment'></div>君身负畚锸，率吏悉发其堙，曰：「茍利国，吾死不爱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158155_comment'></div>于是盐利复兴，岁赀数百万，人皆富完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158155_comment'></div>俄终官下，陵人德之，画像以祭，遂种其祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158155_comment'></div>公生三岁而孤，哀慕如有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158155_comment'></div>长乃自力于学，声称发闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158155_comment'></div>太宗淳化三年，以进士试殿中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158155_comment'></div>及第，调主新建簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158155_comment'></div>改棣州防御推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158155_comment'></div>真宗咸平中，契丹侵河北，引师环城设攻具，公登埤射其长，殪之，围解，迁定州观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158155_comment'></div>敌岁侵边，官兵留屯，公常护粮及资具输之壁，敌不能抄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158155_comment'></div>改陈州幕府，公卿以为才有馀，可任台省，交牍言上，有诏改著作佐郎、知凤翔府录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158155_comment'></div>未行病卒，实大中祥符元年夏五月，寿四十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158155_comment'></div>公之去中山在京师也，以族来，故不克归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158155_comment'></div>明年，即葬公于开封府开封县汴阳乡之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158155_comment'></div>贾为开封著姓自公始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158155_comment'></div>公于政事，精力不懈，善讨擿病利，故所治必最，官辄迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158155_comment'></div>为人方正，不语怪神，恶刓圆蘧媚者，绝不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158155_comment'></div>佐定、陈二府，其大帅皆副马右戚，居止贵甚，僚属之见者，仰而候，俯而趋，独公正色，廷辨是非，帅折节礼之，由是益知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158155_comment'></div>居家孝，早失兄，躬抚孀鞠孤，无异慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158155_comment'></div>娶夫人史氏，生八子，成就者三人：长曰昌朝，今为山南东道节度使、检校太师、同中书门下平章事、安国公；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158155_comment'></div>次曰昌县，大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158155_comment'></div>夫人操严而行危，自惧忧，终身不御䌽绣，悉出簪珥，市图籍以教子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158155_comment'></div>时丞相方幼，夫人劝勖指画，入俾与贤者居，出俾从仁者游，故年十八能奏颂，天子召试翰林，声名一日暴天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158155_comment'></div>今上嗣位，进讲禁中，以文章任舍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158155_comment'></div>以治剧第一守京邑，以劲亮忠厚擢御史中丞，以器无不施参总机务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158155_comment'></div>踰年使枢筦，又明年遂相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158155_comment'></div>茂烈洪勋，充格光明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158155_comment'></div>久之，以武胜节度守北都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158155_comment'></div>破甘陵有功，换节判郑州，使天下人拭目而观，曰贤宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158155_comment'></div>若夫人可谓善教子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158155_comment'></div>天子诞日，群臣上千万岁寿，于时丞相冠百官于外，夫人首命妇于内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158155_comment'></div>人伦之宠，举之其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158155_comment'></div>上尝赐金饰安舆一，就养于魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158155_comment'></div>丞相年踰五十，奉觞膝下，怡怡有孺子乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158155_comment'></div>若丞相，可谓善显亲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158155_comment'></div>夫人以皇祐二年夏六月丁巳终郑州之廨，寿七十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158155_comment'></div>精爽凝定，将终，遍命诸子内外姻，语讫乃瞑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158155_comment'></div>丞相即日上节印，且请终丧，上不许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158155_comment'></div>癸酉，制召以冠军大将军，左金吾卫上将军仍旧官，敦遣视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158155_comment'></div>丞相哀诉曰：「少孤，惟母为恃，幸时无金革虞，又教爱三年」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158155_comment'></div>乃遣使降手诏褒允，赠赙备厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158155_comment'></div>方丞相之贵，以恩追赠舍人为太师，夫人崔氏、栗氏为齐、燕国太夫人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158155_comment'></div>赞善为太师、中书令，夫人胡氏晋国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158155_comment'></div>公十一赠为太师、尚书令、中书令，夫人六封至安国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158155_comment'></div>公之葬也，以家多难，故茔迫而俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158155_comment'></div>至是庀事，乃治而广之，开阡列树，用上公之制，甲令也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158155_comment'></div>即以其年秋八月甲申，举夫人之丧合于公墓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158155_comment'></div>丞相自执丧，号踊黧瘠，身侍夫人柩自郑还，徒步二百里，不避涂潦，见者为垂泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158155_comment'></div>居常枕块席苫，薾薾尔而劬，纵纵尔而诚，所谓孝子不匮者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158155_comment'></div>昌县孝谨有君子风，在官称职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158155_comment'></div>惟公潜德秘猷，可以参国谋，熙王路，而年不中寿，独令名不足厌也，故涵庆渟祥而大兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158155_comment'></div>惟夫人妇则母仪，春秋承宗祀，身及其荣，独品袿锡钿不足厌也，故神明康强，涉耄而臧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158155_comment'></div>凡天之报施，或隐而先，或显而后，要之若合符然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158155_comment'></div>以为不信，则视公之烈之诒，夫人之享之遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158155_comment'></div>丞相所以膺胙受成，果何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158155_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1158155'>贾自中山，世有显闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158155_comment'></div>舍人含章，克代帝言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158155_comment'></div>惟时陵州，以死勤民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158155_comment'></div>著作嗣生，亲炙先芬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158155_comment'></div>其趾仪仪，其羽振振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158155_comment'></div>才茂行充，不涅不磷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158155_comment'></div>肆其方强，励业搢绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158155_comment'></div>胡然弗淑，歼此哲人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158155_comment'></div>惟其不有，是庆后昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158155_comment'></div>贤嗣光光，显相大君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158155_comment'></div>悯册追绶，参漏幽窀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158155_comment'></div>合姓也贤，教子以仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158155_comment'></div>惟考终命，归祔斯原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158155_comment'></div>款石藏幽，天壤相泯。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1158155_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年10月</a>　十月，在京为翰林侍读学士，以明堂礼成，迁给事中，进封常山郡开国侯，有让恩表。作品：让恩表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157383?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让恩表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157383")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157383_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157383'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157383'>臣某言：钦柴已事，湛露函禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157383_comment'></div>叨预秘枢，均推渥典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157383_comment'></div>席恩徽之累等，扪心极之有涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157383_comment'></div>敢援呐辞，启停蕃锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157383_comment'></div>窃念臣久尘几縡，无补显猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157383_comment'></div>仰就德以日跻，罄小心而昭事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157383_comment'></div>惇崇秩礼，震动殊休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157383_comment'></div>历款先祏而遂见閟宫，裒对上灵而升侑文考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157383_comment'></div>光华接于旦暮，汪濊塞乎天渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157383_comment'></div>内恧衰残，法当侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157383_comment'></div>襜如进揖，宁善于鲁仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157383_comment'></div>肃若动心，但钦于汉瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157383_comment'></div>获纾不敏之咎，已衔大庇之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157383_comment'></div>敢冀睿明，首褒机管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157383_comment'></div>锡之崇号，训以懋功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157383_comment'></div>进三品之美阶，加八柱之荣数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157383_comment'></div>静言匪服，祇足增惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157383_comment'></div>且夫礼行于郊，孰非展寀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157383_comment'></div>勋在于策，斯可归勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157383_comment'></div>茍曰罔功，率为不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157383_comment'></div>矧当三接之地，尤寄百度之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157383_comment'></div>宠既自叨，劝将何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157383_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下矜立志之难夺，靡间于匹夫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157383_comment'></div>察过令而必收，罔论于涣汗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157383_comment'></div>丐还虚授，庸息群言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157383_comment'></div>叩善听之弥高，露危情而偕极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157383_comment'></div>期于从欲，是免滥官。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1157383_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年10月</a>　十月，在京为翰林侍读学士，以明堂礼成，迁给事中，进封常山郡开国侯，有谢表。作品：谢覃恩转给事中表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157384' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157384' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157384?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢覃恩转给事中表</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157384")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157384_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157384'><div class='articleSentence'
