-----title
安陆
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='459634362ec84b55b616a54a5047e83a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("459634362ec84b55b616a54a5047e83a");'><span id='459634362ec84b55b616a54a5047e83a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1017&endYear=1020')">1017-1020年</a>，20-23岁</div><div id='459634362ec84b55b616a54a5047e83a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1017&endYear=1017')">1017年6月29日</a>　六月二十九日，父宋玘卒于京城，时随继母朱夫人寓居安陆。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1017&endYear=1017')">1017年</a>　本年，随继母朱氏依附外家，就学安陆，与兄宋庠相依为命。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1018&endYear=1018')">1018年3月</a>　三月，寓居安陆，预白兆山寺雅集，并作序。作品：春日同赵侍禁游白兆山寺序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四五。）</span><div id='poem_1158006' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158006' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158006?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春日同赵侍禁游白兆山寺序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1018年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158006")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158006_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158006'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158006'>敦牂纪岁，姑洗叶月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158006_comment'></div>树草以乐，原田以滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158006_comment'></div>春服既成，咏雩风于沂水；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158006_comment'></div>众宾咸集，修禊事于山阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158006_comment'></div>时则若天水公感节物之鲜荣，乘徼巡之暇豫，览朝野欢娱之盛，动山水仁智之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158006_comment'></div>精骛幽经，神驰宏域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158006_comment'></div>吏且休矣，伍符尺籍以无烦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158006_comment'></div>神且宁矣，缓带轻裘而自适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158006_comment'></div>于是追盛集、眷良辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158006_comment'></div>弭节乎平原，按辔乎遐路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158006_comment'></div>惟兹山之奇挺，实列仙之游化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158006_comment'></div>瞻言福地，有郁灵踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158006_comment'></div>由是啸侣以登，方蕲而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158006_comment'></div>历纡馀之盘道，顿岑寂之祗园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158006_comment'></div>旁睨崇岩，前识翠阜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158006_comment'></div>九向之势，与朱陵而并驱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158006_comment'></div>万壑之流，疑会稽而争长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158006_comment'></div>若其丹崖披壤，牝谷凝神，触涧成渠，值林为苑，跳峦崎岭，缘云而上征；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158006_comment'></div>飞涝神泉，相背而异态，固可骇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158006_comment'></div>朱蕤幽茂，飞英幡纚，羁禽聱耴，纤籁悲鸣，清飔徐动，徘徊于桂丛，泄雾未凝，弥漫于壤石，又可乐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158006_comment'></div>尔其陟降峣榭，顾步飞楹，送眸子于泬寥，畅襟灵于閒宴，故足荡胸中之鄙吝，究真际之虚徐，发金记之吾圆，入毗邪之不二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158006_comment'></div>纷华外泯，识富贵之傥来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158006_comment'></div>韵宇中虚，冀神明之攸舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158006_comment'></div>自馀布金结瑶之丽，飞锡浮杯之侣，绣栋文楯之纤缛，缭垣绀宇之靓深，灿然异观，不可殚记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158006_comment'></div>斯亦视听之瑰奇，岩薮之魁殊者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158006_comment'></div>天水公慨真想之在襟，顾翔阳之俄景，并徵丽唱，以贲灵陬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158006_comment'></div>且念登高能赋者，贤哲之令猷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158006_comment'></div>因物造端者，述作之常理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158006_comment'></div>红泉碧涧，播康乐之咏歌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158006_comment'></div>高树文禽，形应璩之叹息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158006_comment'></div>顾情所属，来者难诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158006_comment'></div>某猥辱嘉招，备观胜概。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158006_comment'></div>登崇望远，喜先生之并行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158006_comment'></div>进牍含毫，愧吾党之狂简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158006_comment'></div>故非善叙，聊用直书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158006_comment'></div>时天禧二年三月序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1158006_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1018&endYear=1018')">1018年</a>　本年，寓居安陆，有诗。作品：大酺纪事十四韵。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_105592' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105592' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105592?labeling=true' target='_blank'>大酺纪事十四韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1018年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105592")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105592_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105592'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105592'>太极登徽册，鸿恩润庆图。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105592'>三秋少皞月，五日汉家酺。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105592'>硕惠东西暨，高年左右趋。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105592'>云雷方霈泽，酒食更成需。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105592'>慈宴周绵宇，宸嬉极上都。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105592'>风飞迎沛筑，尊满列尧衢。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105592'>鼍伐渔阳鼓，龙吟北里竽。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105592'>激波呈曼衍，跳索戏都卢。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105592'>虎瑟修旃映，鸱夷后乘俱。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105592'>瑞烟浮玉戟，灵旭射金铺。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105592'>篚帛侔王镐，童冠盛舞雩。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105592'>歌忘齐国味，辱免绛人涂。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105592'>紫宙纤罗廓，层穹协气敷。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105592'>万灵酣饫赐，朝野正多娱。<div id='poem_sentence_13_105592_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_105592'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_105592_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1018&endYear=1018')">1018年</a>　本年，寓居安陆，叔父宋位卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1018&endYear=1018')">1018年</a>　本年，寓居安陆，与令狐揆、王得臣之父等人交游。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1019&endYear=1019')">1019年</a>　本年，寓居安陆。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1020&endYear=1020')">1020年</a>　本年，寓居安陆，作赋追怀友人王贺。作品：感交赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷二〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>感交赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序天禧四年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1020年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157083")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157083_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157083'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157083'>夫浚井冽泉，物之利也，甘至而先竭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157083_comment'></div>芳膏煎兰，用之美也，明极而自销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157083_comment'></div>信哉是言，吾见于太原王生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157083_comment'></div>生名贺，字赞尧，其先太原人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157083_comment'></div>襟度冲粹，风规凝简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157083_comment'></div>左右就养，慕婴戏以为娱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157083_comment'></div>卓荦观书，耻章雕而习巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157083_comment'></div>学殖滋大，声誉驶驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157083_comment'></div>由是四充赋于宾贤，一奏御于宸览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157083_comment'></div>引商之曲，始寡和而攸称；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157083_comment'></div>跃冶之金，终不祥而见弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157083_comment'></div>而君曾靡屑虑，啧无尤言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157083_comment'></div>仁不中而反求，气至刚而无害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157083_comment'></div>怡处宫亩，坐进道腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157083_comment'></div>既闲且驰，水曲之銮有节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157083_comment'></div>不怨胜己，嵇山之箭乃深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157083_comment'></div>天禧元祀，予以父怙缠悲，穷阎削迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157083_comment'></div>企入室而孔迩，卜亲邻而有初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157083_comment'></div>而君不我遐遗，惠然肯顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157083_comment'></div>切偲之义弥笃，簪盍之情在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157083_comment'></div>乃至劘切艺文，推明友契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157083_comment'></div>分山雾之馀润，袭皋兰之一薰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157083_comment'></div>恩斯勤斯，或推或挽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157083_comment'></div>俾憃烦之有赖，非哲乂而畴依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157083_comment'></div>而君姿素质羸，少小多病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157083_comment'></div>过郑吟之三岁，甚漳卧之十旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157083_comment'></div>越明年春，食剂愆和，竖膏遘疢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157083_comment'></div>重茧下冰而已甚，邪风造热而迭攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157083_comment'></div>六气之沴交臻，九折之医靡效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157083_comment'></div>革带移眼，怅仙骨之愔愔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157083_comment'></div>葆发悲秋，愒馀阴之奄奄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157083_comment'></div>一日，予往候其疾，生举手而言曰：「吾殆将死矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157083_comment'></div>胸臆结轖，气血周偾，楚魂外散，蜀肺中焦，自兹恐不得复见」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157083_comment'></div>因泣下数行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157083_comment'></div>夏四月卒，年三十有七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157083_comment'></div>行路兴叹，朋游陨泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157083_comment'></div>赍志没地，冯生之恨何穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157083_comment'></div>积忧伤人，盛宪之年不永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157083_comment'></div>直念古者，异世同悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157083_comment'></div>谨按君雅行素隆，华胄相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157083_comment'></div>高节应世，暴秋阳而不渝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157083_comment'></div>奥思际天，耻鞶帨而增饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157083_comment'></div>雅善谈理，素乐名教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157083_comment'></div>执雕虎之疏贱，未尝动心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157083_comment'></div>视龙断之富贵，介然不屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157083_comment'></div>加以累世清白，四壁徒立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157083_comment'></div>北堂垂喜惧之岁，东陂乏膏腴之产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157083_comment'></div>而君夷险一致，欣然忘贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157083_comment'></div>范云之室无姬姜，令伯之晚有儿息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157083_comment'></div>逮夫议围失利，绵痼相乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157083_comment'></div>霞朝雾夕之沈欢，苑雪台风之怅别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157083_comment'></div>醒忧荐委，彊寿弗延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157083_comment'></div>恍兮鬼伯之来催，偃然石室而长寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157083_comment'></div>美志弗遂，永怀李广之数奇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157083_comment'></div>遗文颇多，当类伟长之不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157083_comment'></div>人之云谢，今也其亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157083_comment'></div>先是，君娶范氏，末年生子，未百日而君没。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157083_comment'></div>范既早寡，拥树而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157083_comment'></div>庚申岁，予南涉大江，戾止斯郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157083_comment'></div>访君之孙，已三岁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157083_comment'></div>天骨特异，童游不杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157083_comment'></div>谅夫善庆之所积，宜其孝谨之不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157083_comment'></div>藐是若人，庶乎必复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157083_comment'></div>墓木将拱，州来之叹曷胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157083_comment'></div>青简尚新，秣陵之言永已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157083_comment'></div>追为此赋，式用寄怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157083_comment'></div>敢同刘峻之《广交》，聊代山阳之《感旧》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157083_comment'></div>收纸长想，属思不文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157083_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_68_1157083'>惟天地之肖貌，钟象数之最灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1157083_comment'></div>斡五行而宅秀，揽万物以储精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1157083_comment'></div>粤亨会之吻合，倬思皇而挺生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1157083_comment'></div>联秀骥以服轭，簉仪凰而舞庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1157083_comment'></div>蔼媚天之吉士，焕入彀之群英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1157083_comment'></div>嗟若人之间杰，何遘时之熙盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1157083_comment'></div>袭淮水以启胄，追汾阳而薄景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1157083_comment'></div>统三变之至道，凝四端之粹性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1157083_comment'></div>貌峨峨而突弁，衣襜襜而方领，驰妙誉于丘稷，掩多奇于汝颍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1157083_comment'></div>出乎类以拔萃，砥其言而砺行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1157083_comment'></div>轶士林以横步，邈霄涂而高骋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1157083_comment'></div>直协华之启旦，颁深诏而求治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1157083_comment'></div>鬻公车以千数，集桥门而万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1157083_comment'></div>莪菁菁而载育，薪翘翘而咸刈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1157083_comment'></div>苹呦呦而鹿食，场皎皎而驹至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1157083_comment'></div>彼君子之修业，奉裒举而论艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1157083_comment'></div>驰一封之汉车，冠百朋之周士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1157083_comment'></div>纷采采之雪裳，蔼譊譊之帷被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1157083_comment'></div>家抱玉以相矜，言盈庭而可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1157083_comment'></div>独夫子之卓尔，愤愚儒之翕訾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1157083_comment'></div>决辩涛以四出，轩意霞而中起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1157083_comment'></div>盘百钩而不踠，投千牛而弥锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1157083_comment'></div>群心惕以解体，众口呿而瞠视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1157083_comment'></div>将一鼓以作气，以十手之所指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1157083_comment'></div>蹇登荐于王府，群万有而来洎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1157083_comment'></div>混如泾渭之合，杂若蜩螳之沸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1157083_comment'></div>或腊弹以勤请，或金膏而将意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1157083_comment'></div>惟夫子之介然，谓众谋之非韪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1157083_comment'></div>含清唱而靡应，据中道而不倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1157083_comment'></div>恶登墙而栖处，耻画墁而食志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1157083_comment'></div>茍尔功之可图，非吾人之所履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1157083_comment'></div>企造天之华阙，爰奏技于严宸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1157083_comment'></div>皇不察予之中诚，汩旅退于下陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1157083_comment'></div>无左右以为助，虽随和而孰珍？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1157083_comment'></div>虎当关而逐逐，犬迎吠而狺狺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1157083_comment'></div>敛高足于要津，反初服于私门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1157083_comment'></div>宫一亩以却扫，案三杯而食贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1157083_comment'></div>虽埋照于流俗，愈抗情于曩真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1157083_comment'></div>庶桑榆之可收，奚嗜欲之足驯？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1157083_comment'></div>咨余生之蕞尔，昧贤达之高致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1157083_comment'></div>属钜创以集蓼，委颓龄而归里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1157083_comment'></div>声不高于乡品，志方谋于遁尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1157083_comment'></div>何夫君之渊识，外当世之流议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1157083_comment'></div>续伐木之高矩，缔忘言之密契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1157083_comment'></div>始告导于忠善，终博约于文礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1157083_comment'></div>义盖高而薄云，言志美而成市。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1157083_comment'></div>霜雪零而靡凋，风雨晦而不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1157083_comment'></div>寻越盟于戴笠，泛牙弦于流水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1157083_comment'></div>我有实而子采，尔有规而吾佩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1157083_comment'></div>期左提以右挈，俾尽善而又美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1157083_comment'></div>优圣域以襼裳，宾帝门而结轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1157083_comment'></div>悯人生之多故，抚物化之靡常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1157083_comment'></div>何夫子之禀质，郁中乾而外彊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1157083_comment'></div>广十旬而寝疾，偃四支而在床。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1157083_comment'></div>饵恶石以无徵，指馀阴而激扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1157083_comment'></div>鸟发谶以入室，竖兴妖而在肓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1157083_comment'></div>眷寿母之垂老，抚孤孩而增伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1157083_comment'></div>心念后而惴惴，泪垂睫而浪浪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1157083_comment'></div>启手足以自顾，何命促而意长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1157083_comment'></div>慨朝露之溘至，入脩夜之不旸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1157083_comment'></div>嗟天理之繟然，云祸盈而佑吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1157083_comment'></div>监至高而在下，网虽疏而实密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1157083_comment'></div>何夫君之重道，遭六极而生疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1157083_comment'></div>收华藻于中春，顿遐踪于逐日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1157083_comment'></div>昔二人之同心，今一臂而相失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1157083_comment'></div>望森森之美槚，叹萧萧之遥阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1157083_comment'></div>岂死者之可作，徒兴叹于九原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1157083_comment'></div>脱亭皋之珍木，淡陇首之长烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1157083_comment'></div>日西匿以风戾，雁南翔而露圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1157083_comment'></div>仰泰素之收神，哀拱木而敛魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1157083_comment'></div>沥酒绵之薄奠，抚坟草之陈根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1157083_comment'></div>旧馆阒以无睹，遗书散而罕存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1157083_comment'></div>投空文以长想，尽万代其何言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_140_1157083_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='f2c475daea7a4e3086393d6c10f55458_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f2c475daea7a4e3086393d6c10f55458");'><span id='f2c475daea7a4e3086393d6c10f55458_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1023&endYear=1023')">1023年</a>，26岁</div><div id='f2c475daea7a4e3086393d6c10f55458' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春，为知州夏竦所赏识，受命作《落花》诗。作品：落花。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，由安州取解，乡试作《仲尼五十而学易赋》、《周成汉昭孰优论》<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
湖北
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='88546f585c984338bf2b836d4af703e1_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("88546f585c984338bf2b836d4af703e1");'><span id='88546f585c984338bf2b836d4af703e1_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>，27岁</div><div id='88546f585c984338bf2b836d4af703e1' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>　夏，与兄宋庠南归安陆。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
天门
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='a9375f1b4b6246689df1aabc5115f813_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("a9375f1b4b6246689df1aabc5115f813");'><span id='a9375f1b4b6246689df1aabc5115f813_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1026')">1024-1026年</a>，27-29岁</div><div id='a9375f1b4b6246689df1aabc5115f813' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>　本年，在复州军事推官任，作《石楠树赋》作品：石楠树赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1157090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157090?labeling=true' target='_blank'>石楠树赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157090")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157090_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157090'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157090'>予尝被台檄北走襄汉，襄汉间家树石楠为园池之玩，树率高不过二三丈，柯叶婆娑，如帷盖然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157090_comment'></div>惜其上国之远，不能移植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157090_comment'></div>窃用赋之，以俟知己者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157090_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1157090'>彼美嘉木，生乎汉滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157090_comment'></div>铄纯粹于天极，禀蕃殖于媪神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157090_comment'></div>十雨流液，重云输津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157090_comment'></div>结深根乎奥壤，奋秀体于熙春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157090_comment'></div>尔其阿那扶疏，岧亭葱翠，枝相交，叶相值，不扶自直，拔乎其萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157090_comment'></div>翠帽森覆，仙幢凝峙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157090_comment'></div>秀金枝之未燃，障青绫而半倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157090_comment'></div>长烟夜凄，零露晨委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157090_comment'></div>激雄风而袅茎，沸蒙泉而漱趾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157090_comment'></div>荷亭育之大德，全婆娑之生意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157090_comment'></div>乃有仲长广宅，庾信小园，共忘樊柳，咸嗤树萱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157090_comment'></div>悦吾材之特异，掩群卉以收妍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157090_comment'></div>乃培乃埴，载育载蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157090_comment'></div>高临反宇，近映开轩，均长松之受命，等秾李之无言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157090_comment'></div>黕黕幄密，童童盖圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157090_comment'></div>非同江北之枳化，不愧东家之树完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157090_comment'></div>至如合璧早红，上弦晚白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157090_comment'></div>送密影于琐窗，荐翠霏于瑶席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157090_comment'></div>带寒蜩之嘶喝，映翠禽之格磔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157090_comment'></div>王孙感芳草之思，中妇休流黄之织。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157090_comment'></div>拾蕊未暇，攀条更惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157090_comment'></div>如为两树，认若个于韩凭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157090_comment'></div>脱致一枝，当赠行于越国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157090_comment'></div>故其为世爱玩，受天和煦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157090_comment'></div>条枚黛滋，跗萼星布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157090_comment'></div>不戕杯棬，不夭斤斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157090_comment'></div>娇庶子之春华，同韩宣之嘉树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157090_comment'></div>不生于穷谷，畏七年而未知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157090_comment'></div>不长于少原，嗟错薪之乱楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157090_comment'></div>幸得谥于芳林，获庇根于中土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157090_comment'></div>嗟上国之绝远，悯孤生之薄祜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157090_comment'></div>六枳维乎万国，三槐配于上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157090_comment'></div>御史著中台之柏，大夫纪东岳之松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157090_comment'></div>顾弱质之虽陋，冀赏心之一逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157090_comment'></div>托陵阿之善养，丐根柢之先容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157090_comment'></div>茍君子兮不顾，将老弃于山中。</div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1157090_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>　本年，在复州军事推官任，作《放生池记》作品：放生池记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158016' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158016' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158016?labeling=true' target='_blank'>放生池记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158016")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158016_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158016'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158016'>古者，土蛰发，䱷人于是讲罛罶，作鲜薧，以供祀事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158016_comment'></div>水虫孕，泽虞于是禁鲲鲕，韬竿累，以广孳育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158016_comment'></div>《中孚》先豚鱼之吉，风人美鲿鲨之多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158016_comment'></div>太平之世，则取之有时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158016_comment'></div>四灵为畜，则用而不淰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158016_comment'></div>鸟兽咸若，草木允殖，而万物莫不众矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158016_comment'></div>大江之南，水物惟错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158016_comment'></div>污庳钟美，云雨兴利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158016_comment'></div>民就蒲蠃，取虫蚳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158016_comment'></div>蝝𧑅之捕日繁，鲰鲍之钓家至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158016_comment'></div>禁令寖玩，川缊中贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158016_comment'></div>圣上初元之二年，诏立放生池于郡国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158016_comment'></div>先是，州城邪界，蓄水弥望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158016_comment'></div>鳞品聱耴，芼实纷骈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158016_comment'></div>沆漭淡澹，奫沦深如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158016_comment'></div>过风无损，卬浦兹大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158016_comment'></div>挺叉沈饵，此焉攸处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158016_comment'></div>由是守臣下教，林鲛谨职，尽籍其地，斥而营之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158016_comment'></div>隅立桓柱，连亘籞落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158016_comment'></div>深极九仞，广袤百弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158016_comment'></div>时梁罔施，数罟不入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158016_comment'></div>乘秋水两厓之至，殆鲵桓九名之渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158016_comment'></div>植物斯生，动物斯止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158016_comment'></div>有颁其首，有莘其尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158016_comment'></div>圉圉亟纵，无子产校人之欺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158016_comment'></div>潎潎出游，全庄生濠上之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158016_comment'></div>若夫大道宰世，自见而推隐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158016_comment'></div>至仁根心，因细而形大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158016_comment'></div>爱乎万物，乃譬于刍狗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158016_comment'></div>悯其死地，何择于牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158016_comment'></div>未有远孚潜物而近遗吾民，重惜物生而轻用邦力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158016_comment'></div>是薪舆不烦秋毫之察，折枝有异挟山之为者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158016_comment'></div>上圣之旨，岂不深哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158016_comment'></div>与其童山林，暴天物，鲁侯泗渊之滥，断罟致言，武皇沧海之徂，巨鱼不出，叵同年而记已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158016_comment'></div>仆亲逢圣旦，复耳清诏，讵衒吾党斐然之作，姑赞有虞好生之德云尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158016_comment'></div>时年月记。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_1158016'></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1158016_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>　本年，在复州军事推官任，作《复州乾明禅院记》作品：复州乾明禅院记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158018' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158018' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复州乾明禅院记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158018")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158018_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158018'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158018'>或称离一切相，是之谓法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158018_comment'></div>依十方佛，是之谓宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158018_comment'></div>予曰，不也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158018_comment'></div>夫舍妄求真，必有二体；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158018_comment'></div>摈外修内，则立中间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158018_comment'></div>是扰扰之群生，执种种之差别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158018_comment'></div>弃大海之水，误认一沤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158018_comment'></div>舍如意之珠，更求至宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158018_comment'></div>乃有三僧祇之辛苦，五浊恶之流浪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158018_comment'></div>无缚求解，捏目取华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158018_comment'></div>由是能仁悯怜，正眼提唱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158018_comment'></div>法无可得而名说法，言虽终日而未尝言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158018_comment'></div>不自阶升，径跻补处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158018_comment'></div>自迦文灭度后二十八祖而兹土传教，达磨灭度后二百馀年而信衣不传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158018_comment'></div>云雷普闻，子孙繁盛，法集禅丛之窟遍天下矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158018_comment'></div>复州者，揵江汉之北望，古曰景陵郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158018_comment'></div>乾明院者，直谯门之东趣，唐为开元寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158018_comment'></div>会昌之难，剪焉荆棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158018_comment'></div>劫火沈烬，山灵见鞭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158018_comment'></div>像法中兴，改题院额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158018_comment'></div>祀不失物，益作四事之严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158018_comment'></div>天定胜人，复会六合之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158018_comment'></div>然或外请尊者，以号住持；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158018_comment'></div>或即付上首，以为传袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158018_comment'></div>教失厥序，人有其私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158018_comment'></div>金注益殙，但取小乘之爱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158018_comment'></div>井饮相捽，寖隳大事之缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158018_comment'></div>运之少还，物乃倾否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158018_comment'></div>天禧中，比部员外郎邢若思来领州事，因目胜地，久为人废，乃率郡之大檀越及比丘众，奉公檄诣鄂州灵竹院，请今长老契隐以尸之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158018_comment'></div>惟师逗西竺之上机，绍法眼之昆裔，纯熟众德，摧伏群魔，应以有情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158018_comment'></div>既诣宝所，至上之日，黑白和会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158018_comment'></div>露味灌洒，象王蹴踏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158018_comment'></div>曾未期月，学徒至者盖百馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158018_comment'></div>犹草之得阳春，如子之和鸣鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158018_comment'></div>修复颓范，大兴层搆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158018_comment'></div>乃有五台僧澄岸造僧堂，摄州司马李远向礼建三门行庑，长沙僧智亮作浴室，州校陈钊跨波为桥亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158018_comment'></div>不出十年，遂臻考室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158018_comment'></div>或施璎络，或散香花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158018_comment'></div>园公布金，海人上氎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158018_comment'></div>什器帷帐，罔不周给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158018_comment'></div>千楹攒注，类天宫之化成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158018_comment'></div>百宝庄严，疑地神之通现。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158018_comment'></div>师之功德，可思议之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158018_comment'></div>夫有为之谓缘，利他之谓广，无来去之谓妙，即心佛之谓顿，圆裹四者而不见其用之谓第一义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158018_comment'></div>彼上人者，其庶几焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158018_comment'></div>宜其为巨海之舟航，大方之墙堑者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158018_comment'></div>师以仆尝任州幕，具知胜因，列状载勒，刻识为托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158018_comment'></div>且欲令后付嘱者不私于己，其以吾为兹院之初祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158018_comment'></div>矧国有著令，来者得不信受奉行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158018_comment'></div>时年月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1158018_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>　本年，在复州军事推官任，作《复州广教禅院御书阁碑》作品：复州广教禅院御书阁碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五七。）</span><div id='poem_1158140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158140?labeling=true' target='_blank'>复州广教禅院御书阁碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158140")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158140_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158140'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158140'>昔者上帝册书，藏群玉四彻之府；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158140_comment'></div>神禹秘记，著南方会稽之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158140_comment'></div>若乃上圣蔚兴，含灵皆警，弥文塞天渊之表，遗章倬云汉之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158140_comment'></div>温瑜镂翰，崇树规𫊆，协三五六经之制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158140_comment'></div>蕊函真本，颁贶方国，镇七千神灵之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158140_comment'></div>用能蔽穹壤而相传，存都邑而有副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158140_comment'></div>鼓之而天下动，举焉而能事毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158140_comment'></div>噅噅棼棼，而珍图焜照；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158140_comment'></div>在在处处，而神物护持者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158140_comment'></div>复州者，古为景陵郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158140_comment'></div>栖地敞夷，殖物繁夥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158140_comment'></div>滨带江汉，尝被文王之声诗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158140_comment'></div>蔽亏宿莽，流为骚人之悽怆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158140_comment'></div>神奸物厉之不作，民风国教之在柔，居然吉祥，是最殊胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158140_comment'></div>直城西出一里，有院曰广教，乃唐禅师积公之经始，大士陆生之攸践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158140_comment'></div>巧历之算虽往，故府之求多在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158140_comment'></div>邑井不改，寒泉漱玉而仰流；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158140_comment'></div>岸谷相为，洪碑生金而未泐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158140_comment'></div>肇为宝所，垂乎百祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158140_comment'></div>观其面势盘据，标胜呈露，却背平野，前瞰大泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158140_comment'></div>屈到嗜芰之葰产，幽流不秽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158140_comment'></div>长者挥金而侧布，檀施嗣臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158140_comment'></div>佛事具足以庄严，都人赞叹而踊跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158140_comment'></div>真宗咸平初，遹追来孝，执竞先烈，䌷禁中茂陵之聚，备天下名山之藏，乃以太宗皇帝御制御书凡百轴下赐焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158140_comment'></div>照之天光，震动沙界，成钩之文焕布，辟恶之香纷郁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158140_comment'></div>雾图兰叶，盖天姥之尝窥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158140_comment'></div>赤水珠胎，非象罔而谁得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158140_comment'></div>乾兴元年，景陵县史谭颙内发信誓，谋就功德，捐缗钱数十万，建为重阁，迁赐书而藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158140_comment'></div>木摩而匪彫，栋隆而弗挠，鸣翚斯飞以异状，阳马如舞而四承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158140_comment'></div>巍乎觉菀之增雄，凛然天魔之潜卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158140_comment'></div>奕奕云构，瞻咫威而如在；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158140_comment'></div>灏灏宸懿，赐书文之一同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158140_comment'></div>推而上之，思议安及者已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158140_comment'></div>先是，天禧中，长人邢公若思以宝坊雄峙，睿篇申锡，非大精进，畴克奉行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158140_comment'></div>乃以僧惠嵩为传法住持，并干院事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158140_comment'></div>未几嵩引去，又以今释长老智升次补其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158140_comment'></div>一滴清净之流演，普及众生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158140_comment'></div>四事毕给而薰修，雄成内院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158140_comment'></div>原乎震旦启大千之界，皆为净土，而积高之隩，或明神之所凭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158140_comment'></div>贤劫示百亿之法，待付国王，而大事之缘，有诸圣之时现。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158140_comment'></div>帝华抚挥，笔舌乎五教，而大坟常典，传归乎东序之秘宝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158140_comment'></div>宸极继志，粉泽于先业，而冰绡壶墨，分藏乎不死之福庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158140_comment'></div>蚩蚩之氓，含甘吮滋，迷帝力之所及；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158140_comment'></div>沈沈之宇，子来勿亟，归天保而在兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158140_comment'></div>俾是书也，并日月而丽乎天；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158140_comment'></div>斯阁也，以香花而散其处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158140_comment'></div>射者不敢西向，如畏共工之台；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158140_comment'></div>从昔未曾得闻，更同如来之藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158140_comment'></div>祁宿官甫迩，落成斯觌，淳濯至化，颂次成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158140_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1158140'>宽柔以教兮南方彊，神明来舍兮寿而臧，崇建塔庙兮最吉祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158140_comment'></div>聪睿抚运兮臻太宁，云汉章天兮奎钩明，名山大都兮閟文经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158140_comment'></div>瑶函珠笈兮敞层构，弇勒汤盘兮垂不朽，当来下生兮齐佛寿。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_51_1158140'></div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1158140_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1158140'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按复州，汉竟陵地，五代晋时改为景陵。祁本传：释褐为复州推官。当在天圣三年。碑云乾兴元年，意建阁在前，碑文在后耳。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1158140_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1024&endYear=1024')">1024年</a>　本年，在复州军事推官任，有诗。作品：梦野亭在景陵集仙王君为郡日所创。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一四。）</span><div id='poem_105428' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105428' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105428?labeling=true' target='_blank'>梦野亭在景陵集仙王君为郡日所创</a><span class='authorDate'>（1024年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105428")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105428_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105428'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105428'>州堞巑岏迥势回，一翚斜翥四轩开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105428'>晴光猎草雄风度，晓气浮江赤日来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105428'>望极长天閒倚杵，醉残严角暝休梅。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105428'>须知故楚多馀感，剩费登高作赋才。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105428_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105428'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105428_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1025')">1025年5月</a>　五月，在复州军事推官任，作《皇帝幸玉津园省敛颂》作品：皇帝幸玉津园省敛颂。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三四。）</span><div id='poem_1158033' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158033' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158033?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇帝幸玉津园省敛颂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1025年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158033")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158033_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158033'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158033'>臣闻六气时乘，统以乾元之首；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158033_comment'></div>一游为助，表乎夏家之谚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158033_comment'></div>王者法顺动以省民教，辟囿游而寓稼政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158033_comment'></div>车舆每动，则攸徂相庆，傒我后之来苏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158033_comment'></div>羽旄载扬，则百姓欣告，庶吾王之无疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158033_comment'></div>厥有其道，非圣不举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158033_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下，勤恁道甫，妥绥民极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158033_comment'></div>敛武旌而匪怒，陈庙器以戒盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158033_comment'></div>汤既执中，周先登岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158033_comment'></div>际日出以丕冒，罔不维序；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158033_comment'></div>为天下而守财，于以克俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158033_comment'></div>洪惟坤育之荫，叶赞天元之治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158033_comment'></div>释思高拱，澹深渊以惟默；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158033_comment'></div>凝览泰定，铄清光而无际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158033_comment'></div>麟题信厚之族，章叙于内；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158033_comment'></div>鹭羽群飞之贤，夷仪于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158033_comment'></div>太仓陈粟之腐，水衡见钱之多，又何以加，既富矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158033_comment'></div>简则易从，有亲矣，信可以纾散否滞，颐养精神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158033_comment'></div>诏警跸出入之严，慰臣民侥倖之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158033_comment'></div>云霓大旱，钟鼓饰喜者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158033_comment'></div>若夫南直斗城，外敞琨苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158033_comment'></div>励储胥长杨之禁，均郊野近蜀之富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158033_comment'></div>先时斥官壖之地，以收课谷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158033_comment'></div>领勾盾之职，因为弄田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158033_comment'></div>每丘麦既登，原师至喜，则必按徐銮之节，省敛穰之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158033_comment'></div>因见三老力田，差赐百户束帛，供帐留饮，极欢而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158033_comment'></div>勤民之恤，累圣为常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158033_comment'></div>月惟蕤宾，日次东井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158033_comment'></div>窃扈谨九农之政，贻麰告万箱之收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158033_comment'></div>天子乐由庚之得宜，间大昕之夙退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158033_comment'></div>前除隐椎之道，右清连籞之落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158033_comment'></div>官以辨物，储不改供。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158033_comment'></div>于是廓霄宙，宾旸景，洞应门，引秘驾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158033_comment'></div>短箫铙吹，沸渭而夹引；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158033_comment'></div>师兵弩箙，隐辚而军装。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158033_comment'></div>风清九九之尘，云彗央央之旆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158033_comment'></div>呼鞭凝响，切神光而坌入；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158033_comment'></div>彀骑流赭，绕黄山而斜趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158033_comment'></div>盖天旋辰正，以降于行在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158033_comment'></div>观夫周原砥平，汉锸云荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158033_comment'></div>甸师清野以献状，畯夫涤场而作劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158033_comment'></div>倬彼大田，是观铚艾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158033_comment'></div>馌乎南亩，遂成茨京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158033_comment'></div>揉耒以识帝农之来，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1158033", 1158033, "Clauses/100/Comments/0")'>栖粮</span>而歌东户之泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158033_comment'></div>曩也昏作，今焉稛载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158033_comment'></div>既而美恩下属，偕云而族；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158033_comment'></div>协气相因，助风之薰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158033_comment'></div>散遗秉为寡妇之利，丰四釜为上岁之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158033_comment'></div>皇襟兑悦，帝晖日润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158033_comment'></div>乃诏环星之法从，普合需天之宴慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158033_comment'></div>帷牙九张，饮烽三烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158033_comment'></div>外饔献彘尝之膳，太师侑日举之奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158033_comment'></div>千唱万和，自成葛天之歌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158033_comment'></div>式晏以遨，并拜鹿鸣之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158033_comment'></div>懿哉是举，可以推圣人之用心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158033_comment'></div>昔之重雍在辰，多欢作豫，则必大纵茇苗之猎，靡旃未还；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158033_comment'></div>多从外夷之客，过都辄赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158033_comment'></div>雪宫独乐，不与众共。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158033_comment'></div>鹿囿增筑，虞其非正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158033_comment'></div>陛下骏惠先辟，慎修思永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158033_comment'></div>方且毖事之小，塞政之违，独纡神行，乐登岁取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158033_comment'></div>因一夫之获，恤下之有劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158033_comment'></div>推一谷之登，劭民之足食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158033_comment'></div>岂徒燕出入以为乐，自满假而居逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158033_comment'></div>况时令之既尝新矣，先荐寝庙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158033_comment'></div>《春秋》之不书他者，惟重麦禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158033_comment'></div>陛下上以荐馨嘉，下以劝耘耔，一出而兼二美，非圣人其能哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158033_comment'></div>若夫爱心自中，不待弦匏之感；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158033_comment'></div>至教广运，无须家户之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158033_comment'></div>况臣厕技儒肆，寓目车尘，道之不谈，咎将焉执？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158033_comment'></div>辄次康衢之颂，庶知上帝之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158033_comment'></div>词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_71_1158033'>君之来兮吾民休，傒如云兮骖玉虬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158033_comment'></div>君之乐兮我田良，积如坻兮丰太仓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158033_comment'></div>彼都之人兮宴以喜，官扈民兮无落事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158033_comment'></div>自今以始兮日益宁，禹躬稼兮莫我京。</div><div id='poem_sentence_74_1158033_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1025')">1025年5月</a>　五月，在复州军事推官任，有诗。作品：进幸南园观刈宿麦诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一九。）</span><div id='poem_105632' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105632' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105632?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进幸南园观刈宿麦诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1025年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105632")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_105632_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_105632'>臣某言：伏以囿游神隩，素谨于弄田；霄极嘉生，式登于首种。震吾王羽旄之美，竦彼都人士之观。伏惟皇帝陛下惠利翔仁，清明求治。候驷星而训务，谨鸟师之扈民。万宝阜滋，至和鼓舞。直斗城之南辟，严虎落之缭垣。薰吹袭辰，秀岐弥望。京师奔告，献状于屡丰；宸跸健行，宣风于一豫。用荐新于寝庙，差赐帛于农人。薰为乐和，塞乎穹壤。臣幸逢嘉会，窃缀芜音。得于辕壤之馀，备乃瓜华之采。呈览是渎，陨越为忧。臣某谨进诗随表称贺。</div><div id='poem_preface_105632_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105632'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105632'>农扈方迎夏，宫田首告秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105632'>嘉生拥瑶县，蕃穗遍天麰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105632'>肃雨津茎浃，薰风猎颖浮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105632'>登成告田畯，省敛徯王游。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105632'>紫宙凝神暇，丹书访道休。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105632'>天行九五健，岁取十千求。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105632'>洪洞开金狄，连蜷按玉虬。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105632'>尘清属车豹，枪密羽林驺。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105632'>芝覆依丹旭，旌门倚绿畴。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105632'>先驱护绵野，后骑隘长楸。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105632'>涤圃初开地，腰镰竞劝收。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105632'>田趋农帝耒，塍错夏王沟。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105632'>褒栗攒周甸，茨梁属舜眸。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105632'>籞长包圈虎，箱重载星牛。<div id='poem_sentence_13_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_105632'>九扈开灵圃，三辰驻䌽斿。<div id='poem_sentence_14_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_105632'>劳农差有赐，置酒酌言酬。<div id='poem_sentence_15_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_105632'>鸣爵知年稔，为鱼告梦优。<div id='poem_sentence_16_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_105632'>云雷一日泽，钟鼓万人讴。<div id='poem_sentence_17_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_105632'>帝醉钧天阕，仙归紫气留。<div id='poem_sentence_18_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_105632'>明馨资寝庙，足食焕缇油。<div id='poem_sentence_19_105632_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_105632'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_105632_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1025')">1025年</a>　约于本年春，在复州军事推官任，有诗。作品：题景陵乾明院湖亭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一四。温谱系此诗于天圣二年，此据诗意改。）</span><div id='poem_105565' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105565' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105565?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题景陵乾明院湖亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1025年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105565")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105565_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105565'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105565'>东眺湖波十里平，竹椽疏舍瞰澄瀛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105565'>山花暗落谈经地，水鸟时闻念佛声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105565'>荠树绕天春色晚，䌽云垂地夕凉生。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105565'>后车官冷曾过此，祗得幽人笑缚缨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105565_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105565'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105565_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1025&endYear=1025')">1025年</a>　约于本年，在复州军事推官任，有诗。作品：南亭独瞩。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一八。温谱系此诗于天圣五年，此据宋祁仕历改。）</span><div id='poem_105835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南亭独瞩</a><span class='authorDate'>（1025年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105835")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105835'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105835'>宇下雄风细细凉，客眸凝绝此回肠。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105835'>络头骑过罗敷陌，毕尾乌喧女子墙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105835'>流水清浑迷别浦，碧云高下送残阳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105835'>怀人抚物愁何尽，试借兰成万斛量。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105835_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105835'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105835_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1026&endYear=1026')">1026年2月23日</a>　二月二十三日，在复州军事推官任，上书孙奭，乞举用。作品：上侍讲孙贰卿书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157574' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157574' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157574?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上侍讲孙贰卿书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1026年2月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157574")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157574_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157574'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157574'>二月二十三日，景陵幕佐宋祁，不敢显然布币有请，窃因伯氏附书以私于下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157574_comment'></div>祁闻多材辑而华厦构，众籁号而大乐举，黎献并而本朝尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157574_comment'></div>故一木无当于概霄之巍，榱椽不得而不备；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157574_comment'></div>徒歌无当于摐金之盛，曲张不得而不谐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157574_comment'></div>妄人无当于搢珽之仪，官师不得而不具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157574_comment'></div>必待豫章之干，则匠斤有时而辍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157574_comment'></div>必须嶰阴之琯，则伶箫有时而默；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157574_comment'></div>必伫岩筑之贤，则邦采有时而乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157574_comment'></div>故善工不择枉曲，揉之以就效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157574_comment'></div>知音不废清浊，纵之而投雅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157574_comment'></div>至鉴不斥莩贱，诡之而责功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157574_comment'></div>用能收造天之高明，鼓蟠地之盛则，畅横古之休烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157574_comment'></div>三者殊用，其揆一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157574_comment'></div>国家翕受葆命，混同绵县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157574_comment'></div>以三代文物昭明其志，以万方图籍怵惧其动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157574_comment'></div>乾粹坤厚，金辉玉振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157574_comment'></div>东薄鸢海，北戴斗极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157574_comment'></div>协气所薰，甘泽所漉，沦骨至髓，回首面内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157574_comment'></div>圣上以帝虞光华之懿，执周家彊竞之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157574_comment'></div>动循审训，以当大卞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157574_comment'></div>故号荣容典，烽涌电照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157574_comment'></div>虽臣下使自尽，而不敢少望清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157574_comment'></div>方且退托不明，思近有德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157574_comment'></div>伏惟侍郎明公内挺国器，亲逢圣旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157574_comment'></div>以卓诡切至当上之心，以光辉笃实司邦之直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157574_comment'></div>入则从容言天下之事，出则开陈使人主自择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157574_comment'></div>负日月，垂虹蜺，至诚渊冲，盛气玉色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157574_comment'></div>非圣上敦敏聪睿，皇矣临下，不能倚执事之重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157574_comment'></div>非执事华皓魁垒，毅然一节，不足引圣上之顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157574_comment'></div>君臣感会，夐古无比；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157574_comment'></div>天下之誉，四面而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157574_comment'></div>当此之时，众善可裨国论，必经公虑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157574_comment'></div>片言可溯治本，必关公听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157574_comment'></div>虽辑材之急，号籁之伫，并献之尚，弗先于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157574_comment'></div>则执事之纯诚素蕴，已可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157574_comment'></div>将欲市骨求骏，得十取五，收憔悴以备姬姜之阙，施根柢以充万乘之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157574_comment'></div>宜乎鄙生距跃末路，徘徊盛时，希冲风之末，求一割之利，不为过矣，惟明公少加怜焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157574_comment'></div>祁生而驽疴，长而屯险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157574_comment'></div>进与仕次，见羁简书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157574_comment'></div>跕翼屡堕，扪窍都塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157574_comment'></div>日亲领簿之猥，荡为风波之民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157574_comment'></div>其惷愚冥烦，则明公识之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157574_comment'></div>虽然，自谓先狗马，填沟壑，未知效死之所；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157574_comment'></div>插齿牙，树颐颊，可陪诸生之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157574_comment'></div>又况年历之尚壮，筋力之未衰乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157574_comment'></div>方今学术颓陵，缃素刓敝，上不能抗处士之议，下徒以充扫除之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157574_comment'></div>况能谋王体，协天载，见之于行事，喟然动众心者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157574_comment'></div>顷者台符屡颁，欲得明晓经术之士，以备访逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157574_comment'></div>公卿大臣，未闻以士为荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157574_comment'></div>且夫察伯乐之图者，千载无一骥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157574_comment'></div>诡王良之遇者，一朝获十禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157574_comment'></div>必也无其人，则愿以鄙生为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157574_comment'></div>今归穷上叩，惟命是听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157574_comment'></div>执事其剪而弃诸草莽，亦惟命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157574_comment'></div>以人而废其言，亦惟命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157574_comment'></div>若惠顾一日之雅，徼福先君之祀，拔于煨烬，生以羽毛，请为上言，俾塞诏旨，使得充下馆，备冗列，游精艺文，毕力补掇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157574_comment'></div>长言足叹，绍乎崧高；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157574_comment'></div>掇要著篇，别其朱紫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157574_comment'></div>则是执事于我，生死人而肉白骨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157574_comment'></div>至于摩顶踵，隳肝胆，以报厚德，则邹鲁之士多能言之，不足以烦省览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157574_comment'></div>直摅愤懑，以上左右，执事其辱裁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157574_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_61_1157574'></div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1157574_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157574'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按本传：祁以孙奭荐，改大理丞、国子直讲，当在此时。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157574_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
杞县

id='poem_title_105630_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105630'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105630'>自昔去先闬，乃今还故庐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105630'>陇桑濡露外，岩桂遣风馀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105630'>稍识乌衣巷，相过栗里舆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105630'>感存横涕数，道旧愬杯徐。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105630'>击鲜无久慁，趋局畏官书。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105630_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' -----title
凤台
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6b1f9ffe3b154a77a68ea10239bea804_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6b1f9ffe3b154a77a68ea10239bea804");'><span id='6b1f9ffe3b154a77a68ea10239bea804_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>，44岁</div><div id='6b1f9ffe3b154a77a68ea10239bea804' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年7月7日</a>　七月七日，到知寿州任，有谢表。作品：寿州谢上任表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157371' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157371' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157371?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿州谢上任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年7月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157371")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157371_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157371'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157371'>臣某言：伏奉去岁六月十一日敕书，差臣知寿州军州事，兼管内劝农使，即于今月七日到任礼上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157371_comment'></div>初违侍橐，出总州麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157371_comment'></div>地控翰垣，政兼民稷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157371_comment'></div>引章揆宠，处阁知惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157371_comment'></div>窃念臣本以孤生，仰陶上教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157371_comment'></div>措辞简斐，少不名家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157371_comment'></div>投策猥并，遽叨署第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157371_comment'></div>用沿仕牒，寖剽宸猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157371_comment'></div>匪智也愚，自知其天分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157371_comment'></div>谓多而拙，罔待于人言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157371_comment'></div>朝不汝瑕，谊无过废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157371_comment'></div>料于未至，靡有先容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157371_comment'></div>次补者六官，乃正台郎之秩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157371_comment'></div>内迁者四职，遂玷从臣之联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157371_comment'></div>朝夕参承，岁时赉予。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157371_comment'></div>亲逢云幸，平进罕阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157371_comment'></div>故尝昼昃亡餐，夜分置寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157371_comment'></div>算劳念得，则微横草万分之勤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157371_comment'></div>计过悟非，则有坎檀一介之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157371_comment'></div>内讼左数，宁舍靡遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157371_comment'></div>昧死闻陈，乞邦自试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157371_comment'></div>书下丞相之府，久已见俞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157371_comment'></div>笔阁承明之庭，兹焉获遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157371_comment'></div>洪惟盛世，慎择长人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157371_comment'></div>申勖表乎诏文，共治形于宸叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157371_comment'></div>俯循极陋，曷称敷求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157371_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下善育人材，勤恢教职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157371_comment'></div>谓屡经于策励，审一出于忠愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157371_comment'></div>特委细文，俾临善地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157371_comment'></div>况楚畴沃衍，淮产夥丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157371_comment'></div>潜圣作藩，国封攸启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157371_comment'></div>元戎疏镇，帅节甚雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157371_comment'></div>憬彼东南，此实都会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157371_comment'></div>臣敢不悉心庀务，安节首公？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157371_comment'></div>宣谕本朝之恩，刺候斯民之瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157371_comment'></div>冀逃诿事，姑服彝箴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157371_comment'></div>但念夙侍轩墀，未尝去国，自同犬马，宁不恋君？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157371_comment'></div>魂栖交戟之严，心结觚棱之邃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157371_comment'></div>傥使赐环仍在，踦履终收，则奉计来朝，敢三年而惮远；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157371_comment'></div>省躬论报，虽九殒以犹生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157371_comment'></div>感惕自中，涕洟横集。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1157371_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
