ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年11月</a>　十一月，在知寿州任，有《贺南郊礼毕表》作品：贺南郊礼毕表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三六。）</span><div id='poem_1157363' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157363' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157363?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺南郊礼毕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157363")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157363_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157363'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157363'>臣某言：今月日，马递到敕书一道，以南郊礼毕，大赦天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157363_comment'></div>臣当时集本州官吏军民宣读，并下管内诸县寨施行讫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157363_comment'></div>帝仪讫飨，朝涣推慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157363_comment'></div>飞驿疾传，庶邦丛庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157363_comment'></div>窃以天郊之重，国制有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157363_comment'></div>凡万乘躬行，必三岁间往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157363_comment'></div>不烦不怠，由列圣而持循；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157363_comment'></div>以妥以虔，合诸神而裒对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157363_comment'></div>睿图累盛，缛典勤修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157363_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下纂大合华，溉中布度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157363_comment'></div>抵金璧之玩，率俭示人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157363_comment'></div>收霜电之严，措刑于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157363_comment'></div>克励明德，格于皇穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157363_comment'></div>交熏太和，冒我群品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157363_comment'></div>顾怀时亿，瑞应日来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157363_comment'></div>亟蒇上仪，若祗旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157363_comment'></div>戒期百执，颁诏九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157363_comment'></div>曳云罕之常羊，服翠虬之半汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157363_comment'></div>殊庭一献，清祏遍跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157363_comment'></div>遂自阳灵之宫，往会天元之旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157363_comment'></div>羽旄四合，垓陛参登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157363_comment'></div>上璧左琮之华，合祛而信祝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157363_comment'></div>祖蕝宗题之次，更侑而迭尝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157363_comment'></div>拜嘉胙于席垂，烈钦柴于云表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157363_comment'></div>灵心合答，熙典备成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157363_comment'></div>然后还坐中天之闱，普肆随风之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157363_comment'></div>改颁大号，崇冠初元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157363_comment'></div>昭神之祥，祈命惟永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157363_comment'></div>赏功赦罪，已责逮瘝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157363_comment'></div>咸与惟新，牖民衷而迁善；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157363_comment'></div>聿怀多福，导帝祉以绵区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157363_comment'></div>盛际有光，彝伦咸赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157363_comment'></div>臣向观旧史，殚见往朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157363_comment'></div>或不爱牲玉为恭，殊非明荐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157363_comment'></div>或所过租赋为复，盖出重劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157363_comment'></div>语昔罕全，订今绝拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157363_comment'></div>所恨清尘在望，自苦周南之留；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157363_comment'></div>紫橐仍持，不与甘泉之从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157363_comment'></div>第班恩谕，均浃欢悰。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1157363'></div><div id='poem_sentence_38_1157363_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157363'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按《仁宗本纪》：庆历元年十一月，祀天地于圜丘。是时祁在寿州。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157363_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年12月</a>　十二月，在知寿州任，因南郊礼成，获加阶及爵邑，有谢表。作品：谢加阶并爵邑表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157373' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157373' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157373?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢加阶并爵邑表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157373")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157373_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157373'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157373'>臣某言：今月日，进奏院递到诰敕各一道，特授臣朝请大夫，依前官仍封临洺县开国男，食实封三百户，勋赐如故者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157373_comment'></div>缛仪交展，信赏第颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157373_comment'></div>缘策从勋，汎沾异数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157373_comment'></div>罔功被贶，尸宠蒙惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157373_comment'></div>窃念臣本以孱羁，误膺识拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157373_comment'></div>云章乏使，荷橐见收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157373_comment'></div>束带而奉朝趋，居常三省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157373_comment'></div>戴盆而仰天极，决匪两能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157373_comment'></div>止竭朴愚，以图称报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157373_comment'></div>寸劳未效，公议遄兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157373_comment'></div>出屏近藩，尚通秘籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157373_comment'></div>适会于郊之享，爰修以职之虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157373_comment'></div>法有侍祠，虽预甘泉之簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157373_comment'></div>身方守土，遂阻玉关之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157373_comment'></div>负结恋深，心驰魂震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157373_comment'></div>乃蒙皇帝陛下广歆馨之福，推舍爵之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157373_comment'></div>畴庸以差，均泽于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157373_comment'></div>眷孤臣之补外，助经入而有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157373_comment'></div>录此馀勤，沛为庆典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157373_comment'></div>进阶越等，启土肇封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157373_comment'></div>闻命若惊，修颜罔寘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157373_comment'></div>且扫除奉引，未始请行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157373_comment'></div>而于穆猗那，无从抒叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157373_comment'></div>坐沐光荣之集，例承深润之褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157373_comment'></div>难拒大恩，姑铭丹臆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157373_comment'></div>傥云酬之有所，誓至殒以无忘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1157373_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年12月</a>　十二月，在知寿州任，因预修之《崇文总目》成书，获加阶勋，有谢表。作品：谢书目成加阶勋表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157372' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157372' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157372?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢书目成加阶勋表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157372")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157372_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157372'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157372'>臣某言：月日，进奏院递到官告敕书各一道，特授臣朝散大夫，依前官，加轻车都尉，封赐如故，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157372_comment'></div>秘录终篇，鸿都第赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157372_comment'></div>例沾徽数，垂料馀勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157372_comment'></div>授受交虚，荣忧两萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157372_comment'></div>窃以广内之奥，中经所藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157372_comment'></div>自四圣相承，凡七纪而远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157372_comment'></div>积丘山而尽在，糅朱紫以未分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157372_comment'></div>金匮深严，牙韱丛舛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157372_comment'></div>攸司传失，有诏部分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157372_comment'></div>畴简名才，总制都目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157372_comment'></div>体汉家之流略，概见所从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157372_comment'></div>参史氏之艺文，种分必类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157372_comment'></div>讨论既定，统纪悉周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157372_comment'></div>而僚辅他迁，纂修交集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157372_comment'></div>臣猥缘懵学，俾预末行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157372_comment'></div>素自憃冥，动咨典领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157372_comment'></div>虽片词残牒，时窜左文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157372_comment'></div>且杂语诸家，尚悉全载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157372_comment'></div>讫惭斁职，中请为邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157372_comment'></div>遂专刀笔之烦，益忘缇油之习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157372_comment'></div>不谓芸编卒业，黼幄程文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157372_comment'></div>嘉众籍之有条，美诸儒之竞力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157372_comment'></div>因褒迩列，施及孤臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157372_comment'></div>联文散之近阶，赐朝勋之优转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157372_comment'></div>揆荣至渥，抚己无堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157372_comment'></div>阁笔居多，早戢钟繇之恨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157372_comment'></div>杀青偕上，敢叨刘向之功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157372_comment'></div>汗漫不收，天高难诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157372_comment'></div>但能铭于肝膈，或论报于涓埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157372_comment'></div>愚疑不诬，明神是质。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1157372_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b41a5a1b1add430bbba270473f3ce4ce_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b41a5a1b1add430bbba270473f3ce4ce");'><span id='b41a5a1b1add430bbba270473f3ce4ce_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1042')">1041-1042年</a>，44-45岁</div><div id='b41a5a1b1add430bbba270473f3ce4ce' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，有书答李从。作品：回李从著作书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回李从著作书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157577")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157577_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157577'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157577'>自辱书教，勤勤恳恳，庆其进又恤其退，终于慰且安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157577_comment'></div>文美意周，熟复弥日，然似与仆行事不相储，故粗举一二以晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157577_comment'></div>仆愚且陋，无可比数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157577_comment'></div>上不知其驽，由孤生未十年，使著籍司马门；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157577_comment'></div>又五年，舐笔螭下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157577_comment'></div>当此时，诸老生刮眼骇叹，谓得自结明主，迭奖互成，遂使名浮于情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157577_comment'></div>属公序自学士参宰政，上独念他日进拟，必以亲避，则抑不得官，是以翌日有天章之除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157577_comment'></div>仆既荷不赀之恩，日夜惟省，自专矣，不可不自爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157577_comment'></div>故孤立绝私，辞剧职，就閒处，窒谤虞隙，恐孤主上所以擢任之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157577_comment'></div>会右鄙小警，朝议过恤其勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157577_comment'></div>台阁之才，往往持节走塞下，视方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157577_comment'></div>仆见上忧勤如此，窃不自安，以为材者行，智者虑，拙者助，则贼不足灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157577_comment'></div>因请间伏青蒲上，愿试守一郡，尽力率岁，赋安元元，佐调度之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157577_comment'></div>上辄可之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157577_comment'></div>事下丞相，中格者数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157577_comment'></div>适会公序罢去，俄又仆得请寿春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157577_comment'></div>是以议者未究其详，皆谓仆轧于当路而弗获升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157577_comment'></div>非也，仆素自为计使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157577_comment'></div>且吏二千石，古诸侯之贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157577_comment'></div>百吏六曹，仰而承风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157577_comment'></div>褒善良，检憸猾，逮瘝诏瘠，以佐县官，讵可为轻耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157577_comment'></div>董仲舒、萧望之，世以为如何人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157577_comment'></div>皆经为之，以名自显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157577_comment'></div>仆顾材谫，第畏不职耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157577_comment'></div>使少知治体也，诚乐处之，愿足下庆我而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157577_comment'></div>至乎慰安相勉，则爱至者踊跃为之，仆不敢辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157577_comment'></div>《诗》曰：「大夫不均，我从事独贤」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157577_comment'></div>仆乃今始得与搢绅诸公均贤共劳，决非介介于此处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157577_comment'></div>既已解足下，并以为谢。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1157577_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，有诗答李从。作品：答李从著作。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_105507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105507?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答李从著作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105507")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105507_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105507'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105507'>身是鸡翘侍从流，单车淮上老为州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105507'>全生正似婆娑树，不死翻成觳觫牛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105507'>今日空名同地饼，晚年归计有瓜畴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105507'>惭君远寄相思句，不啻三逢采艾秋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105507'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105507_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，有诗寄晏殊。作品：写怀寄献枢密太尉。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷六。“枢密太尉”指晏殊，参夏承焘《二晏年谱》）</span><div id='poem_105745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>写怀寄献枢密太尉</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105745")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105745'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105745'>仆本草茅人，守植自有素。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105745'>偶与力运偕，牵丝及荣路。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105745'>矢将保独行，安敢邀诡遇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105745'>朝跻绿雾阁，夕舍金马署。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105745'>鴳志屈鸿翼，珉质谢瑶圃。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105745'>内省实空虚，焉得久留处。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105745'>悟非不必老，斑领况云屡。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105745'>竟获一麾来，果此避贤趣。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105745'>载以朱轓车，佩以银符兔。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105745'>君宠寄华冕，癯丑不成恶。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105745'>淮郡梁楚交，刀笔纷民务。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105745'>粗欲逃官责，何暇收民誉。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105745'>平生觏宗工，亟为拯沦误。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105745'>惭负知己言，遂贻越乡虑。<div id='poem_sentence_13_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_105745'>何图霄与泥，肯问簪与屦。<div id='poem_sentence_14_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_105745'>辛勤风波事，尺牍奚能诉。<div id='poem_sentence_15_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_105745'>代马愁南嘶，鹧鸪憎北翥。<div id='poem_sentence_16_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_105745'>所恋明主恩，未理归田驭。<div id='poem_sentence_17_105745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_105745'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_105745_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，有诗怀惠崇。作品：过惠崇旧居二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一〇。）</span><div id='poem_104954' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104954' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104954?labeling=true' target='_blank'>过惠崇旧居<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104954")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104954_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104954'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104954'>人往名长在，钦风历故居。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104954'>社残莲即老，园废柰仍疏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104954'>麈忆清谈外，云经合座馀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104954_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_104955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104955?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104955'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104955'>虽昧平生契，怀贤要可伤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104955'>生涯与薪尽，法意共灯长。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104955'>遗画空观貌，残诗孰补亡。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104955'>神期通一语，无乃困津梁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104955'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104955_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，有诗答王素。作品：答宿州王素都官。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_105517' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105517' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105517?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答宿州王素都官</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105517")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105517_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105517'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105517'>当年弛镫避清尘，此地联麾喜故人。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105517'>豸角去冠休触佞，虎头分绶且行春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105517'>谤销不复投亲杼，宦拙犹须让后薪。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105517'>酌酒为君赓一曲，江边收得子牟身。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105517_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105517'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105517_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，有诗答郑戬。作品：得杭州郑资政书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_105399' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105399' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105399?labeling=true' target='_blank'>得杭州郑资政书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105399")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105399_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105399'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105399'>误抛荷橐别云裘，天赐疏慵卧治州。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105399'>辕下已疲犹恋主，道边宁死不为钩。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105399'>风波路恶惊危涕，蓬葆年侵变黑头。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105399'>独喜故人恩契厚，冷灰遗甑远相求。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105399_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105399'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105399_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，作《怜竹赋》作品：怜竹赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1157093' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157093' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157093?labeling=true' target='_blank'>怜竹赋<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序庆历元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157093")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157093_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157093'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157093'>始伯氏贰宰司，僦甘泉坊韩王旧第居之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157093_comment'></div>庭阶閒敞，予因种竹以为玩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157093_comment'></div>明年伯氏典维扬，予守寿春，怜竹方茂而诿之，后人其能嗣予好以封殖者耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157093_comment'></div>作《怜竹赋》：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1157093'>惟兹竹之冉冉，自林町而丛产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157093_comment'></div>偶拙者之移莳，丁故王之閒馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157093_comment'></div>坞阴漼以披豁，野色悴而纷换。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157093_comment'></div>辞墟落之旷处，佐堂除之近玩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157093_comment'></div>既根危以殖浅，又氛冒而埃漫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157093_comment'></div>迫俗物之挐喧，屈天标之萧散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157093_comment'></div>余乃谨其培封，申以阑护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157093_comment'></div>恶草夷薙，寒泉浸注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157093_comment'></div>昼熙熙以暴阳，夕团团而沐露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157093_comment'></div>舒萌庇本，弭寒阅暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157093_comment'></div>敛衰态以就悦，擢新姿以违故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157093_comment'></div>于是萧疏檀栾，敷芳森萃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157093_comment'></div>谢丛箘之馀素，𢥠圆笴之脩翠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157093_comment'></div>叶舒碧以向荣，泽浮绀而呈美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157093_comment'></div>戺月上而景还，宇风来而籁至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157093_comment'></div>常虚心以自得，顾直质而少媚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157093_comment'></div>虽蒙幸于轩槛，本无争于华蘤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157093_comment'></div>嘉逸民之有言，非一日之可无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157093_comment'></div>予野情而偏爱，托此君以自娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157093_comment'></div>顾泛梗之屡徙，方去尔而索居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157093_comment'></div>感婵娟之甫盛，将披剪而为虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157093_comment'></div>昔召公之至仁，舍小棠而攸苃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157093_comment'></div>公已去而民爱，念蔽芾之勿伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157093_comment'></div>余恤躬以仅免，匪馀庇之能列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157093_comment'></div>徒结尚而敦好，怵后人之我替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157093_comment'></div>矧客土之疏瘠，且狡童之撞㧙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157093_comment'></div>幸不夭于此生，保岁晏之高节。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1157093'></div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1157093_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，作《诋仙赋》作品：诋仙赋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此赋见《景文集》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1157089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诋仙赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157089")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157089'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157089'>予既守寿春，览郡图，得八公山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157089_comment'></div>故老争言山上有车辙马迹，是淮南王上宾之遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157089_comment'></div>耕者往往得金，云丹砂所化，可以疗病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157089_comment'></div>因取班固《书》、葛洪《神仙》二传，合而质之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157089_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157089_comment'></div>人之好奇而不责实也尚矣，而洪又非愚无知者，犹凭浮證伪，况鄙人委巷语耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157089_comment'></div>作《诋仙赋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157089_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1157089'>悯兹俗之鲜知兮，徇悠悠之妄陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157089_comment'></div>常牵奇以合怪兮，欲矜己以自神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157089_comment'></div>操百世之实亡兮，唱千龄之伪存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157089_comment'></div>彼淮南之有子兮，固殊死而殒身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157089_comment'></div>缘《<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1157089", 1157089, "Clauses/24/Comments/2")'>内篇</span>》之丕诞兮，眩南公之多闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157089_comment'></div>谓八人者语王兮，历倒影而上宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157089_comment'></div>饵玉匕之神药，托此躯乎霄晨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157089_comment'></div>王负骄以弗虔兮，又见谲于列真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157089_comment'></div>虽长年之弥亿兮，屏帑偃而愈愆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157089_comment'></div>蹇斯事之吾欺兮，聊反复乎遗言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157089_comment'></div>号圣仙之灵禀兮，宜常监德而辅仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157089_comment'></div>不足察王之倨贵兮，遽引内于天门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157089_comment'></div>已乃悟其非是兮，胡为赏罚之纷纭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157089_comment'></div>宁仙者之回惑兮，无以异乎常人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157089_comment'></div>国为墟而嗣绝兮，载遗恶而不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157089_comment'></div>故里盛传其遗金兮，證碮石之馀痕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157089_comment'></div>武安隐语而前死兮，更生伪铸以赎论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157089_comment'></div>彼逞诈以罔时兮，宜自警于斯文。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1157089'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1157089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157089'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按祁出知寿州，在庆历元年。」<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157089_0'>⑴ 葛《传》云：仙伯主者刘安不恭，乃谪守郡都厕，后为散仙。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1157089_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　本年，在知寿州任，与人有书信往来。作品：回季团练启一。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。温谱系此文于庆历二年，此据文意改。）</span>回季团练启二。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。温谱系此文于庆历二年，此据文意改。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年1月</a>　正月，在知寿州任，有诗和晏殊。作品：和枢密晏太尉元日雪。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_105037' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105037' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105037?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和枢密晏太尉元日雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105037")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105037_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105037'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105037'>寒云万里送残宵，面旋祥霙集岁朝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105037'>繁影未能藏夜燎，薄花仍欲伴春椒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105037'>光含象阙苍龙舞，气勒交衢卓马骄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105037'>丰兆欢歌谁不尔，百官兼放五门朝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105037'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105037_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　春，在知寿州任，有诗送人。作品：送简殿丞赴阙。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一八。王谱系此诗于庆历元年，此据诗意改。）</span><div id='poem_105304' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105304' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105304?labeling=true' "poem_title_105304")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105304_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105304'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105304'>共治清淮北面州，何言分袂帐夷犹。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105304_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105304'>君还南阙双龙下，我驻东方千骑头。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105304_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105304'>未落林花延别醑，无穷堤草伴行舟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105304_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105304'>怀人愬月劳劳意，自此相牵更倚楼。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105304_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105304'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105304_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年5月</a>　五月，在知寿州任，作《寿州风俗记》作品：寿州风俗记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158007' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158007' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158007?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿州风俗记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158007")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158007_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158007'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158007'>寿州，古扬州之偏，本治寿春，于天文直星纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158007_comment'></div>春秋世名蓼六者，后为楚所并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158007_comment'></div>及战国，楚卒徙都，更曰郢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158007_comment'></div>秦号九江郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158007_comment'></div>项氏始为国，王其爱将英布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158007_comment'></div>汉名淮南，以封子厉王，国除，复为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158007_comment'></div>三国时，南切吴，魏以为边，号淮南郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158007_comment'></div>江左北拒胡，晋以为边，号南豫州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158007_comment'></div>逮齐梁，尝宿戍防魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158007_comment'></div>周为扬州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158007_comment'></div>隋唐为今名，或为寿春郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158007_comment'></div>唐季，伪吴盗据兹地，私号清淮军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158007_comment'></div>后唐侨置忠正军节度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158007_comment'></div>周世宗克淮南，迁治颍之下蔡，因以下蔡节度领，自正阳撒浮桁属之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158007_comment'></div>州南夹堤树谯，遂为胜镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158007_comment'></div>真宗洎上之在藩也，又启封焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158007_comment'></div>美名华区，故为淮南第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158007_comment'></div>县曰下蔡，曰寿春，曰霍丘，曰安丰，曰六安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158007_comment'></div>地横狭而纵脩，东抵濠百里，旁值庐百里而赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158007_comment'></div>南距舒五百里，斜触光三百五十里而近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158007_comment'></div>西压颍五十里，北抵亳百有二十里，近者在舍隅，负宿三十里而易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158007_comment'></div>籍户主客，九万有畸，生齿倍之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158007_comment'></div>赋租以斛计者岁二十万，以缗者四之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158007_comment'></div>絇，两计者三十万，匹端者八之一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158007_comment'></div>沿赋杂订上千百计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158007_comment'></div>故输入都内，寿为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158007_comment'></div>土涂泥，田下下，筴之《禹书》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158007_comment'></div>二男五女，畜宜鸟兽，职之《周官》；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158007_comment'></div>家巫史，重淫祀，性躁气果，纪之史志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158007_comment'></div>谂于方俗，逮今犹然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158007_comment'></div>厥贡三种，惟𣗪、米、鱼，鱼为大官盛味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158007_comment'></div>茗场凡三：曰开顺、麻步、霍山，岁榷无虑三万钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158007_comment'></div>坐居行赍，率千金以算，其利不赀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158007_comment'></div>民又时时盗卖，吏缓之则轻犯法，急之则穷为椎埋，株送噍类不容狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158007_comment'></div>故掌理者分院左右，乃胜其烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158007_comment'></div>镇山曰八公、大别、霍，霍为岳帝下祠，八公往往得金，诧曰刘安所遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158007_comment'></div>由霍而外，甗峄岑罗，迤麓崇冈，奔沓相联，犹肱臂然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158007_comment'></div>材章竹个，刊伐菑翳，连千柎而下，衍给旁郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158007_comment'></div>食夥产茂，四方游惰多隐处焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158007_comment'></div>搏掩疻斗，轻死亡命，故候逻者常以逮捕为负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158007_comment'></div>其川曰淝、颍、洛、渒、丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158007_comment'></div>率淝而往，溪浍汧麋污集，瀿渟浸灌相交，如腧脉然，卒皆入于淮，淮行六百二十里而东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158007_comment'></div>渊隈颇产蠙珠，民亦取之，虽得，不偿所费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158007_comment'></div>其大陂曰芍，古尝溉百万亩，渒水注焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158007_comment'></div>汉置陂官，岁廞月淤，吏不能治，今裁溉五十万亩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158007_comment'></div>窦堤为三十六门，均出与入，各有后先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158007_comment'></div>自芍而下，畤庸钟潦，酾而洫之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158007_comment'></div>不能以名达者，又数十处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158007_comment'></div>当旱而霖，讫无凶年，稻粲甘精，南方之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158007_comment'></div>下则芡芰蒲茭，擉罶鱼鳖，亦无饥人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158007_comment'></div>越纻缣丝，金铁匏革，会南北之交市，率征之期泉四千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158007_comment'></div>酒数千酿，分肆开垆，干八千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158007_comment'></div>漕盐六万石，直十千万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158007_comment'></div>故其俗侈忕剽轻，呰惰相夸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158007_comment'></div>农与贾参，迭为并兼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158007_comment'></div>少师儒，不甚官学，亦利使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158007_comment'></div>务丛法弛，守亟迁，吏颇怵为奸欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158007_comment'></div>自天圣初元，讫兹二十岁，凡易守者二十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158007_comment'></div>旁缘旧新，抏敝科禁，断簿辟名，赇谢交臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158007_comment'></div>稽故溃纷，恬不为嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158007_comment'></div>非长人皆不能吏，独资恶政使然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158007_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158007_comment'></div>害吾治者，果在官数易欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158007_comment'></div>龙集辛巳，予以病自乞，实来此邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158007_comment'></div>越明年，病稍愈，因得推略旧闻，觕验今事，而著之篇，以示后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158007_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158007_comment'></div>予诚惷愚，上若不忍加诛，使治寿也，及三年，可使知教，与夫传遽阅人则为之犹贤乎已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158007_comment'></div>庆历二年夏五月裒次。</div><div id='poem_sentence_67_1158007_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年6月</a>　六月，在知寿州任，祷雨有应，作喜雨诗。作品：仲夏愆雨穉苗告悴辄按先帝诏书绘龙请雨兼祷霍山淮渎二祠戊寅蒇祀己卯获雨谨成喜雨诗呈官属。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_105756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仲夏愆雨稚苗告悴辄按先帝诏书绘龙请雨兼祷霍山淮渎二祠戊寅蒇祀己卯获雨谨成喜雨诗呈官属</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105756")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105756'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105756'>盛夏挟骄阳，于以搆炎熯。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105756'>歊尘坌天盖，烈御煽云汉。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105756'>稻颖茁然秀，涸流不胜灌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105756'>田畯恤岁功，释耒共愁叹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105756'>太守忝农使，闭阁重惭惋。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105756'>曾是谬政纲，曾是滥囚犴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105756'>一食三失匕，冀亦思过半。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105756'>驰祝诉群望，愿以身塞谴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105756'>先帝隐民癠，致和格灵变。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105756'>图龙著绘法，令甲布州县。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105756'>愚计不知出，奉行安敢慢。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105756'>外日筑层坛，丙夜封舒雁。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105756'>奉匜再三跪，信辞靡虚荐。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105756'>幸勿为龙羞，敢不报神眷。<div id='poem_sentence_13_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_105756'>翼日耿弗寐，徂野视宵奠。<div id='poem_sentence_14_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_105756'>幽血粲静蠲，执事便传赞。<div id='poem_sentence_15_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_105756'>薄诚蒙昭享，距跃私自忭。<div id='poem_sentence_16_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_105756'>回车未及税，云油默焉遍。<div id='poem_sentence_17_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_105756'>穷海遂涔涔，笼山兹漫漫。<div id='poem_sentence_18_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_105756'>旱麓众卉苏，焦原暍氛散。<div id='poem_sentence_19_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_105756'>寸苗蔚如揠，新波鳞欲涣。<div id='poem_sentence_20_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_105756'>何意一溉窘，有望千箱衍。<div id='poem_sentence_21_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_105756'>揆予乏嘉绩，圣诏仰成宪。<div id='poem_sentence_22_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_105756'>恤祀神罔恫，昏作人胥劝。<div id='poem_sentence_23_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_105756'>抒藻拙言词，窃用慰群掾。<div id='poem_sentence_24_105756_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_105756'></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_105756_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年闰9月</a>　闰九月，在知寿州任，作《寿州重修浮桥记》作品：寿州重修浮桥记。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四六。）</span><div id='poem_1158010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158010?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿州重修浮桥记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年闰9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158010")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158010_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158010'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158010'>寿有大桁，昔在正阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158010_comment'></div>造舟相衔，道北趋南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158010_comment'></div>在周世宗，克伐伪吴，桁移下蔡，实济师徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158010_comment'></div>寿破之年，州亦北迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158010_comment'></div>夹淮而城，桥亘其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158010_comment'></div>于显是州，民穰货丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158010_comment'></div>毂击蹄奔，日月其憧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158010_comment'></div>长缆蜒蜿，以锁大舻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158010_comment'></div>舻自温来，竹以蕲输。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158010_comment'></div>官列戍徒，昼护夜呵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158010_comment'></div>一日而阙，则留于行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158010_comment'></div>庆历之元，予来守藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158010_comment'></div>庀司怠营，桥敝不完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158010_comment'></div>版罅枘脱，陷落是虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158010_comment'></div>客马顿鞅，民乘徐驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158010_comment'></div>予咨于寮，按索旧章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158010_comment'></div>檄发库钱，布材六安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158010_comment'></div>下令于冬，材集以春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158010_comment'></div>百桴盘盘，泛溜而臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158010_comment'></div>是锯是斤，疏为千章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158010_comment'></div>密贯致联，压柞扶持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158010_comment'></div>舟牢索坚，垣为夷涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158010_comment'></div>虹亘蛇申，川怪畏潜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158010_comment'></div>旅行相欢，无念阻艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158010_comment'></div>波摇濑舂，脆日焦风，不能为损，吾新厥功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158010_comment'></div>先时逻兵，才数十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158010_comment'></div>老疲瘠惰，不克邀巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158010_comment'></div>予视台符，满百为率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158010_comment'></div>敕吏如律，事焉肃给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158010_comment'></div>榜成举觞，遍劳属官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158010_comment'></div>匪予之力，实惟众勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158010_comment'></div>清淮汤汤，斯梁与存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158010_comment'></div>嗣葺不忘，以谂后人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158010_comment'></div>明年后九月，乃刻记于石。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1158010_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年闰9月</a>　闰九月，在知寿州任，徙知陈州，有诗。作品：有诏换淮阳。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷八。诗歌系年据温洁《宋祁诗文系年及行实考述》，郑州大学硕士学位论文，2005年，第21页。）</span><div id='poem_104902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>有诏换淮阳</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年闰9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105905?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登齐云亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105905")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105905_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105905'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105905'>少城西北最高处，凭槛极眺襟怀开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105905'>模糊烟树鸟边静，突兀云山天外来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105905'>归樯栉栉逗淮浦，凉飔猎猎生岩隈。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105905'>虽非吾土信云美，伴客留连倾一杯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105905'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105905_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_104858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104858?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同张子春淮上作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104858")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104858'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104858'>南风今日好，归棹上淮津。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104858'>川迥舟如叶，山遥石似人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104858'>波光篙底动，沙垒涨馀新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104858'>谁信机心少，溪鸥伴此身。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104858'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104858_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，在知寿州任，作《寿州西园重修诸亭录》作品：寿州西园重修诸亭录。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集拾遗》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_1158025' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158025?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿州西园重修诸亭录</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158025")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158025'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158025'>州治下蔡八十载，天守牙居，惟有黄堂便坐，与吏民宾客相见，无他观游，庸息我私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158025_comment'></div>前人或指是为传舍，不一二岁且去矣，亟我劳而遗人逸乎，讫不肯营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158025_comment'></div>予友集贤王君子野以景祐三年始来领州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158025_comment'></div>陋前之为，不藏其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158025_comment'></div>乃取四偏隙地，袤三百弓，治而园之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158025_comment'></div>破麋场，荡虺区，刜芜蕴榛，百板以兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158025_comment'></div>崛然而高，于眺望宜，则以为亭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158025_comment'></div>奥然而幽，于息偃宜，则以为堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158025_comment'></div>析置八区，翚棘相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158025_comment'></div>不决沼沱，平疏圃畦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158025_comment'></div>射焉有堋，庇然有樾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158025_comment'></div>取材于官，役不逮民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158025_comment'></div>春秋以展地主之勤，岁月以休公家之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158025_comment'></div>礼成事时，身有馀佚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158025_comment'></div>州人骇观，叹美一辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158025_comment'></div>自是署制剧雄，他邦不若矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158025_comment'></div>当此时，子野以治绩闻，号为异等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158025_comment'></div>由是观之，缮葺燕居，果不害于为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158025_comment'></div>政之不立，虽有廷内，尚恶乎兴？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158025_comment'></div>庆历初年秋七月，予待罪于兹，距子野之迁，岁才四舍，其间凡五易守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158025_comment'></div>而前之胥宇，皆土圮木撑，阶涂缺残，罅风瀸雨，压焉有渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158025_comment'></div>非来者不善继，盖不暇已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158025_comment'></div>予也幸而暇，其明年因得新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158025_comment'></div>坏者支，蔑者鲜，荟者夷，污者浚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158025_comment'></div>潜奇伏妍，一日并还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158025_comment'></div>庶乎子野之志，及予而大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158025_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158025_comment'></div>人之言吾廪帑是力，刀笔是总，茍获济矣，容膝之为多，尚何务为是举，不知君子之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158025_comment'></div>且先王域民也四，惟士以閒宴处之，高明轮奂，各有宜适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158025_comment'></div>仁义之所谈，教化之所谋，体神胖王，乃能自力于道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158025_comment'></div>况吏二千石，居峻制严，表的千里，偪而无差，如等威何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158025_comment'></div>予是以见人之言，与子野之道，得失有閒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158025_comment'></div>初，子野落成，石君曼卿镵石纪其详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158025_comment'></div>及予完复，亦用史臣之法，谨时月，文以忠告之谊，诏后来云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1158025_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
阜阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='9c7d152e85054ab19ee1cd4dd48abac3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9c7d152e85054ab19ee1cd4dd48abac3");'><span id='9c7d152e85054ab19ee1cd4dd48abac3_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年10月</a>　十月，赴知陈州任途中，有诗。作品：道中二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集拾遗》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_105533' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105533' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105533?labeling=true' target='_blank'>道中二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span id='poem_sentence_0_105533'>故岁南趋寿，今兹北向陈。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105533_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105533'>淹留桂枝客，还入玉关人。<div -----title
淮阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8cdf330f4cc04ba6a8f9e899c3703e66_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8cdf330f4cc04ba6a8f9e899c3703e66");'><span id='8cdf330f4cc04ba6a8f9e899c3703e66_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>，45岁</div><div id='8cdf330f4cc04ba6a8f9e899c3703e66' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年10月25日</a>　十月二十五日，到知陈州任，有谢表。作品：陈州谢上任表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157374' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157374?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈州谢上任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年10月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157374")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157374_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157374'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157374'>臣某言：月日，进奏院递到敕书一道，就移臣知陈州军州事，兼管内河堤劝农使，许辞谢，取便路，疾速发赴本任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157374_comment'></div>睿慈垂济，羁偾见宽，许停远方，俾守近屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157374_comment'></div>拜命云已，感涕交沱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157374_comment'></div>臣即以今月九日还付故章，假领新节，恭趣便道，罔敢留行，以二十五日到任礼上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157374_comment'></div>眷兹宛丘，陪迩京邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157374_comment'></div>譬周寰内，均汉右扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157374_comment'></div>氓俗敦庞，阋盗稀简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157374_comment'></div>臣既与吏民相见，即告以朝廷抚育之厚，乡县期会之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157374_comment'></div>最厉惰勤，整比纲目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157374_comment'></div>况谷食丰贱，闾里阜安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157374_comment'></div>傥谨奉条，稍留考课，虽臣庸贱，保致靖嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157374_comment'></div>伏念臣比荷简求，擢在亲近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157374_comment'></div>业以狷直，初无援私，宠灵设加，伦比惊媢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157374_comment'></div>臣亦知险涂易踬，孤蘖难林，尤避讥嫌，居常寝默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157374_comment'></div>冷司閒局，自分岁时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157374_comment'></div>寸劄片文，不干台省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157374_comment'></div>冀缘谨敕，弗累采收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157374_comment'></div>然飞语无根，狙彀潜拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157374_comment'></div>倏违法从，外典守麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157374_comment'></div>仓卒去都，靡遑自辩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157374_comment'></div>间关居外，谁肯为言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157374_comment'></div>而谮不乱聪，昧果蒙照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157374_comment'></div>未踰再祀，俄及内迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157374_comment'></div>幽荄赐萌，朽骼蒙肉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157374_comment'></div>城阙在望，顿比玉关之归；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157374_comment'></div>传瑞交华，决非淮阳之薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157374_comment'></div>抑臣又闻，簪屦至贱，所收本乎君德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157374_comment'></div>狗马何预，所恋在乎主恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157374_comment'></div>物诚有之，臣可无似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157374_comment'></div>敢不勉懦为力，既力而忠，竭肝胆之愚，塞分寸之责，生年死日，质圣誓神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157374_comment'></div>疏屏方虔，造朝云阻，躬留心企，感悦丛并。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1157374'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1157374_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157374'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按《续通鉴长编》，庆历二年，右仆射张耆以鱼周询奏，于七月丁亥判陈州，九月甲申徙寿州。耆自陈徙寿，故祁自寿徙陈。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157374_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年10月25日</a>　十月二十五日，到知陈州任，有谢启。作品：陈州到任谢两地启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈州到任谢两地启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年10月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157778")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157778'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157778'>昨奉敕移知本州，即以今月二十五日到任盘上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157778_comment'></div>收迹远藩，改麾近屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157778_comment'></div>诏蠲入谢，道便之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157778_comment'></div>循复宠私，丛并欢愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157778_comment'></div>伏念祁性惟疏狷，仕偶休嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157778_comment'></div>向自书林，得持从橐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157778_comment'></div>缘不材而冒禄，召多谤之抵巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157778_comment'></div>大度掩容，上司保恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157778_comment'></div>许宽漳滨之疾，遂假淮南之章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157778_comment'></div>幽绩殿科，危心疾首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157778_comment'></div>谓应罢斥，翻及采甄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157778_comment'></div>内移六郡之雄，居重四藩之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157778_comment'></div>府华地奥，物衍岁穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157778_comment'></div>癯质早衰，顾班春而已强；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157778_comment'></div>寒根载茂，宁得地以当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157778_comment'></div>上本曲成，实缘佥启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157778_comment'></div>斯盖阁下敷施阴德，章叙庶官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157778_comment'></div>俾下无失职之嗟，使朝收善养之实，猥容完士，胥洎大钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157778_comment'></div>冀自力以及群，庶有成而论报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157778_comment'></div>析符云恪，翘阁犹赊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157778_comment'></div>徒尔向风，恨无飞肉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1157778_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年10月</a>　十月，刚到陈州，与夏竦有书信往来。作品：上蔡州夏太尉启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五四。温谱系此文于庆历三年，此据文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157696' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157696' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157696?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上蔡州夏太尉启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157696")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157696_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157696'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157696'>忝守近藩，幸临大府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157696_comment'></div>飞邮通问，踦履蒙收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157696_comment'></div>闵方坠之禽，振其毛羽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157696_comment'></div>嘘已枯之木，奋乃条枚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157696_comment'></div>身匪无知，恩归有所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157696_comment'></div>恭惟太尉天挺懿德，邦咨大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157696_comment'></div>一其精心，乂我丕载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157696_comment'></div>竹筠松鬣，迥贯于霜秋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157696_comment'></div>蝇点夜脂，不尘于玉色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157696_comment'></div>故能从容自保，间隙莫乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157696_comment'></div>斯文赖安，吾君倚相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157696_comment'></div>虽作屏侯甸，而乃情王家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157696_comment'></div>钦聆朝制之颁，显服乾台之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157696_comment'></div>窃商公议，莫首茂勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157696_comment'></div>愿御太和，垂副舆望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157696_comment'></div>祁方须交印，尚阻造门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157696_comment'></div>翘溯所天，悁黯无喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157696_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1157696_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　冬，在知陈州任，有诗寄郑戬。作品：永兴郑资政巩县路逢雪见寄。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一一。温谱系此诗于庆历六年，此据诗意改。）</span><div id='poem_104825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴郑资政巩县路逢雪见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104825")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104825'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104825'>大旆关河远，同云天地浮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104825'>凌晨逢朔雪，此路向西州。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104825'>寒袭生犀健，光催畅毂流。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104825'>馀清念东郭，穿履趁英游。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104825_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104825'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104825_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='70f27bddae0b45e2b313af603fa6f30a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("70f27bddae0b45e2b313af603fa6f30a");'><span id='70f27bddae0b45e2b313af603fa6f30a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1043')">1042-1043年</a>，45-46岁</div><div id='70f27bddae0b45e2b313af603fa6f30a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　本年，在知陈州任，上疏乞开治渒河。作品：乞开治渒河奏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1157270' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157270' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157270?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞开治渒河奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157270")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157270_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157270'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157270'>臣知寿州日，伏见本州安丰县有芍陂，自古所传，元引龙穴山水及渒河水入陂，每岁灌田万顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157270_comment'></div>近年多被泥沙淤淀，陂池地渐高，蓄水转少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157270_comment'></div>龙穴山一派，水源既小，今来只藉渒河注水入陂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157270_comment'></div>后来渒河一道水渠，本县又不修开，遂至水道堙塞，陂水浅涸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157270_comment'></div>臣自到任后，并值二年乾旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157270_comment'></div>去年自六月放竭陂水，只是救灌得侧近一二千顷，是以寿州米价踊贵，官私妨阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157270_comment'></div>臣窃闻得寿州正是出米之地，全藉此一陂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157270_comment'></div>旧来陂水若满，常无乾旱，是以县名安丰，盖取此义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157270_comment'></div>臣欲乞朝旨直下本州，委知州、通判亲往陂上相度，开治渒河，令水渠深快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157270_comment'></div>于渒河内筑堤，阑水入渠，注满陂内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157270_comment'></div>高筑陂岸，及重开撅陂内淤淀之处，令稍深阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157270_comment'></div>其工亦不甚多，只乞就来春农隙之时，少借邻县并本县人夫三五千人，约工一月，可见次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157270_comment'></div>如陂水满足，则溉田万顷，永无凶荒，兼得陈颍至京都一路官私米斛有可供应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157270_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1157270_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1042&endYear=1042')">1042年</a>　本年，在知陈州任，与张耆有书信往来。作品：回寿州张侍中启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。）</span>上寿州张侍郎启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回寿州张侍中启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157750")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157750'>向缘易地，得遂趋风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157750_comment'></div>略接台华，遽勤行后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157750_comment'></div>守藩云始，进记未遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157750_comment'></div>敢谓侍中敦好士之风，厚交符之契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157750_comment'></div>占词记室，流问行人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157750_comment'></div>屈卫霍之雄棱，讲楚陈之盟好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157750_comment'></div>外依奖眷，中激衰孱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157750_comment'></div>官有职思，书非言尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157750_comment'></div>永惟衔佩，姑志埏镕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157750_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1157750_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157787' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157787' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157787?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上寿州张侍郎启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157787")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157787_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157787'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157787'>恪守鱼符，怅怀鸱阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157787_comment'></div>尝拟中军之义府，得瞻天老之台华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157787_comment'></div>坐溯三洲，邈成千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157787_comment'></div>兹者侍郎缘汉章之代，损天铉之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157787_comment'></div>敕记室以授辞，付行邮而垂问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157787_comment'></div>大丞相之重，遂屈移书；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157787_comment'></div>一逢掖之卑，敢烦钧礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157787_comment'></div>馀波沛润，幽谷蒙暄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157787_comment'></div>谅缘拜赐之阶，前启知归之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157787_comment'></div>感惭交集，拙讷难宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157787_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157787_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年3月</a>　三月，在知陈州任，以天章阁待制被召赴阙，有谢表。作品：谢替赴阙表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢替赴阙表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157375")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157375_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157375'>臣某月日，都进奏院递到敕书付臣，为差宣徽南院使、保静军节度使王德用判陈州，令臣候交割讫，发来赴阙者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157375_comment'></div>节音垂召，诏底前颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157375_comment'></div>弗弃而收，释忧为忭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157375_comment'></div>拜恩匪次，戢感无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157375_comment'></div>伏念臣本以空疏，误蒙记识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157375_comment'></div>课劳未验，窃宠已华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157375_comment'></div>遂自史员，入尘禁阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157375_comment'></div>水浅舟胶，势有必然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157375_comment'></div>驭拙吻伤，理无容济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157375_comment'></div>果烦正议，将责罔功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157375_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下广覆由天，至慈如父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157375_comment'></div>谓树立之始，实出羁平；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157375_comment'></div>虽进擢以来，不由党援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157375_comment'></div>排訾摈刻，屈宪回仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157375_comment'></div>俾千石以出麾，促万分而自赎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157375_comment'></div>甫踰年律，特改近藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157375_comment'></div>坠叶重春，摧辀复载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157375_comment'></div>会须辅镇，将授帅臣，因得代还，以图收齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157375_comment'></div>闻命欢踊，抚己震惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157375_comment'></div>且念蕞尔孤生，腼然去国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157375_comment'></div>长而多病，衰不须年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157375_comment'></div>鬓雪纷斑，目花眩黑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157375_comment'></div>越在遐外，积有流忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157375_comment'></div>尚恐狗马道穷，先填沟壑，江汉天限，无复朝宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157375_comment'></div>敢期踦屦之馀，倏被召环之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157375_comment'></div>光华下集，首领生归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157375_comment'></div>威灵改加，殒越奚报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157375_comment'></div>但念九阍在望，十舍而遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157375_comment'></div>虽否运已倾，决无终塞，而清光可仰，敢俟驾行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157375_comment'></div>甫讫交符，即当就道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157375_comment'></div>欣荣参会，涩讷难宣。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_1157375'></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1157375_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1157375'><span class='label'>题下原注：</span>「按本传，祁由陈州还知制诰。时系庆历三年。」<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1157375_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年3月</a>　三月，将由陈州赴京，有诗献晏殊。作品：将到都先献枢密太尉相公。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一四。）</span><div id='poem_105123' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105123' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105123?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将到都先献枢密太尉相公</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105123")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105123_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105123'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105123'>再试州旟验不才，却将憔悴到中台。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105123_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105123'>相车问罢同牛喘，大厦成时与燕来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105123_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105123'>今日谋猷须<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_105123", 105123, "Clauses/4/Comments/0")'>丙魏</span>，他年宾客但邹枚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105123_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105123'>西园闻道馀春在，尚及花前滟滟杯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105123_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105123'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105123_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年3月</a>　三月，离陈州赴京，有诗。作品：去郡作。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷五。）</span>离宛丘舟中作。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一三。）</span><div id='poem_105748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>去郡作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105748")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105748'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105748'>解龟淮阳区，浮鹢暮春月。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105748'>州民拥前道，重为使君别。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105748'>尊酒却略跪，丝管参差发。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105748'>共谓君此行，宠命焕朝节。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105748'>进伏丹泥戺，勉之奋芳烈。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105748'>使君惭且嗟，处躬素衷拙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105748'>虽尔荷赐环，安敢冀荣辙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105748'>顿首谢上毕，行当避时杰。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105748'>愿移邦人爱，孤根保勿伐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105748_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105748'></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_105748_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_105349' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105349' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105349?labeling=true' target='_blank'>离宛丘舟中作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105349")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105349_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105349'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105349'>孑孑归樯五两斜，浮云尽处是京华。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105349'>不随东鲁人浮海，正似新丰犬识家。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105349'>笏首新荷寻珥笔，腰间故印解垂緺。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105349'>多年蹇足蹒跚甚，却畏丹泥九墄赊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105349_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105349'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105349_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
