-----title
许昌
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d9354155bfa540eb97633c27a4950c68_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d9354155bfa540eb97633c27a4950c68");'><span id='d9354155bfa540eb97633c27a4950c68_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>，52岁</div><div id='d9354155bfa540eb97633c27a4950c68' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年4月18日</a>　二月十八日，在知许州任，召还为翰林侍读学士、史馆修撰，有谢表。作品：谢复侍读学士表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。系年月份据宋祁《长葛道中作寄侍读梅给事》（《景文集》卷五））</span><div id='poem_1157382' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157382' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢复侍读学士表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年4月18日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157382")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157382_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157382'>臣某言：今月十八日，马递到官诰敕牒各一通，授臣依前充翰林侍读学士，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157382_comment'></div>左符待罪，方儆常箴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157382_comment'></div>中制疏恩，遽还近职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157382_comment'></div>祓前尤之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1157382", 1157382, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>诖谬</span>，艳来宠之便蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157382_comment'></div>抚己衔荣，无颜容愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157382_comment'></div>伏念臣福祚单狭，性局憃烦，距跃至愚，坯陶上教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157382_comment'></div>因随士夫之课，谨修官学之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157382_comment'></div>入直文林，进簪侍笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157382_comment'></div>从鹤翘之游豫，备虎观之讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157382_comment'></div>荐许为邦，俄蒙纳节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157382_comment'></div>序跻天掖，祗演王纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157382_comment'></div>再忝复门之游，久奉华光之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157382_comment'></div>至于删定条约，豫法家之议者三年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157382_comment'></div>整比京司，牧县官之财者万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157382_comment'></div>止贪云补，罔避谤嚣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157382_comment'></div>仍因擿句之閒，尝逮迩言之访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157382_comment'></div>质当今之谓利病，靡敢廋情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157382_comment'></div>语前世所以存亡，或蒙称善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157382_comment'></div>以孤远之质，荷颙卬之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157382_comment'></div>播于传闻，宁无妒媢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157382_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157382_comment'></div>一金被赏，来众口之毁销；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157382_comment'></div>寸的取褒，启百夫之决拾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157382_comment'></div>名盛难处，援寡易危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157382_comment'></div>况复因希阔之仪，抵忘误之禁，缘为飞语，遂浼至聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157382_comment'></div>所赖公议原情，眷慈含垢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157382_comment'></div>悯一眚之失，义有相除；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157382_comment'></div>在三赦之科，愚最无害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157382_comment'></div>止停严直，犹屏大藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157382_comment'></div>曾未半期，亟颁成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157382_comment'></div>举已除之籍，复署禁扉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157382_comment'></div>慎数易之宜，仍留州阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157382_comment'></div>孤心按堵，蹇步良行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157382_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下养以至仁，纳之大度，忍令久弃，俄与自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157382_comment'></div>冒陈橛以流膏，破幽盆而逗照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157382_comment'></div>故緌更饰，足追露冕之矜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157382_comment'></div>新组交垂，遂免寒灰之辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157382_comment'></div>况臣素探前载，粗识大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157382_comment'></div>谓事君之尽忠，不忘于外；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157382_comment'></div>知获罪之无祷，有私在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157382_comment'></div>水虽折而犹东，石可磨而弗挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157382_comment'></div>谨当宣明厥守，湔溉尔疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157382_comment'></div>夙夜匪告于劳，淄磷不昧其节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157382_comment'></div>河湍日皎，有如自誓之言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157382_comment'></div>弦劲韦柔，参服攸闻之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157382_comment'></div>获收涓效，归报洪私。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1157382_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
长葛
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='28a3853492224179b9642be84aea86aa_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("28a3853492224179b9642be84aea86aa");'><span id='28a3853492224179b9642be84aea86aa_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>，52岁</div><div id='28a3853492224179b9642be84aea86aa' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年2月</a>　二月，由许州回京途中过长葛，有诗寄人。作品：长葛道中作寄侍读梅给事。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷五。梅给事疑为梅挚。）</span><div id='poem_105744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长葛道中作寄侍读梅给事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105744")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105744'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105744'>仲春告言归，道次古长葛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105744'>水穷既舍舟，仆具始脂辖。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105744'>南登高原望，天宇莽庨豁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105744'>溱■<span class='inlineComment2'>（氵冀）</span>澹无波，芣騩森相轧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105744'>春鸠日夜鸣，阳膏浅深达。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105744'>田畯挈壶浆，稚子勤襫袯。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105744'>驱牛洒先稑，趣车载输秸。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105744'>郊柘色欣欣，梢沟流活活。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105744'>县官恩泽美，农节未尝夺。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105744'>贤牧谨诏书，民隐罔遗察。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105744'>射蠲赘聚劳，赋检诛求猾。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105744'>我亦占一廛，闻兹慰饥渴。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105744'>矢诗虽不多，要附许风末。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105744_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105744'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_105744_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
亳州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='1dd62467a0b74fc6866da57ede1c10ef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1dd62467a0b74fc6866da57ede1c10ef");'><span id='1dd62467a0b74fc6866da57ede1c10ef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1052')">1051-1052年</a>，54-55岁</div><div id='1dd62467a0b74fc6866da57ede1c10ef' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年3月28日</a>　三月二十八日，到知亳州任，有谢表。作品：亳州谢上表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157386' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157386' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157386?labeling=true' target='_blank'>亳州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年3月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157386")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157386_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157386'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157386'>臣某言：伏奉二月诏书，差臣知亳州军州事，臣即于三月二十八日到任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157386_comment'></div>涡阳旧里，谯社胜区，联奥二京之间，参雄三辅之亚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157386_comment'></div>长人如此，衔赐无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157386_comment'></div>伏念臣学本迂疏，性非通晓，叨尘禁近，久历岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157386_comment'></div>惟悉心以事君，不因回而取福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157386_comment'></div>居常敛分，动辄省身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157386_comment'></div>正以所得之名，多浮于实；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157386_comment'></div>匪衷之服，易用致灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157386_comment'></div>比年以来，宿疢继作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157386_comment'></div>两鬓纷白，馀日何几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157386_comment'></div>双目眩昏，飞花无数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157386_comment'></div>难参法从，愿守外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157386_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下裁贷憃愚，记怜面目，申择善地，俾总化条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157386_comment'></div>顾臣此州所领七县，盗贼数发，流亡尚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157386_comment'></div>所赖首麦向登，膏澍仍降，力农相忭，比屋寖安，仰惟清衷，无及多轸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157386_comment'></div>臣亦早侍秘幄，屡耳圣言，以四方宣力则和，虽一夫失所为负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157386_comment'></div>敢不勉责吏事，勤喻诏恩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157386_comment'></div>向冀刑罚稍衰，手足知措，仓廪向实，礼节可兴，勉衰偾之残躯，报光荣之误宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157386_comment'></div>违颜方迩，结恋徒深。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157386_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年3月</a>　三月，到知亳州任，有诗。作品：予既到郡有诏仍修唐书寄局中诸僚。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_104755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>予既到郡有诏仍修唐书寄局中诸僚</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104755")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104755'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104755'>一章通奏领州麾，诏许残书得自随。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104755_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104755'>吾党成章真小子，官中了事是痴儿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104755_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104755'>昏眸病入花争乱，倦首搔馀雪半垂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104755_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104755'>所赖韦吴皆杰笔，刘生当见汗青期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104755_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104755'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104755_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　夏，在知亳州任，有书上贾昌朝谈修《唐书》事。作品：上观文右丞书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四九。王谱系此文于皇祐四年，此据文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157542' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157542' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157542?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观文右丞书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157542")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157542_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157542'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157542'>祁去年三月二十九日止官下，值艾创溃发，四支无聊，至此月初良已，是用未克奏记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157542_comment'></div>亳虽閒僻，纲纪久废，盗贼总总。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157542_comment'></div>勉力操决，至此渐有绪，时时少暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157542_comment'></div>中前被台符，许讫《唐书》旧稿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157542_comment'></div>自以眼眩花，头垂雪，心术昏倦，实不能从诸公于笔研间，具奏恳免，今又不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157542_comment'></div>会递中得执事所赐书，重复开诲，仍勖以富贵磨灭，惟斯文为不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157542_comment'></div>此事仆敢不勉，正恐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1157542", 1157542, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>阑单</span>淹久，未能成书，佁儗在远，咨询无所，为诸儒诋其疏谬耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157542_comment'></div>今已走一介悉索副稿，计今秋可了列传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157542_comment'></div>若纪、志，犹须来春乃成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157542_comment'></div>天使此书传耶，尚无他患；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157542_comment'></div>若其不传，即未知使仆得谤得罪，一代之典，遂泯然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157542_comment'></div>子长、孟坚才几圣人，作史并数十年，讫无完书，或当时亡失，或后人补缀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157542_comment'></div>况今三百年事，浅猥残缺，要须补润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157542_comment'></div>又史官才不逮二人远甚，虽欲遽急修定，其可行远耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157542_comment'></div>愿执事更纾岁月，使诸儒悉力论讨，庶其寡过者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157542_comment'></div>成之难，则行之久；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157542_comment'></div>成之易，则废之速也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157542_comment'></div>诸序论辄斐然撰次，须且具草，仰丐窜定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157542_comment'></div>官守有限，趋谒未期，惟慎夏多爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157542_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　本年，在知亳州任，荐房庶。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年1月</a>　正月，在知亳州任，有诗。作品：入壬辰新岁。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_104729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>入壬辰新岁</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_104729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104729'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104729'>五十为衰始，仍馀五岁衰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104729'>双眸不明鉴，残鬓已纷丝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104729'>铜虎虽频剖，荷囊信滥持。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104729'>何须依老格，先作故山期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104729_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104729'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104729_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年4月19日</a>　四月十九日，在知亳州任，遣使致祭北岳以祷雨。作品：北岳祷雨文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><div id='poem_1158187' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158187' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158187?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年4月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158187")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158187_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158187'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158187'>维皇祐四年，岁次壬辰，四月丙子朔，越十九日甲午，具位宋祁，谨遣光禄寺丞、签署节度判官厅公事夏倚，以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于北岳安天元圣帝：近以正月至四月不雨，艺者不苗，苗者不蕃，吏民遑遑，忧为岁害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158187_comment'></div>尝遣属官走庙下以旱告，曾未浃辰，雨获嘉应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158187_comment'></div>愁叹之声，转为讴吟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158187_comment'></div>是用卜日具祭，以答灵贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158187_comment'></div>然而川隰之间既幸霶洽矣，其陵阜硗埆之田尚未涵足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158187_comment'></div>神其振张威明，以大明功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158187_comment'></div>俾高下均蒙其赐，则吏民尊奉之心益虔肃矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1158187_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

target='_blank'>请复唐驮幕之制奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157292")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157292_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157292'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157292'>臣闻唐时出师用兵，每什为五驮法，马牛任从所便，其间随行什物锅幕之类皆具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157292_comment'></div>故师行万里，经亘岁月，无所阙乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157292_comment'></div>自五代之乱，更相侵扰，其兵不出中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157292_comment'></div>弱者轻赍，强者因粮，遂失五驮法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157292_comment'></div>至今相承，不复讨寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157292_comment'></div>臣伏见朝廷之制，每指挥五百人，指挥使得夹幕一具，副者得单幕一具，马军得叶锅布行槽等若干，步军得锅若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157292_comment'></div>自军员以下，更无帐幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157292_comment'></div>或出次野外，虽甚风雨，亦无所庇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157292_comment'></div>又战士被甲，所将衣衾，悉自负荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157292_comment'></div>马军则盂杓之类悉在马上，然则行数百里，人马强力，皆已先疲，脱若逢贼，安能挽蹋击刺，与争胜哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157292_comment'></div>故无幕帟，则士卒无所休庇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157292_comment'></div>无驮物，则士卒须自负荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157292_comment'></div>此于军戎，亦非小害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157292_comment'></div>臣乞诏近臣检求唐驮幕法，下殿前马步军司，议可复与否，明条利害，上禀朝廷指挥。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1157292_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　本年，在知真定府任，上《论养马劄子》作品：论养马劄子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1157286' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157286' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157286?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论养马劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157286")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157286_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157286'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157286'>臣等近知河北孳生诸监马，例各低小，不堪战陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157286_comment'></div>盖自来马种杂乱，或翁大母小，或翁小母大，配放时不曾拣别，是致无由生得高大好马，实恐缓急有误诸军分配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157286_comment'></div>昨有判官寇平因点印时曾拣好翁母马七百馀匹，送淇水第一监，别立群分配放，已准宣命施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157286_comment'></div>续据都监李知和乞于逐群内拣出五匹大马，破草养喂好母马配放，又蒙宣命许依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157286_comment'></div>臣等参详，逐官各见用心拣别马种，然终是未得尽善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157286_comment'></div>今欲乞将孳生监与一例分作二等，其骨格高大，堪充战陈者，为上等；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157286_comment'></div>骨格低小，有诸色病名者，为下等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157286_comment'></div>各别立作群分配放，仍令草地相远，不得交相混杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157286_comment'></div>如此，必生得驹口格式入等，堪任披带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157286_comment'></div>至于杂马，亦自无阙用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157286_comment'></div>其自今以后，生得驹子，亦便依此拣别，各归等第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157286_comment'></div>内上等马翁，并乞依寇平等奏请，于不配放时破草料上槽养喂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157286_comment'></div>所贵及时游放，不至羸怯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157286_comment'></div>兼臣等不住将诸州上京马内拣选迭格好翁母马，小作番次，逐旋差殿侍押赴诸监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157286_comment'></div>如此分开等第，不出三年，必须大改，收得迭格驹口，以备战陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157286_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157286_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　本年，在知真定府任，上《又乞养马劄子》作品：论养马劄子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1157286' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157286' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157286?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论养马劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157286")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157286_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157286'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157286'>臣等近知河北孳生诸监马，例各低小，不堪战陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157286_comment'></div>盖自来马种杂乱，或翁大母小，或翁小母大，配放时不曾拣别，是致无由生得高大好马，实恐缓急有误诸军分配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157286_comment'></div>昨有判官寇平因点印时曾拣好翁母马七百馀匹，送淇水第一监，别立群分配放，已准宣命施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157286_comment'></div>续据都监李知和乞于逐群内拣出五匹大马，破草养喂好母马配放，又蒙宣命许依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157286_comment'></div>臣等参详，逐官各见用心拣别马种，然终是未得尽善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157286_comment'></div>今欲乞将孳生监与一例分作二等，其骨格高大，堪充战陈者，为上等；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157286_comment'></div>骨格低小，有诸色病名者，为下等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157286_comment'></div>各别立作群分配放，仍令草地相远，不得交相混杂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157286_comment'></div>如此，必生得驹口格式入等，堪任披带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157286_comment'></div>至于杂马，亦自无阙用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157286_comment'></div>其自今以后，生得驹子，亦便依此拣别，各归等第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157286_comment'></div>内上等马翁，并乞依寇平等奏请，于不配放时破草料上槽养喂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157286_comment'></div>所贵及时游放，不至羸怯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157286_comment'></div>兼臣等不住将诸州上京马内拣选迭格好翁母马，小作番次，逐旋差殿侍押赴诸监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157286_comment'></div>如此分开等第，不出三年，必须大改，收得迭格驹口，以备战陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157286_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157286_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　本年，在知真定府任，上《上仁宗论河北及岭南事宜》作品：上仁宗论河北及岭南事宜。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集拾遗》卷九。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1052&endYear=1052')">1052年</a>　本年，在知真定府任，上《蛮夷利害议》作品：蛮夷利害议。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四三。）</span><div id='poem_1157334' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157334' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157334?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蛮夷利害议</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157334")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157334_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157334'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157334'>右，臣窃闻：用兵者不幸敌之乱，而欲己之不可乱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157334_comment'></div>不畏彼之侵，而患所以来其侵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157334_comment'></div>今闻契丹兴端造隙，欲败和誓，外倚虚骄，摇胁近边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157334_comment'></div>不顾曲直，惟利是视，是谓贪兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157334_comment'></div>兵贪者乱，此可乘而取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157334_comment'></div>然陛下无良将，边陲之臣，类皆才下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157334_comment'></div>又甲胄不完密，弓弩不射远，行无驮幕，出无营垒，马乏精突，士习骄惰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157334_comment'></div>外不能捍患，内能为患，此陛下未有可冀敌之不能乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157334_comment'></div>邕溪之蛮，最脆弱者，今乃离去巢窟，略地千里，弄兵安行，无一能拒，虻飞蝇营，拿而不散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157334_comment'></div>此官滥吏庸，招其所以侵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157334_comment'></div>事弊及此，不振而张之，不可谓谋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157334_comment'></div>谋之不臧，使得遗祸，不可谓国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157334_comment'></div>臣伏见陛下诸臣，急则念治，缓则偷安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157334_comment'></div>天下无事时，见利害之小者，则鄙之，以为不足事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157334_comment'></div>及大利害，则惮，曰「安可卒行」，又曰「据今日之安，亦未及于危」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157334_comment'></div>小者鄙之，大者难之，远者蔑之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157334_comment'></div>于是天下事，日损一日，岁耗一岁，经制不立，纪纲颓陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157334_comment'></div>陛下盛德，四海晏然，然无法而治，不可以恃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157334_comment'></div>今幸二边小警，朝廷焦意寒心，此而献谋，人意必向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157334_comment'></div>臣请先举二方言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157334_comment'></div>今河北既分部署等路，各有属州，是唐诸节度兵也，然而未有都统，以节进退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157334_comment'></div>臣请因建大帅以一之，使部分各得其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157334_comment'></div>则金鼓旗帜，卒伍号令，便当一禀于其帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157334_comment'></div>缀铠磨兵，益养马，阅师而讨之，讲求法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157334_comment'></div>朝廷密诏，以敌入某处，以某部署军当之，某路以师援，某所以粮济，咨大帅而听命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157334_comment'></div>击首尾应，击尾首应，掎角屈伸，包裹弥缝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157334_comment'></div>明立赏罚，阃外之务，不从中制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157334_comment'></div>此所谓不可乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157334_comment'></div>不乱则陛下可用，而胜彼之乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157334_comment'></div>岭南外区，瘴疠薰蒸，北方戍人，夏秋往者，九死一在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157334_comment'></div>多发兵则粮乏，少发则事不集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157334_comment'></div>急责功则蛮獠遁逃不肯出，缓则复来扰人，是宜有以制之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157334_comment'></div>今闻发北方兵踰万人，已戍岭外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157334_comment'></div>下湿上蒸，病死必多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157334_comment'></div>料群蛮势不久屯，击之必散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157334_comment'></div>臣谓不如选一二健将，岁才留北兵五千人分屯要害处，得善吏十数人，完治诸州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157334_comment'></div>募土人为乡军，复其租调，视州大小户多少为之数，统以部伍，教以进退，习以彼所长技，与相追逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157334_comment'></div>率百人给北兵三十，以劲弩利兵佐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157334_comment'></div>冬春则使深入扰其居，夏秋则使谨守防其略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157334_comment'></div>彼虽能诱纳中国亡命，要之食尽，必出卤掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157334_comment'></div>若其来也，一大斩获，则终身疮矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157334_comment'></div>我威已立，然后可议招来，与之盟则固，许之臣则久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157334_comment'></div>远期五年，近止三年，南方无事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157334_comment'></div>臣窃恐有司茍且，复仍旧弊，多留客兵，自取死亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157334_comment'></div>又不先以威，而务招怀，不为远图，而求近效，故虽盟必违，虽臣必叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157334_comment'></div>夫前日之失，已不可追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157334_comment'></div>自今之利，便当审料。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157334_comment'></div>恐诸将功成之后，议者泰然，遂便因循授吏，卤莽设防，不为陛下议长久计，虽一贼死而百贼生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157334_comment'></div>故臣曰，彼侵不足畏，患所以来其侵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157334_comment'></div>臣愚陋不识禁忌，惟陛下裁赦用之。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_1157334'></div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1157334_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年1月4日</a>　正月四日，在知真定府任，作《谢雪文》作品：谢雪文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年1月21日</a>　正月二十一日，在知真定府任，徙知定州，充本路都部署，兼安抚使。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
定州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='3cbf203d10c740aebdb3839467adca73_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3cbf203d10c740aebdb3839467adca73");'><span id='3cbf203d10c740aebdb3839467adca73_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1056')">1053-1056年</a>，56-59岁</div><div id='3cbf203d10c740aebdb3839467adca73' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年2月25日</a>　二月二十五日，到知定州任，有谢表。作品：定州到任谢表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157387' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157387' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157387?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州到任谢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年2月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157387")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157387_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157387'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157387'>臣某言：伏奉正月日制诏，就移臣充定州路都部署兼安抚使、兼知定州，臣以二月二十五日到任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157387_comment'></div>由中被诏，益北护边，外循衰癃，阴讼庸短，强颜临部，扪感充膺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157387_comment'></div>伏以中山之区，河朔为剧，作国垣捍，压敌喉襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157387_comment'></div>高墉崒而云联，诸屯班以棋置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157387_comment'></div>风俗质俭，气尚强雄，从古以还，号劲兵处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157387_comment'></div>自四道分帅，大将须才，韩琦以旧臣之劳，实首兹选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157387_comment'></div>出入六载，经营百为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157387_comment'></div>补绽成完，敛顽就法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157387_comment'></div>声绩明具，纲条设张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157387_comment'></div>考课上闻，居治第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157387_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下精覈吏事，留意塞防，谓琦报政之成，进易其地；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157387_comment'></div>惟定代更之重，谨择于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157387_comment'></div>过听腐儒，俾嗣前最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157387_comment'></div>伏念臣称自寒素，得厕班行，所习简牍之功，不知军旅之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157387_comment'></div>比尝出守，止责亲民，故于岁成，偶纾官坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157387_comment'></div>自尘真定之擢，遂总中权之华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157387_comment'></div>定命不可以固让还，远戍不可以不才解，径趋所莅，甫及半期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157387_comment'></div>讵谓佥言，更忝兹授，官并二组，地绵九州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157387_comment'></div>且臣自揆所能，出群臣之下远甚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157387_comment'></div>潜计其齿，去六十之年几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157387_comment'></div>论公则应黜乃迁，语私则当閒反剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157387_comment'></div>惧溢于喜，荣弗盖惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157387_comment'></div>况此州遭水潦之馀，困储廥之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157387_comment'></div>且食先军足，士以马强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157387_comment'></div>今乃庾乏亿秭之饶，牧微騋牝之衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157387_comment'></div>贤守未办，况臣至愚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157387_comment'></div>谋夫深忧，况臣浅识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157387_comment'></div>斗筲陋器，蒲柳馀阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157387_comment'></div>倚以成功，判于诿事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157387_comment'></div>然闻生者士所重，徇义则轻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157387_comment'></div>兵者器则凶，忘教斯怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157387_comment'></div>臣既粗识前载，数剽大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157387_comment'></div>虽旅力复弗强，知忠孝在所尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157387_comment'></div>当悉心细大，自力宵旰，奋练戎行，绥育生聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157387_comment'></div>有如缓急而可用，曾是掊克之靡加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157387_comment'></div>至于事当便宜，物有长利，奉上无隐，据义固争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157387_comment'></div>敢冀睿慈，每赐裁赦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157387_comment'></div>乘鄣在远，拱宁赊期，心溯凝宸，魂栖清戟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1157387_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年2月25日</a>　二月二十五日，到知定州任，有谢两府启。作品：定州谢到任上两府启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1157740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157740?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州谢到任上两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年2月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157740")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157740'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157740'>昨奉诏书就移前件官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157740_comment'></div>仰对明缗，俯循华组。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157740_comment'></div>地由边重，帅以儒荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157740_comment'></div>任不值能，颜无容愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157740_comment'></div>窃念祁短谋腐学，病质衰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157740_comment'></div>自宜力于艺文，不应彊以军旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157740_comment'></div>比者承乏真定，临制中权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157740_comment'></div>率职半期，无治言状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157740_comment'></div>方襆被以须去，俄假节而益迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157740_comment'></div>进领博陵，深控幽朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157740_comment'></div>营屯云集，亭障蝉联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157740_comment'></div>列属九州，有宜得便于事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157740_comment'></div>裒众十万，无日不讨于师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157740_comment'></div>号为剧藩，当待贤牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157740_comment'></div>宁咨鲰懦，再忝佥俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157740_comment'></div>伏以阁下明总庶官，辅兴邦縡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157740_comment'></div>广十取五之路，收百有一之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157740_comment'></div>谓愚可矜，虽拙有用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157740_comment'></div>遂俾文吏，超摄元戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157740_comment'></div>所赖敌运百年，天声万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157740_comment'></div>戍馀卧鼓之息，城无早阖之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157740_comment'></div>操箠可制豪杰之骄，持簿可期租赋之入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157740_comment'></div>倚国为重，积日赏勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157740_comment'></div>不然巢林一枝，素省身而敛分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157740_comment'></div>假令入竹万个，甘赎罪于旷官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157740_comment'></div>埏冶不私，帡幪知所。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1157740_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年2月25日</a>　二月二十五日，到知定州任，有回诸官启。作品：定州到任回诸官启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1157741' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157741' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157741?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州到任回诸官启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年2月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157741")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157741_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157741'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157741'>解符真定，易地中山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157741_comment'></div>未成五月之劳，复忝万夫之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157741_comment'></div>适询副贰，并屈俊雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157741_comment'></div>得联纸尾之衔，参重幕庭之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157741_comment'></div>息藩为幸，庇短云初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157741_comment'></div>何枉勤私，先贻庆问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157741_comment'></div>丛麻可倚，诚有助于飞蓬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157741_comment'></div>扬秕在前，恐贻羞于嘉谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157741_comment'></div>内名赉惠，实托馀光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157741_comment'></div>就部方勤，尽言安叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157741_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157741_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年2月25日</a>　二月二十五日，到知定州任，有启。作品：定州到任启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1157743' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157743' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157743?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州到任启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年2月25日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157743")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157743_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157743'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157743'>今者祗奉诏期，已如官次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157743_comment'></div>荐烦假节，益壮护边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157743_comment'></div>内循空虚，日用惭震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157743_comment'></div>伏以中山之剧，朔北称雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157743_comment'></div>廪帑万楹，铠械亿计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157743_comment'></div>畅毂蔽野，高墉彗云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157743_comment'></div>屯壁骈集以相望，诸将奔走而听命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157743_comment'></div>宜待才选，庸缉事经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157743_comment'></div>而祁衰老之馀，懦怯有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157743_comment'></div>伤羽不择林以息，穷鳞仅得水而安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157743_comment'></div>何意朝佥，过仍师节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157743_comment'></div>赖名臣之前治，辑郡务而有条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157743_comment'></div>坐遵成规，便足为政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157743_comment'></div>短发虽白，幸弗事于论兵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157743_comment'></div>髀肉自完，况无需于汗马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157743_comment'></div>永言荣遇，特出误知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157743_comment'></div>冀一割之可求，诡万分而为报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157743_comment'></div>宿箴仍率，瞻屏为劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157743_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157743_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年2月</a>　二月，在知定州任，有谢神文。作品：定州到任谢神文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><div id='poem_1158195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州到任谢神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158195")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158195'>恭闻古诸侯祭境内山川、鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158195_comment'></div>祁被皇帝诏书来此邦，凡在祀典者，春秋之笾豆彝斝，举得奉承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158195_comment'></div>故始莅事，不敢不见祠下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158195_comment'></div>惟刺史所治，弗疠弗灾，以享其年，神实庇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158195_comment'></div>辄以熟饔旨酒，侑以鼓吹，遣属吏摄事，再拜诸廷。</div><div
