ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年11月</a>　十一月，在知定州任，有贺南郊礼毕表。作品：定州贺南郊礼毕表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三六。）</span><div id='poem_1157364' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157364' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157364?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州贺南郊礼毕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157364")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157364_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157364'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157364'>臣某言：今月八日，马递到敕书一道，以南郊礼毕，大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157364_comment'></div>臣当时集本州官吏军民宣读，并下管内诸县寨施行讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157364_comment'></div>严燎炀薰，翠舆旋轸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157364_comment'></div>庆腾观魏，欢浃黎苗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157364_comment'></div>窃惟报本以诚，莫尊飨帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157364_comment'></div>就阳而祀，是谓因天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157364_comment'></div>有国以来，三岁为法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157364_comment'></div>合万灵而啜享，穷四海以职来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157364_comment'></div>乘兹治平，用举能事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157364_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下丕承正统，奄治中区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157364_comment'></div>惟古与稽，有典咸秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157364_comment'></div>既扬诩万物，乃嘉享三神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157364_comment'></div>前会诸儒，讨定新乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157364_comment'></div>俄颁制诏，悉侑圣真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157364_comment'></div>谓周以后稷祀郊，祖而忘考；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157364_comment'></div>唐引睿宗配地，亲而未尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157364_comment'></div>参对上神，自我为古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157364_comment'></div>推处大孝，卓冠彝伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157364_comment'></div>爰卜景至之初，克申躬见之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157364_comment'></div>三后居左，自外止则匹行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157364_comment'></div>两仪位中，由天明则地察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157364_comment'></div>罍豆惟旅，箫石告谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157364_comment'></div>祓馨德于神衷，委纯祺于霄极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157364_comment'></div>万乘渊默，百礼休成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157364_comment'></div>茂对刚辰，用肆大眚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157364_comment'></div>揭日破蔀，注海濯瘢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157364_comment'></div>累系有更生之欢，废锢得自新之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157364_comment'></div>赏币丘垤，屯旅藻凫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157364_comment'></div>欢驿疾驰，不崇朝而遍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157364_comment'></div>群心保合，置天下于安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157364_comment'></div>臣适护穷边，阻观钜典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157364_comment'></div>惟军旅而未之学，久尘摄帅之行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157364_comment'></div>知鬼神之所以然，方隔受釐之问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157364_comment'></div>姑宣上德，明谕遐氓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_33_1157364_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　本年，在知定州任，有诗马怀德知雄州。作品：钤辖冒上阁就移知雄州。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_105865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>钤辖冒上閤就移知雄州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105865")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105865'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105865'>聚散非一端，贤逸难两遂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105865'>拥节北临边，安得久交臂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105865'>此行讵不远，印瑞三且二。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105865'>背剑车炙輠，径秦骖舞辔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105865'>雄州乃剧藩，喉领塞南地。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105865'>译通老上庭，道系单于使。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105865'>适馆授主粲，乘韦交客贽。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105865'>列戍俨趋风，诸将走咨事。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105865'>应变君所长，立功今可冀。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105865'>君家诚易知，世烈在青史。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105865'>齐楚异姓王，阴邓后家里。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105865'>券字金对行，戟带霞交尾。<div id='poem_sentence_11_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_105865'>浚源无近波，高峰本洪址。<div id='poem_sentence_12_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_105865'>行矣励壮猷，公侯当复始。<div id='poem_sentence_13_105865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_105865'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_105865_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　本年，在知定州任，上《便宜劄子》作品：便宜劄子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1157294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上便宜劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157294")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157294'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157294'>右，臣伏念行年五十有六，素自衰怯不逮人，宜内治一郡，习刀笔簿领，计校米盐，与俗吏争课最，以报万分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157294_comment'></div>不意陛下过听，乃使守边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157294_comment'></div>居真定不半年，徙定武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157294_comment'></div>任过所能，早夜震惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157294_comment'></div>然常闻天下根本在河北，河北根本在镇定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157294_comment'></div>以其扼冲要，为国门户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157294_comment'></div>且契丹所欲得者，惟定与镇，二军不战，则进薄深、赵、邢、洺，咋脆撞虚，无有患矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157294_comment'></div>臣所以日夜深计者，以为欲兵之强，莫如多谷与财；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157294_comment'></div>欲士而练，莫如善择将；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157294_comment'></div>欲人歆艳乐斗，莫如赏重而罚严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157294_comment'></div>欲敌顾望不敢前，莫如使镇重而定强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157294_comment'></div>夫耻怯尚勇，好论事，甘得而忘死，河北之人殆天性然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157294_comment'></div>陛下少励之，不忧不战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157294_comment'></div>以欲战之士，不得善将，虽斗犹负。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157294_comment'></div>无谷与财，虽镇金城，定汤池，势必轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157294_comment'></div>今朝廷择将练卒，制财积粮，乃以陕西、河东为先，河北为后，非计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157294_comment'></div>夫西戎兵锐士寡，能略边不能深入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157294_comment'></div>河东天险，敌惮为寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157294_comment'></div>惟河北不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157294_comment'></div>失长城之防，自蓟而南，直视千里，敌鼓而前，如莞衽上行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157294_comment'></div>故曰，谋契丹者，不得不先河北；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157294_comment'></div>谋河北，舍定与镇，无可议矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157294_comment'></div>故臣愿先入谷镇、定，镇、定已充，可入谷馀州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157294_comment'></div>列将在陕西、河东有功状者，得迁镇、定，则镇、定重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157294_comment'></div>天下久平，马益少，臣请多用步兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157294_comment'></div>夫鬨然聚，霍然去，云奔飙驰，抄后掠前，此马之长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157294_comment'></div>强弩巨梃，长枪利刃，什什相联，伍伍相遮，大呼薄战，此步之长也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157294_comment'></div>臣料朝廷与敌相攻，驱而去之，及境则止，然则不待马而步可用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157294_comment'></div>臣请损马而益步，故马少则骑精，步多则斗健。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157294_comment'></div>我能用步所长，虽契丹多马，无所用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157294_comment'></div>夫镇、定一体也，势不可离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157294_comment'></div>今判为二，恐谋之未详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157294_comment'></div>自先帝为一道，帅专而师不分，故定揕其胸，则镇捣其胁，势自然耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157294_comment'></div>今其显显有害者，屯寨山川要险之地裂而有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157294_comment'></div>平时号令文移不能一，敌脱叩垒，则彼此不相谋，谁肯任责耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157294_comment'></div>臣请合镇、定为一路，愿以将相大臣领之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157294_comment'></div>无事时以镇为治所，有事则迁治定，指授诸将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157294_comment'></div>诸将权一而责有归，无茍且意，策之上也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157294_comment'></div>惟陛下与中书、枢密院当居安虑危，熟计所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157294_comment'></div>必待事至而后图之，殆矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157294_comment'></div>河东马强，士习善驰突，与镇、定若表里然，东下井陉，不百里入镇、定矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157294_comment'></div>敌若深走，以河东健马佐镇、定兵，掩契丹之惰若归者，万出万全，此一奇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157294_comment'></div>臣闻事切于用者，不可以文陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157294_comment'></div>臣所论增步兵及入谷、分兵、隶裨将等诸条，件目繁碎，要待刀笔吏委曲可晓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157294_comment'></div>臣已便俗言之，辄别封上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157294_comment'></div>至择善将、多蓄财，乞委枢密院、三司条具以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157294_comment'></div>臣一诸生，弗知军旅事，偶有所见，不敢隐，特以受大恩，思亟报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157294_comment'></div>恐议涉迂暗，有司疑诘，更乞付臣，令悉意条陈，然后施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1157294_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　本年，在知定州任，上《御戎论》七篇。作品：御戎论七篇。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四四。）</span><div id='poem_1157987' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157987' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157987?labeling=true' target='_blank'>御戎论<span class='inlineComment2'>（并表）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157987")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157987_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157987'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157987'>臣于皇祐四年秋七月待罪成德军，五年二月改定武军，皆兼本路安抚部署两司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157987_comment'></div>此河北极选，贤士大夫日夜所望立功名者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157987_comment'></div>臣某诚恐诚惧，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157987_comment'></div>臣不肖，少服儒业，幸得秉笔，代天子制令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157987_comment'></div>奉职弗称，遂用外迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157987_comment'></div>乃蒙皇帝陛下擢自疏冗，付以剧使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157987_comment'></div>俾专一面，护诸将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157987_comment'></div>责重体雄，日靡遑宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157987_comment'></div>出入三年，无毫发之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157987_comment'></div>窃以持兵拥甲，野战乘城，皆非臣所能勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157987_comment'></div>加体力早衰，年向六十，谋不逮远，识不先事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157987_comment'></div>姑奉陛下经武之略，赧然汗发于背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157987_comment'></div>然所至询疆埸事，所以制敌大略，目见耳闻，参以一得，辄次为《御戎论》七篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157987_comment'></div>其语不文，以便事也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157987_comment'></div>弗泥于古，从权宜也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157987_comment'></div>直取今日利害，决为可行也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157987_comment'></div>不足示后，时异则计有所不用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157987_comment'></div>伏以中书、枢密院，皆忠力大臣，谋谟闳深，奉承圣算，明烛万里，物无遁情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157987_comment'></div>臣今所上，乃廊庙残计，策牍弃语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157987_comment'></div>犹敢冒昧上陈者，欲明边臣思不出职，亦上佐朝听刍荛千虑之冀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157987_comment'></div>干冒宸览，臣无任愧羞战慄之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157987_comment'></div>其论谨附表投献以闻，臣某诚恐诚惧，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157987_comment'></div>谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1157987_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157988' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157988' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157988?labeling=true' target='_blank'>御戎论<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>篇之一</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157988")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157988_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157988'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157988'>客问臣：「子为陛下守中山，直契丹西鄙，天下精兵处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157988_comment'></div>敌敢引弓南面射，最先薄战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157988_comment'></div>自先帝咸平以来，常以重将临统。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157988_comment'></div>子今出入三年，颇知敌情伪乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157988_comment'></div>臣应曰：「太守本诸生，朝廷不知其愚，使护诸屯，未尝履军陷阵，又无横纵之辨，王霸之术，乌能论敌乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157988_comment'></div>虽然，传曰『知彼知己』，太守诚不肖，粗能举其凡」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157988_comment'></div>客曰：「愿子无让，请以今事言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157988_comment'></div>窃闻西夏与契丹解仇申约，复为甥舅，信乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157988_comment'></div>臣曰：「契丹使一介叩朝廷，言夏人臣顺事，驱马羊纳有司，果信矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157988_comment'></div>「然则两敌合而无隙，彼将连衡，以扰二边，奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157988_comment'></div>臣曰：「合则有之，隙未平也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157988_comment'></div>契丹地大，兵众而猥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157988_comment'></div>羌地狭，卒寡而精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157988_comment'></div>以大临狭，则弗获已而合；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157988_comment'></div>以精抗猥，何敢安受其臣哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157988_comment'></div>「且契丹与夏战，一不胜，杀卒二万馀，北主仅自脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157988_comment'></div>筑威武、金萧等城，跨河而守者五年矣，讫无尺寸功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157988_comment'></div>是北穷于侵而西倦守矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157988_comment'></div>故卑辞厚币，以休兵甲之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157988_comment'></div>思弭隙而连和，以轧吾境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157988_comment'></div>抄劫系累，各饱其私，安得不合」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157988_comment'></div>臣曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157988_comment'></div>如客所谓，兹易与耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157988_comment'></div>国家岁弃金帛五十万与契丹，以五万与西夏，彼有肯盟为不臣者，我币五十万固不出境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157988_comment'></div>若阴以十万许羌人，赦其罪以携之，彼必与中国合，还兵而抗契丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157988_comment'></div>契丹失西援，且不敢前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157988_comment'></div>我又阴许还契丹三十万与之平，则二敌之仇结不解矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157988_comment'></div>朝廷安视其祸，以虚馈操二国重轻，何所患哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157988_comment'></div>客曰：「羌人自元昊以来，势始张，国褊而兵寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157988_comment'></div>虽与合，恐不足为重轻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157988_comment'></div>对曰：「不然，元昊善用兵，其左右皆贤，故数乱西陲，未尝少衄焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157988_comment'></div>虽挟胜而不敢不来臣，知事大之体也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157988_comment'></div>既父子戕死，而诸酋扶孀妪，抱婴雏，南面而朝人，惕息相与，守旧君法，无违德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157988_comment'></div>南抗中国，东支契丹，养马按兵自如，西邻不敢欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157988_comment'></div>国中有年，无疾疫死亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157988_comment'></div>意者天假之幸，是且将兴，乌得不为重轻哉」？</div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1157988_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157989?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>篇之二</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157989_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157989'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157989'>客曰：「子谓契丹与古孰强」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157989_comment'></div>臣曰：「耶律一姓，王二百年，今其衰也欤」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157989_comment'></div>客曰：「彼兼奚、黑水、高丽、达靼、新罗数十国，薄海而东，南包燕蓟肥腴之地，与中国争长六十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157989_comment'></div>今又得西夏而臣之，何云衰耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157989_comment'></div>臣曰：「客诧其表，不责其里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157989_comment'></div>请为客道所闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157989_comment'></div>敌主懦庸，其弟悍剽好战，本许传国，故尽以奚、契丹兵属之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157989_comment'></div>敌主有子且长，更为王，以燕蓟华人属之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157989_comment'></div>然其弟常右蕃卑汉，数请犯中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157989_comment'></div>子常佐汉，愿与中国和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157989_comment'></div>故敌主依违不能有所决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157989_comment'></div>华人之辅政者皆附主与子，蕃长之当国者附其弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157989_comment'></div>是一躯裂为二支，祸难待时作耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157989_comment'></div>有如君长一日病死，其弟即位，爱子能相下为君臣乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157989_comment'></div>能为君臣无疑忌乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157989_comment'></div>华蕃大臣能合而不限乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157989_comment'></div>内不能定，必大诛杀，安得不乱？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157989_comment'></div>乱必有党，党必有争，争未必有能国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157989_comment'></div>彼高丽、达靼等，苦为契丹属久矣，诛求无时，调发无度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157989_comment'></div>一旦契丹乱，彼将猬毛而奋，自王其国，且何恃而强？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157989_comment'></div>又和戎以来，北人习见朝廷袍笏之美，百官之富，肴果饩醪，灸瀹甘珍，衣服器彝，薰泽光鲜，皆委毡毳，厌血食，慕为华风，时时道诗书语，窃问儒者礼乐等事，争货纨绡纤䌨之丽，橙茗辛馥之奇，以相夸尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157989_comment'></div>此贾谊所谓五饵坏其耳目腹心者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157989_comment'></div>客曰：「五饵等语，班固诋以为疏，子何据之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157989_comment'></div>臣曰：「然谊于治体深，故其言奥，其事久而效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157989_comment'></div>固，俗儒也，见谊不为文帝用，便以谊为空言，固则陋矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157989_comment'></div>且自古夷狄所以强中国者，随水草，无常居，耐霜雪，以鞍马为家，此其胜邑居城郭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157989_comment'></div>射狐鹿兔獐，饮其血，服其皮，脯肉而糗之，此其胜耕敛囷廪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157989_comment'></div>喜相群，怒相杀，杀人者取偿而止，有罪即诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157989_comment'></div>凡召发，传一箭，哄然皆集，此其胜文檄簿领也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157989_comment'></div>生能挽弓传矢，带刀剑，懦妻弱子皆习熟，此其胜营伍教督也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157989_comment'></div>不事制度文物，君臣并肱而踞，情一而志通，此其胜礼文亲疏嫌疑等差也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157989_comment'></div>今则不然，反杀而强仁，反战而崇和，弃腥糒，甘飨熟，美衣食，酣声乐，所以胜中国之具者，一切丧矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157989_comment'></div>是耳目腹心坏而不完，徒操虚强以摇中国，太守知其无能为也」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1157989_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157990' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157990' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157990?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>篇之三</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157990_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157990'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157990'>客曰：「景德时，契丹数侵河北，我诸将谋必败，战必走，何耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157990_comment'></div>敌既负胜，由是鼓而前，破五六城，突魏触澶，躨跜无所畏，子识所以然乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157990_comment'></div>臣曰：「识之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157990_comment'></div>中国失虎北之隘，自幽而南，地如衽席然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157990_comment'></div>何承矩始畜陂障，建屯田，塍而畦之，限敌驰突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157990_comment'></div>然东不尽海，西薄常山，数百里辄止，外无所阨，故敌常埽穹庐而来，厉壮马，走平地，以大众加中国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157990_comment'></div>其时也，马适肥，士适饱，人人贪抄劫之利，气适无前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157990_comment'></div>我诸将常迎其锐薄之，又以寡抗众，故彼常胜，吾常负，失所以制敌之术也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157990_comment'></div>曰：「然则何不待其气弱而后战」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157990_comment'></div>臣曰：「得已而然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157990_comment'></div>夫大将在外，必有<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1157990", 1157990, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>贵臣</span>监军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157990_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1157990", 1157990, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>贵臣</span>见敌至，不课彼己强弱，不待便利，促其将使斗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157990_comment'></div>斗而败，闭垒不敢出矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157990_comment'></div>然后敌以数万骑，缀广信、安肃二军，婴保州，则定武仅能自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157990_comment'></div>敌精兵猎瀛、冀，犯深、赵，瀛、冀自不支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157990_comment'></div>其穿西山而出者，绕镇右行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157990_comment'></div>镇兵虽急战，不能禁其入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157990_comment'></div>由是蹂邢躏洺，而睥睨澶、魏矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157990_comment'></div>客曰：「策安出」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157990_comment'></div>臣曰：「在择将，以阃外事付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157990_comment'></div>夫任一则权不分，故外不见胁于中，上不见狃于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157990_comment'></div>值隙而后攻，逢利而后为，可而奋，不可而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157990_comment'></div>避其锐，间其惰，邀其归，厌其所不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157990_comment'></div>无促以功，则功易成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157990_comment'></div>无必其期，则战易胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157990_comment'></div>此亦一端也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157990_comment'></div>客曰：「未也，请衍而申之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157990_comment'></div>臣曰：「敌之来，因粮于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157990_comment'></div>闻景德时，大敌固营不动，而游骑四出，发窖宝，略马牛，系老弱，劫樵采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157990_comment'></div>旦而出，夕而内之军中，仰以济师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157990_comment'></div>当此时，诸将熟视，不出一卒以乘其敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157990_comment'></div>由是肆然燔室庐，残邑聚，逮于讲和，河北为空，此一失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157990_comment'></div>又诏书敕诸将逐敌无深入，及境则止，故敌胜则驱而进，不胜则不畏追而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157990_comment'></div>塞外之人按堵，而吾鄙不聊生矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157990_comment'></div>此再失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157990_comment'></div>夫敌人惟劲镞遗胸，长刀筑胁乃怖耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157990_comment'></div>当抄骑之出，我若以边人逻士邀之，或㢋其左，或厄其右，蔽林伏垠，掩所不防，但令无所获而走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157990_comment'></div>不过五日七日，众饥师老矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157990_comment'></div>以吾饱乘彼饥，何攻不破？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157990_comment'></div>何击不北耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157990_comment'></div>敌之入塞，掠吾老弱畜产若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157990_comment'></div>我伺其便，以五六月马瘦弓弛之时，勒偏将出塞，虏其部属牛羊亦若干，相当即止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157990_comment'></div>敌所恃以为富者，特幽蓟耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157990_comment'></div>彼能残我河北，吾一支病也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157990_comment'></div>我能残其幽蓟，彼一躯废也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157990_comment'></div>若是，则敌惩艾计较，必不敢轻入矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157990_comment'></div>汉武帝使卫青、霍去病深入鏖斗，斩匈奴首级，最凡十四万而已，北狄遂衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157990_comment'></div>此验在前，可质也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157990_comment'></div>故曰，不杀不怖，不伤不刈，不得其当不止，此上术也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157990_comment'></div>客曰：「太守计虽审，然与严尤、班固之说戾而不合，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157990_comment'></div>尤之言曰：『周、秦、汉三家征匈奴，未有得上策者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157990_comment'></div>周得中策，汉得下策，秦无策焉』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157990_comment'></div>又言：『宣王时，猃狁内侵，至于泾阳，命将征之，尽境而还，故天下称明』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157990_comment'></div>固之言曰：『来则惩而御之，去则备而守之，此圣王制御蛮夷之常道也』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157990_comment'></div>臣对曰：「尤、固皆中人俗儒，不足与论天下计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157990_comment'></div>彼特得皮忘髓，齧胲膍而未知隽腴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157990_comment'></div>唐牛僧孺尝诋尤，以为御戎无上策，秦为无策，非是，世谓知言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157990_comment'></div>夫御戎无上策，必以强武服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157990_comment'></div>所谓武，未有不杀而能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157990_comment'></div>威之以武，秦汉是已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157990_comment'></div>然秦与汉自以他失为后世讥病，于计匈奴不为无功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1157990_comment'></div>尤盛赞宣王，以及境则止为明，非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1157990_comment'></div>宣王兴厉王之后，奋衰气，逐强敌，威不能加于狄，故及境而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1157990_comment'></div>诗人姑美其能中兴，不美不追贼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1157990_comment'></div>《易》称高宗伐鬼方，三年克之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1157990_comment'></div>伐而克，非不伐，章章矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1157990_comment'></div>故曰来则惩而御，去则备而守，殊可嗤怪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1157990_comment'></div>必如所言，是兵常在边，而弛甲无期矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1157990_comment'></div>故曰，尤不足与论天下计」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1157990_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157991' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157991' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157991?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>篇之四</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157991'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157991'>客曰：「敌之来，常因吾粮，故朝廷以清野困之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157991_comment'></div>常猎吾民，故坚壁挫之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157991_comment'></div>今日北边，高城浚池，楼橹坚密，比景德有加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157991_comment'></div>一日契丹送腰领，其可以制敌乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157991_comment'></div>对曰：「能悍敌，未足以制敌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157991_comment'></div>吾野虽清，吾壁虽坚，若镇定兵不出，敌犹敢负戎马足，直驱深入，捣虚而夺人气也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157991_comment'></div>曰：「然则奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157991_comment'></div>曰：「敌之中军，其大渠常自将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157991_comment'></div>我若使镇定兵从之，与相上下，吾常环车固垒，出轻骑扰其饷，击其钞，夜噪其营，彼求战不得，攻不能下，掠无所获，大众老而惧，吾因其惧而举薄之，无不胜矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157991_comment'></div>前日敌人犯定军，夹唐河以阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157991_comment'></div>彼不能胜，因舍定攻瀛，破其外郛，又不能克，乃直走澶渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157991_comment'></div>是时，定军尚未出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157991_comment'></div>由此观之，吾失在不战矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157991_comment'></div>太守是以知今日边臣专修守械，不为攻战计，未足以制敌也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157991_comment'></div>客曰：「然则今日楼橹城隍果胜于异时」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157991_comment'></div>臣曰：「不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157991_comment'></div>祖宗时有北复燕、易意，故不专于守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157991_comment'></div>今者专于守，故城益高，隍益深，势自当然，非今人工，昔人拙也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157991_comment'></div>客曰：「今日朝廷分河北为四路，可以经制乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157991_comment'></div>对曰：「甚善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157991_comment'></div>无事时训师徒，抚风俗，便事之宜，治葺保障，督官吏能否，鼎峙而立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157991_comment'></div>其效过异时远甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157991_comment'></div>一日军兴，犹须即河北安抚为大使，统而一之，乃可责功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157991_comment'></div>又镇、定不可裂付二将，宜及平时并为一路，使将佐部分有臂指之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157991_comment'></div>轻重相权，谁曰不宜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157991_comment'></div>沧州东薄海，南倚滨、棣，斜视淄、青，北与敌接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157991_comment'></div>其间弃地，各数百里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157991_comment'></div>土咸潟水，泉不可食；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157991_comment'></div>夏蚊如云，不可居也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157991_comment'></div>至冬，萑苇际天，奸细商贾未尝行，故朝廷轻其戍，列数堡而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157991_comment'></div>景德之后，守臣广陂障，蓄水接海，又黄河限其南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157991_comment'></div>是以议者超然，不以沧州为剧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157991_comment'></div>自河决横垄、商胡，游波纡浸贝丘，荡永静，环海而北，破乾宁，姿肆放流，以入于海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157991_comment'></div>凡游塞下，陂水数百里皆为平地，则滨、棣、淄、青失河之险，未有以恃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157991_comment'></div>我未有恃，则启戎心，故不可不虞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157991_comment'></div>是宜权建沧州为一道，以捍东陲，伐敌之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157991_comment'></div>然止十年计，河若用道，沧可废矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157991_comment'></div>客曰：「塘水之险可恃乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157991_comment'></div>吾闻议者或谓不然」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157991_comment'></div>对曰：「塘水东西斜六百里，其阔百里，或五十里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157991_comment'></div>夏浪冬冰，浅不可载舟，深不可乱而济，足以挫敌骑突怒，省亭堡之防也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157991_comment'></div>然议或不同，何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157991_comment'></div>盖议塘之利者不列其害，谓害者不该其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157991_comment'></div>是以听之似可用，质之则无有也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157991_comment'></div>客曰：「其害奈何」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157991_comment'></div>对曰：「昔之蓄水为塘，其制曰，若干地浅若干尺，若干地掘而浚之若干尺，相错如绣，是谓深不可度马，浅不可载舟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157991_comment'></div>后人忘向时之制，惟因霖潦时涨而广之，故坏民良田无有涯极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157991_comment'></div>而议者诋无涯之害，因忘设险之利也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157991_comment'></div>客曰：「若何而可」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157991_comment'></div>曰：「邢、镇、定皆西倚山，水泉悉输东北，其地西高东下，若建瓴于霤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157991_comment'></div>然昔之为塘必掘而浚之，所以留水也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157991_comment'></div>今若按旧法为塘之限，阔不过百里，狭不下五十里，堤而限之，亦足制敌人之入为中国患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157991_comment'></div>又得良田还与民，则利害晓然判矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157991_comment'></div>客曰：「可为无穷利乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157991_comment'></div>曰：「百年计耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157991_comment'></div>水潦自高而注者，必岁淤而月廞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157991_comment'></div>如今不掘而浚，弗出百年，为平原矣」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_56_1157991_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157992' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157992' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157992?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>篇之五</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157992_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157992'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157992'>客曰：「敌人负其众，中国常为之屈，将天运乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157992_comment'></div>亦人谋有未至耳」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157992_comment'></div>臣曰：「儒者不可舍人而言天意者，谋有未至耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157992_comment'></div>祖宗事，太守不及知，直以庆历时验之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157992_comment'></div>敌人乘西鄙方扰，裒众叩境，作谩言，求关南十县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157992_comment'></div>时议臣仓卒，直以十县岁赋才二十万为对，故岁益金币二十万与之，因欲塞求地之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157992_comment'></div>敌由是得自大，谓不遗镞缺刃而成功，妄言以夸示其下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157992_comment'></div>由是县官用度益急矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157992_comment'></div>殊不知与敌二十万，则其地固其有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157992_comment'></div>彼且缘为辞曰，吾不取赋而还吾县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157992_comment'></div>即是朝廷植今日之祸根，取他年之乱实，已失吾财，又亡吾地，尚谓国有谋乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157992_comment'></div>故曰有未至焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157992_comment'></div>客曰：「不然，是时不许其求则战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157992_comment'></div>我兵未合，必为敌乘，故为一切之权，以乱其谋，子何昧焉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157992_comment'></div>对曰：「等为之权，不如直以百万赂之，使罢兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157992_comment'></div>既不为无穷之馈，又使他年绝旁缘之辞，不犹愈乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157992_comment'></div>客曰：「敌人得朝廷之赐充足其欲，然常以虚计摇边，何耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157992_comment'></div>对曰：「契丹君臣合谋，以为取二十万于我为无名，谓我且尝胆以图其国，刷耻取偿焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157992_comment'></div>是以岁阅马料众，治桥路邮舍，以自张大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157992_comment'></div>外又挟汉为重，制服诸戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157992_comment'></div>太守固知虚憍而实衰也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157992_comment'></div>客曰：「如此，何计而宜」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157992_comment'></div>对曰：「莫如自治，所谓思患而豫防者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157992_comment'></div>今朝廷英俊林立，岂谓无人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157992_comment'></div>但莫适任患，故功不立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157992_comment'></div>粮可广入也，而便籴日改，法下不信，则塞下之仓庾空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157992_comment'></div>财可豫积也，而有司辞以用乏，吝而不出，则塞下之帑库空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157992_comment'></div>马可孳养也，议者媕娿，日推月引，茍安其任，终不肯尽力，则塞下之牧厩空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157992_comment'></div>不止三空，又有五可诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157992_comment'></div>骑军多马少，三分其人，马才居一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157992_comment'></div>士既不可为步，是畜无用之兵，一可诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157992_comment'></div>河决澶、滑，横流不制，坏陂障，破漕渠，失国所恃以为防者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157992_comment'></div>又破沧州，岁赀七十万，朝廷玩之，不为塞，二可诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157992_comment'></div>河北义勇且三十万，著令岁一大习，尽一月止，用古一时讲武之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157992_comment'></div>而州县避事，或岁未稔，民且困，即罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157992_comment'></div>又惜数万石之廪，岁为此言，虽有教阅者，不为部伍行阵，如小儿戏即止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157992_comment'></div>又流亡物故皆不补，十耗三四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157992_comment'></div>自谓便民，民之便，国之不便也，三可诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157992_comment'></div>缘边守将，轻授而重任之，重任而轻易之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157992_comment'></div>众皆知不肖，而朝廷谓之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157992_comment'></div>见效无状，而历任累其年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157992_comment'></div>一日警急，是辈巽愞奔走，败军损国者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157992_comment'></div>若乃公忠材猷、崭然风采士，不肯衮衮雷同，欲卓尔自立，时或有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157992_comment'></div>但一失意于衔命小臣，则飞奏朋毁，使内不能自明，上有以为惑，一纸诏移他路矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157992_comment'></div>是以不材者在，而材者去，四可诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1157992_comment'></div>近年议边臣公用钱尤急，剖粒析毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1157992_comment'></div>探候间谍，无赀募召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1157992_comment'></div>比萧德、吴湛等告西人之和，足及藁街，尚未得其奉使意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1157992_comment'></div>此乃所责小，所失大，五可诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1157992_comment'></div>故曰，三空宜早实，五诮宜速除，居安虑危之至计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1157992_comment'></div>然朝廷每得敌人一好言，便释然高枕，至边戍奏请，罕复报下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1157992_comment'></div>得一妄语，焦心不终日，督切边臣，宣敕纷然，此似未尽其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1157992_comment'></div>夫用兵以狙诈为本，凡不足示人以有馀，强示人以弱，兵家常策也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1157992_comment'></div>景德时，敌人穷兵深入，豕突澶渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1157992_comment'></div>先时令王继忠累表乞和，兵益急，表益来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1157992_comment'></div>会伏弩射杀其将，敌大惧，因遂讲好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1157992_comment'></div>先帝不穷其奸，而与之盟，此已验之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1157992_comment'></div>故得敌好言，可听而不可怠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1157992_comment'></div>得敌恶言，可防而不足惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1157992_comment'></div>不惧谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1157992_comment'></div>自治有素矣」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1157992_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157993' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157993' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157993?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其六 </span>篇之六</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157993_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157993'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157993'>客曰：「敌常籍诸戎兵，席卷入边，故河朔之势不支，子何以御之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157993_comment'></div>苟如子之策，可决胜乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157993_comment'></div>对曰：「大众不足恃也，其取胜者在中军而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157993_comment'></div>中军不振，诸渠长且土崩，虽众何赖为！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157993_comment'></div>夫镇、定在河朔兵第一，今使悉众从彼中军，与相进退，令瀛、魏军当渠长，纵奇兵，击钞骑，河南列屯营，谨守澶渊，馀州皆清野以待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157993_comment'></div>不逾月，敌必饥，饥必求战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157993_comment'></div>我畜锐不发，以羸畜弱卒尝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157993_comment'></div>待其争而嚣，则整师伐之，无不败众涂地矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157993_comment'></div>然中国不用兵五十年，军有所未习，先屈而后胜，未可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157993_comment'></div>用之数年，习知委曲，则士心侈而乐斗矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157993_comment'></div>士见所得财珍马羊，皆自取也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157993_comment'></div>所上首级，厚赏也，死事者，恤其后；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157993_comment'></div>奔怯者，无众寡必戮，罚信而赏明，则士气锐，将谋果，人心定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157993_comment'></div>不止御自来之敌，可北图燕、蓟矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157993_comment'></div>夫燕、蓟，契丹恃以为强也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157993_comment'></div>故太宗已平河东，而先取幽州，圣谋深矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157993_comment'></div>故不复虑北契丹不可臣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157993_comment'></div>客曰：「子言太高，恐不为时所信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157993_comment'></div>且陛下为四海屈己，斥银币五十万为年赐，使者贺正月庆诞日，廷劳答贶又十馀万，西夏三十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157993_comment'></div>大抵直百万，岁弃之二陲，安天下元元，德至厚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157993_comment'></div>子欲轻动干戈，为国生事，非策之宜」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157993_comment'></div>对曰：「唯唯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157993_comment'></div>太守所云，非谓欲朝廷举兵讨也，直因其来而豫为计耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157993_comment'></div>敌之南牧，必先犯镇，定、邢、赵、瀛、魏，以地平易战，民富有，易扰而多获也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157993_comment'></div>所在发掘钞略，终无顾巢窟意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157993_comment'></div>夫敌留吾境，大众不轻动，吾可用奇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157993_comment'></div>若令轻骑挟半月粮，出河东以残云、应，出雄州以袭幽、燕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157993_comment'></div>治战舠数千，载半岁食，出青、莱，浮海以动营州，纵谍者告敌，能安然不畏乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157993_comment'></div>北敌既还，吾轻骑战舠归矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157993_comment'></div>故彼归我出，我出彼归，不数年，敌山川险要无不究，则彼自保不暇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157993_comment'></div>朝廷又出宝货，募使者，走间道，赂新罗、达靼、黑水等，以谍士随说之，许以重爵，割地与之平，使叛契丹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157993_comment'></div>彼不从，必露言于敌，敌且内相疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157993_comment'></div>若听吾命，敌固失援矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157993_comment'></div>此皆伐谋纾难，可先计而后用者也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157993_comment'></div>客曰：「或言契丹岁得银币五十万，库积充满，安肯自为送死？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157993_comment'></div>彼之来，不过略河北数十州，固无五十万之获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157993_comment'></div>敌虽愚，肯舍安受之贿，与朝廷决不可必之胜也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157993_comment'></div>子试策之，此言是乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157993_comment'></div>非耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157993_comment'></div>答曰：「今者敌君臣皆不肖，殆有是矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157993_comment'></div>彼其臣为主谋曰，宋所输珍宝，君皆自得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157993_comment'></div>今若纵兵抄略，所得财皆散于下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157993_comment'></div>有功者，君又将倾府库以偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1157993_comment'></div>然则违盟而战，下得所欲，上丧所畜，君且有胜负之虞，将何事焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1157993_comment'></div>太守策之，此北敌所以迁延自安，未肯作反计，昭昭矣」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1157993_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157994' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157994' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157994?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其七 </span>篇之七</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157994_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157994'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157994'>客诘曰：「子策契丹不反，然子之在中山，所统九州军，修楼橹，浚壕隍，畜粮增马，勒部伍，无日不讨于兵，何不自安」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157994_comment'></div>对曰：「客言非也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157994_comment'></div>兵家有云，无恃敌不攻，恃吾所不可攻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157994_comment'></div>彼虽未叛，吾备何得弛乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157994_comment'></div>常治所以待乱也，不虞是其可虞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157994_comment'></div>前所谓敌主孱，其子长也，而弟又凶德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157994_comment'></div>一日敌主疾病死，弟与子必争其位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157994_comment'></div>争而势分，有弱有强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157994_comment'></div>强者与我为敌，则弱者求吾为助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157994_comment'></div>许之，强者怒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157994_comment'></div>不许，弱者必致雠于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157994_comment'></div>彼习知边鄙怯懦，汉地富有，故攻所易攻，以自长雄，不可不为之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157994_comment'></div>又其弟得国，必恣狂勃，先剽劫于边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157994_comment'></div>左右素不慊者，将妄诛夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157994_comment'></div>虽不保终，要能为疆埸患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157994_comment'></div>朝廷尤须以兵镇抚，所谓待乱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157994_comment'></div>庆历时，敌主将叛，乞师于诸戎，皆以兵从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157994_comment'></div>约曰，所获人畜财赀，皆自取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157994_comment'></div>众戎喜，日夜驰且南向。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157994_comment'></div>会与敌和，各罢归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157994_comment'></div>众戎皆恚曰：『欺我使来』。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157994_comment'></div>因大掠幽蓟间数十县去，契丹不能禁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157994_comment'></div>今敌主再遣王纲约诸国借师，皆曰：『又欲如前欺我乎』？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157994_comment'></div>不肯出兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157994_comment'></div>故去年八月遣使叩塞，告与西夏绝，言甘而礼厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157994_comment'></div>正以反谋未成，为诡计欺朝廷耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157994_comment'></div>异时能得诸戎兵，即又寻隙责言，肆其沓贪，此谓可虞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157994_comment'></div>故太守欲朝廷自治以待彼乱，常备不虞，奚待可虞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157994_comment'></div>又况岁出赀百万赐二国，此宁无穷垂子孙计耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157994_comment'></div>水旱疾疫，古今代有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157994_comment'></div>假如万分一中国遭三年之水旱，数千里疾疫，南方治课不登，而上取无涯之财，填沙幕之北，是自困天下者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157994_comment'></div>天下穷则厚取于民，厚取于民则怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157994_comment'></div>怨而不乱者，未之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157994_comment'></div>彼将乘吾之困，民之怨，责吾所输，恚气直词，归曲于我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157994_comment'></div>此不谓倒太阿假敌以柄乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1157994_comment'></div>太守闻异时县官岁与银皆还入汉边相贸易，官得什六，岁益三四则略足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1157994_comment'></div>自庆历后，敌禁止银不得复入边州且十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1157994_comment'></div>此欲困中国，非一日计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1157994_comment'></div>自和盟以来，岁与三十万者四十年，五十万者十年，契丹所得银币凡千七百万矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1157994_comment'></div>有如他日敌复压境，又欲如庆历时，增岁入之物与之盟乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1157994_comment'></div>故莫若先自治，待其来，勒兵因以威武示之，如前所陈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1157994_comment'></div>我威一立，与之盟则固，与之惠则悦而易臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1157994_comment'></div>有所赐予，不过二三十万，则天下之财不至乏，垂之后世而易遵焉」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1157994_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　本年，在知定州任，上《乞宰相监修唐书疏》作品：乞宰相监修唐书疏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二九。）</span><div id='poem_1157291' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157291' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157291?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞宰相监修唐书疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157291")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157291_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157291'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157291'>臣先奉诏修定《唐书》，是时贾昌朝罢执政，丁度以参知政事嗣总其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157291_comment'></div>度比罢免，而书局不解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157291_comment'></div>今度不幸薨谢，臣又远守边郡，本局止有删修官王畴以下四员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157291_comment'></div>至今编纂迟延，《纪》、《志》俱未有草卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157291_comment'></div>诚恐书无统制，诸儒议论不一，淹引岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157291_comment'></div>欲望朝廷许依前例，以宰相监修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157291_comment'></div>窃以一王大典，垂法千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157291_comment'></div>今功且垂成，而其间褒贬是非出史臣等，须藉当国大臣商榷订正，为斯文之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157291_comment'></div>庶书成行远，无愧前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157291_comment'></div>唐时修晋氏一史，亦宰相恭总。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157291_comment'></div>彼偏方陋国，制度残窭，尚以辅弼领之，比今《唐书》，恢大光明为不侔矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157291_comment'></div>伏乞特赐详度施行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1157291_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　本年，在知定州任，有书上庞籍，乞罢边任。作品：上昭文相公书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1157611' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157611' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157611?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上昭文相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157611")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157611_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157611'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157611'>祁忝学士一十二年，内外无党助，孤立在朝，惟相公谅其本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157611_comment'></div>且生多病，性懦怯，恐不可久叨剧任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157611_comment'></div>又天禀疏拙，不能附离权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157611_comment'></div>边境难测，虽百务俱办，一事有失，则群怒赫然，前劳并弃矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157611_comment'></div>况其本来文翰诸生，不习军旅，今彊所不能，只恐败国家事耳，身之褒黜，胡系重轻！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157611_comment'></div>伏望相公矜悯一介恐心极虑，不为谄谀倾仄，素自安分，靡所觊觎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157611_comment'></div>若早得罢归，供职经筵，晚节之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157611_comment'></div>立功立事，请俟来哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157611_comment'></div>情素危迫，不敢之他门，惟至仁是归，望赐矜哀，不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1157611_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　本年，在知定州任，有启答韩琦。作品：答并州韩太尉启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五四。温谱系此文于至和元年，此据韩琦仕历及文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157712' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157712' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157712?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答并州韩太尉启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157712")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157712'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157712'>伏自太尉建节洋道，开府并门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157712_comment'></div>明喻上恩，申慰善俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157712_comment'></div>万夫圜视以观化，列将抃股而畏威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157712_comment'></div>寻附庆辞，未通便使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157712_comment'></div>而乃屈大国之重，敦邻邦之和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157712_comment'></div>前损台衔，茂申聘旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157712_comment'></div>奖以情厚，位缘眷隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157712_comment'></div>伏况真将军之尊，自殊假帅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157712_comment'></div>旧令尹之懿，方仰前规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157712_comment'></div>钦镂欢言，永为惠好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157712_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157712_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年3月20日</a>　三月二十日，在知定州任，作《五龙堂谢雨文》作品：五龙堂谢雨文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><div id='poem_1158189' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158189' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158189?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五龙堂谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年3月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158189")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158189_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158189'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158189'>维皇祐六年，岁次甲午，三月乙丑朔，越二十日甲申，具位宋祁，谨以清酌之奠，昭告于五龙之神：昨旱暵为虐，绵跨冬春，二麦瘁枯，民屋疵疠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158189_comment'></div>守吏震愧，用斋洁以致，上控于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158189_comment'></div>信辞幽通，神实歆应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158189_comment'></div>甘泽飞霂，沾被四疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158189_comment'></div>然穑事方作，尚须膏润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158189_comment'></div>惟至诚可以感神，惟明神可以庇民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158189_comment'></div>敢因报谢，更蕲来泽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1158189_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　春，在知定州任，有书与张中行。作品：张中行屯田书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1157609' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157609' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157609?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张中行屯田书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157609")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157609_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157609'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157609'>别已一期，凡两得讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157609_comment'></div>谆谆存教，有兼于常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157609_comment'></div>某拙且愚，不能取合当世，不意足下箴警覆护若此，自顾亦未知以不肖无用见怜耶，或果万有一可取，宜收之于朋友也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157609_comment'></div>仆在屯已三岁，未得归，然悉心于官，不敢遗力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157609_comment'></div>人谓之是，仆亦不希进；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157609_comment'></div>人谓之非，仆固不恤退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157609_comment'></div>年老意衰，惟待罢去日乞身退，从罢农漫夫，以养天年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157609_comment'></div>仆既自待如此，彼媢颊谤唇，又奚能轻重仆哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157609_comment'></div>中行知我深者，故及此，终不为他人言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157609_comment'></div>相见未有涯，悁悁叵奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157609_comment'></div>方春，顺爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157609_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　春，在知定州任，有诗上贾昌朝。作品：守塞三年上北京留守贾相公。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一五。温谱系此诗于嘉祐元年，此据贾昌朝仕历及诗意改。）</span><div id='poem_105760' id='poem_sentence_4_465163'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_465163_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年4月</a>　四月，在知定州任，有贺表。作品：贺日蚀降雨表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三七。）</span><div id='poem_1157365' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157365' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157365?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺日蚀日降雨表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157365")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157365_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157365'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157365'>臣某言：臣所治定州并辖下州军，去三月二十九日，云气晦暗，至今月二日五鼓降雨，尽酉刻未止，及尺以上，属县告足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157365_comment'></div>臣伏寻近降德音，以有司豫言朔日日当食，有诏避正殿，辍膳改元，示天下自新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157365_comment'></div>引咎太切，三灵震动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157365_comment'></div>重阴蔽霄，日景不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157365_comment'></div>夫不见者，与不食同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157365_comment'></div>臣诚喜诚忭，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157365_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下，纂成四叶，忧劳万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157365_comment'></div>日月祗惕，罔有懈忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157365_comment'></div>辰晷回薄，大抵有常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157365_comment'></div>今近推变异，厚自克责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157365_comment'></div>天监在顺，神佑者谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157365_comment'></div>感无旋旦，转祥为福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157365_comment'></div>前此六月不雨，麦禾枯悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157365_comment'></div>及兹滂沛，遂冀有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157365_comment'></div>天完太阳，地茂多稼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157365_comment'></div>君道尊安，旱灾讫息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157365_comment'></div>敌使在道，亲觌感应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157365_comment'></div>震畏盛德，抑伏奸谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157365_comment'></div>上推古昔，无今伦比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157365_comment'></div>臣乘边在远，不获与群臣称庆阙下，谨奉表陈贺以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1157365_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年6月24日</a>　六月二十四日，在知定州任，作《北岳祈晴文》作品：北岳祈晴文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><div id='poem_1158182' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158182' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158182?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳祈晴文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年6月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158182")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158182_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158182'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158182'>维至和元年，岁次甲午，六月朔，越二十四日，具位臣宋祁，敢以酒币昭告于北岳安天元圣帝：按时令，是月大雨时行，虽然，久阴连澍，比稍无节，因而不止，恐害粢盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158182_comment'></div>常赵之人，劳寠久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158182_comment'></div>若今无年，将遂转沟壑，匮神祀，乏国赋，两获罪辜，则亦惟帝之闵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158182_comment'></div>矧川渎溢流，坏军城室庐千所，屯吏走告，守臣不敢宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158182_comment'></div>惟智虑昏塞，无以招来和气，是用投诚于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158182_comment'></div>帝若垂哀怜，解驳屯云，使晴雨得宜，百谷成就，元元足食，其谁敢不据神惠而竭报礼以诧无疆！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158182_comment'></div>祁佩军印，不获身到祠所，谨遣司户参军李冲侍祠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1158182_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　夏，在知定州任，有书与范镇。作品：范舍人书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157562' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157562' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157562?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157562'>被教，开慰谆谆，申复无已时，幸甚幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157562_comment'></div>仆假节塞下且三年，赖县官威令施设，肆然以朝服治军中，无他虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157562_comment'></div>承平之盛，不知汉唐时得如此否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157562_comment'></div>但总制一面，刀笔倥偬亦逼人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157562_comment'></div>月中劳宴寮属宾客殆过半，常日操决，踰两时许乃得休，是以少有馀景，翻讨残书，常苦力不足耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157562_comment'></div>比又眸子昏，昼日读大字过十纸即眩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157562_comment'></div>才篝火，则又不能迁延刊削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157562_comment'></div>奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157562_comment'></div>近得三十篇馀，岁中附上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157562_comment'></div>夏暑，歊毒献替，慎疾晏阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157562_comment'></div>叩叩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157562_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href='/Writing/1157620?labeling=true' target='_blank'>畿内都运密学书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157620")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157620_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157620'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157620'>都外之别，乃今四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157620_comment'></div>前自亳得镇，又自镇移定，智短而责愈重，愈老而官益远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157620_comment'></div>婆娑穷障凡再期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157620_comment'></div>赖上威抚有素，即日斥候晏然，故仆得朝服坐黄堂，操簿书，责吏下期会以塞官谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157620_comment'></div>然内手循衿，汗热不自止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157620_comment'></div>长怀贵交，无由一诉斯悃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157620_comment'></div>比承敦迫还台，会有诏取辅州建寰内漕饷剧总，君侯首之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157620_comment'></div>侧闻释然，以为虽未柄任，而经始要司，亦足储民瞻，当帝心而振典型也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157620_comment'></div>方欲走书舍咨下执事，而递中被教，开慰粲然，详味熟观，知哲人一情于昵远也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157620_comment'></div>仆不佞，何足以堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157620_comment'></div>南北数千里，握臂无期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157620_comment'></div>良食安步，无重劳劳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1157620_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157612' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157612' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157612?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宫师相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157612")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157612_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157612'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157612'>祁居塞下，匆匆阅日，奏记不时上，乃情为劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157612_comment'></div>瞻跂台座，弗翅霄泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157612_comment'></div>然惟比日动止清宜否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157612_comment'></div>某度河已三岁，践更未有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157612_comment'></div>阻奉耆明，情府悁吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157612_comment'></div>天佚元老，介寿无疆，缙绅所同愿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1157612_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　约于本年，在知定州任，买《兰亭序》石刻置于公库。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　约于本年，在知定州任，有书与人。作品：王省判学士书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四九。）</span><div id='poem_1157539' class='_poem'><div
