class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157539")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157539_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157539'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157539'>军中日匆匆，久不通讯防阁，我劳奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157539_comment'></div>塞下幸太平，时无简书缓急事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157539_comment'></div>边人帖帖，得轻裘坐阁下，偃息频伸，督刀笔为供职，何幸如之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157539_comment'></div>惟罢归未期，倾企清对耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157539_comment'></div>事外多爱。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1157539_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　约于本年，在知定州任，有书上张存。作品：上张存龙图书二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157563' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157563' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157563?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上张存龙图书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157563")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157563_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157563'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157563'>白首乘塞，无一善状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157563_comment'></div>赖朝廷抚和，边堡帖然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157563_comment'></div>雨旸以时，农秋如可望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157563_comment'></div>盗贼少，吏益奉法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157563_comment'></div>盖监司条约明具使然，列帅之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157563_comment'></div>便籴日来寖少，才得十六万斛止矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157563_comment'></div>若秋大穰，必冀外台早为之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157563_comment'></div>天下本在河北，河北本在多谷而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157563_comment'></div>盛秋使车必下按属城，馀得面禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157563_comment'></div>暑毒，保御多祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157563_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1157563_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157564' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157564' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157564?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157564_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157564'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157564'>符檄系至，睹署判，知玉体之康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157564_comment'></div>然宿官塞下，不得瞻颜色，奉笑言，为悁悁也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157564_comment'></div>毙邑按部中诸州多稼若云，向两旬许无他灾，则揫敛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157564_comment'></div>兹上系朝家普护，使台大庇，斯民其少纾乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157564_comment'></div>入粟之法，望力言诸朝，此时不足食，大事弛矣，惟执事图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157564_comment'></div>秋浅暑残，千万啬爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157564_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1157564_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　约于本年，在知定州任，有书与陈荐。作品：与友人书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四九。“友人”指陈荐，据《永乐大典》卷三一一四引文题目。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年2月12日</a>　二月十二日，在知定州任，作《里社龙神祈雨文》作品：里社龙神祈雨文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><div id='poem_1158183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>里社龙神祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年2月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158183")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158183'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158183'>维至和二年，岁次乙未，二月乙丑朔，越十二日庚子，具官宋祁，谨以酒脯果茗养羞舒雁之牲，敢告于里社龙神：比亢阳为沴，顺气弗效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158183_comment'></div>农夫告勤，是用遣僚属有请于龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158183_comment'></div>弥跨四旬，雨雪三集，润才及寸辄止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158183_comment'></div>今土脉冒蒸，百昌萌芽，此时不雨，岁且大乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158183_comment'></div>惟人依神为庇，惟神享人之祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158183_comment'></div>归穷上叩，不应不止，神其走驱雷风，兴云致雨，弥漫沾足，洁涤品汇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158183_comment'></div>无令无年，以贻龙羞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1158183_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年2月</a>　二月，在知定州任，作《里社龙神谢雨文》作品：里社龙神祈雨文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。）</span><div id='poem_1158183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>里社龙神祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年2月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158183")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158183'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158183'>维至和二年，岁次乙未，二月乙丑朔，越十二日庚子，具官宋祁，谨以酒脯果茗养羞舒雁之牲，敢告于里社龙神：比亢阳为沴，顺气弗效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158183_comment'></div>农夫告勤，是用遣僚属有请于龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158183_comment'></div>弥跨四旬，雨雪三集，润才及寸辄止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158183_comment'></div>今土脉冒蒸，百昌萌芽，此时不雨，岁且大乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158183_comment'></div>惟人依神为庇，惟神享人之祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158183_comment'></div>归穷上叩，不应不止，神其走驱雷风，兴云致雨，弥漫沾足，洁涤品汇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158183_comment'></div>无令无年，以贻龙羞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1158183_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年7月</a>　七月，在知定州任，立秋日有诗。作品：中山立秋。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一八。）</span><div id='poem_104751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中山立秋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104751")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104751'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104751'>峰云晓影破孱颜，万里风生结早寒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104751'>人在兜零烟外走，岁从鶗鴂口中残。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104751'>槽花并滴添新酎，笥月兼轮掩故纨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104751'>白发光阴诚可惜，五年搔首望长安。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104751'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年8月</a>　八月，在知定州任，加端明殿学士，曾上表辞让。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年9月</a>　九月，在知定州任，有谢加端明殿学士表。作品：谢加端明表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157388' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157388' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157388?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢加端明表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157388")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157388_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157388'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157388'>乘塞无状，增秩蒙褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157388_comment'></div>赐予侑颁，心颜交靳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157388_comment'></div>伏念臣才弗振俗，仕偶逢时，备内朝臣，十有六载，学不足膺天子之问，文无以代王者之言，遂图外迁，冀云少补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157388_comment'></div>惟定武一道，直契丹右廷，咸平以来，号劲兵处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157388_comment'></div>自夏竦分建四帅，韩琦始领九州，节制中军，部分诸将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157388_comment'></div>琦既进律，臣实代居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157388_comment'></div>以一介懦儒，当万夫要任，谊难辞剧，奋靡顾愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157388_comment'></div>然臣所习者艺文，未晓者军旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157388_comment'></div>用非所习，虽勤而弗效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157388_comment'></div>责于未晓，故技有必穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157388_comment'></div>用是再期，居无底绩，在法云殿，惟黜是宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157388_comment'></div>乃蒙皇帝陛下悯久成之劳，排彼谮之侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157388_comment'></div>虽远犹录，谓拙可矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157388_comment'></div>收云阁之故资，著丹殿之新籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157388_comment'></div>仍秩经省，未易守藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157388_comment'></div>丛沓徽章，夸嫭鄙邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157388_comment'></div>重降严旨，切却让封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157388_comment'></div>臣亦内揆愚心，旁谂公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157388_comment'></div>若循礼叠请，则恐涉不诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157388_comment'></div>或固节还恩，又似规早罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157388_comment'></div>不有粗使，谁捍边疆？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157388_comment'></div>例格除音，孰尊宠数？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157388_comment'></div>辄昧涯分，祗服器名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157388_comment'></div>日三省以自营，身九殒而奚报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157388_comment'></div>但臣所念者，边务至重，敌诈益滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1157388_comment'></div>得人失人，系今日轻重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1157388_comment'></div>知己知彼，为天下安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1157388_comment'></div>而有司特用苛法相挻，守臣类以生事为解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1157388_comment'></div>封候畏怯，不敢摇手；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1157388_comment'></div>仓库虚乏，正可寒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1157388_comment'></div>建明累上而朝省未从，姑息小亏则谤嚣立至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1157388_comment'></div>况臣衰晏，素自憃冥，判无成功，徒忝休命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1157388_comment'></div>望审择于豪俊，俾临统于方隅，设张远谋，羁制骄狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1157388_comment'></div>因罄敷于感臆，窃附列于瞽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1157388_comment'></div>朔垒地卑，君门天阻，被符蠲谒，揽绶知荣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1157388_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年9月</a>　九月，在知定州任，有谢执政启。作品：转端明殿学士谢执政启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五五。）</span><div id='poem_1157754' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157754' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157754?labeling=true' target='_blank'>转端明殿学士谢执政启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157754")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157754_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157754'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157754'>被八月日敕诰，加前件职，寻具奏陈让，续准九月十七日堂劄，奉圣旨不许辞让者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157754_comment'></div>无庸应黜，有诏蒙褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157754_comment'></div>冒服迩班，长违孤恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157754_comment'></div>伏念祁性与愚狷，才止枵疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157754_comment'></div>一玷从官，五踰闰月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157754_comment'></div>虽数见上而无补，故不称职而外迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157754_comment'></div>寖治边州，兼护屯垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157754_comment'></div>视缦胡之伍，既与等夷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157754_comment'></div>顾章甫之儒，叵为节制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157754_comment'></div>上承庙算，前伐敌谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157754_comment'></div>用能衣朝服犒将校之勤，操券最责钱谷之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157754_comment'></div>牵勉常务，迁延二期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157754_comment'></div>方虞考课之婴，遽误佥言之奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157754_comment'></div>进联华殿，仍秩讲帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157754_comment'></div>使人挟赍，赐物纷侑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157754_comment'></div>还恩弗听，即宠自惟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157754_comment'></div>以远戍见矜，是窃师武臣之力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157754_comment'></div>且论治无实，何解士大夫之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157754_comment'></div>敢商为地之端，固本和钧之赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157754_comment'></div>此盖昭文相公茂襄昭德，垂庇庶工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157754_comment'></div>有所不能，念先容之既尔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157754_comment'></div>久而未召，借赏典以当然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157754_comment'></div>遂令无似之人，得引以长之佩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157754_comment'></div>愿图涓露，归答埏镕。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1157754_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　秋，在知定州任，有诗答庞籍。作品：祗答相国庞公将至并部马上垂寄。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一八。温谱系此诗于皇祐三年，此据庞籍仕历改。）</span><div id='poem_105174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祗答相国庞公将至并部马上垂寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105174")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105174'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105174'>大旆前驱拂晋云，寒天迎望静无氛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105174'>幄中旧借留侯箸，麾下今分邓禹军。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105174'>驰属櫜鞬随指顾，卖残刀剑事耕耘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105174'>据鞍抒思真馀力，又占风骚第一勋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105174'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　秋冬间，在知定州任，为高若讷作墓志铭。作品：高观文墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷六〇。）</span><div id='poem_1158161' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158161' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158161?labeling=true' target='_blank'>高观文墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158161")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158161_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158161'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158161'>至和二年秋八月甲寅，观文殿学士兼翰林侍读学士、尚书左丞、同群牧制置使高公薨于京师之第，享年五十有九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158161_comment'></div>既闻，上震悼，趣辇降酹其寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158161_comment'></div>既还，明日罢紫宸朝，出尚书右仆射制书告柩，赗币赙金系于庭，太常考行，谥曰文庄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158161_comment'></div>以冬十月己酉，克葬公于开封府开封县褒亲乡之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158161_comment'></div>前此门人河东裴煜腾状来中山，取文志隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158161_comment'></div>予与公游也旧，谊不得让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158161_comment'></div>哭寝门已，次其梗概曰：公讳若讷，字敏之，生十岁而孤，侍母夫人，客汲郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158161_comment'></div>生事日狭，取粗完即已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158161_comment'></div>惟纵嗜于学，性警锐，过目辄记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158161_comment'></div>自周汉迄兹数千载，救革质文，娓娓能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158161_comment'></div>天圣初，以乡贡牒诣有司，声光闯焉，一日出诸儒上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158161_comment'></div>方天子委礼部取士，于是中山刘公筠大裒英才，得二百人，多海内选，公在第四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158161_comment'></div>调彰德节度府推官，改著作佐郎，再迁太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158161_comment'></div>历三县，以办最称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158161_comment'></div>台御史荐为监察里行，就改主客员外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158161_comment'></div>进殿中，迁右司谏、直史馆、起居舍人，留知谏院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158161_comment'></div>换刑部员外郎，知侍御史杂事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158161_comment'></div>于是数见上言得失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158161_comment'></div>蜀贾援外戚，得郎官、知蔡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158161_comment'></div>公劾贱丈夫乾没财利，不宜以私谒污二千石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158161_comment'></div>内侍省大中人怙恩，声焰震赫，人争媚附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158161_comment'></div>公斥言其尤，即日外迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158161_comment'></div>有诏累黍定尺，检制乐律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158161_comment'></div>法不合，争论连年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158161_comment'></div>公独以汉世货泉度寸，定古尺示诸朝，议者服其密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158161_comment'></div>尝言中书、枢密院所与一统类，美风俗，今奏事离立，不改刻遽罢，不能究熟万几，宜复古坐而论道，使人自竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158161_comment'></div>帝韪其言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158161_comment'></div>擢天章阁待制，益亲近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158161_comment'></div>转礼部郎中，出为河东都转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158161_comment'></div>召还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158161_comment'></div>丁母夫人忧，号诉愿尽三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158161_comment'></div>国朝两省内外制而上有故者，卒哭辄夺哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158161_comment'></div>有不获命，惨袍幞到朝就职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158161_comment'></div>自公得请，复遂著行服令，诏给实俸终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158161_comment'></div>逮除，尽还旧官，拜龙图阁直学士、史馆修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158161_comment'></div>以吏部郎中进谏议大夫、权御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158161_comment'></div>庆历七年春，小旱，上忧甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158161_comment'></div>引公问《洪范》雨旸所以致休咎者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158161_comment'></div>公推原五事以对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158161_comment'></div>其议闳深博衍，上嗟叹之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158161_comment'></div>后三日，引拜公枢密副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158161_comment'></div>见便座，上戒以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158161_comment'></div>公顿首言：「和无莫济者，有如乐焉，音异乃谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158161_comment'></div>若可否出一，是同也，同则生党」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158161_comment'></div>时大臣执议见遌，故公谢及之，由是见谓为长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158161_comment'></div>天下无事，常宿屯三陲，募兵不止，度支财益绌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158161_comment'></div>公议一切停募，料冗士以苏调给之残，诏可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158161_comment'></div>康定时，西鄙骚绎，东南多盗，始置宣毅兵，州悉有之，捍镇方夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1158161_comment'></div>士既饱衣食不事，悍不可制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1158161_comment'></div>公曰：「是本欲制贼，今反自贼，何赖为」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1158161_comment'></div>建择精锐者团籍北迁，以补戍人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1158161_comment'></div>守臣争言：「士素骄，骤遣必乱」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1158161_comment'></div>公固谓：「朝家威令整严，等辈孰敢」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1158161_comment'></div>既徙，无一上干法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1158161_comment'></div>以工部侍郎参知政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1158161_comment'></div>后二岁，由户部侍郎、检校太傅为枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1158161_comment'></div>侬蜑袭邕州，杀守将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1158161_comment'></div>公曰：「南海可虞也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1158161_comment'></div>或谓未然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1158161_comment'></div>阅旬，贼剽十馀州，乘流下番禺，入其外郛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1158161_comment'></div>南军不习斗，部校争长，连战辄北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1158161_comment'></div>贼遂张，啸亡命数万，岭南大疮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1158161_comment'></div>公谓当遣贵贤将节度诸部，以番落千骑怖之，可禽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1158161_comment'></div>会大臣驰往，斩败将，鼓而南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1158161_comment'></div>贼尽锐薄前军，顾骑出其后，惊以为神，遂大败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1158161_comment'></div>南事平，帝议策勋，公欲让功臣，使得其处，即辞位，章五上，拒不省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1158161_comment'></div>公请愈牢，帝重违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1158161_comment'></div>又以公次当得宰相，虽解机务，犹以学士籍留自近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1158161_comment'></div>公喜曰：「天下士不吾责已」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1158161_comment'></div>公节分崖然，不与俗流，至浮屠神仙阴阳怪谲事，弗语也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1158161_comment'></div>在禁中论得失，无少回挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1158161_comment'></div>及建白裁处，皆深自匿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1158161_comment'></div>令出，反从人问所以然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1158161_comment'></div>故献纳之益，初秘弗得详，久，知乃十一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1158161_comment'></div>常谓承平久，吏忽事厖，必峻法治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1158161_comment'></div>谓管夷吾、韩非责名实，赏信罚必，术最近，与儒家相辅，长利可兴云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1158161_comment'></div>公之次行军约束敕，白罢内降封拜，外戚不可辅政，皆著后法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1158161_comment'></div>执官尹不建节，谓具丘将屈贼自容，卒论死，谏止数赦，盖略施行所谓者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1158161_comment'></div>辅政七年，洁畏自将，和傅内外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1158161_comment'></div>谋议有不尽如素，或蕴诸内，绰然尚有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1158161_comment'></div>然未尝以不如素自解，亦不以有馀矜诸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1158161_comment'></div>故仕虽贵，忌者不媢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1158161_comment'></div>已去位，间者不容訾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1158161_comment'></div>没，而士君子泣相吊也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1158161_comment'></div>公善观书，反复研讨，必得其意乃置，不诞漫莽卤贮之胸中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1158161_comment'></div>所学邃而该，殆不可及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1158161_comment'></div>所著文章二十卷，善文辞者贵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1158161_comment'></div>公累官摄领难悉著，掇其显者，待制时，假节京西，为安抚使，在台兼理检使，知贡举再，使契丹一，知审刑院一，领吏部铨、三班院各再，侍经筵二，特召进读者一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1158161_comment'></div>爵开国公，阶光禄大夫，勋上柱国，邑二千八百，实户六百，功号自「推忠佐理」换「推诚保德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1158161_comment'></div>大较如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1158161_comment'></div>曾祖讳某，赠累太师；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1158161_comment'></div>祖讳某，仕为崇仪使；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1158161_comment'></div>考某，官右侍禁，并赠太师、中书令兼尚书令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1158161_comment'></div>考封祁国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1158161_comment'></div>曾妣王夫人、祖妣马夫人，妣阎夫人，启魏、晋、秦三国，为太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1158161_comment'></div>公娶太原王氏，封某国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1158161_comment'></div>生五男子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1158161_comment'></div>曰彦辅，东头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1158161_comment'></div>曰保衡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1158161_comment'></div>曰安石；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1158161_comment'></div>曰吉甫，大理评事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1158161_comment'></div>曰元规，太常太祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1158161_comment'></div>初，公在庆历时，葬二令君于开封县之吹台乡，地稍庳，公恨之，将改卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1158161_comment'></div>及是，诸孤迁二令君柩与仆射同茔，以昭穆为位，公志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1158161_comment'></div>凡人见今世杰才卓行，其于奔走向服犹未闻如古人之贤，何欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1158161_comment'></div>不得见而愈贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1158161_comment'></div>使千岁后视今为古，予知有藉公风烈者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1158161_comment'></div>长想太息，恨不得操鞭彗从公后以快其慕，为果不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1158161_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_108_1158161'>高氏自渤海，徙占河东，为榆次人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1158161_comment'></div>世潜德弗融，久乃发祥，逮公大昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1158161_comment'></div>以孤童奉母，羁旅京辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1158161_comment'></div>轧出陋贫，化为伟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1158161_comment'></div>由御史谏官，健健敷言，事有固争，不市直取名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1158161_comment'></div>我完吾履，弗授弗倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1158161_comment'></div>一辞寤主，直都贵位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1158161_comment'></div>愤俗陵迟，令敝法刓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1158161_comment'></div>遂弛必衰，或悼后艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1158161_comment'></div>自公佐王，辅乾为刚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1158161_comment'></div>不假借赏刑，以新故章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1158161_comment'></div>引荐俊良，惟力孜孜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1158161_comment'></div>斯谋斯猷，外莫闻知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1158161_comment'></div>澹于荣宠，峻节是甘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1158161_comment'></div>去位甚易，如肩释担。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1158161_comment'></div>迩英之游，惟经术是毗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1158161_comment'></div>巷无密轮，奥无媵袿，谁市其门，谁侈而室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1158161_comment'></div>闻公之风，可以自律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1158161_comment'></div>初秦国多疾，公自调治，方剂天悟，亲向寿祺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1158161_comment'></div>公之属疾，自诊不可治，召见诸子，遗训逾厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1158161_comment'></div>殁无以私，敢丐诸天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1158161_comment'></div>天子贤之，嗟我师臣，显卒光哀，滂漏厥恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1158161_comment'></div>予闻于古，曰仁者寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1158161_comment'></div>公不六十，斯言叵究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1158161_comment'></div>有宰皋如，有树岑如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1158161_comment'></div>公安是居，千载不渝。</div><div id='poem_sentence_133_1158161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年3月</a>　三月，在知定州任，有贺表。作品：定州贺圣体康复表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三六。）</span><div id='poem_1157366' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157366' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157366?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州贺圣体康复表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157366")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157366_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157366'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157366'>臣某言：今月八日得进奏院状，报圣体康复，已于二月二十三日御延和殿，亲见群臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157366_comment'></div>六气顺宣，偶愆常裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157366_comment'></div>万祉交荐，施舍太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157366_comment'></div>便坐天临，列辟凫藻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157366_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下，躬甚盛之德，继下武之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157366_comment'></div>悉揽权纲，罔惮宵仄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157366_comment'></div>百度已治，举器而置于安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157366_comment'></div>一物未宜，无灾而为之惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157366_comment'></div>听断逾励，颐摄稍愆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157366_comment'></div>仙剂暂尝，客疹俄解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157366_comment'></div>前颁旷荡之泽，遄会清明之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157366_comment'></div>帝祐神扶，阳熙玉色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157366_comment'></div>勤在谋始，虽有强不息之劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157366_comment'></div>福及报成，方介万斯年之享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157366_comment'></div>均乾宏冒，与日长跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157366_comment'></div>臣忝服近班，欣聆吉语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157366_comment'></div>且念处无为者，当简于事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157366_comment'></div>谓冲用者，莫啬于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157366_comment'></div>望略繁几，永光丕祚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1157366_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　春，在知定州任，有书上杜衍。作品：上杜相公书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1157610' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157610' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157610?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上杜相公书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157610")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157610_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157610'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157610'>久不参讯，乃心愧惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157610_comment'></div>比春暖，履用荣嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157610_comment'></div>伏念违台坐，凡五易年，塞下虽静壹，然军中亦匆匆相仍，不得频走一介问左右，非敢怠，力不逮也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157610_comment'></div>伏惟深赐矜宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157610_comment'></div>祁即日蒙恩，公私粗如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157610_comment'></div>但才短任剧，未克罢去为忧，他非敢恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157610_comment'></div>敌君长新立，猜阻内讧，惟朝家未有意于乘弱攻昧，故列屯诸校得高枕云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157610_comment'></div>相公与国休戚，辄此及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157610_comment'></div>趋侍未前，惟保御戬谷，进享万年之遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157610_comment'></div>区区不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1157610_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: -----title
三门峡
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='4878afae7cc84cdea991f122c71d87c0_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("4878afae7cc84cdea991f122c71d87c0");'><span id='4878afae7cc84cdea991f122c71d87c0_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>，59岁</div><div id='4878afae7cc84cdea991f122c71d87c0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　冬，赴知益州任途中过陕州，有诗题魏野隐所。作品：题著作魏仲先隐墅。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_105564' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105564' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105564?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题著作魏仲先隐墅</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105564")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105564_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105564'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105564'>隐路高高入翠微，人亡宅在有馀悲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105564'>自圆溪月知吟处，不散岩云忆卧时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105564'>素壁尘昏三纪貌，白杨风老几寻枝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105564'>草堂故集篇篇好，要与商翁续紫芝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105564_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105564'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105564_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
成都
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='d4ab100ae7584c4285e4139169af3604_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("d4ab100ae7584c4285e4139169af3604");'><span id='d4ab100ae7584c4285e4139169af3604_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>，60岁</div><div id='d4ab100ae7584c4285e4139169af3604' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>二月二十日，到知益州任，有谢表。作品：益州谢上表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157389' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157389' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157389?labeling=true' target='_blank'>益州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年2月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157389")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157389_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157389'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157389'>臣某言：昨被嘉祐元年八月诏书，授臣吏部侍郎，仍旧职，移知益州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157389_comment'></div>臣以九月解定州符印，十月过阙下，又奉诏旨，许朝见面赐训敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157389_comment'></div>自见逮辞凡一月，即乘驿趋官，以今年二月二十日领州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157389_comment'></div>既见官属，即遍询闾井病利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157389_comment'></div>皆言稼穑蕃稔，雨旸顺时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157389_comment'></div>人安常业，物无翔价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157389_comment'></div>吏下如律，边尉弛虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157389_comment'></div>事便于宜，人重犯禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157389_comment'></div>无逖与迩，式舞而歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157389_comment'></div>臣身所闻见，与言符验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157389_comment'></div>伏乞睿慈，少宽勤恤，责臣治理，保致嘉靖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157389_comment'></div>伏念臣蚤蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1157389", 1157389, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>记识</span>，得籍近严，惟知悉心事君，未尝枉道从众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157389_comment'></div>是以将贺而吊至，未誉而毁从，一去朝联，四易藩守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157389_comment'></div>前日须泽，变为华颠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157389_comment'></div>向时彊力，郁已尪瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157389_comment'></div>今又走五千里之远，委西南面之雄，躐进华资，冒取<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1157389", 1157389, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>丰秩</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157389_comment'></div>断断之伎斯罄，悠悠之言云何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157389_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下翕受庶工，善养多士，容萤助日，收壤培山，料录冗微，俾充器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157389_comment'></div>然臣愚有所禀，志不可迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157389_comment'></div>故直尺若寻，自视无愧，食荼而荠，罔有惮行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157389_comment'></div>况兹图政之辰，敢负惟良之委？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157389_comment'></div>昔王尊一叱其驭，便诧忠臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157389_comment'></div>何武转而上闻，粗裨盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1157389_comment'></div>臣于兹事，未谢前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1157389_comment'></div>假节方初，造廷云阻，丛感斯望，临文罔宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1157389_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>二月二十日，到知益州任，有谢两府启。作品：益州谢两府启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157798' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157798' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157798?labeling=true' target='_blank'>益州谢两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年2月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157798")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157798_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157798'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157798'>昨自定武军被去年八月诏书改吏部侍郎，仍知益州，以今年二月二十日到任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157798_comment'></div>守边无状，易地蒙褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157798_comment'></div>任非值材，宠实浮愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157798_comment'></div>即趋治所，祗服彝箴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157798_comment'></div>伏念祁本以属文，早陪禁籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157798_comment'></div>后缘学政，稍习吏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157798_comment'></div>向诣朔邮，临总师节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157798_comment'></div>辞穷一鄣之守，众为寒心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157798_comment'></div>语踰三至之多，每蒙辨谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157798_comment'></div>戍瓜四熟，岭雪遍纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157798_comment'></div>何图幽黜之期，更忝骤迁之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157798_comment'></div>天卿贰秩，坤络巨藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157798_comment'></div>寄任光隆，伦辈歆羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157798_comment'></div>此盖阁下财辅丕縡，谋熙庶工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157798_comment'></div>含容予取之求，成就汝谐之往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157798_comment'></div>矧蜀岁丰足，益士文柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157798_comment'></div>法令谨严，盗贼衰弭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157798_comment'></div>虽率愚短，可及靖嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157798_comment'></div>但身远者心危，惊禽有以虚坠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157798_comment'></div>援寡则谗胜，艗木为之先殚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157798_comment'></div>敢丐大钧，终全一介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157798_comment'></div>班春方始，诣府未辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157798_comment'></div>荣感所丛，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1157798", 1157798, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>讷涩</span>非叙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1157798_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='4a4defe3e6aa4ac99e88600c3aed738e_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　夏，在知益州任，有诗。作品：谢提点刑狱李郎中赠扇。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_105910' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_105910_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105910'>制以为扇持赠君，拂君怀袖袪君暑。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105910_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105216'>此地相逢须重别，在家灵运已华颠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105216'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105216_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_105216'><span class='label'>注：</span>予昔家《永乐大典》卷九七六五作宣景陵，与师同预北禅祚公法席。后三十年，予守成都，师自富顺监肯来，洒然话旧。昔之壮也今瘁，昔之鬒也今华，师虽忘怀，予不能无感。俄而告还，作诗一解，以慰其行。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_105216_comment'></div></div><br /><a class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105505")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105505'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105505'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_105505", 105505, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>珍卉</span>分清赏，飞邮附翠笼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105505'>蹄金点鬓密，璋玉镂跗红。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105505'>香惜持来远，春应摘后空。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105505'>玩时仍把酒，恨不与君同。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105505'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105505_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　本年，在知益州任，作《益部方物略记》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　本年，在知益州任，新建文翁祠堂，并作碑记。作品：成都府新建汉文公祠堂碑。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五七。）</span><div id='poem_1158141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>成都府新建汉文公祠堂碑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158141")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158141'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158141'>蜀之庙食千五百年不绝者，秦李公冰、汉文公翁两祠而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158141_comment'></div>冰为蜀凿离堆，逐悍水，以溉所及，常无旱年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158141_comment'></div>西人德之，因言冰身与水怪斗，怪不胜死，自是江无暴流，蛟蜃怖藏，人恬以生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158141_comment'></div>故侈大房殿，岁击羊豕雉鱼，伐鼓啸籥，倾数十州之人，人必侍祠，奔走鼓舞，以娱悦神，祝以传嘏，而后敢安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158141_comment'></div>公之治蜀，开学校，以《诗》、《书》教人，澡刷故俗，长长少少，亲亲尊尊，百姓顺赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158141_comment'></div>其后司马相如、王褒、扬雄以文章倡，张宽以博闻显，严遵、李仲元以有道称，何武入为三公，汉家号令典章，赫然与三代等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158141_comment'></div>蜀有儒自公始，班固言之既详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158141_comment'></div>初，公为礼殿，以舍孔子及七十二子之像，殿右庑作石室，舍公像于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158141_comment'></div>晚汉学焚，有守曰高眣，能兴完之，后人又作眣像，进偶公室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158141_comment'></div>岁时长吏率掾属诸生，奉笾豆饔醪荐之于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158141_comment'></div>虔跽谨洁，一再奠而退，辞无敢不信焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158141_comment'></div>冰以功，公以德，功易见，德难知，故祀虽偕而优狭异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158141_comment'></div>嘉祐二年，予知益州，往款公祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158141_comment'></div>至则区位湫偪，埃蚀垢蒙，不称所闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158141_comment'></div>大惧礼益懈忽，神弗临享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158141_comment'></div>其明年乃占学宫之西，攻位鸠工，弗亟弗迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158141_comment'></div>作堂三楹，张左右序及献庑，大抵若干间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158141_comment'></div>布寻以度堂，累常以度庭，疏窗以快显，壮阖以严闭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158141_comment'></div>采有青丹，陛有级夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158141_comment'></div>瓦密栋彊，若棘若飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158141_comment'></div>乃肖公像于宁间，绘相如等于东西壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158141_comment'></div>本古学之复莫若眣，本今学之盛莫若故枢密直学士蒋公堂，故绘二公于宦漏，皆配祠焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158141_comment'></div>于是择日告成于神，揖而升，簠斝果湆脯脩纷罗而有容，可以告虔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158141_comment'></div>趋而降，罍樽巾洗席燎并施而不慁，可以尽仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158141_comment'></div>相者循循，任者舒舒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158141_comment'></div>礼生于严广，灵妥于阒寂故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158141_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158141_comment'></div>自公之来，蜀之人自视若邹鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158141_comment'></div>宋兴，名臣钜公踵相逮于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158141_comment'></div>先帝时，巨盗再作乱，弄库兵，争剑阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158141_comment'></div>是时蜀豪英无一污贼者，群顽愁窘，不容喘而灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158141_comment'></div>非人好忠、家知孝使然耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158141_comment'></div>所使然者，不自公欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158141_comment'></div>传曰：「非此族也，不在祀典」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158141_comment'></div>公在之矣，则是祠之作，愿自予而古，无俾壤息云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158141_comment'></div>祠之兴，同尚之贤，则转运使赵抃及提点刑狱使者，凡三人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158141_comment'></div>赞辅之勤，自通判军州事祝咨以降六人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158141_comment'></div>营董之劳，自兵马都监毛永保而下二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158141_comment'></div>咸书象于西厢，列官里于石阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158141_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1158141'>公二千石兮守大邦，冠峨峨兮绂斯皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158141_comment'></div>出有瑞节兮车骑罗，石室孔卑兮人谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158141_comment'></div>新堂翼翼兮耽耽，庭广直兮序岩岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158141_comment'></div>吏奉承兮不哗，神来徙兮此其家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158141_comment'></div>俨群贤兮并陈，公所教兮如其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1158141_comment'></div>庖鱼挺兮俎肉鲜，神来享兮憺冤延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1158141_comment'></div>公教在人兮无有颇，蜀贤不乏兮才日多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1158141_comment'></div>俗祥顺兮孝慈，公祀百世兮庸可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1158141_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_1158141'>治平四年记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1158141_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1158141'><span class='label'>按：</span>《宋元宪集》亦收此文，误，删彼存此。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1158141_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　本年，在知益州任，为代渊作墓志铭。作品：代祠部墓志铭。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五八。）</span><div id='poem_1158157' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1158157' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1158157?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代祠部墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1158157")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1158157_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1158157'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1158157'>君讳渊，字蕴之，代其氏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1158157_comment'></div>本雁门贵姓，唐僖宗奔蜀，君之先亦逃乱，客导江，世受田，遂为导江人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1158157_comment'></div>生知好学，性顺祥，事亲孝，执烦苦惟谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1158157_comment'></div>稍长，从陇西李畋授经，清河张逵为文章，一日声闻出诸生上，愈晦抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1158157_comment'></div>年四十未肯仕，乡人更往劝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1158157_comment'></div>天圣初，就进士试礼部，最后日帖经，即偃蹇曰：「不愿在选，取过所欲」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1158157_comment'></div>四姻友共挽迫内省闱中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1158157_comment'></div>讫试，名在第一甲，调清水主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1158157_comment'></div>叹曰：「禄不及亲，吾何赖」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1158157_comment'></div>即去官，还乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1158157_comment'></div>蜀之才子弟举从之，踵相逮，坐席常满。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1158157_comment'></div>蕴之为示书精奥，教辞赋法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1158157_comment'></div>得其道者，去为闻儒显人，于是蕴之名益彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1158157_comment'></div>今端明殿学士、尚书王公拱辰安抚剑南，表为凤州团练推官，不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1158157_comment'></div>故枢密直学士杨公日严未之识，荐诸朝，拜太子中允，遂致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1158157_comment'></div>始谢门下客，止不教授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1158157_comment'></div>深探《易》性命之理，作书二十篇，䌷复而推原之，《易》家取为隽腴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1158157_comment'></div>明堂赦，改太常丞，赐绯鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1158157_comment'></div>晚年撤荤腥，日一饭，巾褐萧散，自放山水间，号「虚一子」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1158157_comment'></div>枢密太尉田公况治益，时厚问以礼，尽取其书奏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1158157_comment'></div>天子异焉，即家庐拜祠部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1158157_comment'></div>蕴之为人简洁，虽长吏岁时致问，无半语诱以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1158157_comment'></div>与人交，不款曲，澹然对之，故昧者不得亲，贤者不得疏，久乃见其所合云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1158157_comment'></div>嘉祐二年秋九月有疾，召术家曰：「为我择胜日」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1158157_comment'></div>对曰：「丙申良」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1158157_comment'></div>蕴之颔许，即敕家人具潘浴，左右不识谓何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1158157_comment'></div>是日卒于寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1158157_comment'></div>曾祖某，祖某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1158157_comment'></div>考某，为吏，有阴德在人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1158157_comment'></div>母何氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1158157_comment'></div>蕴之引恩，累赠屯田员外郎、永昌君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1158157_comment'></div>娶夫人赵氏，封导江君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1158157_comment'></div>生四子：曰履享、履祥、履和、履中，皆以孝秀世其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1158157_comment'></div>明年，诸子卜冬十二月某日葬通化原，从屯田，蕴之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1158157_comment'></div>予以蕴之为同年弟，知之也熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1158157_comment'></div>又履祥持虢略杨冕状来请铭，呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1158157_comment'></div>予能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1158157_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_1158157'>仕不入官，隐不违世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1158157_comment'></div>藩臣高之，天子褒之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1158157_comment'></div>汎然受名，内完泰和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1158157_comment'></div>万物营营，不能舍其情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1158157_comment'></div>享年七十有三，考终厥命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1158157_comment'></div>是谓其言立不朽之徒欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1158157_comment'></div>奚其为为政者欤！</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1158157_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　约于本年夏，在知益州任，避暑江渎池，有诗。作品：避暑江渎祠池。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一〇。）</span><div id='poem_105581' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105581' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105581?labeling=true' target='_blank'>避暑江渎祠池</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105581")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105581_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105581'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105581'>溪浅容篙短，舟移觉岸长。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105581'>烟稠芰荷叶，霞热荔支房。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105581'>技叠参挝鼓，杯寒十馈浆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105581'>便成逃暑醉，官事底相妨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105581_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105581'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105581_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　约于本年夏，在知益州任，于江渎池小饮，有诗。作品：夏日江渎亭小饮。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一〇。）</span><div id='poem_105333' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105333' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105333?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夏日江渎亭小饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105333")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105333_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105333'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105333'>飞槛枕溪光，欢言客遍觞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105333'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_105333", 105333, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>暂云</span>消树影，骤雨发荷香。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105333'>辛臼橙齑熟，庖刀脍缕长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105333'>蘋风如有意，盈衽借浮凉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105333_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105333'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105333_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　约于本年重阳节，在知益州任，有诗。作品：九日药市作。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷六。）</span>重阳不见菊。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷二四。）</span><div id='poem_105714' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105714' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105714?labeling=true' target='_blank'>九日药市作</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105714")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105714_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105714'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105714'>阳九协嘉辰，斯人始多暇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105714_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105714'>五药会广廛，游肩闹相驾。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年</a>　约于本年，在知益州任，有书答人。作品：王龙图书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157556' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157556' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157556?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王龙图书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157556")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157556_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157556'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157556'>别纸已审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157556_comment'></div>老仆年衰，智有所不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157556_comment'></div>阁下悉攻其短，欲成就所长，不惜药石以瘳仆，仆其愈乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157556_comment'></div>古之益友，果不在他，而在阁下也，感服感服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157556_comment'></div>到益部，尽勒指使辈，不与一事，物物关检，庶免于悔云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157556_comment'></div>弛保囚，酬牙校，弗次，知众论不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157556_comment'></div>然越法重轻，是吾辈便宜事，或要一时激劝耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157556_comment'></div>阁下又能循法改正，可谓善后矣，非仆愚者所能及云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1157556_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年3月5日</a>　三月五日，在知益州任，除三司使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年3月25日</a>　三月二十五日，在益州，以端明殿学士、翰林侍读学士、龙图阁学士、集贤殿修撰知郑州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年3月</a>　三月，罢知益州，以思贤阁图其真，有诗。作品：思贤阁图予真愧而成咏。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_105839' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105839' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105839?labeling=true' target='_blank'>思贤阁图予真愧而成咏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105839")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_105839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105839'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105839'>忝中二千石，罢去辄图真。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105839'>揆予本<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_105839", 105839, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>完士</span>，蚤蒙善养仁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105839'>执笏班华位，飞绥侍邃宸。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105839'>如何金紫服，乃裹丘壑身。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105839'>西南一面重，朅来驾朱轮。<div id='poem_sentence_4_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_105839'>牵拙岁再期，初无德在民。<div id='poem_sentence_5_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_105839'>形象安足纪，崖略聊自陈。<div id='poem_sentence_6_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_105839'>质陋眸子瞭，志泰眉宇伸。<div id='poem_sentence_7_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_105839'>谁谓彼其子，而传阿堵神。<div id='poem_sentence_8_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_105839'>爵里三十八，赫赫多名臣。<div id='poem_sentence_9_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_105839'>瞻前谢前哲，垂后惭后人。<div id='poem_sentence_10_105839_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_105839'></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_105839_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年3月</a>　三月，罢知益州，将归，有诗。作品：将归二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一二。温谱系此诗于嘉祐三年，此据诗意改。）</span><div id='poem_105121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105121' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105121?labeling=true' target='_blank'>将归二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105121")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105121'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105121'>远假西南守，三逢梅柳新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105121'>衰令宦情薄，老惜岁华频。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105121'>郫酿供销日，巴禽巧唤春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105121'>离家何所恨，雁后作归人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105121_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105121'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105121_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_105120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105120?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年3月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105120'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105120'>云栈短长亭，今兹重作经。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105120'>邛崃叱残驭，蜀分使回星。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105120'>旅鬓双垂雪，羁怀一泛萍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105120'>骊驹在门久，此曲若为听。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105120_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105120'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　春，在知益州任，应赵抃之请，为其祖父赵湘文集作序。作品：南阳集序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四五。）</span><div id='poem_1157971' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157971' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157971?labeling=true' target='_blank'>南阳集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157971")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157971'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157971'>曩予以布衣偕计来京师，凡当世有名士，必求得其文章，尽疏之牍，凡数十百家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157971_comment'></div>其间南阳赵叔灵诗才十馀解，清整有法度，浑焉所得，不琢而美，无丹雘而采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157971_comment'></div>然恨未见其多，哜醴亟釂，闻雅音不竟曲，其嗛于愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157971_comment'></div>后四十年，予为益州，于是叔灵之孙抃以殿中侍御史领益路转运使，始尽得叔灵所集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157971_comment'></div>疾启而玩，快然乃大偿所素，则诗之外又有文焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157971_comment'></div>其文恢动沈蔚，不减于诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157971_comment'></div>然叔灵以诗自名，信其好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157971_comment'></div>叔灵名湘，淳化中贡进士，未试而春官已题其警句于都堂之壁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157971_comment'></div>俄中第，调庐江尉，阅期，卒于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157971_comment'></div>生平所蕴，未及设张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157971_comment'></div>论著不盈志，名虽在四方，而不彻天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157971_comment'></div>赍恨大宵，与化而嬗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157971_comment'></div>报享之昧昧，使仁鄙一归于数，可胜叹哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157971_comment'></div>殿中曰：「君既知吾祖，请遂冠篇，以信于传」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157971_comment'></div>予曰：「诺」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157971_comment'></div>大抵近世之诗，多师祖前人，不丐奇博于少陵，萧散于摩诘，则肖貌乐天，祖长江而摹许昌也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157971_comment'></div>故陈言旧辞，未读而先厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157971_comment'></div>若叔灵不傍古，不缘今，独行太虚，探出新意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157971_comment'></div>其无谢一家者欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157971_comment'></div>惜寿夺其壮，不克广取而究述，宁天于诗有所啬乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157971_comment'></div>殿中蹈庆址，复有名于时，为天子才臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157971_comment'></div>则叔灵弗大于身而大于后者，身虽没，其言意所谓不朽者，叔灵尚无憾云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1157971_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

-----title
广汉
-----detail

-----title
梓潼
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='bea0281b6259466e8f84f888029bf83d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("bea0281b6259466e8f84f888029bf83d");'><span id='bea0281b6259466e8f84f888029bf83d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>，62岁</div><div id='bea0281b6259466e8f84f888029bf83d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>四月，由益州赴京途中过绵州，有启与绵州知州。作品：王侍读启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五三。温谱系此文于嘉祐二年，此据文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157680' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157680' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157680?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王侍读启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157680")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157680_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157680'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157680'>二日次左绵，枉飨人肃给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157680_comment'></div>嗣饷醪笋，皆济所乏，感愧无喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157680_comment'></div>但去人滋远，思人滋深，奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157680_comment'></div>陟顿虽勤，幸无雨淖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157680_comment'></div>若过二剑，则无阻矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157680_comment'></div>所过来牟大稔，民屋熙熙，西南信乐国也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157680_comment'></div>今日是学射出遨，想千骑彷徉于鲜原，把酒劳客，观者墙堵，并四者之乐，不亦盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157680_comment'></div>不得一接后乘，歆艳可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157680_comment'></div>山阪日多，乘百步马从兵行役，殊未有涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157680_comment'></div>惟冀善护玉体。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1157680_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>四月，由益州赴京途中过梓潼，有诗。作品：次梓潼。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷八。温谱系此诗于嘉祐二年，此据诗意改。）</span><div id='poem_104912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/104912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次梓潼</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_104912")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_104912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104912'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104912'>行行芳序深，秀色媚诸岑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104912'>早叶易经吹，暖云难久阴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104912'>拥条孤狖啸，戏荇一凫沈。<div id='poem_sentence_2_104912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_104912'>不是无樽酒，其谁共献斟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_104912_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_104912'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_104912_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

剑阁

西安
