-----title
郑州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='f24e9189897f4892ac65ffa258542253_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("f24e9189897f4892ac65ffa258542253");'><span id='f24e9189897f4892ac65ffa258542253_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1060')">1059-1060年</a>，62-63岁</div><div id='f24e9189897f4892ac65ffa258542253' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年5月24日</a>　五月二十四日，到知郑州任，有谢表。作品：郑州谢到任表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157391' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157391' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157391?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑州谢到任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年5月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157391")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157391_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157391'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157391'>臣某言：伏奉四月十九日诏书，授臣依前官加龙图阁学士、知郑州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157391_comment'></div>臣见乞免所加职名、候朝旨外，已于今月二十四日到任上事讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157391_comment'></div>让还剧使，恩与近藩，始冀避亲，终成冒宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157391_comment'></div>伏念臣器识迂暗，年事颓侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157391_comment'></div>前日护边，用非所习；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157391_comment'></div>向来治蜀，烦不值能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157391_comment'></div>蒙赐代符，进迁计职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157391_comment'></div>适以臣兄庠冠枢近之秩，参调发之繁，谊不处嫌，理容上诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157391_comment'></div>果沐中旨，许收误恩，复以华资，寘于便地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157391_comment'></div>陪京甚迩，举族自安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157391_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下大造曲成，至慈善养，释臣多惧，惠臣更生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157391_comment'></div>臣敢不奉扬化条，刻诵圣训？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157391_comment'></div>尚期寸效，归谢上仁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1157391_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年5月24日</a>　五月二十四日，到知郑州任，有谢两地启。作品：郑州到任谢两地启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郑州到任谢两地启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年5月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157776")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157776'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157776'>伏奉去年四月十九日诏书，还旧职兼龙图阁学士知郑州，已于五月二十四日赴任讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157776_comment'></div>避亲辞剧，得可赐藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157776_comment'></div>大造烛幽，举宗蒙幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157776_comment'></div>伏念祁天资拙甚，时事昧然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157776_comment'></div>尽信古言，自安素守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157776_comment'></div>数忝帅领，并付便宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157776_comment'></div>以方有为之时，责非所习之伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157776_comment'></div>类难称职，恩弗汝瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157776_comment'></div>擢领计廷，正妨枢省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157776_comment'></div>引诉既苦，成命改班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157776_comment'></div>帖以美资，假之便郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157776_comment'></div>地虽三辅，靡及于浩穰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157776_comment'></div>人匪独贤，乃叨于燕息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157776_comment'></div>此盖阁下迈种阴德，推衍上慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157776_comment'></div>罔俾处于嫌疑，遂遑宁于转侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157776_comment'></div>敢忘忠敬，归报坯陶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年5月</a>　五月，在知郑州任，有谢兼龙图阁学士表。作品：谢龙图表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157390' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157390' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157390?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢龙图表</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐四年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157390")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157390_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157390'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157390'>右，臣伏奉今月七日中书劄子，以臣陈让龙图阁学士，奉圣旨，令臣依累降圣旨，不许辞让，便令受告敕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157390_comment'></div>危愫数陈，严音三却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157390_comment'></div>拒命难固，蒙宠增惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157390_comment'></div>伏念臣天俾憃愚，性止崖介，时借其运，实不副名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157390_comment'></div>然十七年中，遍践美职，为龙图阁直学士者一，翰林、端明殿者各再，龙图阁、侍读者三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157390_comment'></div>今又丛资累华，并为异数，当今两制兼职，皆不逮臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157390_comment'></div>材劣众贤，而恩冠近列，是以亟剖丹若，上格诏文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157390_comment'></div>涣汗弗收，匹夫终夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157390_comment'></div>昔三绶为侈，两印自矜，未若臣秘禁经筵，宝图重构，衔置重复，班级高华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157390_comment'></div>此盖皇帝陛下垂怜衰残，早经驱策，因避嫌之请，增通籍之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157390_comment'></div>扣铰厩驹，称服珍带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157390_comment'></div>山岳施重，蝼蚁命轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157390_comment'></div>论报何阶，抚躬如陨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1157390_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年5月</a>　五月，在知郑州任，因兼龙图阁学士，有谢两地启。作品：兼龙图谢两地启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兼龙图谢两地启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157805")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157805'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157805'>奉中书劄子，以祁三让，便令授告敕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157805_comment'></div>丹诉数闻，成音三却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157805_comment'></div>愿孤易夺，恩重难违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157805_comment'></div>伏念祁年景颓侵，才力衰钝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157805_comment'></div>召自西蜀，归领计廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157805_comment'></div>属有内避之嫌，尤滞官联之总。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157805_comment'></div>蒙便私请，还授故资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157805_comment'></div>仍因进藩，更帖新职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157805_comment'></div>但素愿已获，旧物尽归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157805_comment'></div>又取美名，实同诡遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157805_comment'></div>沥恳虽苦，收涣莫能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157805_comment'></div>惟令出之必行，终降拜而升受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157805_comment'></div>此盖阁下导仁下济，俾物曲成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157805_comment'></div>恧多取以非廉，畏罔功之求比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157805_comment'></div>誓勤夙夕，冀报涓分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1157805_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年10月</a>　十月，在知郑州任，以袷享赦书加恩，进封常山郡开国公，有谢表。作品：谢加常山郡开国公表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157392' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157392' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157392?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢加常山郡开国公表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157392")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157392_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157392'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157392'>臣某言：十月二十三日，进奏院递到敕诰，伏蒙圣恩，授臣常山郡开国公、加食邑实封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157392_comment'></div>制出中天，恩临蕞品，扪躬匪称，拜命载兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157392_comment'></div>伏念臣才不适时，智非周物，坐逢熙序，历践华涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157392_comment'></div>会国家追讲旷代之遗，盛修合食之享。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157392_comment'></div>孝思上格，臣职骏奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157392_comment'></div>俯惟守土之拘，莫预奉璋之助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157392_comment'></div>魂驰龙扆，魄集驽悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157392_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下凯泽一均，至仁四被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157392_comment'></div>靡间孱陋，例沾宠荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157392_comment'></div>集超列爵之高，益厚加田之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157392_comment'></div>涓尘微效，夙无补于圣猷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157392_comment'></div>穹壤殊私，遽并膺于奖典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157392_comment'></div>重恩难让，愚悃奚安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157392_comment'></div>徒镂骨以自期，庶粉躯而论报<span class='inlineComment2'>（《宋景文集》卷三八。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157392_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1157392'>二十三日：佚存本卷八五作「二十二日」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1157392_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　本年，在知郑州任，有诗寄连庠。作品：寄连元礼屯田员外。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_105377' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄连元礼屯田员外</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105377")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105377'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105377'>忆共西州把酒卮，酒酣风味未全衰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105377'>人惊李郭同舟日，句索羊何共和时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105377'>省帐飘香君觐早，箧书腾谤我归迟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105377'>他年会面须惊怅，瘦尽昆山玉树枝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105377'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105377_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　本年，在知郑州任，有诗送祖无择知陕州。作品：陕府祖择之学士。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷一四。）</span><div id='poem_105103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_105103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/105103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陕府祖择之学士</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_105103")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_105103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_105103'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_105103'>白发书林作丈人，陕郊迢递驾朱轮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_105103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_105103'>谩誇燕许文章手，未得严徐侍从臣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_105103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_105103'>列岫倚窗吟榭晓，乱花窥酒宴堂春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_105103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_105103'>几篇新咏留珉刻，首记銮舆八月巡。<div id='poem_sentence_3_105103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_105103'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_105103_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　本年，在知郑州任，编《西州猥稿》作品：西州猥稿系题。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四八。王谱系此文于嘉祐三年，此据文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157975' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157975' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157975?labeling=true' target='_blank'>西州猥稿系题</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157975")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157975_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157975'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157975'>西州者，益也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157975_comment'></div>猥，杂也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157975_comment'></div>稿，其未工之辞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157975_comment'></div>始予以嘉祐初来为州，州大务丛，日操刀笔坐阁下，吏环立听命，必取判乃得去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157975_comment'></div>又主劳宾客，皆有常处，一不可废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157975_comment'></div>会天子促上唐家书，遣使者就索传草，经三时乃悉送官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157975_comment'></div>凡再期之间，身事交逼，操楫佐辕，伎不两工，故于他论著，不遑及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157975_comment'></div>惟览山川，采谣俗，观风云怪奇，草荣木悴，岁时故新，朋昵判合，时寓诸诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157975_comment'></div>诗者，探所感于中而出之外者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157975_comment'></div>所以怡性情，娱僚宾，故狭章不为贫，积韵不为广，悼于往弗及于流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157975_comment'></div>自假守至满更，月裒日次，凡得百馀篇，杂内褚中，命曰《猥稿》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157975_comment'></div>野庖之芹，穷纬之蒯，自爱而不忍弃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157975_comment'></div>或曰，君之诗往往为邦人写去，奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157975_comment'></div>不如因出之，可见本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157975_comment'></div>予不能谢，即诿门人邛州从事段绎释之书而刻之石，置大智禅坊之亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157975_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157975_comment'></div>后之人孰为我窜其辞，删其冗，掇所得百分之一，以备乐府杂家，俾知治世之音安且乐云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1157975_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年3月</a>　三月，在知郑州任，以修《唐书》成，进尚书左丞，上劄子辞让。作品：让转左丞劄子。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷二八。）</span><div id='poem_1157281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>让转左丞劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐五年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157281")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157281'>右，臣今月十八日，本州进奏院递到官诰敕牒各一道，以《唐书》了毕，转臣尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157281_comment'></div>闻命警惧，不知所舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157281_comment'></div>臣自庆历中受诏纂修，与诸儒讨论，首尾才及六年，便值臣差任出外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157281_comment'></div>虽朝廷许将史草自随，悉力编纂，其如极边事务，荒废转多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157281_comment'></div>皇祐中史未有绪，蒙朝廷差欧阳修分总纪志，与臣共力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157281_comment'></div>臣任益州日，烦差使臣督趣列传残卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157281_comment'></div>及移郑州，又蒙遣编修官吕夏卿乘驿就臣商较同异，催促了当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157281_comment'></div>历一十七年，书克奏上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157281_comment'></div>书成淹延，职臣之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157281_comment'></div>至如欧阳修撰列纪志等众篇，各有法度，方成一家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157281_comment'></div>范镇、王畴以下，撰次精该。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157281_comment'></div>一代大典，非修等不成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157281_comment'></div>臣去书局已十有一年，修撰之时，不与诸儒研确；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157281_comment'></div>成书之日，又不与伏奏殿廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157281_comment'></div>臣于修书之勤，十不得一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157281_comment'></div>若然，臣有稽延之罪，无编次之勤，不可与修等均赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157281_comment'></div>伏乞陛下收还臣此来恩命，只旌赏修以下诸儒，庶责赏分明，允惬公议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1157281_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　春，在知郑州任，有书答孙瑜。作品：兖州学士书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。温谱系此文于嘉祐四年，此据文意改。）</span><div id='poem_1157615' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157615' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157615?labeling=true' target='_blank'>兖州学士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157615")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157615_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157615'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157615'>顷得二讯，殊解悁悁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157615_comment'></div>属久病，不克时答，果见诮让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157615_comment'></div>然地远，必恐未始知之耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157615_comment'></div>某自蜀还，中热，胃气虚滑，日饭半升许不能尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157615_comment'></div>数月间顿成衰翁，肤冻梨而发纷雪也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157615_comment'></div>入仲春，稍良愈，但癯弱未完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157615_comment'></div>少于阁下乃如此，固知蒲柳之不如松柏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157615_comment'></div>见索拙句，今且驰奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157615_comment'></div>戚戚少悰，深恧稚鄙，诸贤得无笑仆乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157615_comment'></div>春序妍淑，公馀自爱毋忽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1157615_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年4月</a>　四月，在知郑州任，有谢转尚书左丞表。作品：谢转左丞表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集拾遗》卷一二。）</span><div id='poem_1157487' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157487' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157487?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢转左丞表</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157487")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157487_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157487'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157487'>臣某言：三月十八日，进奏院递到官诰敕牒各一道，以臣同修《唐书》成，除臣尚书左丞，依前充端明殿、翰林侍读、龙图阁等学士，集贤殿修撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157487_comment'></div>寻具奏陈让，今月八日奉答诏不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157487_comment'></div>冒荣而授，抚己增惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157487_comment'></div>臣某诚荣诚感，顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157487_comment'></div>伏念臣曩与诸儒，共刊旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157487_comment'></div>粗使在外，裒稿自随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157487_comment'></div>十有七年，书乃绝笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157487_comment'></div>伏蒙尊号皇帝陛下列责其缓，止录所勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157487_comment'></div>外嘉终篇，例诏增秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157487_comment'></div>臣实无状，辄用固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157487_comment'></div>而成命已行，如汗不返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157487_comment'></div>众力相藉，孤让难从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157487_comment'></div>永惟剧司，是号中辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157487_comment'></div>臣敢不以瘁补拙，勉懦为强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157487_comment'></div>一得一酬，允殒无惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157487_comment'></div>臣无任戴天荷圣激切屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157487_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年6月</a>　六月，在知郑州任，序迁工部尚书。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年6月</a>　六月，在知郑州任，有启上韩绎。作品：上蔡州韩谏议启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五六。）</span><div id='poem_1157793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上蔡州韩谏议启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157793")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157793'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157793'>承以尽言触宰相，出守近州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157793_comment'></div>初闻之甚骇怅，俄而释然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157793_comment'></div>古之人当官而行，亦皆如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157793_comment'></div>坚车大艎，不能不小留却而后臻于所趣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157793_comment'></div>雅怀想以此自慰，但暑热，馆次少为劳烦，矧素简上心，当不远而复，慎护斋疾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1157793_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　夏，在知郑州任，有书上张瑰。作品：上紫微张唐公舍人书二首。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷四九。）</span><div id='poem_1157534' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157534' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157534?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上紫微张唐公舍人书<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157534")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157534_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157534'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157534'>承驰驿赴召，已止阙下，大慰斯文景止之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157534_comment'></div>偃薄埃雾，喜玉体为爽叶和，乃心慰抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157534_comment'></div>某久病在告，人事多不闻知，失于迎讯，想至仁亮之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157534_comment'></div>几日入对，上固想见风采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157534_comment'></div>俟病已造朝，得首走清防，谨奉启陈闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1157534_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1157535' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157535' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157535?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157535_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157535'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157535'>侧闻以言诿出领便州，殊用惋怅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157535_comment'></div>虽然，唐公以直道进，以直道去，想无所悔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157535_comment'></div>但触盛暑，汎淮江，此为劳烦耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157535_comment'></div>按六辔，走夷道，时时小却，无足较计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157535_comment'></div>惟宝用精神，绵绵不勤则善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157535_comment'></div>某蒙免无他，又此阔别，相见尚未日，末如悁企何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157535_comment'></div>不宣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1157535_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年7月</a>　七月，在知郑州任，有谢转工部尚书表。作品：谢转工部尚书表。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三八。）</span><div id='poem_1157393' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157393' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157393?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢转工部尚书表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157393")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157393_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157393'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157393'>臣某言：奉去年六月二十三日制诏，授臣工部尚书，职任、勋、封、食实封、赐等并如旧，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157393_comment'></div>成命临下，愧汗交颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157393_comment'></div>伏念臣性本迂疏，能有涯分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157393_comment'></div>论撰清选，每得窜名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157393_comment'></div>虽边要至雄，亦叨假节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157393_comment'></div>奏课弗效，误眷无酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157393_comment'></div>向以众力成书，特恩进秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157393_comment'></div>避让既却，冒受尚新，俄录岁勤，更偕省坐，名品尤峻，迟暮难堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157393_comment'></div>但四载叙迁，已成定制；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157393_comment'></div>一辞祈免，恐近取名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157393_comment'></div>辄服褒言，肃祗官次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157393_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下广无遗覆，照必逮微，垂记孤臣，普加陟典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157393_comment'></div>敢不益勉孱陋，愈探典刑，肌骨昭铭，涓埃廑效。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1157393_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年7月</a>　七月，在知郑州任，有《回贺加尚书启》作品：回贺加尚书启。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五二。）</span><div id='poem_1157650' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157650' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157650?labeling=true' target='_blank'>回贺加尚书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157650")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157650_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157650'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157650'>向以成书，冒荣左辖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157650_comment'></div>兹繇满岁，进秩中台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157650_comment'></div>宠过者灾必相寻，食浮者人将不称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157650_comment'></div>惕然自愧，罔或遑宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157650_comment'></div>敢图评旦之优，助协朝佥之允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157650_comment'></div>华褒已定，危悃差安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157650_comment'></div>遂系金石之交，更决桑榆之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157650_comment'></div>瞻言厚德，载戢丹衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157650_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1157650_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='535f1d0a2d6c4e1b915d261337391d9e_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("535f1d0a2d6c4e1b915d261337391d9e");'><span id='535f1d0a2d6c4e1b915d261337391d9e_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>，63岁</div><div id='535f1d0a2d6c4e1b915d261337391d9e' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，在知郑州任，为僧梵才文集作序。作品：淮海丛编集序。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集拾遗》卷一五。）</span><div id='poem_1157977' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157977' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157977?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淮海丛编集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157977")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157977_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157977'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157977'>诗为天地缊，予常意藏混茫中，若有区所，人之才者，能往取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157977_comment'></div>取多者名无穷，少者自高一世，顾力至不至尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157977_comment'></div>然造物者吝之，其取之无限，则辄穷踬其命，而怫戾所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157977_comment'></div>予略记其近者，王摩诘颠于盗，愁苦仅脱死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157977_comment'></div>杜子美客巴蜀，入沅湘，寒饥不自存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157977_comment'></div>李太白踣于贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157977_comment'></div>白乐天偃蹇不得志，五十馀分司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157977_comment'></div>元微之为众排迮，终身恨望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157977_comment'></div>刘梦得流摈，抵老弗见容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157977_comment'></div>是皆章章信验也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157977_comment'></div>惟山林方外之人，亟索亟用，天不能扼其数，以无求于世，与道彷徉者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157977_comment'></div>予友梵才吉公其人欤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157977_comment'></div>公资能诗，始来京师，以高言警章与士大夫相酬谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157977_comment'></div>士大夫争从之游，名彻天子，故锡命服师号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157977_comment'></div>师亦以宠为侈，遂以南方庵天台凡三十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157977_comment'></div>年愈高，学愈精，自浙东西，山溪鸟鱼，草木风云，人事法集，灵所怪区，一物一兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1157977_comment'></div>瞻公之思，不能给而告疲焉，可谓取其蕴多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1157977_comment'></div>公又挟惠力自在，天果不能扼之乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1157977_comment'></div>故前后所著踰千篇，分目数集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1157977_comment'></div>所谓《淮海丛编》，其第三集也，属予以叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1157977_comment'></div>公之得诵人口、贵人纸者固多，不待仆赞而显矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1157977_comment'></div>虽然，愿一言焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1157977_comment'></div>公之徒若有辩如净名者，或呵公以外学自彰，公云何而默其呵，使予释然云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1157977_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>本年，在知郑州任，有书与僧梵才。作品：吉大师书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1157617' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157617' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157617?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吉大师书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157617")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157617_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157617'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157617'>去夏五月，自蜀留郑，首得手教，具审少病少恼，道体佳宜远静，欣欣之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157617_comment'></div>日来殊衰疾，心厌嚣烦，惟阅儒篇梵典不知勌，殆宿业使然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157617_comment'></div>每怀清对，无缘一快语，劳生奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157617_comment'></div>顷须丛编题辞，久欲附上，但不能得善便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157617_comment'></div>今且托邮置，未知果得尘观览否？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157617_comment'></div>苟无沈浮，分一回字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157617_comment'></div>拙思不足褒扬公所得，愧汗愧汗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1157617_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
中牟
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='748b18c0397343999368056ba9a3993b_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("748b18c0397343999368056ba9a3993b");'><span id='748b18c0397343999368056ba9a3993b_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>，63岁</div><div id='748b18c0397343999368056ba9a3993b' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>七月，在知郑州任，上状乞解郑州任，还京求医。作品：乞解郑州还京求医状。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷三〇。）</span><div id='poem_1157326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157326?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞解郑州还京求医状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1060年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(24788, "北宋", "宋祁", "poem_title_1157326")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157326'>右，臣伏以臣子危急，必干朝廷，祈君父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157326_comment'></div>虽诛戮在前，不敢避也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157326_comment'></div>伏念臣自去年五月脾胃寒泄，服暖药过度，虚风客热，结成沉疴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157326_comment'></div>发歇不定，经一年有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157326_comment'></div>臣以所领州路当两京冲要，诚欲尽瘁，死节官下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157326_comment'></div>是以不敢请假，牵勉勾当，偶无旷败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157326_comment'></div>昨自六月中，寒溏顿作，不复支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1157326_comment'></div>经四十馀日，饮食减少，出厅不得，肌肉销尽，惟有皮骨，左脚麻木，行履艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1157326_comment'></div>情志昏塞，委实勾当不前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1157326_comment'></div>遂于七月二十一日，牒公事与本州通判管勾，已奏闻讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1157326_comment'></div>人情病未及死，须思治疗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1157326_comment'></div>伏缘外州难得医药，坐待死亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1157326_comment'></div>臣欲望圣慈，念臣从川途替归，往复万里，年老病甚，将就溘然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1157326_comment'></div>特许解罢郑州，令还京师，就求医药，以救残喘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1157326_comment'></div>或得一閒散，主判司局，所贵易得假告，休息衰骸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1157326_comment'></div>万一尪残之躯，未填沟壑，再得陪服朝序，即异时朝旨，别有差遣，不以远迩，闻命即行，以答陛下再生之赐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1157326_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>七月，在知郑州任，有书答张文裕。作品：文裕待制书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。）</span><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>七月，将自郑州还京，有书上人。作品：王尚书书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《景文集》卷五一。）</span><div id='poem_1157613' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1157613' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1157613?labeling=true' "poem_title_1157613")'>宋祁</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1157613_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1157613'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1157613'>递中得教谆谆，俄专使来，又慰存累幅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1157613_comment'></div>某，病残人也，曷以堪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1157613_comment'></div>自六月苦痢，弥五十日不克损，皮骨仅存，遂乞身便医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1157613_comment'></div>蒙朝旨许还台，君相更生之恩也，一二难道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1157613_comment'></div>方力疾就路，至仁果尔恻怛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1157613_comment'></div>年事迟暮，故为百疾所陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1157613_comment'></div>傥馀景可延，冀终托陶坯之末云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1157613_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>七月，自郑州还京，途中过中牟，有诗。作品：去郑暮次中牟。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《景文集》卷八。温谱系此诗于嘉祐四年，此据诗意改。）</span><div id='poem_104811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_104811' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_104811'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_104811'>暮投京县宿，气象已纷罗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_104811_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_104811'>菀树道旁密，侯田关内多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_104811_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_104811'>高城切星斗，秋水似天河。<div
